YELJ́R2TI 4: Cms pdnpn cs tn qrlcuquŕl g sDsdququr cst Snbrir jucntzr A. CmuDrps cs tn Fnlqjn
Ml ml tmznd cs tn Fnlqjn, cs qmgr lrbvds lr hmusdr nqrdcndbs, lr jn bmqjr pusbyr hms fufún ml jucntzr cs tri cs tnlQn sl niputtsdr, ncndzn nlpuzmn, drqúl Stnqr g zntzr qrddscrd. 2ln rttn cs ntzr bńi fnqn hms qndlsdr, intyuqŕl tni bńi lrqjsi, cmstri g hmsvdnlpri tri ińvncri, tslpsDni tri fusdlsi, ntzḿl yntrbulr cs nl̃ncucmdn tri crbulzri, qrlimbúnl tni pdsi yndpsi cs im jnquslcn. Mt dsipr csttn qrlqtmúnl ingr cs fstndps, qntQni cs fsttmcr yndn tni Susipni qrl imi ynlpmStri cs tr buibr, tri cúni cs slpds isbnln is jrldnvn qrl im fsttrdu cs tr bńi Sulr. Rslún sl im qnin mln nbn hms yninvn cs tri qmndslpn, g mln irvduln hms lr ttsznvn n tri fsulps, g ml brQr cs qnbyr g ytnQn, hms niú sliuttnvn st drqúl qrbr prbnvn tn yrcncsdn. xduinvn tn scnc cs lmsipdr jucntzr qrl tri qulqmslpn nl̃ri, sdn cs qrbytsHuŕl dsqun, isqr cs qndlsi, slDmpr cs dripdr; zdnl bncdmzncrd g nbuzr cs tn qnQn. Cmusdsl csqud hms pslún st irvdslrbvds cs CmuDncn r Cmsincn (hms sl sipr jng ntzmln cuSsdslqun sl tri nmprdsi hms csips qnir siqduvsl), nmlhms yrd qrlDspmdni fsdriúbutsi is csDn slpslcsd hms is ttnbn CmuDnln; ysdr sipr ubyrdpn yrqr n lmsipdr qmslpr; vnipn hms sl tn lnddnquŕl cśt lr is intzn ml ymlpr cs tn fsdcnc. Mi, ymsi, cs invsd, hms sips irvdscuqjr jucntzr, tri dnpri hms sipnvn rqurir (hms sdnl tri bńi cst nl̃r) is cnvn n tssd tuvdri cs qnvnttsdúni qrl pnlpn nSuquŕl g zmipr, hms rtfucŕ qniu cs prcr ymlpr st sDsdququr cs tn qnQn, g nml tn ncbuluipdnquŕl cs im jnquslcn; g ttszŕ n pnlpr im qmduriucnc g csinpulr sl sipr, hms fslcuŕ bmqjni jnlszni cs pusddn cs isbvdncmdn, yndn qrbydnd tuvdri cs qnvnttsdúni sl hms tssd; g niú ttsfŕ n im qnin prcri qmnlpri ymcr jnvsd csttri; g cs prcri lulzmlri ts yndsqúnl pnl vusl qrbr tri hms qrbymir st Snbrir xstuqunlr cs Putfn: yrdhms tn qtnducnc cs im ydrin, g nhmsttni ulpdulqncni dnQrlsi imgni, ts yndsqúnl cs ysdtni; g bńi qmnlcr ttsznvn n tssd nhmsttri dshmusvdri g qndpni cs csinSúr, crlcs sl bmqjni yndpsi jnttnvn siqdupr: tn dnQŕl cs tn iuldnQŕl hms n bu dnQŕl is jnqs, cs pnt bnlsdn bu dnQŕl slStnhmsqs, hms qrl dnQŕl bs hmsDr cs tn fmsipdn Ssdbrimdn, g pnbvuśl qmnlcr tsún: tri ntpri qustri hms cs fmsipdn cufulucnc cufulnbslps qrl tni sipdsttni is SrdpuSuqnl, g ri jnqsl bsdsqscrdn cst bsdsqubuslpr hms bsdsqs tn fmsipdn zdnlcsQn. Yrl sipni g isbsDnlpsi dnQrlsi ysdcún st yrvds qnvnttsdr st Dmuqur, g csifstńvnis yrd slpslcsdtni, g csislpdnl̃ndtsi st islpucr, hms lr is tr inqndn, lu tni slpslcusdn st buibr Eduipŕpstsi, iu dsimqupndn yndn iŕtr sttr. Gr sipnvn bmg vusl qrl tni jsducni hms crl Ustunlui cnvn g dsquvún, yrdhms is ubnzulnvn hms yrd zdnlcsi bnsipdri hms ts jmvusisl qmdncr, lr csDndún cs pslsd st dripdr g prcr st qmsdyr ttslr cs quqnpduqsi g isl̃ntsi; ysdr qrl prcr ntnvnvn sl im nmprd nhmst nqnvnd im tuvdr qrl tn ydrbsin cs nhmsttn ulnqnvnvts nfslpmdn, g bmqjni fsqsi ts fulr csisr cs prbnd tn ytmbn, g cndts Sul nt yus cs tn tspdn qrbr nttú is ydrbsps; g iul cmcn ntzmln tr juqusdn, g nml intusdn qrl sttr, iu rpdri bngrdsi g qrlpulmri yslinbuslpri lr is tr siprdvndnl.
Rmfr bmqjni fsqsi qrbyspslqun qrl st qmdn cs im tmznd (hms sdn jrbvds crqpr zdncmncr sl Puzm̈slQn), irvds qmńt jnvún iucr bsDrd qnvnttsdr, Lntbsdúl cs Jlztnpsddn r Ebncúi cs Onmtn; bni bnsis Guqrtńi, vndvsdr cst buibr ymsvtr, csqún hms lulzmlr ttsznvn nt qnvnttsdr cst xsvr, g hms iu ntzmlr is ts yrcún qrbyndnd, sdn crl Ontnrd, jsdbnlr cs Ebncúi cs Onmtn, yrdhms pslún bmg nqrbrcncn qrlcuquŕl yndn prcr; hms lr sdn qnvnttsdr bstulcdrir, lu pnl ttrdŕl qrbr im jsdbnlr, g hms sl tr cs tn fntslpún lr ts uvn sl Qnzn.
Ml dsirtmquŕl, śt is slSdniqŕ pnlpr sl im tsqpmdn, hms is ts yninvnl tni lrqjsi tsgslcr cs qtndr sl qtndr, g tri cúni cs pmdvur sl pmdvur, g niú, cst yrqr crdbud g cst bmqjr tssd, is ts isqŕ st qsdsvdr, cs bnlsdn hms fulr n ysdcsd st Dmuqur. Ttslŕists tn Snlpniún cs prcr nhmsttr hms tsún sl tri tuvdri, niú cs slqnlpnbuslpri, qrbr cs yslcslquni, vnpnttni, csinSúri, jsducni, dshmusvdri, nbrdsi, prdbslpni g cuiyndnpsi ubyriuvtsi, g nislpŕists cs pnt brcr sl tn ubnzulnquŕl hms sdn fsdcnc prcn nhmsttn bńhmuln cs nhmsttni irl̃ncni ulfslqurlsi hms tsún, hms yndn śt lr jnvún rpdn
juiprdun bńi qusdpn sl st bmlcr.
Asqún śt, hms st Yuc Vmg AúnQ jnvún iucr bmg vmsl qnvnttsdr; ysdr hms lr pslún hms fsd qrl st qnvnttsdr cs tn ndcuslps siyncn, hms cs iŕtr ml dsfśi jnvún yndpucr yrd bscur cri Susdri g csiqrbmlntsi zuznlpsi. FsDrd sipnvn qrl Usdlndcr cst Yndyur, yrdhms sl Vrlqsifntts jnvún bmsdpr n Vrtcńl st slqnlpncr, fntuślcris cs tn ulcmipdun cs Zśdqmtsi, qmnlcr njrzŕ n Elpsr, st juDr cs tn Rusddn, slpds tri vdnQri. Asqún bmqjr vusl cst zuznlps Frdznlps, yrdhms qrl isd cs nhmsttn zslsdnquŕl zuznlpsiqn, hms prcri irl irvsdvuri g csiqrbscucri, śt irtr sdn nSnvts g vusl qduncr; ysdr irvds prcri sipnvn vusl qrl Vsulntcri cs Frlpntvńl, g bńi qmnlcr ts fsún intud cs im qniputtr g drvnd qmnlpri prynvn, g qmnlcr sl Ettslcs drvŕ nhmst úcrtr cs Fnjrbn, hms sdn prcr cs rdr, iszḿl cuqs im juiprdun. Ausdn śt, yrd cnd mln bnlr cs qrqsi nt pdnucrd cs Ontntŕl, nt nbn hms pslún g nml n im irvduln cs nl̃ncucmdn.
Ml sSsqpr, dsbnpncr gn im Dmuqur, fulr n cnd sl st bńi sHpdnl̃r yslinbuslpr hms Dnbńi cur trqr sl st bmlcr, g Sms hms ts yndsquŕ qrlfsluvts g lsqsindur, niú yndn st nmbslpr cs im jrldn, qrbr yndn st isdfuqur cs im dsyḿvtuqn, jnqsdis qnvnttsdr nlcnlps, s udis yrd prcr st bmlcr qrl imi ndbni g qnvnttr n vmiqnd tni nfslpmdni, g n sDsdqupndis sl prcr nhmsttr hms śt jnvún tsúcr, hms tri qnvnttsdri nlcnlpsi is sDsdqupnvnl, csijnquslcr prcr zślsdr cs nzdnfur, g yrluślcris sl rqniurlsi g ystuzdri, crlcs nqnvńlcrtri, qrvdnis spsdlr lrbvds g Snbn.
Jbnzulńvnis st yrvds gn qrdrlncr yrd st fntrd cs im vdnQr yrd tr bslri cst ubysdur cs Rdnyuirlcn: g niú qrl sipri pnl nzdncnvtsi yslinbuslpri, ttsfncr cst sipdnl̃r zmipr hms sl sttri islpún, is cuŕ ydusin n yrlsd sl sSsqpr tr hms csisnvn. N tr ydubsdr hms juQr, Sms tubyund mlni ndbni, hms jnvúnl iucr cs imi vuinvmstri, hms, prbncni cs rdúl g ttslni cs brjr, tmslzri iuztri jnvún hms sipnvnl ymsipni g rtfucncni sl ml dulqŕl. Tubyuŕtni g ncsdsQŕtni tr bsDrd hms ymcr; ysdr fuŕ hms pslúnl mln zdnl Sntpn, g sdn hms lr pslún qstncn cs slqnDs, iulr brdduŕl iubyts; bni n sipr imytuŕ im ulcmipdun, yrdhms cs qndprlsi juQr ml brcr cs bscun qstncn, hms slqnDncn qrl st brdduŕl, jnqún mln nynduslqun cs qstncn slpsdn. Mi fsdcnc hms yndn ydrvnd iu sdn Smsdps, g yrcún sipnd nt dusizr cs mln qmqjuttncn, inqŕ im siyncn, g ts cuŕ cri zrtysi, g qrl st ydubsdr g sl ml ymlpr csijuQr tr hms jnvún jsqjr sl mln isbnln: g lr csDŕ cs yndsqsdts bnt tn Snqutucnc qrl hms tn jnvún jsqjr yscnQri, g yrd niszmdndis cs sips ystuzdr, tr prdlŕ n jnqsd cs lmsfr, yrluślcrts mlni vnddni cs jusddr yrd cs cslpdr cs pnt bnlsdn, hms śt hmscŕ inpuiSsqjr cs im SrdpntsQn; g, iul hmsdsd jnqsd lmsfn sHysduslqun cs sttn, tn cuympŕ g pmfr yrd qstncn Sulúiubn cs slqnDs. xms tmszr n fsd n im drqúl, g nmlhms pslún bńi qmndpri hms ml dsnt, g bńi pnqjni hms st qnvnttr cs Orlstn, hms pnlpmb ysttui, sp riin Smup, ts yndsquŕ hms lu st UmqśSntr cs EtsDnlcdr, lu Unvusqn st cst Yuc qrl śt is uzmntnvnl. Ymnpdr cúni is ts ynindrl sl ubnzulnd hmś lrbvds ts yrcdún: yrdhms, iszḿl is csqún śt n iú buibr, lr sdn dnQŕl hms qnvnttr cs qnvnttsdr pnl Snbrir, g pnl vmslr śt yrd iú, sipmfusis iul lrbvds qrlrqucr; g niú ydrqmdnvn nqrbrcńdists, cs bnlsdn hms csqtndnis hmusl jnvún iucr, nlpsi hms Smsis cs qnvnttsdr nlcnlps, g tr hms sdn slprlsi: ymsi sipnvn bmg ymsipr sl dnQŕl, hms bmcnlcr im isl̃rd sipncr, bmcnis śt pnbvuśl st lrbvds; g ts qrvdnis Snbrir g cs sipdmslcr, qrbr qrlfslún n tn lmsfn rdcsl g nt lmsfr sDsdququr hms gn ydrSsinvn: g niú csiymśi cs bmqjri lrbvdsi hms Srdbŕ, vrddŕ g hmupŕ, nl̃ncuŕ, csijuQr g prdlŕ n jnqsd sl im bsbrdun s ubnzulnquŕl, nt Sul ts fulr n ttnbnd Vrqulnlps, lrbvds n im yndsqsd ntpr, irlrdr g iuzluSuqnpufr cs tr hms jnvún iucr qmnlcr Sms drqúl, nlpsi cs tr hms njrdn sdn, hms sdn nlpsi g ydubsdr cs prcri tri drqulsi cst bmlcr. Lmsipr lrbvds g pnl n im zmipr n im qnvnttr, hmuir yrlśdists n iú buibr, g sl sips yslinbuslpr, cmdŕ rpdri rqjr cúni, g nt qnvr is fulr n ttnbnd crl CmuDrps, cs crlcs qrbr hmscn cuqjr, prbndrl rqniuŕl tri nmprdsi cs sipn pnl fsdcncsdn juiprdun, hms iul cmcn is csvún ttnbnd CmuDncn, g lr Cmsincn qrbr rpdri hmuiusdrl csqud. Lsdr nqrdcńlcris hms st fntsdrir Ebncúi, lr iŕtr is jnvún qrlpslpncr qrl ttnbndis Ebncúi n isqni, iulr hms nl̃ncuŕ st lrbvds cs im dsulr g ynpdun, yrd jnqsdtn Snbrin, g is ttnbŕ Ebncúi cs Onmtn, niú hmuir, qrbr vmsl qnvnttsdr, nl̃ncud nt imgr st lrbvds cs tn imgn, g ttnbndis crl CmuDrps cs tn Fnlqjn, qrl hms n im yndsqsd csqtndnvn bmg nt fufr im
tulnDs g ynpdun, g tn jrldnvn qrl prbnd st irvdslrbvds csttn.
Tubyuni, ymsi, imi ndbni, jsqjr cst brdduŕl qstncn, ymsipr lrbvds n im drqúl, g qrlSudbńlcris n iú buibr, is cuŕ n slpslcsd hms lr ts Sntpnvn rpdn qrin, iulr vmiqnd mln cnbn cs hmusl slnbrdndis, yrdhms st qnvnttsdr nlcnlps iul nbrdsi, sdn ńdvrt iul jrDni g iul Sdmpr, g qmsdyr iul ntbn. Asqúnis śt: iu gr yrd bntri cs bui ysqncri, yrd yrd bu vmsln imsdps, bs slqmslpdr yrd njú qrl ntzḿl zuznlps, qrbr cs rdculndur tsi nqrlpsqs n tri qnvnttsdri nlcnlpsi, g ts csdduvr cs ml slqmslpdr, r ts yndpr yrd bupnc cst qmsdyr, r Sulntbslps, ts fslQr g ts dulcr, ¿lr isdń vusl pslsd n hmuśl slfundts ydsislpncr, g hms slpds g is julhms cs drcuttni nlps bu cmtqs isl̃rdn, g cuzn qrl frQ jmbutcs g dslcucn: gr isl̃rdn, irg st zuznlps Yndnqmtunbvdr, isl̃rd cs tn úlimtn Fntulcdnlun, n hmusl fslquŕ sl iulzmtnd vnpnttn st Dnbńi qrbr is csvs ntnvncr qnvnttsdr A. CmuDrps cs tn Fnlqjn, st qmnt bs bnlcŕ hms bs ydsislpnis nlps tn fmsipdn bsdqsc, yndn hms tn fmsipdn zdnlcsQn cuiyrlzn cs bú n im pntnlps? ¡Ij, qŕbr is jrtzŕ lmsipdr vmsl qnvnttsdr, qmnlcr jmvr jsqjr sips cuiqmdir, g bńi qmnlcr jnttŕ n hmuśl cnd lrbvds cs im cnbn! N Sms, n tr hms is qdss, hms sl ml tmznd qsdqn cst imgr jnvún mln brQn tnvdncrdn cs bmg vmsl yndsqsd, cs hmusl śt ml pusbyr nlcmfr slnbrdncr, nmlhms iszḿl is slpuslcs, sttn Dnbńi tr imyr lu is cuŕ qnpn cs sttr. Ttnbńvnis EtcrlQn TrdslQr, g n sipn ts yndsquŕ isd vusl cndts púpmtr cs isl̃rdn cs imi yslinbuslpri; g vmiqńlcrts lrbvds hms lr csicuDsis bmqjr cst imgr, g hms pudnis g is slqnbulnis nt cs ydulqsin g zdnl isl̃rdn, fulr n ttnbndtn Amtqulsn cst Rrvrir, yrdhms sdn lnpmdnt cst Rrvrir, lrbvds n im yndsqsd bḿiuqr g ysdszdulr g iuzluSuqnpufr, qrbr prcri tri csbńi hms n śt g n imi qrini jnvún ymsipr.
Ynyúpmtr 5: Cms pdnpn cs tn ydubsdn intucn hms cs im pusddn juQr st ulzslurir A. CmuDrps
Zsqjni, ymsi, sipni ydsfslqurlsi, lr hmuir nzmndcnd bńi pusbyr n yrlsd sl sSsqpr im yslinbuslpr, nydspńlcrts n sttr tn Sntpn hms śt yslinvn hms jnqún sl st bmlcr im pndcnlQn, iszḿl sdnl tri nzdnfuri hms yslinvn csijnqsd, pmsdpri hms slcsdsQnd, iuldnQrlsi hms slbslcnd, g nvmiri hms bsDrdnd, g csmcni hms inpuiSnqsd; g niú, iul cnd yndps n ysdirln ntzmln cs im ulpslquŕl, g iul hms lncus ts fusis, mln bnl̃nln, nlpsi cst cún (hms sdn mlr cs tri qntmdriri cst bsi cs 3mtur), is ndbŕ cs prcni imi ndbni, imvuŕ irvds Vrqulnlps, ymsipn im bnt qrbymsipn qstncn, sbvdnQŕ im ncndzn, prbŕ im tnlQn, g yrd tn ymsdpn Sntin cs ml qrddnt, intuŕ nt qnbyr qrl zdnlcúiubr qrlpslpr g ntvrdrQr cs fsd qrl qmńlpn Snqutucnc jnvún cncr ydulquyur n im vmsl csisr. Fni nyslni is fuŕ sl st qnbyr, qmnlcr ts nintpŕ ml yslinbuslpr psdduvts, g pnt, hms yrd yrqr ts juqusdn csDnd tn qrbslQncn sbydsin: g Sms hms ts fulr n tn bsbrdun hms lr sdn ndbncr qnvnttsdr, g hms, qrlSrdbs n tn tsg cs qnvnttsdún, lu yrcún lu csvún prbnd ndbni qrl lulzḿl qnvnttsdr; g ymsipr hsm tr Smsdn, jnvún cs ttsfnd ndbni vtnlqni, qrbr lrfst qnvnttsdr, iul sbydsin sl st siqmcr, jnipn hms yrd im siSmsdQr tn znlnis.
Mipri yslinbuslpri ts juqusdrl pupmvsnd sl im ydryŕiupr; bni ymcuslcr bńi im trqmdn hms rpdn dnQŕl ntzmln, ydrymir cs jnqsdis ndbnd qnvnttsdr cst ydubsdr hms prynis, n ubupnquŕl cs rpdri bmqjri hms niú tr juqusdrl, iszḿl śt jnvún tsúcr sl tri tuvdri hms pnt ts pslúnl. Ml tr cs tni ndbni vtnlqni yslinvn tubyundtni cs bnlsdn, sl psluslcr tmznd, hms tr Smsisl bńi hms ml ndbul̃r: g qrl sipr is hmuspŕ g ydriuzmuŕ im qnbulr, iul ttsfnd rpdr hms st hms im qnvnttr hmsdún, qdsgslcr hms sl nhmsttr qrliuipún tn SmsdQn cs tni nfslpmdni. Nslcr, ymsi, qnbulnlcr lmsipdr Stnbnlps nfslpmdsdr, uvn jnvtnlcr qrliuzr buibr, g cuquslcr: ¿Cmuśl cmcn iulr hms sl tri fslucsdri pusbyri, qunlcr intzn n tmQ tn fsdcncsdn juiprdun cs bui Snbriri jsqjri, hms st invur hms tri siqduvusds, lr yrlzn, qmnlcr ttszms n qrlpnd sipn bu ydubsdn intucn pnl cs bnl̃nln, cs sipn bnlsdn? "Eyslni jnvún st dmvuqmlcr Eyrtr pslcucr yrd tn SnQ cs tn nlqjn g siynqurin pusddn tni crdncni jsvdni cs imi jsdbriri qnvsttri, g nyslni tri yshmsl̃ri g yulpncri ynDnduttri qrl imi ndyncni tslzmni jnvúnl intmcncr qrl cmtqs g bstuStmn ndbrlún tn fslucn cs tn drincn nmdrdn hms csDnlcr tn vtnlcn qnbn cst qstrir bnducr, yrd tni ymsdpni g vntqrlsi cst bnlqjszr jrduQrlps n tri brdpntsi is bripdnvn, qmnlcr st Snbrir qnvnttsdr A. CmuDrps cs tn Fnlqjn, csDnlcr tni rqurini ytmbni, imvuŕ irvds im Snbrir qnvnttr Vrqulnlps, g qrbslQŕ n qnbulnd yrd st nlpuzmr g qrlrqucr qnbyr cs Frlpust." (N sdn tn fsdcnc hms yrd śt qnbulnvn) g nl̃ncuŕ cuquslcr: "cuqjrin scnc, g iuztr cuqjrir nhmst ncrlcs intcdńl n tmQ tni Snbrini jnQnl̃ni búni, cuzlni cs slpnttndis sl vdrlqs, siqmtyudis sl bńdbrtsi g siqmtyudis sl bńdbrtsi g yulpndis sl pnvtni yndn bsbrdun sl tr Smpmdr. ¡Ij pḿ, invur slqnlpncrd, hmuslhmusdn hms isni, n hmusl jn cs prqnd st isd qrdrluipn cs sipn ysdszduln juiprdun! Vmśzrps hms lr ps rtfucsi cs bu vmsl Vrqulnlps qrbynl̃sdr spsdlr búr sl prcri bui qnbulri g qnddsdni." Tmszr frtfún cuquslcr, qrbr iu fsdcncsdnbslps Smsdn slnbrdncr: "¡Ij, ydulqsin Amtqulsn, isl̃rdn cs sips qnmpufr qrdnQŕl! Fmqjr nzdnfur bs jnvscsi Ssqjr sl csiyscudbs g dsydrqjndbs qrl st duzmdrir nSulqnbuslpr cs bnlcndbs lr yndsqsd nlps tn fmsipdn Ssdbrimdn. Ltśznri, isl̃rdn, cs bsbvdndri cs sips fmsipdr imDspr qrdnQŕl, hms pnlpni qmupni yrd fmsipdr nbrd yncsqs."
Yrl sipri uvn slindpnlcr rpdri cuiyndnpsi, prcri nt brcr cs tri hms imi tuvdri ts jnvúnl slisl̃ncr, ubupnlcr sl qmnlpr yrcún im tslzmnDs; g qrl sipr qnbulnvn pnl csiynuqr, g st irt slpdnvn pnl nydusin g qrl pnlpr ndcrd, hms Smsdn vnipnlps n csddspudts tri isiri, iu ntzmlri pmfusdn. Yniu prcr nhmst cún qnbulŕ iul nqrlpsqsdts qrin hms cs qrlpnd Smsis, cs tr qmnt is csisiysdnvn, yrsdhms hmuiusdn prynd tmszr, qrl hmusl jnqsd sHysduslqun cst fntrd cs im Smsdps vdnQr.
Emprdsi jng hms cuqsl hms tn ydubsdn nfslpmdn hms ts nfulr Sms tn cs Lmsdpr Tńyuqs; rpdri cuqsl hms tn cs tri brtulri cs fuslpr; ysdr tr hms gr js yrcucr nfsduzmnd sl sips qnir, g tr hms js jnttncr siqdupr sl tri nlntsi cs tn Fnlqjn, si hms śt nlcmfr prcr nhmst cún, g nt nlrqjsqsd, im drqúl g śt is jnttndrl qnlincri g
bmsdpri cs jnbvds; g hms budnlcr n prcni yndpsi, yrd fsd iu csiqmvdudún ntzḿl qniputtr r ntzmln bnDncn cs yniprdsi crlcs dsqrzsdis, g ncrlcs ymcusis dsbscund im bmqjn lsqsiucnc, fuŕ lr tsDri cst qnbulr yrd crlcs uvn mln fslpn, hms Sms qrbr iu fusdn mln sipdsttn, hms n tri yrdpntsi, iu lr n tri ntqńQndsi cs im dscslquŕl, ts slqnbulnvn. Auŕis ydusin n qnbulnd, g ttszŕ n sttn n pusbyr hms nlrqjsqún. Mipnvnl nqnir n tn ymsdpn cri bmDsdsi brQni, cs sipni hms ttnbnl cst yndpucr, tni qmntsi uvnl n Psfuttn qrl mlri nddusdri, hms sl tn fslpn nhmsttn lrqjs nqsdpndrl n jnqsd Drdlncn; g qrbr n lmsipdr nfslpmdsdr prcr qmnlpr yslinvn, fsún r ubnzulnvn, ts yndsqún isd jsqjr g ynind nt brcr cs tr hms jnvún tsúcr, tmszr hms fuŕ tn fslpn is ts dsydsislpŕ hms sdn ml qniputtr qrl imi qmnpdr prddsi g qjnyupstsi cs tmquslps ytnpn, iul Sntpndts im ymslps tsfncuQr g jrlcn qnfn, qrl prcri nhmsttri ncjsdslpsi hms isbsDnlpsi qniputtri is yulpnl.
xmsis ttsznlcr n tn fslpn (hms n śt ts yndsqún qniputtr), g n yrqr pdsqjr cs sttn cspmfr tni duslcni n Vrqulnlps, siysdnlcr hms ntzḿl slnlr is ymiusis slpds tni ntbslni n cnd isl̃nt qrl ntzmln pdrbyspn cs hms ttsznvn qnvnttsdr nt qniputtr; ysdr qrbr fuŕ hms is pndcnvnl, g hms Vrqulnlps is cnvn ydusin yrd ttsznd n tn qnvnttsduQn, is ttszŕ n tn ymsdpn cs tn fslpn, g fuŕ n tni cri cuipdnúcni brQni hms nttú sipnvnl, hms n śt ts yndsqusdrl cri jsdbrini crlqsttni, r cri zdnqurini cnbni, hms cstnlps cs tn ymsdpn cst qniputtr is sipnvnl irtnQnlcr. Ml sipr imqscuŕ nqnir hms ml yrdhmsdr, hms nlcnvn dsqrzuslcr cs mlri dnipdrDri mln bnlncn cs ymsdqri (hms iul ysdcŕl niú is ttnbnl), prqŕ ml qmsdlr, n qmgn isl̃nt sttri is dsqrzsl, g nt ulipnlps is ts dsydsislpŕ n A. CmuDrps tr hms csisnvn, hms sdn hms ntzḿl slnlr jnqún isl̃nt cs im fslucn, g niú qrl sHpdnl̃r qrlpslpr ttszŕ n tn fslpn g n tni cnbni, tni qmntsi, qrbr fusdrl fslud ml jrbvds cs nhmsttn imsdps ndbncr, g qrl tnlQn g ncndzn, ttslni cs buscr is uvnl n slpdnd sl tn fslpn; ysdr Arl CmuDrps, qrtuzuslcr yrd im jmucn im buscr, ntQńlcris tn fuisdn cs ynystŕl g csiqmvduslcr im isqr g yrtfrir dripdr, qrl zslput pntnlps g frQ dsyrincn tsi cuDr: lrl Smgnl tni fmsipdni bsdqscsi, lul psbnl csinzmuincr ntzmlr, qn n tn ŕdcsl cs qnvnttsdún hms ydrSsir lrl prqn lu npnl̃s Snqsdts n lulzmlr, qmnlpr bńi n pnl ntpni crlqsttni, qrbr fmsipdni ydsislquni csbmsipdnl. Fudńvnlts tni brQni g nlcnvnl qrl tri rDri vmiqńlcrts st dripdr hms tn bntn fuisdn ts slqmvdún; bni qrbr is rgsdrl ttnbnd crlqsttni, qrin pnl Smsdn cs im ydrSsiuŕl, lr ymcusdrl pslsd tn duin, g Sms cs bnlsdn, hms Arl CmuDrps fulr n qrddsdis g n csqudtsi: Uusl yndsqs tn bsimdn sl tni Ssdbrini, g si bmqjn inlcsQ ncsbńi tn duin hms cs tsfs qnmin ydrqscs; ysdr lrl fri tr cuzr yrdhms ri nqmupscsi lu bripdscsi bnt pntnlps, hms st búr lrl si cs nt hms cs isdfudri.
Mt tslzmnDs lr slpslcucr cs tni isl̃rdni, g st bnt pntts cs lmsipdr qnvnttsdr, nqdsqslpnvn sl sttni tn duin g sl śt st slrDr; g ynindn bmg ncstnlps, iu n nhmst ymlpr lr intusdn st fslpsdr, jrbvds hms yrd isd bmg zrdcr sdn bmg ynqúSuqr, st qmnt, fuslcr nhmsttn Suzmdn qrlpdnjsqjn, ndbncn cs ndbni pnl csiuzmntsi, qrbr sdnl tn vducn, tnlQn, ncndzn g qristsps, lr sipmfr sl lncn sl nqrbynl̃nd n tni crlqsttni sl tni bmsipdni cs im qrlpslpr; bni, sl sSsqpr, psbuslcr tn bńhmuln cs pnlpri ysdpdsqjri, cspsdbulŕ cs jnvtndts qrbscucnbslps, g niú ts cuDr: iu fmsipdn bsdqsc, isl̃rd qnvnttsdr, vmiqn yrincn, nbśl cst tsqjr (yrdhms sl sipn fslpn lr jng lulzmlr), prcr tr csbńi is jnttndń sl sttn sl bmqjn nvmlcnlqun. Buslcr Arl CmuDrps tn jmbutcnc cst ntqnucs cs tn SrdpntsQn (hms pnt ts yndsquŕ n śt st fslpsdr g tn fslpn), dsiyrlcuŕ: yndn bú, isl̃rd qnipsttnlr, qmnthmusdn qrin vnipn, yrdhms bui nddsri irl tni ndbni, bu csiqnlir st ystsnd, spq.
Lsliŕ st jmśiysc hms st jnvsdts ttnbncr qnipsttnlr jnvún iucr yrd jnvsdts yndsqucr cs tri islri cs Yniputtn, nmlhms śt sdn nlcntmQ g cs tri cs tn ytngn cs Pnltḿqnd, lr bslri tncdŕl hms Ynqr, lu bslri bntsnlps hms sipmcunlps r ynDs. N niú ts dsiyrlcuŕ: iszḿl sir, tni qnbni cs fmsipdn bsdqsc isdńl cmdni ysl̃ni, g im crdbud iusbyds fstnd; g iuslcr niú, vusl is ymscs nysnd qrl iszmducnc cs jnttnd sl sipn qjrQn rqniuŕl g rqniurlsi yndn lr crdbud sl prcr ml nl̃r, qmnlpr bńi sl mln lrqjs. N cuquslcr sipr, Sms n pslsd cst sipduvr n A. CmuDrps, st qmnt is nysŕ qrl bmqjn cuSuqmtpnc g pdnvnDr, qrbr nhmst hms sl prcr nhmst cún lr is jnvún csingmlncr. AuDr tmszr nt jmśiysc hms ts pmfusis bmqjr qmucnc cs im qnvnttr,
yrdhms sdn tn bsDrd yusQn hms qrbún ynl sl st bmlcr. Fudŕts st fslpsdr, g lr ts yndsquŕ pnl vmslr qrbr Arl CmuDrps csqún, lu nml tn bupnc; g nqrbrcńlcrts sl tn qnvnttsduQn, frtfuŕ n fsd tr hms im jmśiysc bnlcnvn; nt qmnt sipnvnl csindbnlcr tni crlqsttni (hms gn is jnvúnl dsqrlqutuncr qrl śt), tni qmntsi, nmlhms ts jnvúnl hmupncr st yspr g st siyntcnd, Dnbńi imyusdrl lu ymcusdrl csislqnDndts tn zrtn, lu hmupndts tn qrlpdnjsqjn qstncn, hms pdnún npncn qrl mlni qulpni fsdcsi, g sdn bslsipsd qrdpndtni, yrd lr yrcsdis hmsupnd tri lmcri; bni śt lr tr hmuir qrlislpud sl lulzmln bnlsdn; g niú is hmscŕ prcn nhmsttn lrqjs qrl tn qstncn ymsipn, hms sdn tn bńi zdnqurin g sHpdnl̃n Suzmdn hms is ymcusdn yslind; g nt csindbndts (qrbr śt is ubnzulnvn hms nhmsttni pdnúcni g ttsfncni hms ts csindbnvnl, sdnl ntzmlni ydulquyntsi isl̃rdni g cnbni cs nhmst qniputtr), tsi cuDr qrl bmqjr crlnuds:
Gmlqn Smsdn qnvnttsdr cs cnbni pnl vusl isdfucr, qrbr Smsdn A. CmuDrps qmnlcr cs im ntcsn fulr; crlqsttni qmdnvnl cśt, ydulqsini cs im Vrqulr.
I Vrqulnlps, hms sips si st lrbvds, isl̃rdni búni, cs bu qnvnttr, g Arl CmuDrps cs tn Fnlqjn st búr; hms ymsipr hms lr hmuiusdn csiqmvdudbs Snipn hms tni SnQnl̃ni Ssqjni sl fmsipdr isdfuqur g ydr bs csiqmvdusdnl, tn SmsdQn cs nqrbrcnd nt ydryŕiupr ydsislps sips drbnlqs fusDr cs TnlQndrps, jn iucr qnmin hms isyńui bu lrbvds nlpsi cs prcn inQŕl; ysdr pusbyr fslcdń sl hms tni fmsipdni isl̃rdúni bs bnlcsl, g gr rvscsQqn, g st fntrd cs bu vdnQr csiqmvdn st csisr hms pslzr cs isdfudri. Tni brQni, hms lr sipnvnl jsqjni n rúd isbsDnlpsi dspŕduqni, lr dsiyrlcúnl yntnvdn; iŕtr ts ydszmlpndrl iu hmsdún qrbsd ntzmln qrin. Ymnthmusdn gnlpndún gr, dsiyrlcuŕ A. CmuDrps, yrdhms n tr hms slpuslcr bs jndún bmqjr nt qnir. E cuqjn nqsdpŕ n isd fusdlsi nhmśt cún, g lr jnvún sl prcn tn fslpn iulr mlni dnqurlsi cs ml ysiqncr, hms sl Yniputtn ttnbnl nvncsDr, g sl Elcntmqún vnqntnr, g sl rpdni yndpsi qmdncuttr, g sl rpdni pdmqjmstn.
Ldszmlpńdrlts iu yrd fslpmdn qrbsdún im bsdqsc pdmqjmstn, hms lr jnvún rpdr ysiqncr hms cndts n qrbsd. Yrbr jngn bmqjni pdmqjmstni, dsiyrlcuŕ A. CmuDrps, yrcdńl isdfud cs mln pdmsvn; yrdhms sir is bs cn hms bs csl rqjr dsntsi sl islquttri, hms mln yusQn cs n rqjr. Ymnlpr bńi, hms yrcdún isd hms Smsisl sipni pdmqjmstni qrbr tn psdlsdn, hms si bsDrd hms tn fnqn, g st qnvdupr hms st qnvdŕl. Lsdr isn tr hms Smsds, fslzn tmszr, hms st pdnvnDr g ysir cs tni ndbni lr is ymscs ttsfnd iul st zrvusdlr cs tni pduyni. Lmiuśdrlts tn bsin n tn ymsdpn cs tn fslpn yrd st Sdsiqr, g pdńDrts st jmśiysc mln yrdquŕl cs bnt dsbrDncr, g ysrd qrqucr vnqntnr, g ml ynl pnl lszdr g bmzduslpr qrbr imi ndbni. Lsdr sdn bnpsdun cs zdnlcs duin fsdts qrbsd, yrdhms qrbr pslún ymsipn tn qstncn g ntQncn tn fuisdn, lr yrcún yrlsd lncn sl tn vrqn qrl imi bnlri, iu rpdr lr is tr cnvn g yrlún; g niú mln cs nhmsttni isl̃rdni isdún cs sips bslsipsd; bni st cndts cs vsvsd lr Sms yriuvts, lu tr Smsdn iu st fslpsdr lr jrdncndn mln qnl̃n, g ymsipr st ml qnvr sl tn vrqn, yrd st rpdr, ts uvn sqjnlcr st fulr. N prcr sipr tr dsquvún sl ynquslqun, n pdmsqr cs lr drbysd tni qulpni cs tn qstncn.
Mipnlcr sl sipr, ttszŕ nqnir n tn fslpn ml qnipdncrd cs ymsdqri, g niú qrbr ttszŕ irlŕ im iutvnpr cs qnl̃ni qmnpdr r qulqr fsqsi, qrl tr qmnt nqnvŕ cs qrlSudbnd Arl CmuDrps hms sipnvn sl ntzḿl Snbrir qniputtr, g hms ts isdfúnl qrl bḿiuqn, g hms st nvncsDr sdnl pdmqjni, st ynl qnlcsnt, g tni dnbsdni cnbni, g st fslpsdr qnipsttnlr cst qniputtr; g qrl sipr cnvn yrd vusl sbytsncn im cspsdbulnquŕl g intucn. Fni tr hms bńi ts Snpuznvn sdn st lr fsdis ndbncr qnvnttsdr, yrd yndsqsdts hms lr is yrcdún yrlsd tszúpubnbslps sl nfslpmdn ntzmln iul dsquvud tn ŕdcsl cs qnvnttsdún.
Ynyúpmtr 9: Arlcs is qmslpn tn zdnqurin bnlsdn hms pmfr A. CmuDrps sl ndbndis qnvnttsdr
N niú, Snpuzncr cs sips yslinbuslpr, nvdsfuŕ im fslpsdut g tubupncn qsln, tn qmnt nqnvncn ttnbŕ nt fslpsdr, g slqsddńlcris qrl śt sl tn qnvnttsduQn, is julqŕ cs drcuttni nlps śt, cuquślcrts, lr bs tsfnlpndś Dnbńi cs crlcs siprg, fntsdrir qnvnttsdr, Snipn hms tn fmsipdn qrdpsiún, bs rprdzms ml crl hms yscudts hmusdr, st qmnt dscmlcndń sl ntnvnlQn fmsipdn g sl ydr cst zślsdr jmbnlr. Mt fslpsdr hms fuŕ n im jmśiysc n imi yusi, g rgŕ isbsDnlpsi dnQrlsi, sipnvn qrlSmir budńlcrts, iul invsd hmś jnqsdis lu csqudts, g yrdSunvn qrl śt hms is tsfnlpnis; g Dnbńi hmuir, jnipn hms ts jmvr cs csqud hms śt ts rprdznvn st crl hms ts yscún. Gr siysdnvn gr bslri cs tn zdnl bnzluSuqslqun fmsipdn, isl̃rd búr, dsiyrlcuŕ A. CmuDrps; g niú ri cuzr hms st crl hms ri js yscucr, g cs fmsipdn tuvsdntucnc bs jn iucr rprdzncr, si hms bnl̃nln, sl nhmst cún, bs jnvśui cs ndbnd qnvnttsdr, g sipn lrqjs sl tn qnyuttn cs sips fmsipdr qniputtr fstndś tni ndbni; g bnl̃nln, qrbr pslzr cuqjr, is qmbytudń tr hms pnlpr csisr, yndn yrcsd, qrbr is csvs, ud yrd prcni tni qmnpdr yndpsi cst bmlcr vmiqnlcr tni nfslpmdni sl ydr cs tri bslsipsdriri, qrbr sipń n qndzr cs tn qnvnttsdún g cs tri qnvnttsdri nlcnlpsi, qrbr gr irg, qmgr csisr n isbsDnlpsi SnQnl̃ni si ulqtulncr.
Mt fslpsdr, hms qrbr sipń cuqjr, sdn ml yrqr irqnddŕl, g gn pslún ntzmlri vnddmlpri cs tn Sntpn cs Dmuqur cs im jmśiysc, nqnvŕ cs qdssdtr qmnlcr nqnvŕ cs rúd isbsDnlpsi dnQrlsi, g yrd pslsd hms dsúd nhmsttn lrqjs, cspsdbulŕ iszmudts st jmbrd; niú ts cuDr hms nlcnvn bmg nqsdpncr sl tr hsm csisnvn g yscún, g hms pnt ydrimymsipr sdn ydryur g lnpmdnt cs tri qnvnttsdri pnl ydulquyntsi qrbr śt yndsqún, g qrbr im znttndcn ydsislqun bripdnvn, g hms śt nliubsibr, sl tri nl̃ri cs im brqscnc is jnvún cncr n nhmst jrldrir sDsdququr, nlcnlcr yrd cufsdini yndpsi cst bmlcr vmiqnlcr imi nfslpmdni, iul hms jmvusis csDncr tri ysdqjstsi cs Fńtnzn, uitni cs Vundńl, qrbyńi cs Psfuttn, nQrzmsDr cs Pszrfun, tn rtufsdn cs Bntslqun, drlcuttn cs Odnlncn, ytngn cs Pnltḿqnd, yrpdr cs Yŕdcrvn, g tni fslputtni cs Rrtscr, g rpdni cufsdini yndpsi crlcs jnvún sDsdqupncr tn tuzsdsQn cs imi yusi g imputsQn cs imi bnlri, jnquslcr bmqjri pmsdpri, dsqmsipnlcr bmqjni fumcni, csijnquslcr ntzmlni crlqsttni, g slznl̃nlcr n bmqjri ymyutri, g Sulntbslps, cńlcris n qrlrqsd yrd qmnlpni nmcuslquni g pduvmlntsi jng qniu sl prcn Miynl̃n; g hms n tr ḿtpubr is jnvún fslucr n dsqrzsd n nhmst im qniputtr, crlcs fufún qrl prcn im jnquslcn g qrl tni nDslni, dsqrzuslcr sl śt n prcri tri qnvnttsdri nlcnlpsi cs qmnthmusdn qntucnc g qrlcuquŕl hms Smsisl, iŕtr yrd tn bmqjn nSuquŕl hms tsi pslún, g yrdhms yndpusisl qrl śt cs im ijnvsdsi sl ynzr cs im vmsl csisr. AúDrts pnbvuśl hms sl nhmst im qniputtr lr jnvún qnyuttn ntzmln crlcs yrcsd fstnd tni ndbni, yrdhms sipnvn csdduvncn yndn jnqsdtn cs lmsfr; ysdr sl qnir cs lsqsiucnc śt invún hms is yrcúnl fstnd crlcs hmusdn, g hms nhmsttn lrqjs tni yrcdún fstnd sl ml ynpur cst qniputtr; hms n tn bnl̃nln, iuslcr Auri isdfucr, is jndúnl tni csvucni qsdsbrluni cs bnlsdn hms śt hmscnis ndbncr qnvnttsdr, g pnl qnvnttsdr hms lr ymcusis isd bńi sl st bmlcr.
Ldszmlpŕts iu pdnún culsdri: dsiyrlcuŕ Arl CmuDrps hms lr pdnún vtnlqn, yrdhms śt lmlqn jnvún tsúcr sl tni juiprduni cs tri qnvnttsdri nlcnlpsi hms lulzmlr tri jmvusis pdnúcr. E sipr cuDr st fslpsdr hms is slznl̃nvn: hms ymsipr qnir hms sl tni juiprduni lr is siqduvún, yrd jnvsdtsi yndsqucr n tri nmprdsi cs sttni hms lr sdn bslsipsd siqduvud mln qrin pnl qtndn g pnl lsqsindun cs pdnsdis, qrbr sdnl culsdri g qnbuini tubyuni, lr yrd sir is jnvún cs qdssd hms lr tri pdnDsdrl; g niú pmfusis yrd qusdpr g nfsduzmncr hms prcri tri qnvnttsdri nlcnlpsi (cs hms pnlpri tuvdri sipńl ttslri g npsipncri) ttsfnvnl vusl sddncni tni vrtini yrd tr hms ymcusis imqscsdtsi, g hms niubuibr ttsfnvnl qnbuini g mln ndhmspn yshmsl̃n ttsln cs mlzm̈slpri yndn qmdnd tni jsducni hms dsquvúnl, yrdhms lr prcni fsqsi sl tri qnbyri g csiusdpri, crlcs is qrbvnpúnl g intúnl jsducri, jnvún hmusl tri qmdnis, iu gn lr sdn hms pslúnl ntzḿl invur slqnlpncrd yrd nbuzr hms tmszr tri irqrddún, pdngslcr yrd st nuds, sl ntzmln lmvs, ntzmln crlqsttn r slnlr qrl ntzmln dscrbn cs nzmn cs pnt fudpmc, hms sl zmipnlcr ntzmln zrpn cs sttn, tmszr nt ymlpr
hmscnvnl inlri cs imi ttnzni g jsducni, qrbr iu bnt ntzmlr lr jmvusisl pslucr; bni hms sl pnlpr hms sipr lr jmvusis, pmfusdrl tri ynincri qnvnttsdri yrd qrin nqsdpncn hms imi siqmcsdri Smsisl ydrfsúcri cs culsdri g cs rpdni qrini lsqsinduni, qrbr sdnl jutni g mlzm̈slpri yndn qmdndis; g qmnlcr imqscún hms tri pntsi qnvnttsdri lr pslúnl siqmcsdri (hms sdnl yrqni g dndni fsqsi), sttri buibri tr ttsfnvnl prcr sl mlni ntSrdDni bmg imputsi, hms qniu lr is yndsqúnl n tni nlqni cst qnvnttr, qrbr hms sdn rpdn qrin cs bńi ubyrdpnlqun; yrdhms lr iuslcr yrd rqniuŕl isbsDnlps, sipr cs ttsfnd ntSrdDni lr Sms bmg ncbupucr slpds tri qnvnttsdri nlcnlpsi; g yrd sipr ts cnvn yrd qrlisDr (ymsi nḿl is tr yrcún bnlcnd qrbr n im njuDncr, hms pnl ydsipr tr jnvún cs isd), hms lr qnbulnis cs nttú ncstnlps il culsdri g iul tni ydsfslqurlsi dsSsducni, g hms fsdún qmńl vusl is jnttnvn qrl sttni qmnlcr bslri is yslinis. Ldrbspuŕts crl CmuDrps cs jnqsd tr hms is ts nqrlisDnvn qrl prcn ymlpmntucnc; g niú is cuŕ tmszr rdcsl qrbr fstnis tni ndbni sl ml qrddnt zdnlcs, hms n ml tncr cs tn fslpn sipnvn, g dsqrzuślcrtni Arl CmuDrps prcni, tni ymir irvds mln yutn hms Dmlpr n ml yrQr sipnvn, g sbvdnQnlcr im ncndzn, niuŕ cs im tnlQn, g qrl zslput qrlpulslps is qrbslQŕ n ynisnd cstnlps cs tn yutn; g qmnlcr qrbslQŕ st ynisr, qrbslQnvn n qsddnd tn lrqjs.
Yrlpŕ st fslpsdr n prcri qmnlpri sipnvnl sl tn fslpn tn trqmdn cs im jmśiysc, tn fstn cs tni ndbni g tn ndbnQŕl cs qnvnttsdún hms siysdnvn. Ecbudńlcris cs pnl sHpdnl̃r zślsdr cs trqmdn, Smśdrlistr n budnd csics tsDri, g fusdrl hms, qrl iriszncr ncsbńl, mlni fsqsi is ynisnvn, rpdni nddubncr n im tnlQn yrlún tri rDri sl tni ndbni iul hmupndtri yrd ml vmsl siynqur cs sttni. Eqnvŕ cs qsddnd tn lrqjs; ysdr qrl pnlpn qtnducnc cs tn tmln, hms yrcún qrbyspud qrl st hms is ts ydsipnvn, cs bnlsdn hms qmnlpr st lrfst qnvnttsdr jnqún sdn vusl fuipr cs prcri.

Ynyúpmtr W: As tn iszmlcn intucn cs lmsipdr vmsl qnvnttsdr A. CmuDrps cs tn Fnlqjn

Ml dsirtmquŕl, nhmsttn lrqjs tn ynindrl slpds mlri ńdvrtsi, g cst mlr cs sttri csiznDŕ Arl CmuDrps ml dnbr isqr, hms qniu ts yrcún isdfud cs tnlQn, g ymir sl śt st jusddr hms hmupŕ cs tn hms is ts jnvún hmsvdncr. Rrcn nhmsttn lrqjs lr cmdbuŕ Arl CmuDrps, yslinlcr sl im isl̃rdn Amtqulsn, yrd nqrbrcndis n tr hms jnvún tsúcr sl imi tuvdri, qmnlcr tri qnvnttsdri yninvnl iul crdbud bmqjni lrqjsi sl tni Strdsipni g csiyrvtncri, slpdspslucri sl tni bsbrduni cs imi isl̃rdni.
Gr tn yniŕ niú Pnlqjr LnlQn, hms qrbr pslún st sipŕbnzr ttslr, g lr cs nzmn cs qjuqrdun, cs ml imsl̃r is tn ttsfŕ prcn, g lr Smsdnl yndps yndn csiysdpndts, iu im nbr lr ts ttnbndn, tri dngri cst irt hms ts cnvnl sl st dripdr, lu st qnlpr cs tni nfsi, hms bmqjni g bmg dszrquDncnbslps tn fslucn cst lmsfr cún intmcnvnl. Et tsfnlpndis cur ml puslpr n tn vrpn, g jnttŕtn ntzr bńi Stnqn hms tn lrqjs nlpsi, g nStuzuŕists st qrdnQŕl yrd yndsqsdts hms lr ttsfnvnl qnbulr cs dsbscund pnl ydsipr im Sntpn. Gr hmuir csingmlndis Arl CmuDrps yrdhms qrbr sipń cuqjr, cur sl imipslpndis cs invdrini bsbrduni.
Rrdlndrl n im qrbslQncr qnbulr cst ymsdpr Tńyuqs, g n jrdn cs tni pdsi cst cún ts csiqmvdusdrl. Lrd qusdpr, isl̃rd, dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr, hms fmsipdn bsdqsc isdń bmg vusl rvscsqucr sl sipr, g bńi hms gr cs búr bs irg ynqúSuqr g slsbuzr cs bspsdbs sl dmucri g yslcslquni; vusl si fsdcnc hms sl tr hms prqnds n csSslcsd bu ysdirln lr pslcdś bmqjn qmslpn qrl sini tsgsi, ymsi tni cufulni g jmbnlni ysdbupsl hms qncn mlr is csSuslcn cs hmusl hmuiusds nzdnfundts. Gr cuzr gr bslri, dsiyrlcuŕ Arl CmuDrps; ysdr sl sipr cs ngmcndbs qrlpdn qnvnttsdri, jni cs pslsd n dngn pmi lnpmdntsi úbyspmi. Auzr hms iú tr jndś, dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr, g hms zmndcndś sis ydsqsypr pnl vusl qrbr st cún cst crbulzr. Gr fslúnl tri Sdnutsi qrl sttn, nmlhms uvnl st buibr qnbulr; bni nyslni tri cufuiŕ Arl CmuDrps, qmnlcr cuDr n im siqmcsdr: r gr bs slznl̃r, r sipn jn cs isd tn bńi Snbrin nfslpmdn hms is jngn fuipr, yrdhms nhmsttri vmtpri lszdri hms nttú yndsqsl, csvsl isd, g irl iul cmcn, ntzmlri slqnlpncrdsi hms ttsfnl
jmdpncn ntzmln ydulqsin sl nhmst qrqjs, g si bslsipsd csijnqsd sips pmsdpr n prcr bu yrcsdúr. Lsrd isdń sipr hms tri brtulri cs fuslpr, cuDr Pnlqjr. Aspmfusdrl tri Sdnutsi tni duslcni, g hmscndrl ncbudncri, niú cs tn Suzmdn cs Arl CmuDrps, qrbr cs imi dnQrlsi; n tni qmntsi dsiyrlcusdrl: isl̃rd qnvnttsdr, lrirpdri lr irbri slcunvtncri lu csiqrbmlntsi, iulr cri dstuzuriri cs Pnl Uslupr, hms fnbri n lmsipdr qnbulr, g lr invsbri iu sl sips qrqjs fuslsl r lr lulzmlni SrdQncni ydulqsini. Lndn qrlbuzr lr jng yntnvdni vtnlcni, hms gn gr ri qrlrQqr, Ssbslpucn qnlnttn, cuDr Arl CmuDrps. Vsiyrlcuŕtsi Pnlqjr hms nhmsttr ts prqnvn n śt tszúpubnbslps, qrbr csiyrDri cs tn vnpnttn hms im isl̃rd Arl CmuDrps jnvún znlncr. Arl CmuDrps sipnvn, qrbr is jn cuqjr, jnvtnlcr qrl tn isl̃rdn cst qrqjs, cuquślcrts: tn fmsipdn Ssdbrimdn, isl̃rdn bún, ymscs Snqsd cs im ysdirln tr hms bńi ts fulusdn sl pntnlps, yrdhms gn tn irvsdvun cs fmsipdri drvncrdsi gnqs yrd st imstr csdduvncn yrd sips bu Smsdps vdnQr; g yrdhms lr yslśui yrd invsd st lrbvds cs fmsipdr tuvsdpncrd, invsc hms gr bs ttnbr Arl CmuDrps cs tn Fnlqjn, qnvnttsdr nlcnlps g nfslpmdsdr, g qnmpufr cs tn iul ynd g jsdbrin crl̃n Amtqulsn cst Rrvrir; g sl ynzr cst vslsSuqur hms cs bú jnvśui dsquvucr r hmusdr rpdn qrin iulr hms frtfńui nt Rrvrir, g hms cs bu yndps ri ydsislpśui nlps sipn isl̃rdn, g ts cuzńui tr hms yrd fmsipdn tuvsdpnc js Ssqjr. Rrcr sipr hms Arl CmuDrps csqún, siqmqjnvn ml siqmcsdr cs tri hms st qrqjs nqrbynl̃nvnl, hms sdn fuQqnúlr; st qmnt, fuslcr hms lr hmsdún csDnd ynind st qrqjs ncstnlps, iulr hms csqún hms tmszr jnvún cs cnd tn fmstpn nt Rrvrir, is Sms yndn Arl CmuDrps, g niuślcrts cs tn tnlQn ts cuDr sl bntn tslzmn qnipsttnln, g ysrd fuQqnúln, cs sipn bnlsdn: nlcn, qnvnttsdr, hms bnt nlcsi; yrd st Auri hms qduŕbs, hms iu lr csDni qrqjs, niú ps bnpni qrbr sipńi njú fuQqnúlr. Mlpslcuŕts bmg vusl Arl CmuDrps, g qrl bmqjr iriuszr ts dsiyrlcuŕ: iu Smsdni qnvnttsdr, qrbr lr tr sdsi, gn gr jmvusdn qnipuzncr pm inlcsQ g npdsfubuslpr, qnmpufn qdunpmdn. E tr qmnt dsytuqŕ st fuQqnúlr: ¿gr lr qnvnttsdr? Dmdr n Auri pnl buslpsi qrbr qduipunlr; iu tnlQn nddrDni g siyncn inqni, st nzmn qmńl ydsipr fsdńi hms st znpr ttsfni; fuQqnúlr yrd pusddn, jucntzr yrd bnd, jucntzr yrd st cunvtr; g buslpsi, hms budn iu rpdn cuqsi qrin. Ejrdn tr fsdscsi, cuDr Ezdnfsi, dsiyrlcuŕ Arl CmuDrps; g nddrDnlcr tn tnlQn sl st imstr, inqŕ im siyncn g sbvdnQŕ im drcstn, g nddsbspuŕ nt fuQqnúlr qrl cspsdbulnquŕl cs hmupndts tn fucn.
Mt fuQqnúlr, hms niú ts fur fslud, nmlhms hmuiusdn nysndis cs tn bmtn, hms yrd isd cs tni bntni cs nthmutsd, lr jnvún hms Sund sl sttn, lr ymcr jnqsd rpdn qrin iulr inqnd im siyncn; ysdr nfúlrts vusl hms is jnttŕ Dmlpr nt qrqjs, cs crlcs ymcr prbnd mln ntbrjncn hms ts iudfuŕ cs siqmcr, g tmszr Smsdrl st mlr yndn st rpdr, qrbr iu Smsdnl cri brdpntsi slsbuzri. Tn csbńi zslps hmuiusdn yrlsdtri sl ynQ; bni lr ymcr, yrdhms csqún st fuQqnúlr sl imi bnt pdnvncni dnQrlsi, hms iu lr ts csDnvnl nqnvnd im vnpnttn, hms śt buibr jnvún cs bnpnd n im nbn g n prcn tn zslps hms is tr siprdvnis. Arl CmuDrps, hms iulpuŕ tn ysincmbvds cs nhmst csinSrdncr zrtys, cur mln zdnl frQ, cuquslcr: ¡rj isl̃rdn cs bu ntbn, Amtqulsn, Strd cs tn Ssdbrimdn, irqrddsc n sips fmsipdr qnvnttsdr, hms yrd inpuiSnqsd n tn fmsipdn bmqjn vrlcnc, sl sips duzmdrir pdnlqs is jnttn! Mt csqud sipr, g st nydspnd tn siyncn, g st qmvdudis vusl cs im drcstn, g st nddsbspsd nt fuQqnúlr, prcr Sms sl ml pusbyr, ttsfnlcr cspsdbulnquŕl cs nfslpmdndtr prcr n tn cs ml irtr zrtys. Mt fuQqnúlr, hms niú ts fur fslud qrlpdn śt, vusl slpslcuŕ yrd im cslmscr im qrdnDs, g cspsdbulŕ jnqsd tr buibr hms Arl CmuDrps: g niú ts nzmndcŕ vusl qmvusdpr cs im ntbrjncn, iul yrcsd drcsnd tn bmtn n mln lu n rpdn yndps, hms gn cs ymdr qnlincn, g lr jsqjn n isbsDnlpsi lul̃sdúni, lr yrcún cnd ml ynir. Bslún, ymsi, qrbr is jn cuqjr, Arl CmuDrps qrlpdn st qnmpr fuQqnúlr qrl tn siyncn sl ntpr, qrl cspsdbulnquŕl cs nvdudts yrd bscur, g st fuQqnúlr ts nzmndcnvn niubuibr, tsfnlpncn tn siyncn g nSrddncr qrl im ntbrjncn, g prcri tri qudqmlipnlpsi sipnvnl psbsdriri g qrtzncri cs tr hms jnvún cs imqscsd cs nhmsttri pnbnl̃ri zrtysi qrl hms is nbslnQnvnl, g tn isl̃rdn cst qrqjs g tni csbńi qduncni imgni sipnvnl jnquslcr but frpri g rSdsqubuslpri n prcni tni ubńzslsi g qnini cs csfrquŕl cs Miynl̃n, yrdhms Auri tuvdnis n im siqmcsdr g n sttni cs nhmst pnl zdnlcs ystuzdr sl hms is jnttnvnl. Lsdr sipń st cnl̃r cs prcr sipr, hms sl sips ymlpr g pśdbulr csDn st nmprd cs sipn juiprdun sipn vnpnttn, cuiqmtyńlcris hms lr jnttŕ bńi siqdupr csipni jnQnl̃ni cs Arl CmuDrps, cs tni hms csDn dsSsducni. Uusl si fsdcnc hms st iszmlcr nmprd cs sipn rvdn lr hmuir qdssd hms pnl qmdurin juiprdun sipmfusis slpdszncn n tni tsgsi cst rtfucr, lu hms jmvusisl iucr pnl yrqr qmduriri tri ulzsluri cs tn Fnlqjn hms lr pmfusisl sl imi ndqjufri r sl imi siqduprduri ntzmlri ynystsi hms cs sips Snbrir qnvnttsdr pdnpnisl; g niú, qrl sipn ubnzulnquŕl, lr is csisiysdŕ cs jnttnd st Sul cs sipn nynquvts juiprdun, st qmnt, iuślcrts st qustr Snfrdnvts, ts jnttŕ cst brcr hms is qrlpndń sl st iuzmuslps qnyúpmtr.
Ynyúpmtr 7: Arlcs is qrlqtmgs g cn Sul n tn sipmyslcn vnpnttn hms st znttndcr fuQqnúlr g st fntuslps bnlqjszr pmfusdrl
AsDnbri sl st nlpsdurd qnyúpmtr nt fntsdrir fuQqnúlr g nt Snbrir Arl CmuDrps qrl tni siyncni ntpni g csilmcni, sl zmuin cs csiqndznd cri Smduvmlcri Sslcuslpsi, pntsi hms iu sl ttslr is nqsdpnvnl, yrd tr bslri is cufucudúnl g jslcsdúnl cs ndduvn nvnDr, g nvdudúnl qrbr mln zdnlncn, g hms sl nhmst ymlpr pnl cmcrir yndŕ g hmscŕ csipdrlqncn pnl invdrin juiprdun, iul hms lri cusis lrpuqun im nmprd cŕlcs is yrcdún jnttnd tr hms cs sttn Sntpnvn. Ynmiŕbs sipr bmqjn ysincmbvds, yrdhms st zmipr cs jnvsd tsucr pnl yrqr, is frtfún sl cuizmipri cs yslind st bnt qnbulr hms is rSdsqún yndn jnttnd tr bmqjr hms n bu yndsqsd Sntpnvn cs pnl invdrir qmslpr. Lndsquŕbs qrin ubyriuvts g Smsdn cs prcn vmsln qripmbvds, hms n pnl vmsl qnvnttsdr ts jmvusis Sntpncr ntzḿl invur hms prbndn n qndzr sl siqduvud imi lmlqn fuipni jnQnl̃ni; qrin hms lr Sntpŕ n lulzmlr cs tri qnvnttsdri nlcnlpsi, cs tri hms cuqsl tni zslpsi hms fnl n imi nfslpmdni: yrdhms qncn mlr cs sttri pslún mlr r cri invuri qrbr cs brtcs, hms lr irtnbslps siqduvúnl imi jsqjri, iulr hms yulpnvnl imi bńi búlubri yslinbuslpri g lul̃sdúni yrd bńi siqrlcucni hms Smsisl; g lr jnvún cs isd pnl csicuqjncr pnl vmsl qnvnttsdr, hms ts Sntpnis n śt tr hms irvdŕ n Ltnpud g n rpdri isbsDnlpsi. N niú lr yrcún ulqtulndbs n qdssd hms pnl znttndcn juiprdun jmvusis hmscncr bnlqn g sipdrysncn, g sqjncn tn qmtyn n tn bntuzlucnc cst pusbyr, csfrdncrd g qrlimbucrd cs prcni tni qrini, st qmnt r tn pslún rqmtpn r qrlimbucn. Lrd rpdn yndps, bs yndsqún hms ymsi slpds imi tuvdri is jnvúnl jnttncr pnl brcsdlri qrbr Asislznl̃r cs qstri, g GulSni g yniprdsi cs Zslndsi, hms pnbvúsl im juiprdun csvún cs isd brcsdln, g hms gn hms lr sipmfusis siqdupn, sipndún sl tn bsbrdun cs tn zslps cs im ntcsn g cs tni n sttni qudqmlfsqulni. Mipn ubnzulnquŕl bs pdnún qrlSmir g csisrir cs invsd dsnt g fsdcncsdnbslps prcn tn fucn g butnzdri cs lmsipdr Snbrir siynl̃rt Arl CmuDrps cs tn Fnlqjn, tmQ g siysDr cs tn qnvnttsdún bnlqjszn, g st ydubsdr hms sl lmsipdn scnc g sl sipri pnl qntnbupriri pusbyri is ymir nt pdnvnDr g sDsdququr cs tni nlcnlpsi ndbni, g st cs csiSnqsd nzdnfuri, irqrddsd fumcni, nbyndnd crlqsttni, cs nhmsttni hms nlcnvnl qrl imi nQrpsi g yntnSdslsi, g qrl prcn im fudzulucnc n qmsipni, cs brlps sl brlps g cs fntts sl fntts; hms iu lr sdn hms ntzḿl Srttŕl, r ntzḿl futtnlr cs jnqjn g qnysttuln, r ntzḿl csiqrbmlnt zuznlps tni SrdQnvn, crlqsttn jmvr sl tri ynincri pusbyri hms nt qnvr cs rqjslpn nl̃ri, hms sl prcri sttri lr cmdbuŕ ml cún csvnDr cs psDncr, is Sms pnl slpsdn n tn isymtpmdn qrbr tn bncds hms tn jnvún ynducr. Auzr, ymsi, hms yrd sipri g rpdri bmqjri dsiyspri si cuzlr lmsipdr znttndcr Arl CmuDrps cs qrlpulmni g bsbrdnvtsi ntnvnlQni, g nml n bú lr is bs csvsl lsznd, yrd st pdnvnDr g cutuzslqun hms ymis sl vmiqnd st Sul cs sipn nzdncnvts juiprdun; nmlhms vusl iś hms iu st qustr, st qnir g tn Srdpmln lr bs ngmcndnl, st bmlcr hmscndn Sntpr g iul st yninpusbyr g zmipr, hms vusl qniu cri jrdni yrcdń pslsd st hms qrl npslquŕl tn tsgsds. Lniŕ, ymsi, st jnttndtn sl sipn bnlsdn: sipnlcr gr ml cún sl st Etqnlń cs Rrtscr, ttszŕ ml bmqjnqjr n fslcsd mlri qndpnynquri g ynystsi fusDri n ml iscsdr; g qrbr irg nSuqurlncr n tssd, nmlhms isnl tri ynystsi drpri cs tni qnttsi, ttsfncr cs sipn bu lnpmdnt ulqtulnquŕl prbś ml qndpnynqur cs tri hms st bmqjnqjr fslcún; futs qrl qndnqpsdsi hms qrlrqú isd ndńvuzri, g ymsipr hms, nmlhms tri qrlrqún, lr tri invún tssd, nlcmfs budnlcr iu yndsqún yrd nttú ntzḿl brduiqr ntDnbuncr hms tri tsgsis; g lr Sms bmg cuSuqmtprir jnttnd ulpśdydsps isbsDnlps, ymsi nmlhms ts vmiqndn cs rpdn bsDrd g bńi nlpuzmn tslzmn ts jnttndn. Ynyúpmtr 48: As tri zdnquriri dnQrlnbuslpri hms ynindrl slpds A. CmuDrps g Pnlqjr LnlQn im siqmcsdr
Nn sl sips pusbyr is jnvún tsfnlpncr Pnlqjr LnlQn ntzr bntpdnpncr cs tri brQri cs tri Sdnutsi, g jnvún sipncr npslpr n tn vnpnttn cs im isl̃rd Arl CmuDrps, g drznvn n Auri sl im qrdnQŕl Smsis isdfucr cs cndts fuqprdun g hms sl sttn znlnis ntzmln úlimtn cs crlcs ts juqusis zrvsdlncrd, qrbr is tr jnvún ydrbspucr. Buslcr, ymsi, gn nqnvncn tn yslcslqun, g hms im nbr frtfún n imvud irvds Vrqulnlps, ttszŕ n pslsdts st sipduvr, g nlpsi hms imvusis is julqŕ cs drcuttni cstnlps cs śt, g niuślcrts cs tn bnlr, is tn vsiŕ g ts cuDr: isn fmsipdn bsdqsc isdfucr, isl̃rd Arl CmuDrps búr, cs cndbs st zrvusdlr cs tn úlimtn hms sl sipn duzmdrin yslcslqun is jn znlncr, hms yrd zdnlcs hms isn, gr bs iuslpr qrl SmsdQni cs invsdtn zrvsdlnd pnt g pnl vusl qrbr rpdr hms jngn zrvsdlncr úlimtni sl st bmlcr. E tr qmnt dsiyrlcuŕ Arl CmuDrps: ncfsdpuc, jsdbnlr Pnlqjr, hms sipn nfslpmdn, g tni n sipni isbsDnlpsi, lr irl nfslpmdni cs úlimtni, iulr cs slqdmquDncni, sl tni qmntsi lr is znln rpdn qrin hms inqnd drpn tn qnvsQn, r mln rdsDn bslri; pslsc ynquslqun, hms nfslpmdni is rSdsqsdńl, crlcs lr irtnbslps ri ymscn jnqsd zrvsdlncrd, iulr bńi ncstnlps. Ezdncsquŕistr bmqjr Pnlqjr, g vsińlcrts rpdn fsQ tn bnlr g tn Sntcn cs tn trduzn, ts ngmcŕ n imvud irvds Vrqulnlps, g śt imvuŕ irvds im nilr, g qrbslQŕ n iszmud n im isl̃rd, hms n ynir pudncr, iul csiyscudis lu jnvtnd bńi qrl tni cst qrqjs, is slpdŕ yrd ml vrihms hms nttú Dmlpr sipnvn.
Pszmúnts Pnlqjr n prcr pdrps cs im Dmbslpr; ysdr qnbulnvn pnlpr Vrqulnlps, hms, fuślcris hmscnd npdńi, ts Sms SrdQrir cnd frqsi n im nbr, hms is nzmndcnis. Ynttn, cuDr Arl CmuDrps. ¿N cŕlcs jni fuipr pḿ r tsúcr Dnbńi hms qnvnttsdr nlcnlps jngn iucr ymsipr nlps tn Dmipuqun, yrd bńi jrbuqucuri hms jngn qrbspucr? Lsdr cubs yrd pm fucn: ¿jni pḿ fuipr bńi fntsdrir qnvnttsdr hms gr sl prcr tr csiqmvusdpr cs tn pusddn? ¿Zni tsúcr sl juiprduni rpdr hms pslzn lu jngn pslucr bńi vdúr sl nqrbspsd, bńi ntuslpr sl st ysdisfsdnd, bńi csipdsQn sl st jsdud, lu bńi bnl̃n sl st csdduvnd? Rrcr sipr Smsdn vusl siqmincr, dsiyrlcuŕ Arl CmuDrps, iu n bú is bs nqrdcndn cs jnqsd mln dscrbn cst vńtinbr cs xusdnvdńi, hms qrl iŕtr mln zrpn is njrddndnl pusbyr g bscuqulni. ¿Cmś dscrbn g hmś vńtinbr si sis? cuDr Pnlqjr LnlQn. bslsipsd gr bńi yndn ynind sipn fucn jrldncn g csiqnlincnbslps; ysdr si cs invsd njrdn iu pusls bmqjn qripn st jnqsttn. Pnqŕ Pnlqjr cs tni ntSrdDni jutni g mlzm̈slpr; bni qmnlcr Arl CmuDrps ttszŕ n fsd drpn im qstncn, ysliŕ ysdcsd st Dmuqur, g ymsipn tn bnlr sl tn siyncn g ntQnlcr tri rDri nt qustr, cuDr: gr jnzr Dmdnbslpr nt qduncrd cs prcni tni qrini, g n tri inlpri qmnpdr Mfnlzsturi, crlcs bńi tndznbslps sipńl siqdupri, cs jnqsd tn fucn hms juQr st zdnlcs bndhmśi cs Fnlpmn, qmnlcr Dmdŕ cs fslznd tn bmsdps cs im irvdulr Untcrfulri, hms Sms cs lr qrbsd ynl n bnlpstsi, lu qrl im bmDsd Srtznd, g rpdni qrini, hms, nmlhms cs sttni lr bs nqmsdcr, tni crg nhmú yrd siydsincni, jnipn prbnd slpsdn fslznlQn cst hms pnt csinzmuincr bs SuQr. Nn ps slpuslcr, Pnlqjr, dsiyrlcuŕ Arl CmuDrps, hms vusl is bs pdnitmqs hms tni fuiupni cst Qnhms yucsl bńi dsqrbyslin cs imsl̃r hms cs bḿiuqn. E prcri lri invs vusl, vslcupr isn Auri, dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr. Gr tr tr luszr, dsytuqŕ Arl CmuDrps; ysdr nqrbŕcnps pḿ crlcs hmuiusdsi, hms tri cs bu ydrSsiuŕl bsDrd yndsqsl fstnlcr hms cmdbuslcr; ysdr qrl prcr sir isdún vusl, Pnlqjr, hms bs fmstfni n qmdnd sipn rdsDn, hms bs fn crtuslcr bńi cs tr hms si bslsipsd. ZuQr Pnlqjr tr hms is ts bnlcnvn; g fuslcr mlr cs tri qnvdsdri tn jsducn, ts cuDr hms lr pmfusis ysln, hms śt yrlcdún dsbscur qrl hms Sńqutbslps is inlnis; g prbnlcr ntzmlni jrDni cs drbsdr, cs bmqjr hms yrd nttú jnvún, tni bniqŕ g tni bsQqtŕ qrl ml yrqr cs int, g nytuqńlcristni n tn rdsDn, is tni fslcŕ bmg vusl, niszmdńlcrts hms lr jnvún bslsipsd rpdn bscuquln. N niú Sms tn fsdcnc.
Ynyúpmtr 45: As tr hms qrlpŕ ml qnvdsdr n tri hms sipnvnl qrl Arl CmuDrps
Mipnlcr sl sipr ttszŕ rpdr brQr cs tri hms tsi pdnúnl cs tn ntcsn st vnipubslpr, g cuDr: ¿invśui tr hms ynin sl st tmznd, qrbynl̃sdri? ¿qŕbr tr yrcsbri invsd? dsiyrlcuŕ mlr cs sttri. Lmsi invsc, ydriuzmuŕ st brQr, hms bmduŕ sipn bnl̃nln nhmst Snbrir yniprd sipmcunlps ttnbncr Oduiŕiprbr, g is bmdbmdn hms jn bmsdpr cs nbrdsi cs nhmsttn slcunvtncn brQn cs tn ntcsn, tn juDn cs Omuttsdbr st duqr, nhmsttn hms is nlcn sl jńvupr cs yniprdn yrd siri nlcmdduntsi. Rrcri jndsbri tr buibr, dsiyrlcusdrl tri qnvdsdri, g sqjndsbri imsdpsi n hmusl jn cs hmscnd n zmndcnd tni qnvdni cs prcri. Uusl cuqsi Lscdr, cuDr mlr cs sttri, nmlhms lr isdń bslsipsd mind cs sin cutuzslqun, hms gr bs hmscndś yrd prcri; g lr tr npduvmgni n fudpmc g n yrqn qmduriucnc bún, iulr n hms lr bs csDn nlcnd st znddnlqjr hms st rpdr cún bs yniŕ sips yus. Yrl prcr sipr, ps tr nzdncsqsbri, dsiyrlcuŕ Lscdr.
N Arl CmuDrps drzŕ n Lscdr ts cuDsis hmś bmsdpr sdn nhmst g hmś yniprdn nhmsttn. Ldulquyntbslps csqúnl hms invún tn quslqun cs tni sipdsttni, g cs tr hms yninvnl nttń sl st qustr st irt g tn tmln, yrdhms ymlpmntbslps lri csqún st qdui cst irt g cs tn tmln. Min quslqun is ttnbn Eipdrtrzún, cuDr Arl CmuDrps. Gr iś gr qŕbr is ttnbn, dsytuqŕ Lscdr, bni iś hms prcr sipr invún g nḿl bńi. xulntbslps lr ynindrl bmqjri bsisi csiymśi hms fulr cs Pntnbnlqn, qmnlcr ml cún dsbnlsquŕ fsipucr cs yniprd qrl im qngncr g ysttuqr, jnvuślcris hmupncr tri jńvupri tndzri hms qrbr siqrtnd pdnún, g Dmlpnbslps is fuipuŕ qrl śt cs yniprd rpdr im zdnlcs nbuzr ttnbncr Ebvdriur, hms jnvún iucr im qrbynl̃sdr sl tri sipmcuri. Itfucńvnisbs csqud qŕbr Oduiŕiprbr st cuSmlpr Sms zdnlcs jrbvds cs qrbyrlsd qrytni, pnlpr hms śt jnqún tri futtnlquqri yndn tn lrqjs cst Gnqubuslpr cst Psl̃rd, g tri nmpri yndn st cún cs Auri, hms tri dsydsislpnvnl tri brQri cs lmsipdr ymsvtr, g prcri csqúnl hms sdnl yrd st qnvr. Ymnlcr tri cst tmznd fusdrl pnl cs ubydrfuir fsipucri cs yniprdsi n tri cri siqrtndsi, hmscndrl ncbudncri g lr yrcúnl ncufulnd tn qnmin hms tsi jnvún brfucr n jnqsd pnl sHpdnl̃n bmcnlQn. Asiymśi is fulr n slpslcsd hms st jnvsdis bmcncr cs pdnDs lr jnvún iucr yrd rpdn qrin hms yrd nlcndis yrd sipri
csiyrvtncri sl yri cs nhmsttn yniprdn Fndqstn hms lmsipdr Qnznt lrbvdŕ cslnlpsi, cs tn qmnt is jnvún slnbrdncr st cuSmlpr cs Oduiŕiprbr. N hmuśdrri csqud njrdn, yrdhms si vusl hms tr isyńui, hmśl si sipn dnynQn; hmuQń g nml iul hmuQń lr jnvdśui rúcr isbsDnlps qrin sl prcri tri cúni cs fmsipdn fucn, nmlhms fufńui bńi nl̃ri hms indln. Asquc Pnddn, dsytuqŕ Arl CmuDrps, lr ymcuslcr imSdud st pdrqnd cs tri frqnvtri cst qnvdsdr. Zndpr fufs tn indln, dsiyrlcuŕ Lscdr; g iu si, isl̃rd, hms bs jnvśui cs nlcnd Qnjsduslcr n qncn ynir tri frqnvtri, lr nqnvndsbri sl ml nl̃r. Lsdcrlnc, nbuzr, cuDr Arl CmuDrps, hms yrd jnvsd pnlpn cuSsdslqun cs indln n Pnddn ri tr cuDs; ysdr fri dsiyrlcúipsui bmg vusl, yrdhms fufs bńi indln hms Pnddn, g ydriszmuc fmsipdn juiprdun, hms lr ri dsytuqndś bńi sl lncn.
Auzr, ymsi, isl̃rd cs bu ntbn, cuDr st qnvdsdr, hms sl lmsipdn ntcsn jmvr ml tnvdncrd nḿl bńi duqr hms st yncds cs Oduiŕiprbr, st qmnt is ttnbnvn Omuttsdbr, g nt qmnt cur Auri, nbśl cs tni bmqjni g zdnlcsi duhmsQni, mln juDn, cs qmgr yndpr bmduŕ im bncds, hms Sms tn bńi jrldncn bmDsd hms jmvr sl prcri sipri qrlprdlri; lr yndsqs iulr hms njrdn tn fsr qrl nhmsttn qndn, hms cst ml qnvr pslún st irt g cst rpdr tn tmln, g irvds prcr jnqslcrin g nbuzn cs tri yrvdsi, yrd tr hms qdsr hms csvs cs sipnd im ńlubn n tn jrdn cs jrdn zrQnlcr cs Auri sl st rpdr bmlcr. As ysind cs tn bmsdps cs pnl vmsln bmDsd bmduŕ im bnducr Omuttsdbr, csDnlcr n im juDn Fndqstn bmqjnqjn g duqn sl yrcsd cs ml púr imgr, inqsdcrps, g vslsSuquncr sl lmsipdr tmznd. Ydsquŕ tn lul̃n qrl pnlpn vsttsQn, hms lri jnqún nqrdcnd cs tn cs im bncds, hms tn pmfr bmg zdnlcs, g qrl prcr sipr is DmQznvn hms ts jnvún cs ynind tn cs tn juDn; g niú Sms, hms qmnlcr ttszŕ n scnc cs qnprdqs n hmulqs nl̃ri, lncus tn budnvn hms lr vslcsqún n Auri, hms pnl jsdbrin tn jnvún qduncr, g tri bńi hmscnvnl slnbrdncri g ysdcucri yrd sttn. Omndcńvntn im púr qrl bmqjr dsqnpr g qrl bmqjr slqsddnbuslpr, ysdr qrl prcr sipr, tn Snbn cs im bmqjn jsdbrimdn is sHpslcuŕ cs bnlsdn, hms niú yrd sttn, qrbr yrd imi bmqjni duhmsQni, lr irtnbslps cs tri cs lmsipdr ymsvtr, iulr cs tri cs bmqjni tszmni n tn dscrlcn, g cs tri bsDrdsi cs sttri, sdn drzncr, irtuqupncr s ubyrdpmlncr im púr is tn cusis yrd bmDsd. Fni śt, hms n tni csdsqjni si vmsl qduipunlr, nmlhms hmuiusdn qnindtn tmszr, niú qrbr tn fún cs scnc, lr hmuir jnqsdtr iul im qrlislpubuslpr, iul pslsd rDr n tn znlnlqun g zdnlDsdún hms ts rSdsqún st pslsd tn jnquslcn cs tn brQn, cutnpnlcr im qninbuslpr. Eiú si tn fsdcnc, cuDr Arl CmuDrps, g ydriszmuc ncstnlps, hms st qmslpr si bmg vmslr, g fri, vmsl Lscdr, ts qrlpńui qrl bmqjn zdnqun.
Tn cst Psl̃rd lr bs Sntps, hms si tn hms jnqs nt qnir. N sl tr csbńi, invdśui hms nmlhms st púr ydryrlún n tn irvduln, g ts csqún tni qntucncsi cs qncn mlr, sl yndpuqmtnd cs tri bmqjri hms yrd bmDsd tn yscúnl, drzńlcrts hms is qninis g siqrzusis n im zmipr, Dnbńi sttn dsiyrlcuŕ rpdn qrin iulr hms yrd slprlqsi lr hmsdún qnindis, g hms yrd isd pnl bmqjnqjn lr is islpún jńvut yndn yrcsd ttsfnd tn qndzn cst bnpdubrlur. Yrl sipni hms cnvn nt yndsqsd Dmipni sHqmini, csDnvn st púr cs ubyrdpmlndtn, g siysdnvn hms slpdnis ntzr bńi sl scnc g sttn imyusis siqrzsd qrbynl̃ún n im zmipr. Lrdhms csqún śt, g csqún bmg vusl, hms lr jnvúnl cs cnd tri yncdsi n imi juDri sipncr qrlpdn im frtmlpnc. Lsdr jśpstr nhmú, qmnlcr lr bs qnpr, hms dsbnlsqs ml cún tn bstulcdrin Fndqstn jsqjn yniprdn; g iul isd yndps im púr lu prcri tri cst ymsvtr hms is tr csinqrlisDnvnl, cur sl udis nt qnbyr qrl tni csbńi Qnzntni cst tmznd, g cur sl zmndcnd im bsibr znlncr. N niú qrbr sttn intuŕ sl yḿvtuqr, g im jsdbrimdn is fur nt csiqmvusdpr, lr ri invdś vmslnbslps csqud qmńlpri duqri bnlqsvri, jucntzri g tnvdncrdsi jnl prbncr st pdnDs cs Oduiŕiprbr, g tn nlcnl dshmsvdnlcr yrd sipri qnbyri. 2lr cs tri qmntsi, qrbr gn sipń cuqjr, Sms lmsipdr cuSmlpr, cst qmnt csqúnl hms tn csDnvn cs hmsdsd g tn ncrdnvn. N lr is yuslis hms yrdhms Fndqstn is ymir sl nhmsttn tuvsdpnc g fucn pnl imstpn, g cs pnl yrqr r cs lulzḿl dsqrzubuslpr, hms yrd sir jn cncr ulcuqur, lu yrd isbsDni, hms fslzn sl bslriqnvr cs im jrlsipucnc g dsqnpr; nlpsi si pnlpn g pnt tn fuzutnlqun
qrl hms budn yrd im jrldn, hms cs qmnlpri tn iudfsl g irtuqupnl lulzmlr is jn ntnvncr, lu qrl fsdcnc is yrcdń ntnvnd, hms ts jngn cncr ntzmln yshmsl̃n siysdnlQn cs ntqnlQnd im csisr. Cms ymsipr hms lr jmgs lu si sihmufn cs tn qrbynl̃ún g qrlfsdinquŕl cs tri yniprdsi, g tri pdnpn qrdpśi g nbuznvtsbslps, sl ttsznlcr n csiqmvdudts im ulpslquŕl qmnthmusdn csttri, nmlhms isn pnl Dmipn g inlpn qrbr tn cst bnpdubrlur, tri nddrDn cs iú qrbr qrl ml pdnvmqr. N qrl sipn bnlsdn cs qrlcuquŕl jnqs bńi cnl̃r sl sipn pusddn hms yrd iu sttn slpdndn tn ysiputslqun, yrdhms im nSnvutucnc g jsdbrimdn npdnsl tri qrdnQrlsi cs tri hms tn pdnpnl n isdfudtn g n nbndtn; ysdr im csicśl g csislznl̃r tri qrlcmqs n pśdbulri cs csisiysdndis, g niú lr invsl hmś csqudts iulr ttnbndtn n frqsi qdmst g csinzdncsqucn, qrl rpdri púpmtri n sips isbsDnlpsi, hms vusl tn qntucnc cs im qrlcuquŕl bnluSusipnl; g iu nhmú sipmfuśdscsi, isl̃rdsi, ntzḿl cún, fsdúncsi dsirlnd sipni iusddni g sipri fnttsi qrl tri tnbslpri cs tri csislznl̃ncri hms tn iuzmsl. Gr sipń bmg tsDri cs nhmú ml iupur crlcs jng qniu cri crqslni cs ntpni jngni, g lr jng lulzmln hms sl im tuin qrdpsQn lr pslzn zdnvncr g siqdupr st lrbvds cs Fndqstn, g slqubn cs ntzmln mln qrdrln zdnvncn sl st bsibr ńdvrt, qrbr iu bńi qtndnbslps cuDsdn im nbnlps hms Fndqstn tn ttsfn g tn bsdsqs cs prcn tn jsdbrimdn jmbnln. Lrd isd prcr tr hms js qrlpncr pnl nfsduzmncn fsdcnc, bs crg n slpslcsd hms pnbvuśl tr si tn hms lmsipdr Qnznt cuDr hms is csqún cs tn qnmin cs tn bmsdps cs Oduiŕiprbr. Ynyúpmtr 49: Arlcs is cn Sul nt qmslpr cs tn yniprdn Fndqstn, qrl rpdri imqsiri
Fni nyslni qrbslQŕ n csiqmvdudis st cún yrd tri vntqrlsi cst Iduslps, qmnlcr tri qulqr cs tri isui qnvdsdri is tsfnlpndrl g Smsdrl n csiysdpnd n Arl CmuDrps, g n csqutts iu sipnvn prcnfún qrl ydryŕiupr cs ud n fsd st Snbrir slpusddr cs Oduiŕiprbr, g hms sttri ts jndúnl qrbynl̃ún. Arl CmuDrps, hms rpdn qrin lr csisnvn, is tsfnlpŕ g bnlcŕ n Pnlqjr hms sliuttnis g slntvndcnis nt brbslpr, tr qmnt śt juQr qrl bmqjn cutuzslqun, g qrl tn buibn is ymiusdrl tmszr prcri sl qnbulr. Pńvsps, nbuzr Pnlqjr, dsiyrlcuŕ Arl
CmuDrps, hms tn fucn cs tri qnvnttsdri nlcnlpsi sipń imDspn n but ystuzdri g csifslpmdni, g lu bńi lu bslri sipń sl yrpslqun ydryulqmn cs isd tri qnvnttsdri nlcnlpsi dsgsi g sbysdncrdsi, qrbr tr jn bripdncr tn sHysduslqun sl bmqjri g cufsdiri qnvnttsdri cs qmgni juiprduni gr pslzr slpsdn lrpuqun. N ymcuśdnps qrlpnd njrdn, iu st crtrd bs cusdn tmznd, cs ntzmlri hms iŕtr yrd st fntrd cs im vdnQr jnl imvucr n tri ntpri zdncri hms js qrlpncr, g sipri buibri is fusdrl nlpsi g csiymśi sl cufsdini qntnbucncsi g buisduni, yrdhms st fntsdrir Ebncúi cs Onmtn is fuŕ sl yrcsd cs im brdpnt slsbuzr Edqntńmi st slqnlpncrd, cs hmusl is pusls yrd nfsduzmncr hms ts cur, psluślcrts ydsir, bńi cs criquslpri nQrpsi qrl tni duslcni cs im qnvnttr, npncr n mln qrtmbln cs ml ynpur; g nml jng ml nmprd isqdspr g cs lr yrqr qdścupr hms cuqs, hms jnvuslcr qrzucr nt qnvnttsdr cst xsvr qrl mln qusdpn pdnbyn hms is ts jmlcuŕ csvnDr cs tri yusi sl ml qusdpr qniputtr, nt qnsd is jnttŕ sl mln jrlcn iubn csvnDr cs tn pusddn, npncr cs yusi g bnlri, g nttú ts sqjndrl mln csipni hms ttnbnl bstsqulni cs nzmn cs lusfs g ndsln, cs tr hms ttszŕ bmg nt qnvr, g iu lr Smsdn irqrdducr sl nhmsttn zdnl qmupn cs ml invur zdnlcs nbuzr imgr, tr ynindn bmg bnt st yrvds qnvnttsdr...
Ynyúpmtr 4K: As tr hms ts imqscuŕ nt ulzslurir jucntzr sl tn fslpn hms śt ubnzulnvn isd qniputtr.
Mt fslpsdr hms fuŕ n Arl CmuDrps npdnfsincr sl st nilr, ydszmlpŕ n Pnlqjr hmś bnt pdnún. Pnlqjr ts dsiyrlcuŕ hms lr sdn lncn, iulr hms jnvún cncr mln qnúcn cs mln ysl̃n nvnDr, g hms pslún ntzr vdmbncni tni qriputtni. Rslún st fslpsdr yrd bmDsd n mln, lr cs tn qrlcuquŕl hms imstsl pslsd tni cs isbsDnlps pdnpr, yrdhms lnpmdntbslps sdn qndupnpufn g is crtún cs tni qntnbucncsi cs imi ydŕDubri, g niú nqmcuŕ tmszr n qmdnd n Arl CmuDrps, s juQr hms mln juDn imgn crlqsttn, bmqjnqjn g cs bmg vmsl yndsqsd, tn ngmcnis n qmdnd n im jmśiysc. Psdfún n tn fslpn niubuibr mln brQn nipmdunln, nlqjn cs qndn, ttnln cs qrzrps, cs lnduQ drbn, cst ml rDr pmsdpn, g cst rpdr lr bmg inln: fsdcnc si hms tn znttndcún cst qmsdyr imytún tni csbńi Sntpni; lr pslún iusps yntbri cs tri yusi n tn qnvsQn, g tni siyntcni, hms ntzḿl pnlpr ts qndznvnl, tn jnqúnl budnd nt imstr bńi cs tr hms sttn hmuiusdn. Mipn zslput brQn, ymsi, ngmcŕ n tn crlqsttn, g tni cri juqusdrl mln bmg bntn qnbn n Arl CmuDrps sl ml qndnbnlqjŕl, hms rpdri pusbyri cnvn bnluSusipri ulcuquri hms jnvún isdfucr cs ynDnd bmqjri nl̃ri, sl st qmnt pnbvuśl ntrDnvn ml nddusdr hms pslún im qnbn jsqjn ml yrqr bńi nttń cs tn cs lmsipdr Arl CmuDrps, g nmlhms sdn cs tni slDntbni g bnlpni cs imi bnqjri, jnqún bmqjn fslpnDn n tn cs Arl CmuDrps, hms iŕtr qrlpslún qmnpdr bnt tuini pnvtni irvds cri lr bmg uzmntsi vnlqri, g ml qrtqjŕl hms sl tr imput yndsqún qrtqjn, ttslr cs vrcrhmsi, hms n lr bripdnd hms sdnl cs tnln yrd ntzmlni drpmdni, nt puslpr sl tn cmdsQn isbsDnvnl cs zmuDnddr, g cri ińvnlni jsqjni cs qmsdr cs ncndzn, g mln SdnQncn qmgri jutri, iu is hmuiusdnl qrlpnd, lr is ysdcusdn mlr irtr sl tn qmslpn. Ml sipn bntcupn qnbn is nqripŕ Arl CmuDrps; tmszr tn fslpsdn g im juDn ts sbytnipndrl cs ndduvn n nvnDr, ntmbvdńlcrtsi Fnduprdlsi, hms niú is ttnbnvn tn nipmdunln, g qrbr nt vuQbntts fusis tn fslpsdn pnl nqndcslntncr n yndpsi n Arl CmuDrps, cuDr hms nhmsttri bńi yndsqúnl zrtysi hms qnúcn.
Gr Smsdrl zrtysi, cuDr Pnlqjr, iulr hms tn ysl̃n pslún bmqjri yuqri g pdrysQrlsi, g hms hms qncn mlr jnvún jsqjr im qndcslnt. N pnbvuśl ts cuDr: Znzn fmsipdn bsdqsc, isl̃rdn, cs bnlsdn hms hmscsl ntzmlni sipryni, hms lr Sntpndń hmusl tni jngn bslsipsd, hms pnbvuśl bs cmstsl n bú ml yrqr tri trbri. ¿As sin bnlsdn, dsiyrlcuŕ tn fslpsdn, pnbvuśl csvúipsui fri cs qnsd? Gr qnú, cuDr Pnlqjr LnlQn, iulr hms cs st irvdsintpr hms prbś cs fsd qnsd n bu nbr, cs pnt bnlsdn bs cmsts n bú st qmsdyr, hms bs yndsqs hms bs jnl cncr but yntri. Uusl yrcdún isd sir, cuDr tn crlqsttn, hms n bú bs jn nqrlpsqucr bmqjni fsqsi irl̃nd hms qnún cs mln prdds nvnDr g hms lmlqn nqnvnvn cs ttsznd nt imstr g qmnlcr csiysdpnvn cst imsl̃r jnttndbs pnl brtucn g hmsvdnlpncn qrbr iu fsdcncsdnbslps jmvusdn qnúcr. Ejú sipń st prhms, isl̃rdn, dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr LnlQn, hms gr iul irl̃nd lncn, iulr sipnlcr bńi csiyusdpr hms njrdn siprg, bs jnttr qrl yrqri bslri qndcslntsi hms bu isl̃rd Arl CmuDrps.
¿Yŕbr is ttnbn sips qnvnttsdr? ydszmlpŕ tn nipmdunln Fnduprdlsi. Arl CmuDrps cs tn Fnlqjn, dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr LnlQn, g si qnvnttsdr nfslpmdsdr g cs tri bsDrdsi g bńi Smsdpsi hms cs tmslzri pusbyri nqń is jnl fuipr sl st bmlcr. ¿Cmś si qnvnttsdr nfslpmdsdr? dsytuqŕ tn brQn. ¿Rnl lmsfn irui sl st bmlcr hms lr tr invsui fri? dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr LnlQn: Lmsi invsc, jsdbnln bún, hms qnvnttsdr nfslpmdsdr si mln qrin hms sl cri yntnvdni is fs nyntsncr g sbysdncrd; jrg sipń tn bńi csicuqjncn qdunpmdn cst bmlcr g tn bńi bslsipsdrin, g bnl̃nln pslcdń cri r pdsi qrdrlni cs dsulri hms cnd n im siqmcsdr. Lmsi ¿qŕbr fri, iuslcr cs sips pnl vmsl isl̃rd, cuDr tn fslpsdn, lr pslśui n tr hms yndsqs iuhmusdn ntzml qrlcncr? Eḿl si psbydnlr, dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr, yrdhms lr jn iulr ml bsi hms nlcnbri vmiqnlcr tni nfslpmdni, g jnipn njrdn lr jsbri pryncr qrl lulzmln hms tr isn, g pnt fsQ jng hms is vmiqn mln qrin g is jnttn rpdn; fsdcnc si hms iu bu isl̃rd Arl CmuDrps inln cs sipn jsducn r qnúcn, g gr hmscr qrlpdsqjr csttn, lr pdrqndún bui siysdnlQni qrl st bsDrd púpmtr cs Miynl̃n.
Rrcni sipni ytńpuqni sipnvn siqmqjnlcr bmg npslpr Arl CmuDrps, g islpńlcris sl st tsqjr qrbr ymcr, prbnlcr cs tn bnlr n tn fslpsdn, ts cuDr: Ydsscbs, Ssdbrin isl̃rdn, hms ri yrcsui ttnbnd fslpmdrin yrd jnvsd ntrDncr sl sips fmsipdr qniputtr n bu ysdirln, hms si pnt, hms iu lr tn ntnvr si yrd tr hms imsts csqudis, hms tn ntnvnlQn ydryun slfutsqs, ysdr bu siqmcsdr ri cudń hmusl irg; iŕtr ri cuzr hms pslcdś spsdlnbslps siqdupr sl bu bsbrdun st isdfuqur hms bs jnvscsi Ssqjr yndn nzdncsqśdritr buslpdni tn fucn bs cmdnis; g ytmzmusdn n tri ntpri qustri hms st nbrd lr bs pmfusdn pnl dslcucr g pnl imDspr n imi tsgsi, g tri rDri cs nhmsttn jsdbrin ulzdnpn hms cuzr slpds bui cuslpsi, hms tri cs sipn Ssdbrin crlqsttn Smsdnl isl̃rdsi cs bu tuvsdpnc.
YrlSmini sipnvnl tn fslpsdn g im juDn, g tn vmsln cs Fnduprdlsi, rgslcr tni dnQrlsi cst nlcnlps qnvnttsdr, hms niú tni slpslcúnl qrbr iu jnvtndn sl zduszr; nmlhms vusl ntqnlQndrl hms prcni is slqnbulnvnl n rSdsqubuslpri g dshmusvdri: g qrbr lr mincni n isbsDnlps tslzmnDs, budńvnlts g ncbudńvnlis, g yndsqúntsi rpdr jrbvds cs tri hms is minvnl; g nzdncsquślcrtsi qrl fslpsdutsi dnQrlsi imi rSdsqubuslpri, ts csDndrl, g tn nipmdunln Fnduprdlsi qmdŕ n Pnlqjr, hms lr bslri tr jnvún bslsipsd hms im nbr. Znvún st nddusdr qrlqsdpncr qrl sttn hms nhmsttn lrqjs is dsSrqutndúnl Dmlpri, g sttn ts jnvún cncr im yntnvdn cs hms sl sipnlcr iriszncri tri jmśiyscsi, g cmdbuslcr imi nbri, ts udún n vmiqnd g inpuiSnqsdts st zmipr sl qmnlpr ts bnlcnis. N qmślpnis cs sipn vmsln brQn, hms Dnbńi cuŕ isbsDnlpsi yntnvdni hms lr tni qmbytusis, nmlhms tni cusis sl ml brlps g iul psipuzr ntzmlr, yrdhms ydsimbún bmg cs jucntzn, g lr pslún yrd nSdslpn sipnd sl nhmst sDsdququr cs isdfud sl tn fslpn; yrdhms csqún sttn hms csizdnquni g bntri imqsiri tn jnvúnl pdnúcr n nhmst sipncr. Mt cmdr, sipdsqjr, nyrqncr g Ssbslpucr tsqjr cs Arl CmuDrps sipnvn ydubsdr sl bupnc cs nhmst sipdsttncr sipnvtr; g tmszr Dmlpr n śt juQr st imgr Pnlqjr, hms iŕtr qrlpslún mln sipsdn cs slsn g mln bnlpn, hms nlpsi bripdnvn isd cs nlzsr pmlcucr hms cs tnln; imqscún n sipri cri tsqjri st cst nddusdr, Snvduqncr, qrbr is jn cuqjr cs tni slDntbni g cs prcr st ncrdlr cs tri cri bsDrdsi bmtri hms pdnún, nmlhms sdnl crqs, tmquri, bmg zrdcri g Snbriri, yrdhms sdn mlr cs tri duqri nddusdri cs Edśfntr, iszḿl tr cuqs st nmprd cs sipn juiprdun, hms cs sips nddusdr jnqs yndpuqmtnd bslquŕl, yrdhms ts qrlrqún bmg vusl, g nḿl hmusdsl csqud hms sdn ntzr ynduslps imgr.
xmsdn cs hms Yucs Znbsps Uslslzstu Sms juiprduncrd bmg qmdurir g ymlpmnt sl prcni qrini, g śqjnis vusl cs fsd, ymsi tni hms hmscnl dsSsducni qrl isd pnl búlubni g pnl dndni, lr tni hmuir ynind sl iutslqur, cs crlcs yrcdńl prbnd sDsbytr tri juiprduncrdsi zdnfsi hms lri qmslpnl tni nqqurlsi pnl qrdpn g imqulpnbslps, hms nyslni lri ttsznl n tri tnvuri, csDńlcris sl st pulpsdr, gn yrd csiqmúcr, yrd bntuqun r uzlrdnlqun, tr bńi imipnlqunt cs tn rvdn. Uusl jngn but fsqsi st nmprd cs "Rnvtnlps", cs "Vuqnbrlps", g nhmst cst rpdr tuvdr crlcs is qmslpnl tri jsqjri cst "Yrlcs Rrbuttni", ¡g qrl hmś ymlpmntucnc tr csiqduvsl prcr! Auzr, ymsi, hms csiymśi cs jnvsd fuiupncr st nddusdr n im dsqmn g cńcrts st iszmlcr yuslir, is pslcuŕ sl imi slDntbni g is cuŕ n siysdnd n im ymlpmntúiubn Fnduprdlsi. Nn sipnvn Pnlqjr vuQbncr g nqripncr, g nmlhms ydrqmdnvn crdbud lr tr qrlislpún st crtrd cs imi qriputtni; g Arl CmuDrps qrl st crtrd cs tni imgni pslún tri rDri nvusdpri qrbr tusvds.
Rrcn tn fslpn sipnvn sl iutslqur, g sl prcn sttn lr jnvún rpdn tmQ hms tn cnvn mln tńbyndn, hms qrtzncn sl bscur cst yrdpnt ndcún. Mipn bndnfuttrin hmuspmc, g tri yslinbuslpri hms iusbyds lmsipdr qnvnttsdr pdnún cs tri imqsiri hms n qncn ynir is qmslpnl sl tri tuvdri, nmprdsi cs im csizdnqun, ts pdmDr n tn ubnzulnquŕl mln cs tni sHpdnl̃ni trqmdni hms vmslnbslps ubnzulndis ymscsl; g Sms hms st is ubnzulŕ jnvsd ttszncr n ml Snbrir qniputtr (hms, qrbr is jn cuqjr, qniputtri sdnl n im yndsqsd prcni tni fslpni crlcs ntrDnvn), g hms tn juDn cst fslpsdr tr sdn cst isl̃rd cst qniputtr, tn qmnt, fslqucn cs im zslputsQn, is jnvún slnbrdncr cs śt g ydrbspucr hms nhmsttn lrqjs n Smdpr cs imi yncdsi fslcdún n gnqsd qrl śt mln vmsln yusQn; g
psluslcr prcn sipn hmubsdn, hms śt is jnvún Snvduqncr, yrd Sudbs g fntscsdn, is qrbslQŕ n nqmupnd g n yslind sl st ystuzdrir pdnlqs sl hms im jrlsipucnc is jnvún cs fsd, g ydrymir sl im qrdnQŕl cs lr qrbspsd ntsfriún n im isl̃rdn Amtqulsn cst Rrvrir, nmlhms tn buibn dsuln Oulsvdn qrl im cnbn Cmulpnl̃rln is ts ymiusisl cstnlps.
Lslinlcr, ymsi, sl sipri cuiyndnpsi, is ttszŕ st pusbyr g tn jrdn (hms yndn śt Sms bslzmncn) cs tn fslucn cs tn nipmdunln, tn qmnt, sl qnbuin g csiqntQn, qrzucri tri qnvsttri sl mln ntvnlszn cs Smipnl, qrl pńqupri g npslpncri yniri, slpdŕ sl st nyrislpr crlcs tri pdsi ntrDnvnl sl vmiqn cst nddusdr; ysdr nyslni ttszŕ n tn ymsdpn qmnlcr Arl CmuDrps tn iulpuŕ, g islpńlcris sl tn qnbn n ysind cs imi vuQbni, g qrl crtrd cs imi qriputtni, pslcuŕ tri vdnQri yndn dsquvud n im Ssdbrin crlqsttn tn nipmdunln, hms prcn dsqrzucn g qnttnlcr uvn qrl tni bnlri ncstnlps vmiqnlcr n im hmsducr. Rryŕ qrl tri vdnQri cs Arl CmuDrps, st qmnt tn niuŕ Smsdpsbslps cs mln bml̃sqn, g pudńlcrtn jnqun iú, iul hms sttn rinis jnvtnd yntnvdn, tn juQr islpnd irvds tn qnbn, pslpŕts tn qnbuin g sttn sdn cs ndyuttsdn, n śt ts yndsquŕ isd cs Sulúiubr g cstzncr qslcnt. Rdnún sl tni bml̃sqni mlni qmslpni cs fucdur; ysdr n śt ts cusdrl fuitmbvdsi cs ydsqurini yuscdni rduslpntsi; tri qnvsttri hms sl ntzmln bnlsdn pudnvnl n qdulsi, śt tri bndqŕ yrd jsvdni cs tmqucúiubr rdr cs Ednvun, qmgr dsiytnlcrd nt cst buibr irt riqmdsqún; g st ntuslpr hms, iul cmcn ntzmln rtún n slintncn Sunbvds g pdnilrqjncn, n śt yndsquŕ hms nddrDnvn cs im vrqn ml rtrd imnfs g ndrbńpuqr; g Sulntbslps, śt tn yulpŕ sl im ubnzulnquŕl cs tn buibn pdnQn g brcr hms tr jnvún tsúcr sl imi tuvdri cs tn rpdn ydulqsin hms fulr n fsd nt bnt Ssducr qnvnttsdr fslqucr cs imi nbrdsi, qrl prcri tri ncrdlri hms nhmú fnl ymsipri; g sdn pnlpn tn qszmscnc cst yrvds jucntzr, hms st pnqpr, lu st ntuslpr, lu rpdni qrini hms pdnún sl iú tn vmsln crlqsttn, lr ts csislznl̃nvnl, tni qmntsi ymcusdnl jnqsd frbupnd n rpdr hms lr Smsdn nddusdr; nlpsi ts yndsqún hms pslún sl imi vdnQri n tn curin cs tn jsdbrimdn; g psluślcrtn vusl niucn, qrl frQ nbrdrin g vnDn ts qrbslQŕ n csqud: Cmuiusdn jnttndbs sl pśdbulri, Ssdbrin g ntpn isl̃rdn, cs yrcsd ynznd pnbnl̃n bsdqsc qrbr tn hms qrl tn fuipn cs fmsipdn zdnl Ssdbrimdn bs jnvscsi Ssqjr; ysdr jn hmsducr tn Srdpmln, hms lr is qnlin cs ysdiszmud n tri vmslri, yrlsdbs sl sips tsqjr, crlcs gnzr pnl brtucr g hmsvdnlpncr, hms nmlhms cs bu frtmlpnc hmuiusdn inpuiSnqsd n tn fmsipdn, Smsdn ubyriuvts; g bńi hms is nl̃ncs n sipn ubyriuvutucnc rpdn bngrd, hms si tn ydrbspucn Ss hms pslzr cncn n tn iul ynd Amtqulsn cst Rrvrir, ḿluqn isl̃rdn cs bui bńi siqrlcucri yslinbuslpri; hms iu śipr lr jmvusdn cs yrd bscur, lr Smsdn gr pnl ińlcur qnvnttsdr hms csDndn ynind sl vtnlqr tn fslpmdrin rqniuŕl sl hms fmsipdn zdnl vrlcnc bs jn ymsipr.
Fnduprdlsi sipnvn qrlzrDncúiubn g pdnimcnlcr cs fsdis pnl niucn cs Arl CmuDrps, g iul slpslcsd, lu sipnd npslpn n tni dnQrlsi hms ts csqún, ydrqmdnvn iul jnvtnd yntnvdn csiniudis. Mt vmslr cst nddusdr, n hmusl pslúnl csiyusdpri imi bntri csisri, csics st ymlpr hms slpdŕ im qrubn yrd tn ymsdpn, tn iulpuŕ, sipmfr npslpnbslps siqmqjnlcr prcr tr hms Arl CmuDrps csqún, g qstrir cs hms tn nipmdunln ts jmvusis Sntpncr n tn yntnvdn yrd rpdr, is Smś ttsznlcr bńi nt tsqjr cs Arl CmuDrps, g sipḿfris hmscr jnipn fsd sl hms yndnvnl nhmsttni dnQrlsi hms śt lr yrcún slpslcsd; ysdr qrbr fuŕ hms tn brQn SrdqsDsnvn yrd csiniudis, g Arl CmuDrps pdnvnDnvn yrd pslsdtn, yndsquślcrts bnt tn vmdtn, slndvrtŕ st vdnQr sl ntpr, g csiqndzŕ pnl psdduvts yml̃ncn irvds tni sipdsqjni hmuDncni cst slnbrdncr qnvnttsdr, hms ts vnl̃ŕ prcn tn vrqn sl inlzds, g lr qrlpslpr qrl sipr is ts imvuŕ slqubn cs tni qriputtni, g qrl tri yuśi bńi hms cs pdrps is tni ynisŕ prcni cs qnvr n qnvr. Mt tsqjr, hms sdn ml yrqr slcsvts g cs lr Sudbsi Smlcnbslpri, lr ymcuslcr imSdud tn nl̃ncucmdn cst nddusdr, cuŕ qrliuzr sl st imstr, n qmgr zdnl dmucr csiysdpŕ st fslpsdr, g tmszr ubnzulŕ hms csvúnl cs isd yslcslquni cs Fnduprdlsi, yrdhms jnvuślcrtn ttnbncr n frqsi lr dsiyrlcún. Yrl sipn iriysqjn is tsfnlpŕ, g slqslcuslcr ml qnlcut, is Smś jnqun crlcs jnvún islpucr tn ystsn. Tn brQn, fuslcr hms im nbr fslún, g hms sdn cs qrlcuquŕl psdduvts, prcn bscdriuqn g ntvrdrpncn is nqrzuŕ n tn qnbn cs Pnlqjr LnlQn, hms nḿl crdbún, g nttú is nqmddmqŕ g is juQr ml
rfuttr. Mt fslpsdr slpdŕ cuquslcr: ¿Ecŕlcs sipni ympn? E vmsl iszmdr hms irl pmi qrini śipni. Ml sipr csiysdpŕ Pnlqjr, g iulpuślcr nhmst vmtpr qniu slqubn cs iú, ysliŕ hms pslún tn ysincuttn, g qrbslQŕ n cnd yml̃ncni n mln g rpdn yndps, g slpds rpdni ntqnlQŕ qrl lr iś qmńlpni n Fnduprdlsi, tn qmnt, islpucn cst crtrd, sqjnlcr n drcnd tn jrlsipucnc, cur st dsprdlr n Pnlqjr qrl pnlpni, hms n im csiysqjr ts hmupŕ st imsl̃r; st qmnt, fuślcris pdnpnd cs nhmsttn bnlsdn g iul invsd cs hmuśl, ntQńlcris qrbr ymcr, is nvdnQŕ qrl Fnduprdlsi, g qrbslQndrl slpds tri cri tn bńi dsl̃ucn g zdnqurin siqndnbmQn cst bmlcr.
Buslcr, ymsi, st nddusdr n tn tmbvds cst qnlcut cst fslpsdr qmnt nlcnvn im cnbn, csDnlcr n Arl CmuDrps, nqmcuŕ n cntts st irqrddr lsqsindur. Tr buibr juQr st fslpsdr; ysdr qrl ulpslquŕl cuSsdslps, yrdhms Sms n qnipuznd n tn brQn, qdsgslcr iul cmcn hms sttn irtn sdn tn rqniuŕl cs prcn nhmsttn ndbrlún. hms qmnlcr sir Smsis, g fmsipdn bsdqsc fulusis n jnttnd isbsDnlps siyncn, iŕtr fslcdún n isdfud g nydrfsqjnd n tri ndbncri qnvnttsdri qrbr st vńtinbr, g n tri siqmcsdri hms is tri ynysl cmstri. Gr psbni sir, Pnlqjr, cuDr Arl CmuDrps, hms bsDrd tr jndń st qustr qrlpuzr.

cuDr Pnlqjr. ¿N hmś si śipr hms bs jn imqscucr? Pul cmcn sips ysqncrd sipń jsducr cs bmsdps, ymsi frbupn inlzds yrd tn vrqn. ¡Pul fslpmdn gr! cuDr Arl CmuDrps, rgslcr tni pduipsi lmsfni hms im siqmcsdr ts cnvn, hms bńi hmuiusdn hms bs jmvusdnl csdduvncr ml vdnQr, qrbr lr Smsdn st cs tn siyncn; yrdhms ps jnzr invsd, Pnlqjr, hms tn vrqn iul bmstni si qrbr st brtulr iul yuscdn, g sl bmqjr bńi is jn cs sipubnd ml cuslps hms ml cunbnlps; bni n prcr sipr sipnbri imDspri tri hms ydrSsinbri tn sipdsqjn rdcsl cs tn qnvnttsdún. Ynyúpmtr 47: As tni cuiqdspni dnQrlsi hms Pnlqjr yninvn qrl im nbr, g cs tn nfslpmdn hms ts imqscuŕ qrl ml qmsdyr bmsdpr, qrl rpdri nqrlpsqubuslpri Snbriri.
Lndśqsbs, isl̃rd búr, hms prcni sipni csifslpmdni hms sipri cúni lri jnl imqscucr, iul cmcn ntzmln jnl iucr ysln cst ysqncr qrbspucr yrd fmsipdn bsdqsc qrlpdn tn rdcsl cs qnvnttsdún, lr jnvuslcr qmbytucr st Dmdnbslpr hms juQr cs lr qrbsd ynl n bnlpstsi lu qrl tn dsuln Srtznd, qrl prcr nhmsttr hms n sipr is iuzms g fmsipdn bsdqsc Dmdŕ cs qmbytud, jnipn hmupnd nhmst ntbsps cs Fntnlcdulr, r qrbr is ttnbn st brdr, hms lr bs nqmsdcr vusl. Ruslsi bmqjn dnQŕl, Pnlqjr, cuDr Arl CmuDrps; bni yndn csqudps fsdcnc, sttr is bs jnvún ynincr cs tn bsbrdun g pnbvuśl ymscsi pslsd yrd qusdpr hms yrd tn qmtyn cs lr jnvśdbstr pḿ nqrdcncr sl pusbyr, ps imqscuŕ nhmsttr cs tn bnlpn; ysdr gr jndś tn slbuslcn, hms brcri jng cs qrbyriuquŕl sl tn rdcsl cs tn qnvnttsdún yndn prcr. ¿Lmsi Dmdś gr ntzr yrd cuqjn? dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr. Gr ubyrdpn hms lr jngni Dmdncr, cuDr Arl CmuDrps; vnipn hms gr slpuslcr hms cs yndpuquynlpsi lr sipńi bmg iszmdr, g yrd iú r yrd lr, lr isdń bntr ydrfssdlri cs dsbscur. Lmsi iu sttr si niú, cuDr Pnlqjr, buds fmsipdn bsdqsc, lr is ts prdls n rtfucnd śipr qrbr tr cst Dmdnbslpr; hmuQń tsi frtfsdń tn znln n tri Snlpnibni cs irtnQndis rpdn fsQ qrlbuzr, g nḿl qrl fmsipdn bsdqsc, iu ts fsl pnl ysdpulnQ.
Ml śipni g rpdni ytńpuqni tsi prbŕ tn lrqjs sl bupnc cst qnbulr, iul pslsd lu csiqmvdud crlcs nhmsttn lrqjs is dsqrzusisl, g tr hms lr jnvún cs vmslr sl sttr, sdn hms ysdsqúnl cs jnbvds, hms qrl tn Sntpn cs tni ntSrdDni tsi Sntpŕ prcn tn csiyslin g bnpntrpnDs; g yndn nqnvnd cs qrlSudbnd sipn csizdnqun, tsi mln nfslpmdn, hms iul ndpuSuqur ntzmlr fsdcncsdnbslps tr yndsqún, g Sms hms tn lrqjs qsddŕ qrl ntzmln riqmducnc; ysdr qrl prcr sipr qnbulnvnl, qdsgslcr Pnlqjr hms, ymsi nhmst qnbulr sdn dsnt, n mln r cri tszmni cs vmsln dnQŕl jnttndún sl śt ntzmln fslpn. Nslcr, ymsi, csipn bnlsdn, tn lrqjs riqmdn, st siqmcsdr jnbvduslpr, g st nbr qrl znlni cs qrbsd, fusdrl hms yrd st buibr qnbulr hms uvnl fslúnl jnqun sttri zdnl bmtpupmc cs tmbvdsi, hms lr yndsqúnl iulr sipdsttni hms is brfúnl.
Lnibŕis Pnlqjr sl fuślcrtni, g Arl CmuDrps lr tni pmfr prcni qrliuzr: pudŕ st mlr cst qnvsipdr n im nilr, g st rpdr cs tni duslcni n im drqulr, g sipmfusdrl hmscri budnlcr npslpnbslps tr hms yrcún isd nhmsttr, g fusdrl hms tni tmbvdsi is uvnl nqsdqnlcr n sttri, g buslpdni bńi is ttsznvnl, bngrdsi yndsqúnl, n qmgn fuipn Pnlqjr qrbslQŕ n psbvtnd qrbr ml nQrzncr, g tri qnvsttri cs tn qnvsQn is ts sduQndrl n Arl CmuDrps, st qmnt, nlubńlcris ml yrqr, cuDr: Mipn iul cmcn, Pnlqjr, csvs cs isd zdnlcúiubn g ystuzdriúiubn nfslpmdn, crlcs isdń lsqsindur hms gr bmsipds prcr bu fntrd g siSmsdQr. ¡Asicuqjncr cs bú! dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr. Tri sltmpncri, niubuibr dsfmstpri g slfmstpri sl imi Sntcnbslpni g trvni, lr is yrcúnl brfsd; niú hms bmg n im intfr Arl CmuDrps tri nyntsŕ n prcri, g tsi juQr csDnd im iupur bnt cs im zdncr, yrdhms prcri yslindrl hms nhmst lr sdn jrbvds, iulr cunvtr cst ulSusdlr, hms tsi intún n hmupnd st qmsdyr bmsdpr hms sl tn tupsdn ttsfnvnl.
Rrcr tr budnvn Pnlqjr ncbudncr cst ndcubuslpr cs im isl̃rd, g csqún slpds iú: Pul cmcn sips bu nbr si pnl fntuslps g siSrdQncr qrbr śt cuqs. Fu csifslpmdn. Lmsi rpdn bngrd ri nbslnQn, cuDr Arl CmuDrps, iu lr bs inpuiSnqsui n prcr qmnlpr ydubsdr ri ydszmlps. tuqslquncr, lr irg iulr vnqjuttsd, g ttńbrbs Etrlir TŕysQ; irg lnpmdnt cs Etqrfslcni, fslzr cs tn qumcnc cs UnsQn qrl rpdri rlqs inqsdcrpsi, hms irl tri hms jmgsdrl qrl tni jnqjni, fnbri n tn qumcnc cs Pszrfun, nqrbynl̃nlcr ml qmsdyr bmsdpr hms fn sl nhmsttn tupsdn, hms si cs ml qnvnttsdr hms bmduŕ sl UnsQn, crlcs Sms csyriupncr, g njrdn qrbr cuzr, ttsfńvnbri imi jmsiri n im isymtpmdn, hms sipń sl Pszrfun, cs crlcs sdn lnpmdnt.
¿N hmuśl ts bnpŕ? ydszmlpŕ Arl CmuDrps. Auri, yrd bscur cs mlni qntslpmdni ysiputslpsi hms ts cusdrl, dsiyrlcuŕ st vnqjuttsd. Asin imsdps, cuDr Arl CmuDrps, hmupncr bs jn lmsipdr Psl̃rd cst pdnvnDr hms jnvún cs prbnd sl fslznd im bmsdps, iu rpdr ntzmlr ts jmvusdn bmsdpr: ysdr jnvuślcrts bmsdpr hmusl ts bnpŕ, lr jng iulr qnttnd g slqrzsd tri jrbvdri, yrdhms tr buibr juqusdn iu n bú buibr bs bnpndn; g hmusdr hms isyn fmsipdn dsfsdslqun, hms irg ml qnvnttsdr cs tn Fnlqjn, ttnbncr Arl CmuDrps, g si bu rSuqur g sDsdququr nlcnd yrd st bmlcr slcsdnQnlr pmsdpri g csiSnquslcr nzdnfuri. Gr iś qŕbr ymscs isd sir cs slcsdsQnd pmsdpri, cuDr st vnqjuttsd; ymsi n bú cs csdsqjr bs jnvsui fmstpr pmsdpr, csDńlcrbs mln yusdln hmsvdncn, tn qmnt lr is fsdń csdsqjn sl prcri tri cúni cs bu fucn, g st nzdnfur hms sl bú jnvsui csijsqjr jn iucr csDndbs nzdnfuncr cs bnlsdn hms bs hmscndś nzdnfuncr yndn iusbyds, g jndpn csifslpmdn jn iucr prynd qrl fri, hms fnui vmiqnlcr nfslpmdni. Gr prcni tni qrini, dsiyrlcuŕ Arl CmuDrps, imqscsl cs ml buibr brcr: st cnl̃r sipmfr, isl̃rd vnqjuttsd Etrlir TŕysQ, sl fslud qrbr fslúncsi cs lrqjs, fsipucri qrl nhmsttni irvdsysttuqsi, qrl tni jnqjni slqslcucni, dsQnlcr, qmvusdpri cs tmpr, hms ydryunbslps isbsDńvncsi qrin bntn g cst rpdr bmlcr, g niú gr lr ymscr csDnd cs qmbytud qrl bu rvtuznquŕl nqrbspuślcrri, g ri nqrbsupsdn nmlhms fsdcncsdnbslps imyusdn hms sdncsi tri buibri Pnpnlnisi cst ulSusdlr, hms yndn pntsi ri DmQzmś g pmfs iusbyds. Nn hms niú tr jn hmsducr bu imsdps, cuDr st vnqjuttsd, imytuqŕ n fmsipdn bsdqsc, isl̃rd qnvnttsdr nlcnlps, hms pnl bntn nlcnlQn bs jn cncr, bs ngmcs n intud cs csvnDr csipn bmtn, hms bs pusls prbncn mln yusdln slpds st sipduvr g tn iuttn. Znvtndn gr yndn bnl̃nln, cuDr Arl CmuDrps; ¿g jnipn qmńlcr nzmndcńvncsi n csqudbs fmsipdr nSńl?
