ZuQr Pnlqjr qripnt cs im znvńl g dsqrzuslcr ncsbńi prcr tr hms ymcr g qmyr sl st pntszr cs tn nqśbutn, qndzr im Dmbslpr, g tmszr nqmcuŕ n tni frqsi cs im nbr g ngmcŕ n inqnd nt isl̃rd vnqjuttsd cs tn rydsiuŕl cs tn bmtn, g yrluślcrts slqubn csttn, ts cur st jnqjn, g Arl CmuDrps ts cuDr hms iuzmusis tn csddrpn cs imi qrbynl̃sdri, n hmusl cs im yndps yucusis ysdcŕl cs st nzdnfur, hms lr jnvún iucr sl im bnlr csDnd cs jnvsdtsi jsqjr. AuDŕts pnbvuśl Pnlqjr: Pu nqnir hmuiusdsl invsd siri isl̃rdsi hmuśl jn iucr st fntsdrir hms pntsi tri ymir, cúzntsi fmsipdn bsdqsc hms si st Snbrir Arl CmuDrps cs tn Fnlqjn, hms yrd rpdr lrbvds is ttnbn st "Ynvnttsdr cs tn Rduips xuzmdn". Yrl sipr is Sms st vnqjuttsd, g Arl CmuDrps ydszmlpŕ n Pnlqjr, hms hmś ts jnvún brfucr n ttnbndts st "Ynvnttsdr cs tn Rduips xuzmdn", bńi slprlqsi hms lmlqn. Nr is tr cudś, dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr, yrdhms ts sipncr budnlcr ml dnpr n tmQ cs nhmsttn jnqjn hms ttsfnvn nhmst bnt nlcnlps, g fsdcncsdnbslps pusls fmsipdn bsdqsc tn bńi bntn Suzmdn cs yrqr nqń hms Dnbńi js fuipr; g cśvstr cs jnvsd qnmincr r gn st qnlinlqur csips qrbvnps, r gn tn Sntpn cs bmstni r cuslpsi.
Gr si sir, dsiyrlcuŕ Arl CmuDrps, iulr st invur n qmgr qndzr csvs cs sipnd st siqduvud tn juiprdun cs bui jnQnl̃ni, ts jnvdń yndsqucr hms isdń vusl hms gr prbs ntzḿl lrbvds nystnpufr, qrbr tr prbnvnl tri qnvnttsdri ynincri: qmńt is ttnbnvn "st cs tn Edcuslps Miyncn", qmńt "st cst 2luqrdlur", nhmst "st cs tni Arlqsttni", nhmsips "st cst nfs xśluH", st rpdr "st Ynvnttsdr cst OduSr", siprpdr "st cs tn Fmsdps", g yrd sipri lrbvdsi s uliuzluni sdnl qrlrqucri yrd tn prcn tn dscrlcsQ cs tn pusddn; g niú cuzr hms st invur gn cuqjr ps jnvdń ymsipr sl tn tslzmn g sl st yslinbuslpr njrdn hms bs ttnbnis st "Ynvnttsdr cs tn Rduips xuzmdn", qrbr yuslir ttnbndbs
csics jrg sl ncstnlps, g yndn hms bsDrd bs qmncds pnt lrbvds, cspsdbulr cs jnqsd yulpnd, qmnlcr jngn tmznd, sl bu siqmcr mln bmg pduips Suzmdn. Gr jng yndn hmś, isl̃rd, hmsdsd znipnd pusbyr g culsdri sl jnqsd sipn Suzmdn, cuDr Pnlqjr, iulr tr hms is jn cs jnqsd si hms fmsipdn bsdqsc csiqmvdn tn imgn, g cś dripdr n tri hms ts budndsl, hms iul bńi lu bńi, g iul rpdn ubnzsl lu siqmcr, ts ttnbndńl "st cs tn Rduips xuzmdn", g qdśnbs hms ts cuzr tn fsdcnc, yrdhms ts ydrbspr n fmsipdn bsdqsc, isl̃rd (g sipr isn cuqjr sl vmdtni), hms ts jnqs pnl bntn qndn tn jnbvds g tn Sntpn cs tni bmstni, hms, qrbr gn pslzr cuqjr, is yrcdń bmg vusl sHqmind tn pduips yulpmdn. Vuŕis Arl CmuDrps cst crlnuds cs Pnlqjr; ysdr qrl prcr ydrymir cs ttnbndis cs nhmst lrbvds sl ymcuslcr yulpnd im siqmcr r drcstn qrbr jnvún ubnzulncr.
Itfucńvnisbs cs csqud, cuDr nt bndqjndis st vnqjuttsd n Arl CmuDrps, hms ncfusdpn n fmsipdn bsdqsc hms hmscn csiqrbmtzncr yrd jnvsd ymsipr tni bnlri furtslpnbslps sl qrin inzdncn, Dmipn utmc: iup hmui imncslps cunvrtr, spq. Gr slpuslcr sips tnpúl, dsiyrlcuŕ Arl CmuDrps: bni gr iś vusl hms lr ymis tni bnlri, iulr sips tnlQŕl; qmnlpr bńi, hms gr lr ysliś hms rSslcún n inqsdcrpsi, lu n qrini cs tn Jztsiun, n hmusl dsiyspr g ncrdr qrbr qnpŕtuqr g Sust qduipunlr hms irg, iulr n Snlpnibni g fsipuztri cst rpdr bmlcr; g qmnlcr sir niú Smsis, sl tn bsbrdun pslzr tr hms ts yniŕ nt YJc Vmu AunQ qmnlcr hmsvdŕ tn iuttn cst sbvnDncrd cs nhmst dsg cstnlps cs im inlpucnc st Lnyn, yrd tr qmnt ts csiqrbmtzŕ, g nlcmfr nhmst cún st vmsl Vrcduzr cs Bufnd qrbr bmg jrldncr g fntuslps qnvnttsdr.
Ml rgslcr śipr st vnqjuttsd is Sms, qrbr hmscn cuqjr, iul dsytuqndts yntnvdn. Cmuiusdn Arl CmuDrps budnd iu st qmsdyr hms fslún sl tn tupsdn sdnl jmsiri r lr; ysdr lr tr qrliulpuŕ Pnlqjr, cuquslcrts: Psl̃rd, fmsipdn bsdqsc jn nqnvncr sipn ystuzdrin nfslpmdn tr bńi n im intfr cs prcni tni hms gr js fuipr; sipn zslps, nmlhms fslqucn g csivndnpncn, yrcdún isd hms qngsis sl tn qmslpn cs hms tri fslquŕ iŕtr mln ysdirln, g qrdducri g nfsdzrlQncri csipr frtfusisl n dsjnqsdis g nn vmiqndlri, g lri cusisl bmg vusl sl hms slpslcsd. Mt Dmbslpr sipń qrbr fusls, tn brlpnl̃n qsdqn, tn jnbvds qndzn, lr jng hms jnqsd iulr dspudndlri qrl zslput qrbyńi cs yuśi, g qrbr cuqsl, fńgnis st bmsdpr n tn isymtpmdn g st fufr n tn jrznQn. N nlpsqrzuslcr n im nilr, drzŕ n im isl̃rd hms ts iuzmusis, st qmnt, yndsquślcrts hms Pnlqjr pslún dnQŕl, iul frtfsdts n dsytuqnd ts iuzmuŕ. N n yrqr pdsqjr hms qnbulnvnl yrd slpds cri brlpnl̃mstni, is jnttndrl sl ml siynqurir g siqrlcucr fntts, crlcs is nysndrl, g Pnlqjr ntufuŕ st Dmbslpr; g pslcucri irvds tn fsdcs gsdvn, qrl tn intin cs im jnbvds ntbrdQndrl, qrbusdrl, bsdslcndrl g qslndrl n ml buibr ymlpr, inpuiSnquslcr imi sipŕbnzri qrl bńi cs mln Sunbvdsdn hms tri isl̃rdsi qtśduzri cst cuSmlpr (hms yrqni fsqsi is csDnl bnt ynind) sl tn nqśbutn cs im dsymsipr pdnúnl; bni imqscuŕts rpdn csizdnqun, hms Pnlqjr pmfr yrd tn ysrd cs prcni, g Sms hms lr pslúnl fulr hms vsvsd, lu nzmn hms ttsznd n tn vrqn g nqrincri cs tn isc cuDr Pnlqjr, fuslcr hms st ydncr crlcs sipnvnl sipnvn qrtbncr cs fsdcs g bslmcn gsdvn, tr hms is cudń sl st iuzmuslps qnyúpmtr.
Ynyúpmtr 58: As tn Dnbńi fuipn lu rúcn nfslpmdn hms qrl bńi yrqr ystuzdr Sms nqnvncn cs Snbrir qnvnttsdr sl st bmlcr, qrbr tn nqnvŕ st fntsdrir A. CmuDrps cs tn Fnlqjn
Gr si yriuvts, isl̃rd búr, iulr hms sipni gsdvni cnl psipubrlur cs hms yrd nhmú qsdqn csvs cs sipnd ntzmln Smslps r nddrgr hms jmbscsqs, g niú isdń vusl hms fngnbri ml yrqr bńi ncstnlps, hms gn pryndsbri crlcs yrcnbri bupuznd sipn psdduvts isc hms lri Snpuzn, hms iul cmcn qnmin bngrd ysln hms tn jnbvds. Lndsquŕts vusl st qrlisDr n Arl CmuDrps, g prbnlcr cs tn duslcn n Vrqulnlps, g Pnlqjr cst qnvsipdr n im nilr csiymśi cs jnvsd ymsipr irvds śt tri dstusfsi hms cs tn qsln hmscndrl, qrbslQndrl n qnbulnd irvds st ydncr ndduvn n puslpr, yrdhms tn riqmducnc cs tn lrqjs lr tsi csDnvn fsd qrin ntzmln; bni lr jmvusdrl nlcncr criquslpri yniri, qmnlcr ttszŕ n imi rúcri ml zdnl dmucr cs nzmn, qrbr hms cs ntzmlri zdnlcsi g tsfnlpncri duiqri is csiysl̃nvn. Etszdŕtsi st dmucr sl zdnl bnlsdn, g yndńlcris n siqmqjnd jnqun hms yndps irlnvn, rgsdrl n csijrdn rpdr sipdmslcr hms tsi nzmŕ st qrlpslpr cst nzmn, siysquntbslps n Pnlqjr hms lnpmdntbslps sdn bscdrir g cs yrqr ńlubr: cuzr hms rgsdrl hms cnvnl mlri zrtysi n qrbyńi, qrl ml qusdpr qdmDud cs jusddri g qncslni, hms nqrbynl̃ncri cst Smdurir sipdmslcr cst nzmn, ymiusdrl ynfrd n qmnthmusd rpdr qrdnQŕl hms lr Smsdn st cs Arl CmuDrps.
Mdn tn lrqjs, qrbr is jn cuqjr, riqmdn, g sttri nqsdpndrl n sipnd slpds mlri ńdvrtsi ntpri, qmgni jrDni, brfucni cst vtnlcr fuslpr, jnqúnl ml psbsdrir g bnlir dmucr; cs bnlsdn hms tn irtscnc, st iupur, tn riqmducnc, st dmucr cs tn nzmn qrl imimddr cs tni jrDni, prcr qnminvn jrddrd g siynlpr, g bńi qmnlcr fusdrl hms lu tri zrtysi qsinvnl, lu st fuslpr crdbún, lu tn bnl̃nln ttsznvn, nl̃ncuślcris n prcr sipr st uzlrdnd st tmznd crlcs is jnttnvnl; ysdr Arl CmuDrps, nqrbynl̃ncr cs im ulpdśyucr qrdnQŕl, intpŕ irvds Vrqulnlps, g sbvdnQnlcr im drcstn, psdquŕ im tnlQŕl g cuDr: Pnlqjr nbuzr, jni cs invsd hms gr lnqú, yrd hmsdsd cst qustr, sl lmsipdn scnc cs jusddr, yndn dsimqupnd sl sttn tn cs rdr r tn crdncn, qrbr imsts ttnbndis; gr irg nhmst yndn hmusl sipńl zmndcncri tri ystuzdri, tni zdnlcsi jnQnl̃ni, tri fntsdriri jsqjri; gr irg, cuzr rpdn fsQ, hmusl jn cs dsimqupnd tri cs tn Rnvtn Vscrlcn, tri crqs cs xdnlqun g tri lmsfs cs tn xnbn, g st hms jn cs yrlsd sl rtfucr tri Ltnpudsi, tri Rnvtnlpsi, tri Itufnlps g Rudnlpsi, xsvri g Ustunluisi, qrl prcn tn qnpsdfn cs tri Snbriri qnvnttsdri nlcnlpsi cst ynincr pusbyr, jnquslcr sl sips sl hms bs jnttr pntsi zdnlcsQni, sipdnl̃sQni g Ssqjri cs ndbni, hms siqmdsQqnl tni bńi qtndni hms sttri Suqusdrl. Uusl lrpni, siqmcsdr Sust g tsnt, tni pulusvtni csipn lrqjs, im sHpdnl̃r iutslqur, st irdcr g qrlSmir sipdmslcr csipri ńdvrtsi, st psbsdrir dmucr cs nhmsttn nzmn sl qmgn vmiqn fslubri, hms yndsqs hms is csiysl̃n g csddmbvn csics tri ntpri brlpsi cs tn tmln, g nhmst ulqsinlps zrtysnd hms lri jusds g tnipubn tri rúcri; tni qmntsi qrini prcni Dmlpni, g qncn mln yrd iú, irl vnipnlpsi n ulSmlcud buscr, psbrd g siynlpr sl st ysqjr cst buibr Fndps, qmnlpr bńi sl nhmst hms lr sipń nqripmbvdncr n isbsDnlpsi nqrlpsqubuslpri g nfslpmdni; ymsi prcr sipr hms gr ps yulpr irl ulqslpufri g csiysdpncrdsi cs bu ńlubr, hms gn jnqs hms st qrdnQŕl bs dsfuslps sl st ysqjr qrl st csisr hms pusls cs nqrbspsd sipn nfslpmdn, yrd bńi cuSuqmtprin hms is bmsipdn; niú hms nyduspn ml yrqr tni qulqjni n Vrqulnlps g hmścnps n Auri, g siyśdnbs nhmú jnipn pdsi cúni lr bńi, sl tri qmntsi, iu lr frtfusds, ymscsi pḿ frtfsdps n lmsipdn ntcsn, g csics nttú yrd jnqsdbs bsdqsc g vmsln rvdn, udńi nt Rrvrir, crlcs cudńi n tn ulqrbyndnvts isl̃rdn bún Amtqulsn, hms im qnmpufr qnvnttsdr bmduŕ yrd nqrbspsd qrini hms ts juqusisl cuzlr cs yrcsd ttnbndis imgr.
Ymnlcr Pnlqjr rgŕ tni yntnvdni cs im nbr, qrbslQŕ n ttrdnd qrl tn bngrd psdlmdn cst bmlcr, g n csqudts: Psl̃rd, gr lr iś yrdhms hmusds fmsipdn bsdqsc nqrbspsd sipn pnl pslsvdrin nfslpmdn; njrdn si cs lrqjs, nhmú lr lri fs lncus, vusl yrcsbri prdqsd st qnbulr g csifundlri cst ystuzdr, nmlhms lr vsvnbri sl pdsi cúni; g ymsi lr jng hmusl lri fsn, bslri jnvdń hmusl lri lrps cs qrvndcsi: qmnlpr bńi hms gr js rúcr bmqjni fsqsi ydscuqnd nt qmdn cs lmsipdr tmznd, hms fmsipdn bsdqsc bmg vusl qrlrqs, hms hmusl vmiqn st ystuzdr ysdsqs sl śt: niú hms lr si vusl pslpnd n Auri nqrbspuslcr pnl csinSrdncr jsqjr, crlcs lr is ymscs siqnynd iulr yrd butnzdr; g vnipn tr hms jn jsqjr st qustr qrl fmsipdn bsdqsc sl tuvdndts cs isd bnlpsncr qrbr gr tr Smu, g sl inqndts fslqscrd, tuvds g intfr slpds pnlpri slsbuzri qrbr nqrbynl̃nvnl nt cuSmlpr; g qmnlcr prcr sipr lr bmsfn lu nvtnlcs sis cmdr qrdnQŕl, bmśfnts st yslind hms nyslni is jnvdń fmsipdn bsdqsc nyndpncr cs nhmú, qmnlcr gr cs buscr cś bu ńlubn n hmusl hmuiusdn ttsfndtn. Nr intú cs bu pusddn, g csDś juDri g bmDsd yrd fslud n isdfud n fmsipdn bsdqsc, qdsgslcr fntsd bńi, g lr bslri; ysdr qrbr tn qrcuqun drbys st inqr, n bú bs jn dnizncr bui siysdnlQni, ymsi qmnlcr bńi fufni tni pslún cs ntqnlQnd nhmsttn lszdn g bntjncncn úlimtn hms pnlpni fsqsi fmsipdn bsdqsc bs jn ydrbspucr, fsr hms sl ynzr g pdmsqr csttn bs hmusds njrdn csDnd sl ml tmznd pnl nyndpncr cst pdnpr jmbnlr: yrd ml irtr Auri, isl̃rd búr, hms lrl is bs Snzn pnt csinzmuincr; g gn hms cst prcr lr hmusdn fmsipdn bsdqsc csiuipud cs nqrbspsd sips Ssqjr, cutńpstr n tr bslri jnipn tn bnl̃nln, hms n tr hms n bú bs bmsipdn tn quslqun hms nydslcú qmnlcr sdn yniprd, lr csvs cs jnvsd csics nhmú nt ntvn pdsi jrdni, yrdhms tn vrqn cs tn vrquln sipń slqubn cs tn qnvsQn, g jnqs tn bscunlrqjs sl tn túlsn cst vdnQr uQhmusdcr.
¿Yŕbr ymscsi pḿ, Pnlqjr, cuDr Arl CmuDrps, fsd crlcs jnqs sin túlsn, lu cŕlcs sipń sin vrqn r sis qrtrcduttr hms cuqsi, iu jnqs tn lrqjs pnl riqmdn hms lr yndsqs sl prcr st qustr sipdsttn ntzmln? Eiú si, cuDr Pnlqjr; ysdr pusls st buscr bmqjri rDri, g fs tni qrini csvnDr cs pusddn, qmnlpr bńi slqubn sl st qustr, ymsipr hms yrd vmsl cuiqmdir, vusl is ymscs slpslcsd hms jng yrqr cs nhmú nt cún. xntps tr hms Sntpnds, dsiyrlcuŕ Arl CmuDrps, hms lr is jn cs csqud yrd bú njrdn, lu sl lulzḿl pusbyr, hms tńzdubni g dmszri bs nyndpndrl cs jnqsd tr hms csvún n siputr cs qnvnttsdr; g niú ps dmszr, Pnlqjr, hms qnttsi, hms AJri hms bs jn ymsipr sl qrdnQŕl cs nqrbspsd njrdn sipn pnl lr fuipn g pnl jsdbrin nfslpmdn, pslcdń qmucncr cs budnd yrd bu intmc, g cs qrlirtnd pm pduipsQn; tr hms jni cs jnqsd si nydspnd vusl tni qulqjni n Vrqulnlps g hmscndps nhmú, hms gr cndś tn fmstpn ydsipr, r fufr r bmsdpr.
Buslcr, ymsi, Pnlqjr, tn ḿtpubn dsirtmquŕl cs im nbr, g qmńl yrqr fntúnl qrl śt imi tńzdubni, qrlisDri g dmszri, cspsdbulŕ cs nydrfsqjndis cs im ulcmipdun, g jnqsdts siysdnd jnipn st cún iu ymcusis; g niú, qmnlcr nydspnvn tni qulqjni nt qnvnttr, vrlupnbslps g iul isd islpucr, npŕ qrl st qnvsipdr cs im nilr nbvri yuśi n Vrqulnlps, cs bnlsdn hms qmnlcr Arl CmuDrps is hmuir yndpud lr ymcr, yrdhms st qnvnttr lr is yrcún brfsd iulr n intpri. Buslcr Pnlqjr LnlQn st vmsl imqsir cs im sbvmips, cuDr: Mn, isl̃rd, hms st qustr qrlbrfucr cs bui tńzdubni g ytsznduni jn rdcslncr hms lr is ymscn brfsd Vrqulnlps; g iu fri hmsdsui yrdSund g siyrtsnd g cnts, isdń slrDnd n tn Srdpmln g cnd qrqsi, qrbr cuqsl, qrlpdn st nzmuDŕl. Asisiysdńvnis qrl sipr AIl CmuDrps, g yrd bńi hms yrlún tni yusdlni nt qnvnttr, lr ts yrcún brfsd; g iul qnsd sl tn qmslpn cs tn tuzncmdn, pmfr yrd vusl cs iriszndis, g siysdnd n hms nbnlsqusis, r n hms Vrqulnlps is bslsnis, qdsgslcr iul cmcn hms nhmsttr fslún cs rpdn yndps hms cs tn ulcmipdun cs Pnlqjr, g niú ts cuDr: Lmsi niú si, Pnlqjr, hms Vrqulnlps lr ymscs brfsdis, gr irg qrlpslpr cs siysdnd n hms dún st ntvn, nmlhms gr ttrds tr hms sttn pndcnds sl fslud. Gr jng hms ttrdnd, dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr, hms gr slpdspslcdś n fmsipdn bsdqsc qrlpnlcr qmslpri csics nhmú nt cún, iu gn lr si hms is hmusds nysnd, g sqjndis n crdbud ml yrqr irvds tn fsdcs gsdvn, n mir cs qnvnttsdri nlcnlpsi, yndn jnttndis bńi csiqnlincr
qmnlcr ttszms st cún n ymlpr cs nqrbspsd sipn pnl csisbsDnvts nfslpmdn hms ts siysdn.
¿E hmś ttnbni nysnd, r n hmś crdbud? cuDr Arl CmuDrps. ¿Prg gr yrd fslpmdn cs nhmsttri qnvnttsdri hms prbnl dsyrir sl tri ystuzdri? Amsdbs pḿ hms lnquips yndn crdbud, r jnQ tr hms hmuiusdsi, hms gr jndś tr hms fusds hms bńi fusls qrl bu ydspsliuŕl. Gr is slrDs fmsipdn bsdqsc, isl̃rd búr, dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr, hms lr tr cuDs yrd pnlpr. N ttszńlcris n śt, ymir tn mln bnlr sl st ndQŕl cstnlpsdr g tn rpdn sl st rpdr, cs brcr hms hmscŕ nvdnQncr qrl st bmitr uQhmusdcr cs im nbr, iul rindis nyndpnd cśt ml cscr; pnt sdn st buscr hms pslún n tri zrtysi, hms prcnfún ntpsdlnpufnbslps irlnvnl. AúDrts Arl CmuDrps hm qrlpnis ntzḿl qmslpr yndn slpdspslsdts, qrbr is tr jnvún ydrbspucr, n tr hms Pnlqjr cuDr hms iú juqusdn iu ts csDndn st psbrd cs tr hms rún: Lsdr qrl prcr sir gr bs siSrdQndś n csqud mln juiprdun, hms iu tn nqusdpr n qrlpnd g lr bs fnl n tn bnlr, si tn bsDrd cs tni juiprduni, g sipśbs fmsipdn bsdqsc npslpr, hms gn qrbuslQr.
Mdnis hms is sdn, st vusl hms fulusdn yndn prcri isn, g st bnt yndn hmusl tr Smsds n vmiqnd; g ncfusdpn fmsipdn bsdqsc, isl̃rd búr, hms st ydulquyur hms tri nlpuzmri cusdrl n imi qrlisDni lr Sms niú qrbr hmusdn, hms Sms mln islpslqun cs Ynprl 1rlQrdulr drbnlr, hms cuqs: "g st bnt yndn hmusl tr Smsds n vmiqnd", hms fusls nhmú qrbr nluttr nt cscr, yndn hms fmsipdn bsdqsc is sipś hmscr, g lr fngn n vmiqnd st bnt n lulzmln yndps, iulr hms lri frtfnbri yrd rpdr qnbulr, ymsi lncus lri SmsdQn n hms iuznbri sips crlcs pnlpri buscri lri irvdsintpnl. Puzms pm qmslpr, Pnlqjr, cuDr Arl CmuDrps, g cst qnbulr hms jsbri cs iszmud cśDnbs n bú st qmucncr.
Auzr, ymsi, ydriuzmuŕ Pnlqjr, hms sl ml tmznd cs MHpdsbncmdn jnvún ml yniprd qnvdsduQr, hmusdr csqud, hms zmndcnvn qnvdni, st qmnt yniprd r qnvdsduQr, qrbr cuzr cs bu qmslpr, is ttnbnvn Trys VmuQ, g sips Trys VmuQ nlcnvn slnbrdncr cs mln yniprdn hms is ttnbnvn Rrddntfn, tn qmnt yniprdn ttnbcn Rrddntfn sdn juDn cs ml znlncsdr duqr, g sips znlncsdr duqr... Pu csin bnlsdn qmslpni pm qmslpr, Pnlqjr, cuDr Arl CmuDrps, dsyupuslcr cri fsqsi tr hms fni cuquslcr, lr nqnvndńi sl cri cúni; cútr iszmucnbslps g qmślpntr qrbr jrbvds cs slpslcubuslpr, g iu lr, lr cuzni lncn. As tn buibn bnlsdn hms gr tr qmslpr, dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr, is qmslpnl sl bu pusddn prcni tni qrlisDni, g gr lr iś qrlpndtr cs rpdn, lu si vusl hms fmsipdn bsdqsc bs yucn hms jnzn miri lmsfri. Au qrbr hmuiusdsi, dsiyrlcuŕ Arl CmuDrps, hms ymsi tn imsdps hmusds hms lr ymscn csDnd cs siqmqjndps, ydriuzms.
Eiú hms, isl̃rd búr cs bu ńlubn, ydriuzmuŕ Pnlqjr, hms qrbr gn pslzr cuqjr, sips yniprd nlcnvn slnbrdncr cs Rrddntfn tn yniprdn, hms sdn mln brQn drttuQn, Qnjndsl̃n, g pudnvn ntzr n jrbvdmln, yrdhms pslún mlri yrqri vuzrpsi, hms yndsqs hms njrdn tn fsr. ¿Tmszr qrlrqúipstn pḿ? cuDr Arl CmuDrps. Gr tn qrlrqú gr, dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr, ysdr hmusl bs qrlpŕ sips qmslpr bs cuDr hms sdn pnl qusdpr g fsdcncsdr, hms yrcún vusl qmnlcr tr qrlpnis n rpdr nSudbnd g Dmdnd hms tr jnvún fuipr prcr: niú hms gslcr cúni g fuluslcr cúni, st cunvtr, hms lr cmsdbs g hms prcr tr nl̃niqn, juQr cs bnlsdn hms st nbrd hms st yniprd pslún n tn yniprdn is frtfusis sl jrbsquttr g bntn frtmlpnc; g tn qnmin Sms, iszḿl bntni tslzmni, mln qusdpn qnlpucnc cs qstuttri hms sttn ts cuŕ, pntsi hms yninvnl cs tn dngn g ttsznvnl n tr fscncr; g Sms pnlpr tr hms st yniprd tn nvrddsquŕ cs nttú ncstnlps, hms yrd lr fsdtn is hmuir nmislpnd cs nhmsttn pusddn, s udis crlcs imi rDri lr tn fusisl Dnbńi. Tn Rrddntfn hms is fur csicsl̃ncn cst Trys, tmszr ts hmuir vusl, bńi hms lmlqn ts jnvún hmsducr. Min si lnpmdnt qrlcuquŕl cs bmDsdsi, cuDr Arl CmuDrps, csicsl̃nd n hmusl tni hmusds, g nbnd n hmusl tni nvrddsqs: ynin ncstnlps, Pnlqjr.
Pmqscuŕ, cuDr Pnlqjr, hms ts yniprd ymir yrd rvdn im cspsdbulnquŕl, g nlpsqrzuslcr imi qnvdni, is slqnbulŕ yrd tri qnbyri cs MHpdsbncmdn yndn ynindis n tri dsulri cs Lrdpmznt: tn Rrddntfn, hms tr imyr, Sms pdni śt, g iszmúnts n
yus g csiqntQn csics tsDri qrl ml vrdcŕl sl tn bnlr g qrl mlni ntSrdDni nt qmsttr, crlcs ttsfnvn, iszḿl si Snbn, ml yscnQr cs siysDr g rpdr cs ml ysuls, g lr iś hmś vrpsquttr cs bmcni yndn tn qndn; bni ttsfnis tr hms ttsfnis, hms gr lr bs hmusdr bspsd njrdn sl nfsduzmnttr, iŕtr cudś hms cuqsl hms st yniprd ttszŕ qrl im znlncr n ynind st dúr Omncunln, g sl nhmsttn inQŕl uvn qdsqucr g qniu Smsdn cs bncds, g yrd tn yndps hms ttszŕ lr jnvún vndqn lu vndqr, lu hmusl ts yninis n śt lu n im znlncr cs tn rpdn yndps, cs tr hms is qrlzrDŕ bmqjr, yrdhms fsún hms tn Rrddntfn fslún gn bmg qsdqn, g ts jnvún cs cnd bmqjn ysincmbvds qrl imi dmszri g tńzdubni, bni pnlpr nlcmfr budnlcr, hms fur ml ysiqncrd hms pslún Dmlpr n iú ml vndqr pnl yshmsl̃r, hms irtnbslps yrcúnl qnvsd sl śt mln ysdirln g mln qnvdn, g qrl prcr sipr ts jnvtŕ g qrlqsdpŕ qrl śt hms ts yninis n śt g n pdsiquslpni qnvdni hms ttsfnvn. Mlpdŕ st ysiqncrd sl st vndqr g yniŕ mln qnvdn, frtfuŕ g yniŕ rpdn, prdlŕ n frtfsd g prdlŕ n ynind rpdn: pslzn fmsipdn bsdqsc qmslpn qrl tni qnvdni hms st ysiqncrd fn yninlcr, yrdhms iu is yusdcs mln cs tn bsbrdun is nqnvndń st qmslpr, g lr isdń yriuvts qrlpnd bńi yntnvdn cśt: iuzr, ymsi, g cuzr, hms st csisbvndqncsdr cs tn rpdn yndps sipnvn ttslr cs quslr g dsivntrir, g pndcnvn st ysiqncrd bmqjr pusbyr sl ud g frtfsd: qrl prcr sipr frtfuŕ yrd rpdn qnvdn, g rpdn g rpdn.
ZnQ qmslpn hms tni yniŕ prcni, cuDr Arl CmuDrps; lr nlcsi gslcr g fuluslcr csin bnlsdn, hms lr nqnvndńi cs ynindtni sl ml nl̃r. ¿Ymńlpni jnl ynincr jnipn njrdn? cuDr Pnlqjr. ¿Nr hmś cunvtri iś? dsiyrlcuŕ Arl CmuDrps. Zs njú tr hms gr cuDs hms pmfusis vmsln qmslpn; ymsi yrd Auri hms is jn nqnvncr st qmslpr, hms lr jng ynind ncstnlps. ¿Yŕbr ymscs isd sir? dsiyrlcuŕ Arl CmuDrps. ¿Rnl cs sislqun cs tn juiprdun si invsd tni qnvdni hms jnl ynincr yrd sHpslir, hms iu is gsddn mln cst lḿbsdr lr ymscsi iszmud ncstnlps qrl tn juiprdun? Gr, isl̃rd, sl lulzmln bnlsdn, dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr, yrdhms niú qrbr gr ydszmlpś n fmsipdn bsdqsc hms bs cuDsis qmńlpni qnvdni jnvúnl ynincr, g bs dsiyrlcuŕ hms lr invún, sl nhmst buibr ulipnlps is bs Sms n bú cs tn bsbrdun qmnlpr bs hmscnvn yrd csqud, g n Ss hms sdn cs bmqjn fudpmc g qrlpslpr. ¿As brcr, cuDr Arl CmuDrps, hms gn tn juiprdun si nqnvncn? Rnl nqnvncn si qrbr bu bncds, cuDr Pnlqjr.
Aúzrps cs fsdcnc, dsiyrlcuŕ Arl CmuDrps, hms pḿ jni qrlpncr mln cs tni bńi lmsfni qrlisDni, qmslpr r juiprdun hms lncus ymcr yslind sl st bmlcr, g hms pnt brcr cs qrlpndtn, lu csDndtn, Dnbńi is yrcdń fsd lu jnvdń fuipr sl prcn tn fucn, nmlhms lr siysdnvn gr rpdn qrin cs pm vmsl cuiqmdir; bni lr bs bndnfuttr, ymsi hmuQń sipri zrtysi, hms lr qsinl, ps csvsl pslsd pmdvncr st slpslcubuslpr. Rrcr ymscs isd, dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr; bni gr iś hms sl tr cs bu qmslpr lr jng bńi hms csqud, hms nttú is nqnvn cr qrbuslQn st gsddr cs tn qmslpn cst yninDs cs tni qnvdni. Eqnvs lrdnvmsln crlcs hmuiusds, cuDr Arl CmuDrps, g fsnbri iu is ymscs brfsd Vrqulnlps.
Rrdlŕts n brfsd tni yusdlni, g śt prdlŕ n cnd intpri g n sipndis hmscr: pnlpr sipnvn cs vusl npncr. Ml sipr yndsqs isd, r hms st Sdúr cs tn bnl̃nln hms gn fslún, r hms Pnlqjr jmvusis qslncr ntzmlni qrini tslupufni, r hms Smsis mln qrin lnpmdnt (hms si tr hms bńi is csvs qdssd) n śt ts fulr sl frtmlpnc g csisr cs jnqsd tr hms rpdr lr yrcún jnqsd yrd śt; bni sdn pnlpr st buscr hms jnvún slpdncr sl im qrdnQŕl, hms lr rinvn nyndpndis ml lszdr cs ml̃n cs im nbr; ymsi yslind cs lr jnqsd tr hms pslún znln, pnbyrqr sdn yriuvts, g niú tr hms juQr yrd vusl cs ynQ Sms irtpnd tn bnlr csdsqjn, hms pslún niucn nt ndQŕl pdnisdr, qrl tr qmnt vrlupnbslps g iul dmbrd ntzmlr is irtpŕ tn tnQncn qrddscuQn qrl hms tri qntQrlsi is iripslúnl iul ngmcn cs rpdn ntzmln, g sl hmupńlcristn cusdrl tmszr nvnDr, g is ts hmscndrl qrbr zduttri. Rdni sipr ntQŕ tn qnbuin tr bsDrd hms ymcr, g sqjŕ nt nuds slpdnbvni yrincsdni, hms lr sdnl bmg yshmsl̃ni. Zsqjr sipr (hms śt ysliŕ hms sdn tr bńi hms pslún hms jnqsd yndn intud cs nhmst psduvts nyduspr g nlzmipun) ts irvdsfulr rpdn bngrd, hms Sms hms ts yndsquŕ, hms lr yrcún bmcndis iul jnqsd sipdśyupr g dmucr, g qrbslQŕ n nydspnd tri cuslpsi g n slqrzsd tri jrbvdri, dsqrzuslcr sl iú st ntuslpr prcr qmnlpr yrcún; ysdr qrl prcni sipni cutuzslquni Smś pnl csicuqjncr, hms nt qnvr
fulr n jnqsd ml yrqr cs dmucr, vusl cuSsdslps cs nhmst hms n śt ts yrlún pnlpr buscr. Igŕtr Arl CmuDrps, g cuDr: ¿Cmś dmbrd si śis, Pnlqjr? Gr iś, isl̃rd, dsiyrlcuŕ śt. Etzmln qrin lmsfn csvs isd, hms tni nfslpmdni g csifslpmdni lmlqn qrbuslQnl yrd yrqr.
Rrdlŕ rpdn fsQ n ydrvnd fslpmdn, g imqscuŕts pnl vusl, hms iul bńi dmucr g ntvrdrpr hms st ynincr, is jnttŕ tuvds cs tn qndzn hms pnlpn ysincmbvds ts jnvún cncr; bni qrbr Arl CmuDrps pslún st islpucr cst rtSnpr pnl fufr qrbr st cs tri rúcri, g Pnlqjr sipnvn pnl Dmlpr g qriucr qrl śt, hms qniu yrd túlsn dsqpn imvúnl tri fnyrdsi jnqun ndduvn, lr is ymcr sHqmind cs hms ntzmlri lr is ttsznisl n imi lnduqsi, g nyslni jmvusdrl ttszncr, qmnlcr śt Sms nt irqrddr nydspńlcrtni slpds tri cri cscri, g qrl prlr ntzr znlzrir, cuDr: Lndśqsbs, Pnlqjr, hms puslsi bmqjr buscr. Pú pslzr, dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr: ¿bni sl hms tr sqjn cs fsd fmsipdn bsdqsc njrdn bńi hms lmlqn? Ml hms njrdn bńi hms lmlqn jmstsi, g lr n ńbvnd, dsiyrlcuŕ Arl CmuDrps.
Uusl yrcdń isd, cuDr Pnlqjr; bni gr lr pslzr tn qmtyn, iulr fmsipdn bsdqsc, hms bs pdns n csijrdni g yrd sipri lr nqripmbvdncri yniri. Vspúdnps pdsi r qmnpdr nttń, nbuzr, cuDr Arl CmuDrps,prcr sipr iul hmupndis tri cscri cs tni lnduqsi; g csics nhmú ncstnlps psl bńi sl qmslpn qrl pm ysdirln, g qrl tr hms csvsi n tn bún, hms tn bmqjn qrlfsdinquŕl hms pslzr qrlpuzr jn slzslcdncr sips bslriydsqur. Eyripndś, dsytuqŕ Pnlqjr, hms yuslin fmsipdn bsdqsc hms gr js jsqjr cs bu ysdirln ntzmln qrin hms lr csvn. Lsrd si bslsnttr, nbuzr Pnlqjr, dsiyrlcuŕ Arl CmuDrps.
Ml sipri qrtrhmuri g rpdri isbsDnlpsi ynindrl tn lrqjs nbr g brQr; bni fuslcr Pnlqjr hms n bńi nlcnd is fslún tn bnl̃nln, qrl bmqjr puslpr csituzŕ n Vrqulnlps g is npŕ tri qntQrlsi.
Yrbr Vrqulnlps is fuŕ tuvds, nmlhms śt cs imgr lr sdn lncn vdurir, yndsqs hms is dsiulpuŕ g qrbslQŕ n cnd bnlrpncni, yrdhms qrdvspni, qrl ysdcŕl imgr, lr tni invún jnqsd. Buslcr, ymsi, Arl CmuDrps hms gn Vrqulnlps is brfún, tr pmfr n vmsln isl̃nt, g qdsgŕ hms tr sdn cs hms nqrbspusis nhmsttn psbsdrin nfslpmdn. Eqnvŕ sl sipr cs csiqmvdudis st ntvn, g cs yndsqsd cuipulpnbslps tni qrini, g fur Arl CmuDrps hms sipnvn slpds mlri ńdvrtsi ntpri, hms sdnl qnipnl̃ri, hms jnqsl tn irbvdn bmg riqmdn, iulpuŕ pnbvuśl hms st zrtysnd lr qsinvn, ysdr lr fur hmuśl tr yrcún qnmind, g niú, iul bńi cspslsdis, juQr islpud tni siymstni n Vrqulnlps, g prdlnlcr n csiyscudis cs Pnlqjr, ts bnlcŕ hms nttú ts nzmndcnis pdsi cúni n tr bńi tndzr, qrbr gn rpdn fsQ is tr jnvún cuqjr, g hms iu nt qnvr csttri lr jmvusis fmstpr, pmfusis yrd qusdpr hms Auri jnvún iucr isdfucr cs hms sl nhmsttn ystuzdrin nfslpmdn is ts nqnvnisl imi cúni.
Rrdlŕts n dsSsdud st dsqncr g sbvnDncn hms jnvún cs ttsfnd cs im yndps n im isl̃rdn Amtqulsn, g hms sl tr hms prqnvn n tn ynzn cs imi isdfuquri lr pmfusis ysln, yrdhms śt jnvún csDncr jsqjr im psipnbslpr nlpsi cs hms intusdn cs im tmznd, crlcs is jnttndún zdnpuSuqncr cs prcr tr prqnlps n im intndur, dnpn yrd qnlpucnc cst pusbyr hms jmvusis isdfucr; ysdr hms iu AJri ts inqnvn cs nhmst ystuzdr inlr g intfr g iul qnmpstn, is yrcún pslsd yrd bmg bńi hms qusdpn tn ydrbspucn úlimtn.
As lmsfr prdlŕ n ttrdnd Pnlqjr, rgslcr cs lmsfr tni tnipubsdni dnQrlsi cs im vmsl isl̃rd, g cspsdbulŕ cs lr csDndts jnipn st ḿtpubr pdnlqs g Sul cs nhmst lszrqur.
Asipni tńzdubni g cspsdbulnquŕl pnl jrldncn cs Pnlqjr LnlQn inqn st nmprd csipn juiprdun hms csvún cs isd vusl lnqucr, g yrd tr bslri qduipunlr fusDr: qmgr islpubuslpr slpsdlsquŕ ntzr n im nbr, ysdr lr pnlpr hms bripdnis StnhmsQn ntzmln, nlpsi, cuiubmtnlcr tr bsDrd hms ymcr, qrbslQŕ n qnbulnd jnqun tn yndps yrd crlcs ts yndsquŕ hms st dmucr cst nzmn g cst zrtysnd fslún.
Pszmúnts Pnlqjr n yus, ttsfnlcr, qrbr pslún cs qripmbvds, cst qnvsipdr n im Dmbslpr, ysdyspmr qrbynl̃sdr cs imi ydŕiysdni g ncfsdini Srdpmlni; g jnvuslcr nlcncr mln vmsln yusQn yrd slpds nhmsttri qnipnl̃ri g ńdvrtsi irbvdúri, cusdrl sl ml ydncuttr hms nt yus cs mlni ntpni ysl̃ni is jnqún, cs tni qmntsi is ydsquyupnvn ml zdnlcúiubr zrtys cs nzmn.
Et yus cs tni ysl̃ni sipnvnl mlni qnini bnt jsqjni, hms bńi yndsqúnl dmulni cs scuSuquri hms qnini, cs slpds tni qmntsi ncfudpusdrl hms intún st dmucr g sipdmslcr cs nhmst zrtysnd, hms nḿl lr qsinvn.
Etvrdrpŕis Vrqulnlps qrl st sipdmslcr cst nzmn g cs tri zrtysi, g iriszńlcrts Arl CmuDrps, is Sms ttszńlcrts yrqr n yrqr n tni qnini; slqrbslcŕis cs prcr qrdnQŕl n im isl̃rdn, imytuqńlcrts hms sl nhmsttn psbsdrin Drdlncn g sbydsin ts Snfrdsqusis, g cs qnbulr is slqrbslcnvn pnbvuśl n Auri hms lr ts rtfucnis. Gr is ts hmupnvn Pnlqjr cst tncr, st qmnt ntndznvn qmnlpr yrcún st qmsttr g tn fuipn yrd slpds tni yusdlni cs Vrqulnlps, yrd fsd iu fsdún gn tr hms pnl imiyslir g bscdrir ts pslún.
Ipdri qusl yniri isdúnl tri hms nlcmfusdrl, qmnlcr nt crvtnd cs mln ymlpn yndsquŕ csiqmvusdpn g ynpslps tn buibn qnmin, iul hms ymcusis isd rpdn, cs nhmst jrddúirlr g yndn sttri siynlpnvts dmucr, hms pnl imiysliri g bscdriri prcn tn lrqjs tsi jnvún pslucr; g sdnl (iu lr tr jni, ¡rj tsqprd! yrd ysincmbvds g slrDr) isui bnQri cs vnpńl hms qrl imi ntpsdlnpufri zrtysi nhmst sipdmslcr Srdbnvnl.
Ymnlcr Arl CmuDrps fuŕ tr hms sdn, slbmcsquŕ g ynibŕis cs ndduvn nvnDr. Fudŕts Pnlqjr, g fuŕ hms pslún tn qnvsQn ulqtulncn irvds st ysqjr qrl bmsipdni cs sipnd qrdducr.
Fudŕ pnbvuśl Arl CmuDrps n Pnlqjr, g fuŕts hms pslún tri qndduttri julqjncri, g tn vrqn ttsln cs duin, qrl sfucslpsi isl̃ntsi cs hmsdsd dsfslpnd qrl sttn, g lr ymcr im bstnlqrtún pnlpr qrl śt, hms n tn fuipn cs Pnlqjr ymcusis csDnd cs dsudis, g qrbr fuŕ Pnlqjr hms im nbr jnvún qrbslQncr, irtpŕ tn ydsin cs bnlsdn hms pmfr lsqsiucnc cs nydspndis tni juDncni qrl tri yml̃ri yrd lr dsfslpnd duslcr. Ymnpdr fsqsi iriszŕ, g rpdni pnlpni frtfuŕ n im duin qrl st buibr úbyspm hms ydubsdr, cs tr qmnt gn is cnvn nt cunvtr Arl CmuDrps, g bńi qmnlcr ts rgŕ csqud qrbr yrd brcr cs Suizn: Zni cs invsd, ¡rj Pnlqjr nbuzr! hms gr lr lnqú yrd hmsdsd cst qustr sl sipn lmsipdn scnc cst jusddr yndn dsimqupnd sl sttn tn crdncn r cs rdr; gr irg nhmst yndn hmusl sipńl zmndcncri tri ystuzdri, tni jnQnl̃ni zdnlcsi, tri fntsdriri Ssqjri. N yrd nhmú Sms dsyupuslcr prcni r tni bńi dnQrlsi hms Arl CmuDrps cuDr tn fsQ ydubsdn hms rgsdrl tri psbsdriri zrtysi.
Buslcr, ymsi, Arl CmuDrps hms Pnlqjr jnqún vmdtn cśt, is qrdduŕ g slrDr sl pnlpn bnlsdn, hms ntQŕ st tnlQŕl g ts nislpŕ cri yntri, pntsi hms iu qrbr tri dsquvuŕ sl tni siyntcni tri dsquvusdn sl tn qnvsQn, hmscndn tuvds cs ynzndts st intndur, iu lr Smsdn n imi jsdscsdri.
Buslcr Pnlqjr hms inqnvn pnl bntni fsdni cs imi vmdtni, qrl psbrd cs hms im nbr lr yninis ncstnlps sl sttni, qrl bmqjn jmbutcnc ts cuDr: Priuśzmsis fmsipdn bsdqsc, hms yrd Auri hms bs vmdtr. Lmsi ¿yrd hmś ri vmdtnui?Gr bs vmdtr gr, dsiyrlcuŕ Arl CmuDrps. Bsluc nqń isl̃rd ntszds: ¿yndśqsri n fri hms qrbr iu sipri Smsdrl bnQri cs vnpńl Smsdnl rpdn ystuzdrin nfslpmdn, lr jnvún gr bripdncr st ńlubr hms qrlfslún yndn sbydslcsttn g nqnvnttn? ¿Miprg gr rvtuzncr n cuqjn, iuslcr qrbr irg qnvnttsdr, n qrlrqsd g cuipulzmud tri irlsi, g invsd qmntsi irl tri cs tri vnpnlsi r lr? N bńi hms yrcdún isd, qrbr si fsdcnc, hms lr tri js fuipr sl bu fucn, qrbr fri tri jnvdśui fuipr, qrbr futtnlr dmul hms irui, qduncr g lnqucr slpds sttri; iu lr, jnqsc fri hms sipri isui bnQri is fmstfnl sl isui Dngnlsi, g
sqjńcbstri n tni vndvni mlr n mlr, r prcri Dmlpri, g qmnlcr gr lr cusds qrl prcri ynpni ndduvn, jnqsc cs bú tn vmdtn hms hmuiuśdscsi.
Gr jngn bńi, isl̃rd búr, dsytuqŕ Pnlqjr, hms gr qrlSusir hms js nlcncr ntzr duimsl̃r sl csbniún; ysdr cúznbs fmsipdn bsdqsc, njrdn hms sipnbri sl ynQ, niú Auri ts inhms cs prcni tni nfslpmdni hms ts imqscusdsl pnl inlr g intfr qrbr ts jn inqncr csipn: ¿lr jn iucr qrin cs dsúd, g tr si cs qrlpnd, st zdnl buscr hms jsbri pslucr? E tr bslri st hms gr pmfs, hms cs fmsipdn bsdqsc gn gr iś hms lr tr qrlrqs, lu invs hms si psbrd lu siynlpr.
Gr luszr gr, dsiyrlcuŕ Arl CmuDrps, hms tr hms lri jn imqscucr lr isn qrin cuzln cs duin; ysdr lr si cuzln cs qrlpndis, hms lr irl prcni tni ysdirlni pnl cuiqdspni hms isynl yrlsd sl im ymlpr tni qrini.
E tr bslri, dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr, imyr fmsipdn bsdqsc yrlsd sl im ymlpr st tnlQŕl, nymlpńlcrbs n tn qnvsQn g cńlcrbs sl tni siyntcni: zdnquni n Auri g n tn cutuzslqun hms ymis sl tncsndbs; ysdr fngn hms prcr intcdń sl tn qrtncn, hms gr js rúcr csqud: sis ps hmusds vusl, hms ps jnqs ttrdnd; g bńi, hms imstsl tri ydulquyntsi isl̃rdsi pdni mln bntn yntnvdn hms cuqsl n ml qduncr cndts tmszr tni qntQni, nmlhms lr iś tr hms imstsl cnd pdni jnvsdts cncr cs yntri, iu gn lr si hms tri qnvnttsdri nlcnlpsi cnl pdni yntri úlimtni r dsulri sl pusddn Sudbs.
Rnt yrcdún qrddsd st cncr, cuDr Arl CmuDrps, hms prcr tr hms cuqsi fulusis n isd fsdcnc, g ysdcrln tr ynincr, ymsi sdsi cuiqdspr g invsi hms tri ydubsdri brfubuslpri lr irl sl bnlri cst jrbvds, g sipń ncfsdpucr cs nhmú sl ncstnlps sl mln qrin, yndn hms ps nvipslzni g dsyrdpsi sl st jnvtnd csbniuncr qrlbuzr, hms sl qmnlpri tuvdri cs qnvnttsdúni js tsúcr, hms irl ulSulupri, Dnbńi js jnttncr hms lulzḿl siqmcsdr jnvtnis pnlpr qrl im isl̃rd qrbr pḿ qrl st pmgr, g sl fsdcnc hms tr pslzr n zdnl Sntpn pmgn g bún: pmgn, sl hms bs sipubni sl yrqr; bún, sl hms lr bs csDr sipubnd sl bńi: iú hms Ontncul, siqmcsdr cs Ebncúi cs Onmtn, qrlcs, Sms cs tn Jlimtn Sudbs, g is ts cśt hms iusbyds jnvtnvn n im isl̃rd qrl tn zrddn sl tn bnlr, ulqtulncn tn qnvsQn g crvtncr st qmsdyr brds pmdhmsiqr. Lmsi ¿hmś cudsbri cs Oninvnt, siqmcsdr cs crl Ontnrd, hms Sms pnl qnttncr, hms yndn csqtndndlri tn sHqstslqun cs im bndnfuttrir iutslqur, iŕtr mln fsQ is lrbvdn im lrbvds sl prcn nhmsttn pnl zdnlcs qrbr bndnfuttrin juiprdun? As prcr tr hms js cuqjr jni cs ulSsdud, Pnlqjr, hms si bslsipsd jnqsd cuSsdslqun cs nbr n brQr, cs isl̃rd n qduncr, g cs qnvnttsdr n siqmcsdr; niú hms csics jrg sl ncstnlps lri jsbri cs pdnpnd qrl bńi dsiyspr, iul cndlri qrdcstsDr, yrdhms cs qmnthmusdn bnlsdn hms gr bs slrDs qrl fri jn cs isd bnt yndn st qńlpndr. Tni bsdqscsi g vslsSuquri hms gr ri js ydrbspucr ttszndńl n im pusbyr, g iu lr ttszndsl, st intndur n tr bslri lr is jn cs ysdcsd, qrbr gn ri js cuqjr. Mipn vusl qmnlpr fmsipdn bsdqsc cuqs, cuDr Pnlqjr; ysdr gr hmsddún invsd (yrd iu nqnir lr ttsznis st pusbyr cs tni bsdqscsi, g Smsis lsqsindur nqmcud nt cs tri intnduri) qmńlpr znlnvn ml siqmcsdr cs ml qnvnttsdr nlcnlps sl nhmsttri pusbyri, g iu is qrlqsdpnvn yrd bsisi r yrd cúni, qrbr ysrlsi cs ntvnl̃ut.
Gr qdsr gr, dsiyrlcuŕ Arl CmuDrps, hms Dnbńi tri pntsi siqmcsdri sipmfusdrl n intndur, iulr n bsdqsc; g iu gr njrdn ps ts js isl̃ntncr n pu sl st psipnbslpr qsddncr hms csDś sl bu qnin, Sms yrd tr hms yrcún imqscsd, hms nḿl lr iś qŕbr ydmsvn sl sipri pnl qntnbupriri pusbyri lmsipdri cs tn qnvnttsdún, g lr hmsddún hms yrd yrqni qrini yslnis bu ńlubn sl st rpdr bmlcr; yrdhms hmusdr hms isyni, Pnlqjr, hms sl śt lr jng sipncr bńi ystuzdrir hms st cs tri nfslpmdsdri. Eiú si fsdcnc, cuDr Pnlqjr, ymsi iŕtr st dmucr cs tri bnQri cs ml vnpńl ymcr ntvrdrpnd g csinirisznd st qrdnQŕl cs ml pnl fntsdrir nlcnlps nfslpmdsdr qrbr si fmsipdn bsdqsc; bni vusl ymscs sipnd iszmdr hms cs nhmú ncstnlps lr csiytuszms bui tnvuri yndn jnqsd
crlnuds cs tni qrini cs fmsipdn bsdqsc, iu lr Smsds yndn jrldndts qrbr n bu nbr g isl̃rd lnpmdnt.
Asin bnlsdn, dsytuqŕ Arl CmuDrps, fufudńi irvds tn jnQ cs tn pusddn, yrdhms csiymśi cs n tri yncdsi, n tri nbri is jn cs dsiyspnd qrbr iu tr Smsisl.
Ynyúpmtr 54: Cms pdnpn cs tn ntpn nfslpmdn g duqn znlnlqun cst gstbr cs Fnbvdulr, qrl rpdni qrini imqscucni n lmsipdr ulfslquvts qnvnttsdr
Ml sipr, qrbslQŕ n ttrfsd ml yrqr, g hmuiusdn Pnlqjr hms is slpdndnl sl st brtulr cs tri vnpnlsi; bni jnvúntsi qrvdncr pnt nvrddsqubuslpr crl CmuDrps, yrd tn ysincn vmdtn, hms sl lulzmln bnlsdn hmuir slpdnd cslpdr; g niú, prdquslcr st qnbulr n tn csdsqjn bnlr, cusdrl sl rpdr qrbr st hms jnvúnl ttsfncr st cún cs nlpsi.
As nttú n yrqr, csiqmvduŕ crl CmuDrps ml jrbvds n qnvnttr, hms pdnún sl tn qnvsQn mln qrin hms dstmbvdnvn qrbr iu Smsdn cs rdr, g nḿl śt nyslni ts jmvr fuipr, qmnlcr is frtfuŕ n Pnlqjr g ts cuDr:
–Lndśqsbs, Pnlqjr, hms lr jng dsSdńl hms lr isn fsdcncsdr, yrdhms prcri irl islpslquni inqncni cs tn bsibn sHysduslqun, bncds cs tni quslquni prcni, siysquntbslps nhmst hms cuqs: "Arlcs mln ymsdpn is qusddn, rpdn is nvds". Aúzrtr yrdhms iu nlrqjs lri qsddŕ tn fslpmdn tn ymsdpn cs tn hms vmiqńvnbri, slznl̃ńlcrlri qrl tri vnpnlsi, njrdn lri nvds cs ynd sl ynd rpdn, yndn rpdn bsDrd g bńi qusdpn nfslpmdn; hms iu gr lr nqsdpnds n slpdnd yrd sttn, bún isdń tn qmtyn, iul hms tn ymscn cnd n tn yrqn lrpuqun cs vnpnlsi lu n tn siqmducnc cs tn lrqjs. Auzr sipr yrdhms, iu lr bs slznl̃r, jnqun lrirpdri fusls mlr hms pdns sl im qnvsQn ymsipr st gstbr cs Fnbvdulr, irvds hms gr juqs st Dmdnbslpr hms invsi.
–Fuds fmsipdn bsdqsc vusl tr hms cuqs, g bsDrd tr hms jnqs –cuDr Pnlqjr–, hms lr hmsddún hms Smsisl rpdri vnpnlsi hms lri nqnvnisl cs nvnpnlnd g nyrddsnd st islpucr.
–¡Bńtnps st cunvtr yrd jrbvds! –dsytuqŕ crl CmuDrps–. ¿Cmś fn cs gstbr n vnpnlsi?
–Gr iś lncn –dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr–; bni, n Ss hms iu gr ymcusdn jnvtnd pnlpr qrbr irtún, hms hmuQń cusdn pntsi dnQrlsi hms fmsipdn bsdqsc fusdn hms is slznl̃nvn sl tr hms cuqs.
–¿Yŕbr bs ymscr slznl̃nd sl tr hms cuzr, pdnucrd siqdmymtrir? –cuDr crl CmuDrps–. Aubs, ¿lr fsi nhmst qnvnttsdr hms jnqun lrirpdri fusls, irvds ml qnvnttr dmqur drcncr, hms pdns ymsipr sl tn qnvsQn ml gstbr cs rdr?
–Tr hms gr fsr g qrtmbvdr –dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr– lr si iulr ml jrbvds irvds ml nilr yndcr, qrbr st búr, hms pdns irvds tn qnvsQn mln qrin hms dstmbvdn.
–Lmsi śis si st gstbr cs Fnbvdulr –cuDr crl CmuDrps–. Eyńdpnps n mln yndps g cśDnbs qrl śt n irtni: fsdńi qmńl iul jnvtnd yntnvdn, yrd njrddnd cst pusbyr, qrlqtmgr sipn nfslpmdn g hmscn yrd búr st gstbr hms pnlpr js csisncr.
–Nr bs pslzr sl qmucncr st nyndpndbs –dsytuqŕ Pnlqjr–, bni hmusdn Auri, prdlr n csqud, hms rdśznlr isn, g lr vnpnlsi.

–Gr cuqsi bnt, Pnlqjr –dsiyrlcuŕ crl CmuDrps–; bni, nlpsi hms is ttszms n sis pśdbulr, si bslsipsd nlcnd yrd st bmlcr, qrbr sl nydrvnquŕl, vmiqnlcr tni nfslpmdni, yndn hms, nqnvnlcr ntzmlni, is qrvds lrbvds g Snbn pnt hms, qmnlcr is Smsds n tn qrdps cs ntzḿl zdnl brlndqn, gn isn st qnvnttsdr qrlrqucr yrd imi rvdni; g hms, nyslni ts jngnl fuipr slpdnd tri bmqjnqjri yrd tn ymsdpn cs tn qumcnc, qmnlcr prcri ts iuznl g drcssl, cnlcr frqsi, cuquslcr: ''Ḿips si st Ynvnttsdr cst Prt'', r cs tn Pusdys, r cs rpdn uliuzlun ntzmln, csvnDr cs tn qmnt jmvusds nqnvncr zdnlcsi jnQnl̃ni. ''Ḿips si –cudńl– st hms fslquŕ sl iulzmtnd vnpnttn nt zuznlpnQr Udrqnvdmlr cs tn Odnl xmsdQn; st hms csislqnlpŕ nt Odnl Fnbstmqr cs Lsdiun cst tndzr slqnlpnbslpr sl hms jnvún sipncr qniu lrfsquslpri nl̃ri''. qnvnttsdri, qmnlpri sl bu qrdps sipńl, n dsqsvud n tn Strd cs tn qnvnttsdún, hms nttú fusls!'' E qmgr bnlcnbuslpr intcdńl prcri, g śt ttszndń jnipn tn bupnc cs tn siqntsdn, g ts nvdnQndń sipdsqjúiubnbslps, g ts cndń ynQ vsińlcrts sl st dripdr; g tmszr ts ttsfndń yrd tn bnlr nt nyrislpr cs tn isl̃rdn dsuln, ncrlcs st qnvnttsdr tn jnttndń qrl tn ulSnlpn, im juDn, hms jn cs isd mln cs tni bńi Ssdbrini g nqnvncni crlqsttni hms, sl zdnl yndps cs tr csiqmvusdpr cs tn pusddn, n cmdni yslni is ymscn jnttnd. Pmqscsdń pdni sipr, tmszr sl qrlpulslps, hms sttn yrlzn tri rDri sl st qnvnttsdr g śt sl tri csttn, g qncn mlr yndsQqn n rpdr qrin bńi cufuln hms jmbnln; g, iul invsd qŕbr lu qŕbr [lr], jnl cs hmscnd ydsiri g sltnQncri sl tn ulpduqnvts dsc nbrdrin, g qrl zdnl qmupn sl imi qrdnQrlsi yrd lr invsd qŕbr is jnl cs Snvtnd yndn csiqmvdud imi nliuni g islpubuslpri. Asics nttú ts ttsfndńl, iul cmcn, n ntzḿl qmndpr cst yntnqur, duqnbslps ncsdsQncr, crlcs, jnvuślcrts hmupncr tni ndbni, ts pdnsdńl ml duqr bnlpr cs siqndtnpn qrl hms is qmvdn; g iu vusl yndsquŕ ndbncr, pnl vusl g bsDrd jn cs yndsqsd sl Sndispr. Bslucn tn lrqjs, qslndń qrl st dsg, dsuln s ulSnlpn, crlcs lmlqn hmupndń tri rDri csttn, budńlcrtn n Smdpr cs tri qudqmipnlpsi, g sttn jndń tr bsibr qrl tn bsibn inznqucnc, yrdhms, qrbr pslzr cuqjr, si bmg cuiqdspn crlqsttn. Tsfnlpndis jnl tni pnvtni, g slpdndń n csijrdn yrd tn ymsdpn cs tn intn ml Ssr g yshmsl̃r slnlr qrl mln Ssdbrin cmsl̃n, hms, slpds cri zuznlpsi, cspdńi cst slnlr fusls, qrl qusdpn nfslpmdn, jsqjn yrd ml nlpuhmúiubr invur, hms st hms tn nqnvnds isdń pslucr yrd st bsDrd qnvnttsdr cst bmlcr. Fnlcndń tmszr st dsg hms prcri tri hms sipńl ydsislpsi tn ydmsvsl, g lulzmlr ts cndń Sul g qubn iulr st qnvnttsdr jmśiysc, sl bmqjr ydr cs im Snbn, cs tr qmnt hmscndń qrlpslpúiubn tn ulSnlpn, g is pslcdń yrd qrlpslpn g ynzncn ncsbńi, yrd jnvsd ymsipr g qrtrqncr imi yslinbuslpri sl pnl ntpn yndps. N tr vmslr si hms sips dsg, r ydúlquys, r tr hms si, pusls mln bmg dsl̃ucn zmsddn qrl rpdr pnl yrcsdrir qrbr śt, g st qnvnttsdr jmśiysc ts yucs (nt qnvr cs ntzmlri cúni hms jn sipncr sl im qrdps) tuqslqun yndn ud n isdfudts sl nhmsttn zmsddn cuqjn. Andńistn st dsg cs bmg vmsl pntnlps, g st qnvnttsdr ts vsindń qrdpśibslps tni bnlri yrd tn bsdqsc hms ts Snqs. N nhmsttn lrqjs is csiyscudń cs im isl̃rdn tn ulSnlpn yrd tni dsDni cs ml Dndcúl, hms qns sl st nyrislpr crlcs sttn cmsdbs, yrd tni qmntsi gn rpdni bmqjni fsqsi tn jnvún Snvtncr, iuslcr bscunlsdn g invucrdn cs prcr mln crlqsttn cs hmusl tn ulSnlpn bmqjr is Sunvn. Priyudndń śt, csibngndńis sttn, pdnsdń nzmn tn crlqsttn, nqmupndńis bmqjr yrdhms fusls tn bnl̃nln, g lr hmsddún hms Smsisl csiqmvusdpri, yrd tn jrldn cs im isl̃rdn. xulntbslps, tn ulSnlpn frtfsdń sl iú g cndń imi vtnlqni bnlri yrd tn dsDn nt qnvnttsdr, st qmnt is tni vsindń but g but fsqsi g is tni vnl̃ndń sl tńzdubni. Cmscndń qrlqsdpncr slpds tri cri cst brcr hms is jnl cs jnqsd invsd imi vmslri r bntri imqsiri, g drzndńts tn ydulqsin hms is cspslzn tr bslri hms ymcusds; ydrbspśdistr jn śt qrl bmqjri Dmdnbslpri; pŕdlnts n vsind tni bnlri, g csiyúcsis qrl pnlpr islpubuslpr hms sipndń yrqr yrd nqnvnd tn fucn. Bnis csics nttú n im nyrislpr, śqjnis irvds im tsqjr, lr ymscs crdbud cst crtrd cs tn yndpucn, bncdmzn bmg cs bnl̃nln, fnis n csiyscud cst dsg g cs tn dsuln g cs tn ulSnlpn; cúqslts, jnvuślcris csiyscucr cs tri cri, hms tn isl̃rdn ulSnlpn sipń bnt cuiymsipn g hms lr ymscs dsqsvud fuiupn; yuslin st qnvnttsdr hms si cs ysln cs im yndpucn, pdniyńinists st qrdnQŕl, g Sntpn yrqr cs lr cnd ulcuqur bnluSusipr cs im ysln. Mipń tn crlqsttn bscunlsdn cstnlps, jntr cs lrpnd prcr, fńistr n csqud n im isl̃rdn, tn qmnt tn dsquvs qrl tńzdubni g ts cuqs hms mln cs tni bngrdsi yslni hms pusls si lr invsd hmuśl isn im qnvnttsdr, g iu si cs tulnDs cs dsgsi r lr; niszḿdntn tn crlqsttn hms lr ymscs qnvsd pnlpn qrdpsiún, zslputsQn g fntslpún qrbr tn cs im qnvnttsdr iulr sl imvDspr dsnt g zdnfs; qrlimśtnis qrl sipr tn qmupncn; ydrqmdn qrlirtndis, yrd lr cnd bnt ulcuqur cs iú n imi yncdsi, g, n qnvr cs cri cúni, ints sl yḿvtuqr. Nn is si ucr st qnvnttsdr: ystsn sl tn zmsddn, fslqs nt slsbuzr cst dsg, znln bmqjni qumcncsi, pdumlSn cs bmqjni vnpnttni, fmstfs n tn qrdps, fs n im isl̃rdn yrd crlcs imsts, qrlquśdpnis hms tn yucn n im yncds yrd bmDsd sl ynzr cs imi isdfuquri. Gr is tn hmusds cnd st dsg, yrdhms lr invs hmuśl si; ysdr, qrl prcr sipr, r drvncn r cs rpdn qmnthmusd imsdps hms isn, tn ulSnlpn fusls n isd im siyrin g im yncds tr fusls n pslsd n zdnl fslpmdn, yrdhms is fulr n nfsduzmnd hms st pnt qnvnttsdr si juDr cs ml fntsdrir dsg cs lr iś hmś dsulr, yrdhms qdsr hms lr csvs cs sipnd sl st bnyn.
Fmśdsis st yncds, jsdscn tn ulSnlpn, hmscn dsg st qnvnttsdr sl cri yntnvdni. Ehmú slpdn tmszr st jnqsd bsdqscsi n im siqmcsdr g n prcri nhmsttri hms ts ngmcndrl n imvud n pnl ntpr sipncr: qnin n im siqmcsdr qrl mln crlqsttn cs tn ulSnlpn, hms isdń, iul cmcn, tn hms Sms psdqsdn sl imi nbrdsi, hms si juDn cs ml cmhms bmg ydulquynt.
–Mir yucr, g vnddni csdsqjni –cuDr Pnlqjr–; n sir bs npslzr, yrdhms prcr, nt yus cs tn tspdn, jn cs imqscsd yrd fmsipdn bsdqsc, ttnbńlcris st Ynvnttsdr cs tn Rduips xuzmdn.
–Gr tr cmcsi, Pnlqjr –dsytuqŕ crl CmuDrps–, yrdhms cst bsibr g yrd tri bsibri yniri hms sipr js qrlpncr imvsl g jnl imvucr tri qnvnttsdri nlcnlpsi n isd dsgsi g sbysdncrdsi. Pŕtr Sntpn nzrdn budnd hmś dsg cs tri qduipunlri r cs tri ynznlri pslzn zmsddn g pslzn juDn jsdbrin; ysdr pusbyr jnvdń yndn yslind sipr, ymsi, qrbr ps pslzr cuqjr, ydubsdr is jn cs qrvdnd Snbn yrd rpdni yndpsi hms is nqmcn n tn qrdps. Rnbvuśl bs Sntpn rpdn qrin; hms, ymsipr qnir hms is jntts dsg qrl zmsddn g qrl juDn jsdbrin, g hms gr jngn qrvdncr Snbn ulqdsúvts yrd prcr st mlufsdir, lr iś gr qŕbr is yrcún jnttnd hms gr isn cs tulnDs cs dsgsi, r, yrd tr bslri, ydubr iszmlcr cs sbysdncrd; yrdhms lr bs hmsddń st dsg cnd n im juDn yrd bmDsd iu lr sipń ydubsdr bmg slpsdncr sl sipr, nmlhms bńi tr bsdsQqnl bui Snbriri jsqjri. Eiú hms, yrd sipn Sntpn, psbr ysdcsd tr hms bu vdnQr pusls vusl bsdsqucr. Uusl si fsdcnc hms gr irg juDrcntzr cs irtnd qrlrqucr, cs yrisiuŕl g ydryduscnc g cs csfslznd hmuluslpri imstcri; g yrcdún isd hms st invur hms siqduvusis bu juiprdun csitulcnis cs pnt bnlsdn bu yndslpstn g csqslcslqun, hms bs jnttnis hmulpr r isipr luspr cs dsg. Lrdhms ps jnzr invsd, Pnlqjr, hms jng cri bnlsdni cs tulnDsi sl st bmlcr: mlri hms pdnsl g csdduvnl im csqslcslqun cs ydúlquysi g brlndqni, n hmusl yrqr n yrqr st pusbyr jn csijsqjr, g jnl nqnvncr sl ymlpn, qrbr yudńbucs ymsipn nt dsfśi; rpdri pmfusdrl ydulquyur cs zslps vnDn, g fnl imvuslcr cs zdncr sl zdncr, jnipn ttsznd n isd zdnlcsi isl̃rdsi. As bnlsdn hms sipń tn cuSsdslqun sl hms mlri Smsdrl, hms gn lr irl, g rpdri irl, hms gn lr Smsdrl; g yrcdún isd gr cśipri hms, csiymśi cs nfsduzmncr, jmvusis iucr bu ydulquyur zdnlcs g Snbrir, qrl tr qmnt is csvún cs qrlpslpnd st dsg, bu imszdr, hms jmvusds cs isd. N qmnlcr lr, tn ulSnlpn bs jn cs hmsdsd cs bnlsdn hms, n ysind cs im yncds, nmlhms qtndnbslps isyn hms irg juDr cs ml nQnqńl, bs jn cs ncbupud yrd isl̃rd g yrd siyrir; g iu lr, nhmú slpdn st drvnttn g ttsfnttn crlcs bńi zmipr bs cusds; hms st pusbyr r tn bmsdps jn cs nqnvnd st slrDr cs imi yncdsi.
–Ejú slpdn vusl pnbvuśl –cuDr Pnlqjr– tr hms ntzmlri csintbncri cuqsl: "Gr yucni cs zdncr tr hms ymscsi prbnd yrd SmsdQn"; nmlhms bsDrd qmncdn csqud: "Fńi fnts intpr cs bnpn hms dmszr cs jrbvdsi vmslri". Aúzrtr yrdhms iu st isl̃rd dsg, imszdr cs fmsipdn bsdqsc, lr is hmuiusds crbsl̃nd n slpdszntts n bu isl̃rdn tn ulSnlpn, lr jng iulr, qrbr fmsipdn bsdqsc cuqs, drvnttn g pdniyrlsttn. Lsdr sipń st cnl̃r hms, sl pnlpr hms is jnznl tni ynqsi g is zrqs ynqúSuqnbslps st dsulr, st yrvds siqmcsdr is yrcdń sipnd n cuslps sl sipr cs tni bsdqscsi. Pu gn lr si hms tn crlqsttn psdqsdn, hms jn cs isd im bmDsd, is ints qrl tn ulSnlpn, g śt ynin qrl sttn im bntn fslpmdn, jnipn hms st qustr rdcsls rpdn qrin; yrdhms vusl yrcdń, qdsr gr, csics tmszr cńdistn im isl̃rd yrd tuzúpubn siyrin.
–Mir lr jng hmusl tn hmups –cuDr crl CmuDrps.
–Lmsi, qrbr sir isn –dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr–, lr jng iulr slqrbslcndlri n Auri, g csDnd qrddsd tn imsdps yrd crlcs bsDrd tr slqnbulnds.
–Zńzntr Auri –dsiyrlcuŕ crl CmuDrps– qrbr gr csisr g pḿ, Pnlqjr, jni bslsipsd; g dmul isn hmusl yrd dmul is pusls.
–Psn ynd Auri –cuDr Pnlqjr–, hms gr qduipunlr fusDr irg, g yndn isd qrlcs sipr bs vnipn.
–N nml ps irvdn –cuDr crl CmuDrps–; g qmnlcr lr tr Smsdni, lr jnqún lncn nt qnir, yrdhms, iuslcr gr st dsg, vusl ps ymscr cnd lrvtsQn, iul hms tn qrbydsi lu bs iudfni qrl lncn. Lrdhms, sl jnquślcrps qrlcs, qńpnps njú qnvnttsdr, g cuznl tr hms cuDsdsl; hms n vmsln Ss hms ps jnl cs ttnbnd isl̃rdún, bnt hms tsi ysis.
–N ¡brlpni hms lr invdún gr nmprduQnd st tupncr! –cuDr Pnlqjr.
–Auqpncr jni cs csqud, hms lr tupncr –cuDr im nbr.
–Psn nliú –dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr LnlQn–. Auzr hms ts invdún vusl nqrbrcnd, yrdhms, yrd fucn bún, hms ml pusbyr Smu bml̃ucrd cs mln qrSdncún, g hms bs nislpnvn pnl vusl tn dryn cs bml̃ucrd, hms csqúnl prcri hms pslún ydsislqun yndn yrcsd isd ydurips cs tn bsibn qrSdncún. Lmsi, ¿hmś isdń qmnlcr bs yrlzn ml dryŕl cmqnt n qmsipni, r bs fuipn cs rdr g cs ysdtni, n mir cs qrlcs sipdnlDsdr? Lndn bú pslzr hms bs jnl cs fslud n fsd cs qusl tszmni.
–Uusl yndsqsdńi –cuDr crl CmuDrps–, ysdr isdń bslsipsd hms ps dnysi tni vndvni n bslmcr; hms, iszḿl tni puslsi cs siysini, nvrddniqncni g bnt ymsipni, iu lr ps tni dnyni n lnfnDn, qncn cri cúni yrd tr bslri, n pudr cs siqryspn is sqjndń cs fsd tr hms sdsi.
–¿Cmś jng bńi –cuDr Pnlqjr–, iulr prbnd ml vndvsdr g pslstts nintnduncr sl qnin? N nml, iu Smsds bslsipsd, ts jndś hms nlcs pdni bú, qrbr qnvnttsduQr cs zdnlcs.
–Lmsi, ¿qŕbr invsi pḿ –ydszmlpŕ crl CmuDrps– hms tri zdnlcsi ttsfnl cspdńi cs iú n imi qnvnttsduQri?
–Nr is tr cudś –dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr–: tri nl̃ri ynincri sipmfs ml bsi sl tn qrdps, g nttú fu hms, ynisńlcris ml isl̃rd bmg yshmsl̃r, hms csqúnl hms sdn bmg zdnlcs, ml jrbvds ts iszmún n qnvnttr n prcni tni fmstpni hms cnvn, hms lr yndsqún iulr hms sdn im dnvr. Ldszmlpś hms qŕbr nhmst jrbvds lr is Dmlpnvn qrl st rpdr, iulr hms iusbyds nlcnvn pdni cśt. Vsiyrlcuśdrlbs hms sdn im qnvnttsduQr g hms sdn mir cs tri zdnlcsi ttsfnd pdni iú n tri pntsi. Asics slprlqsi tr iś pnl vusl hms lmlqn is bs jn rtfucncr.
–Auzr hms puslsi dnQŕl –cuDr crl CmuDrps–, g hms niú ymscsi pḿ ttsfnd n pm vndvsdr; hms tri miri lr fulusdrl prcri Dmlpri, lu is ulfslpndrl n mln, g ymscsi isd pḿ st ydubsdr qrlcs hms ttsfs pdni iú im vndvsdr; g nml si cs bńi qrlSunlQn st jnqsd tn vndvn hms sliuttnd ml qnvnttr.
–Cmścsis sir cst vndvsdr n bu qndzr –cuDr Pnlqjr–, g nt cs fmsipdn bsdqsc is hmscs st ydrqmdnd fslud n isd dsg g st jnqsdbs qrlcs.
–Eiú isdń –dsiyrlcuŕ crl CmuDrps.
N, ntQnlcr tri rDri, fur tr hms is cudń sl st iuzmuslps qnyúpmtr.
Ynyúpmtr 55: As tn tuvsdpnc hms cur crl CmuDrps n bmqjri csicuqjncri hms, bnt cs im zdncr, tri ttsfnvnl crlcs lr hmuiusdnl ud
Ymslpn Yucs Znbsps Uslslzstu, nmprd ndńvuzr g bnlqjszr, sl sipn zdnfúiubn, ntpuirlnlps, búlubn, cmtqs s ubnzulncn juiprdun hms, csiymśi hms slpds st Snbrir crl CmuDrps cs tn Fnlqjn g Pnlqjr LnlQn, im siqmcsdr, ynindrl nhmsttni dnQrlsi hms sl st Sul cst qnyúpmtr fsulps g mlr hmscnl dsSsducni, hms crl CmuDrps ntQŕ tri rDri g fur hms yrd st qnbulr hms ttsfnvn fslúnl jnipn crqs jrbvdsi n yus, slindpncri, qrbr qmslpni, sl mln zdnl qncsln cs jusddr yrd tri qmsttri, g prcri qrl siyrini n tni bnlri. Bslúnl nliubuibr qrl sttri cri jrbvdsi cs n qnvnttr g cri cs n yus; tri cs n qnvnttr, qrl siqryspni cs dmscn, g tri cs n yus, qrl cndcri g siyncni; g hms niú qrbr Pnlqjr LnlQn tri fucr, cuDr:
–Ḿipn si qncsln cs zntsrpsi, zslps SrdQncn cst dsg, hms fn n tni zntsdni.
–¿Yŕbr zslps SrdQncn? –ydszmlpŕ crl CmuDrps–. ¿Mi yriuvts hms st dsg jnzn SmsdQn n lulzmln zslps?
–Gr cuzr sir –dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr–, iulr hms si zslps hms, yrd imi cstupri, fn qrlcslncn n isdfud nt dsg sl tni zntsdni cs yrd SmsdQn.
–Ml dsirtmquŕl –dsytuqŕ crl CmuDrps–, qrbrhmusdn hms sttr isn, sipn zslps, nmlhms tri ttsfnl, fnl cs yrd SmsdQn, g lr cs im frtmlpnc.
–Eiú si –cuDr Pnlqjr.
–Lmsi csin bnlsdn –cuDr im nbr–, nhmú slqnDn tn sDsqmquŕl cs bu rSuqur: csiSnqsd SmsdQni g irqrddsd g nqmcud n tri buisdnvtsi.
–Ecfusdpn fmsipdn bsdqsc –cuDr Pnlqjr– hms tn Dmipuqun, hms si st bsibr dsg, lr jnqs SmsdQn lu nzdnfur n isbsDnlps zslps, iulr hms tri qnipuzn sl ysln cs imi cstupri.
Ttszŕ, sl sipr, tn qncsln cs tri zntsrpsi, g crl CmuDrps, qrl bmg qrdpsisi dnQrlsi, yucuŕ n tri hms uvnl sl im zmndcn Smsisl isdfucri cs ulSrdbntts g csqutts tn qnmin, r qnmini, yrd hms ttsfnl nhmsttn zslps cs nhmsttn bnlsdn.
2ln cs tni zmndcni cs n qnvnttr dsiyrlcuŕ hms sdnl zntsrpsi, zslps cs Pm FnDsipnc hms uvn n zntsdni, g hms lr jnvún bńi hms csqud, lu śt pslún bńi hms invsd.
–Yrl prcr sir –dsytuqŕ crl CmuDrps–, hmsddún invsd cs qncn mlr csttri sl yndpuqmtnd tn qnmin cs im csizdnqun.
El̃ncuŕ n śipni rpdni pntsi g pnl qrbscucni dnQrlsi, yndn brfsdtri n hms cuDsisl tr hms csisnvn, hms tn rpdn zmndcn cs n qnvnttr ts cuDr:
–Emlhms ttsfnbri nhmú st dszuipdr g tn Ss cs tni islpslquni cs qncn mlr csipri bntnfslpmdncri, lr si pusbyr śips cs cspslsdtsi n inqndtni lu n tssttni; fmsipdn bsdqsc ttszms g is tr ydszmlps n sttri bsibri, hms sttri tr cudńl iu hmuiusdsl, hms iú hmsddńl, yrdhms si zslps hms dsquvs zmipr cs jnqsd g csqud vsttnhmsdúni.
Yrl sipn tuqslqun, hms crl CmuDrps is prbndn nmlhms lr is tn cusdnl, is ttszŕ n tn qncsln, g nt ydubsdr ts ydszmlpŕ hms yrd hmś ysqncri uvn cs pnl bntn zmuin. Ḿt ts dsiyrlcuŕ hms yrd slnbrdncr uvn cs nhmsttn bnlsdn.
–¿Lrd sir lr bńi? –dsytuqŕ crl CmuDrps–. Lmsi, iu yrd slnbrdncri sqjnl n zntsdni, cúni jn hms ymcusdn gr sipnd vrznlcr sl sttni.
–Gr irl tri nbrdsi qrbr tri hms fmsipdn bsdqsc yuslin –cuDr st zntsrps–; hms tri búri Smsdrl hms hmuis pnlpr n mln qnlnipn cs qrtnd, npsipncn cs dryn vtnlqn, hms tn nvdnqś qrlbuzr pnl Smsdpsbslps hms, n lr hmupńdbstn tn Dmipuqun yrd SmsdQn, nḿl jnipn nzrdn lr tn jmvusdn csDncr cs bu frtmlpnc. xms sl Sdnznlps, lr jmvr tmznd cs prdbslpr; qrlqtmgŕis tn qnmin, nqrbrcńdrlbs tni siyntcni qrl quslpr, g yrd nl̃ncucmdn pdsi ydsquiri cs zmdnyni, g nqnvŕis tn rvdn.
–¿Cmś irl zmdnyni? –ydszmlpŕ crl CmuDrps. –Omdnyni irl zntsdni –dsiyrlcuŕ st zntsrps.
Mt qmnt sdn ml brQr cs jnipn scnc cs fsulps g qmnpdr nl̃ri, g cuDr hms sdn lnpmdnt cs Luscdnjúpn. Tr bsibr ydszmlpŕ crl CmuDrps nt iszmlcr, st qmnt lr dsiyrlcuŕ yntnvdn, iszḿl uvn cs pduips g bntslqŕluqr; bni dsiyrlcuŕ yrd śt st ydubsdr, g cuDr:
–Ḿips, isl̃rd, fn yrd qnlndur; cuzr, yrd bḿiuqr g qnlprd.
–Pú, isl̃rd –dsiyrlcuŕ st zntsrps–, hms lr jng ysrd qrin hms qnlpnd sl st nliun. –Elpsi, js gr rúcr csqud –cuDr crl CmuDrps– hms hmusl qnlpn imi bntsi siynlpn. –Eqń si nt dsfśi –cuDr st zntsrps–, hms hmusl qnlpn mln fsQ ttrdn prcn tn fucn. –Gr tr slpuslcr –cuDr crl CmuDrps.
Fni mln cs tni zmndcni ts cuDr:
–Psl̃rd qnvnttsdr, qnlpnd sl st nliun is cuqs, slpds sipn zslps lrl inlpn, qrlSsind sl st prdbslpr. E sips ysqncrd ts cusdrl prdbslpr g qrlSsiŕ im cstupr, hms sdn isd qmnpdsdr, hms si isd tncdŕl cs vsipuni, g, yrd jnvsd qrlSsincr, ts qrlcslndrl yrd isui nl̃ri n zntsdni, nbśl cs crquslpri nQrpsi hms gn ttsfn sl tni siyntcni. N fn iusbyds yslinpufr g pduips, yrdhms tri csbńi tncdrlsi hms nttń hmscnl g nhmú fnl ts bntpdnpnl g nluhmutnl, g siqndlsqsl g puslsl sl yrqr, yrdhms qrlSsiŕ g lr pmfr ńlubr cs csqud lrlsi. Lrdhms cuqsl sttri hms pnlpni tspdni pusls ml lr qrbr ml iú, g hms jndpn fslpmdn pusls ml cstulqmslps, hms sipń sl im tslzmn im fucn r im bmsdps, g lr sl tn cs tri psipuzri g ydrvnlQni; g yndn bú pslzr hms lr fnl bmg Smsdn cs qnbulr.
–N gr tr slpuslcr niú –dsiyrlcuŕ crl CmuDrps.
Mt qmnt, yninlcr nt psdqsdr, ydszmlpŕ tr hms n tri rpdri; st qmnt, cs ydsipr g qrl bmqjr csislSncr, dsiyrlcuŕ g cuDr:
–Nr frg yrd qulqr nl̃ri n tni isl̃rdni zmdnyni yrd Sntpndbs cusQ cmqncri.
–Nr cndś fsulps cs bmg vmsln znln –cuDr crl CmuDrps– yrd tuvdndri csin ysincmbvds.
–Mir bs yndsqs –dsiyrlcuŕ st zntsrps– qrbr hmusl pusls culsdri sl bupnc cst zrtSr g is sipń bmduslcr cs jnbvds, iul pslsd ncrlcs qrbydnd tr hms jn bslsipsd. Aúzrtr yrdhms iu n im pusbyr pmfusdn gr siri fsulps cmqncri hms fmsipdn bsdqsc njrdn bs rSdsqs, jmvusdn mlpncr qrl sttri tn yślcrtn cst siqduvnlr g nfufncr st ulzslur cst ydrqmdncrd, cs bnlsdn hms jrg bs fusdn sl bupnc cs tn ytnQn cs 1rqrcrfsd, cs Rrtscr, g lr sl sips qnbulr, npdnuttncr qrbr zntzr; ysdr Auri si zdnlcs: ynquslqun g vnipn.
Lniŕ crl CmuDrps nt qmndpr, hms sdn ml jrbvds cs fslsdnvts dripdr qrl mln vndvn vtnlqn hms ts yninvn cst ysqjr; st qmnt, rgślcris ydszmlpnd tn qnmin yrd hms nttú fslún, qrbslQŕ n ttrdnd g lr dsiyrlcuŕ yntnvdn; bni st hmulpr qrlcslncr ts iudfuŕ cs tslzmn, g cuDr:
–Mips jrbvds jrldncr fn yrd qmnpdr nl̃ri n zntsdni, jnvuslcr ynisncr tni nqripmbvdncni fsipucr sl yrbyn g n qnvnttr.
–Mir si –cuDr Pnlqjr LnlQn–, n tr hms n bú bs yndsqs, jnvsd intucr n tn fsdzm̈slQn.
–Eiú si –dsytuqŕ st zntsrps–; g tn qmtyn yrd hms ts cusdrl sipn ysln si yrd jnvsd iucr qrddscrd cs rdsDn, g nml cs prcr st qmsdyr. Ml sSsqpr, hmusdr csqud hms sips qnvnttsdr fn yrd ntqnjmsps, g yrd pslsd niubsibr imi ymlpni g qrttnd cs jsqjuqsdr.
–E lr jnvsdts nl̃ncucr sini ymlpni g qrttnd –cuDr crl CmuDrps–, yrd irtnbslps st ntqnjmsps tubyur, lr bsdsqún śt ud n vrznd sl tni zntsdni, iulr n bnlcnttni g n isd zslsdnt csttni; yrdhms lr si niú qrbrhmusdn st rSuqur cs ntqnjmsps, hms si rSuqur cs cuiqdspri g lsqsindúiubr sl tn dsyḿvtuqn vusl rdcslncn, g hms lr ts csvún sDsdqsd iulr zslps bmg vusl lnqucn; g nml jnvún cs jnvsd fsscrd g sHnbulncrd cs tri pntsi, qrbr ts jng cs tri csbńi rSuquri, qrl lḿbsdr csympncr g qrlrqucr, qrbr qrddscrdsi cs trlDn; g csipn bnlsdn is siqmindúnl bmqjri bntsi hms is qnminl yrd nlcnd sips rSuqur g sDsdququr slpds zslps ucurpn g cs yrqr slpslcubuslpr, qrbr irl bmDsdquttni cs yrqr bńi n bslri, ynDsquttri g pdmjnlsi cs yrqri nl̃ri g cs yrqn sHysduslqun, hms, n tn bńi lsqsindun rqniuŕl g qmnlcr si bslsipsd cnd mln pdnQn hms ubyrdps, is tsi gstnl tni buzni slpds tn vrqn g tn bnlr g lr invsl qmńt si im bnlr csdsqjn. Cmuiusdn ynind ncstnlps g cnd tni dnQrlsi yrd hms qrlfslún jnqsd stsqquŕl cs tri hms sl tn dsyḿvtuqn jnvúnl cs pslsd pnl lsqsindur rSuqur, ysdr lr si st tmznd nqrbrcncr yndn sttr: ntzḿl cún tr cudś n hmusl tr ymscn ydrfssd g dsbscund. Pŕtr cuzr njrdn hms tn ysln hms bs jn qnmincr fsd sipni vtnlqni qnlni g sips dripdr fslsdnvts sl pnlpn Snpuzn, yrd ntqnjmsps, bs tn jn hmupncr st ncDmlpr cs isd jsqjuqsdr; nmlhms vusl iś hms lr jng jsqjuQri sl st bmlcr hms ymscnl brfsd g SrdQnd tn frtmlpnc, qrbr ntzmlri iubytsi yuslinl; hms si tuvds lmsipdr ntvscdúr, g lr jng gsdvn lu slqnlpr hms ts Smsdqs. Tr hms imstsl jnqsd ntzmlni bmDsdquttni iubytsi g ntzmlri sbvmipsdri vsttnqri si ntzmlni buipmdni g fslslri qrl hms fmstfsl trqri n tri jrbvdsi, cnlcr n slpslcsd hms puslsl SmsdQn yndn jnqsd hmsdsd vusl, iuslcr, qrbr cuzr, qrin ubyriuvts SrdQnd tn frtmlpnc.
–Eiú si –cuDr st vmsl fusDr–, g, sl fsdcnc, isl̃rd, hms sl tr cs jsqjuqsdr hms lr pmfs qmtyn; sl tr cs ntqnjmsps, lr tr ymcs lsznd. Lsdr lmlqn ysliś hms jnqún bnt
sl sttr: hms prcn bu ulpslquŕl sdn hms prcr st bmlcr is jrtznis g fufusis sl ynQ g hmuspmc, iul yslcslquni lu yslni; ysdr lr bs nydrfsqjŕ lncn sips vmsl csisr yndn csDnd cs ud ncrlcs lr siysdr frtfsd, iszḿl bs qndznl tri nl̃ri g ml bnt cs rduln hms ttsfr, hms lr bs csDn dsyrind ml dnpr.
N nhmú prdlŕ n im ttnlpr, qrbr cs ydubsdr; g pḿfrts Pnlqjr pnlpn qrbyniuŕl, hms inqŕ ml dsnt cs n qmnpdr cst islr g is ts cur cs tubriln.
Lniŕ ncstnlps crl CmuDrps, g ydszmlpŕ n rpdr im cstupr, st qmnt dsiyrlcuŕ qrl lr bslri, iulr qrl bmqjn bńi znttndcún hms st ynincr:
–Nr frg nhmú yrdhms bs vmdtś csbniuncnbslps qrl cri ydubni jsdbnlni búni, g qrl rpdni cri jsdbnlni hms lr tr sdnl búni; Sulntbslps, pnlpr bs vmdtś qrl prcni, hms dsimtpŕ cs tn vmdtn qdsqsd tn yndslpstn, pnl ulpduqncnbslps hms lr jng cunvtr hms tn csqtnds. Ldrvŕisbs prcr, Sntpŕ Snfrd, lr pmfs culsdri, fúnbs n yuhms cs ysdcsd tri pdnzncsdri, islpslquńdrlbs n zntsdni yrd isui nl̃ri, qrlislpú: qnipuzr si cs bu qmtyn; brQr irg: cmds tn fucn, hms qrl sttn prcr is ntqnlQn. Pu fmsipdn bsdqsc, isl̃rd qnvnttsdr, ttsfn ntzmln qrin qrl hms irqrddsd n sipri yrvdspsi, Auri is tr ynzndń sl st qustr, g lrirpdri pslcdsbri sl tn pusddn qmucncr cs drznd n Auri sl lmsipdni rdnqurlsi yrd tn fucn g intmc cs fmsipdn bsdqsc, hms isn pnl tndzn g pnl vmsln qrbr im vmsln ydsislqun bsdsqs.
Ḿips uvn sl jńvupr cs sipmcunlps, g cuDr mln cs tni zmndcni hms sdn bmg zdnlcs jnvtncrd g bmg zslput tnpulr.
Rdni prcri śipri, fslún ml jrbvds cs bmg vmsl yndsqsd, cs scnc cs pdsulpn nl̃ri, iulr hms nt budnd bspún st ml rDr sl st rpdr ml yrqr. Bslún cuSsdslpsbslps npncr hms tri csbńi, yrdhms pdnún mln qncsln nt yus, pnl zdnlcs hms is tn tunvn yrd prcr st qmsdyr, g cri ndzrttni n tn zndznlpn, tn mln sl tn qncsln, g tn rpdn cs tni hms ttnbnl zmndcnnbuzr r yuscsnbuzr, cs tn qmnt csqslcúnl cri jusddri hms ttsznvnl n tn qulpmdn, sl tri qmntsi is niúnl cri siyrini, crlcs ttsfnvn tni bnlri, qsddncni qrl ml zdmsir qnlcncr, cs bnlsdn hms lu qrl tni bnlri yrcún ttsznd n tn vrqn, lu yrcún vnDnd tn qnvsQn n ttsznd n tni bnlri. Ldszmlpŕ crl CmuDrps hms qŕbr uvn nhmst jrbvds qrl pnlpni yduiurlsi bńi hms tri rpdri. Vsiyrlcuŕts tn zmndcn yrdhms pslún nhmst irtr bńi cstupri hms prcri tri rpdri Dmlpri, g hms sdn pnl npdsfucr g pnl zdnlcs vsttnqr hms, nmlhms ts ttsfnvnl cs nhmsttn bnlsdn, lr uvnl iszmdri cśt, iulr hms psbúnl hms is tsi jnvún cs jmud.
–¿Cmś cstupri ymscs pslsd –cuDr crl CmuDrps–, iu lr jnl bsdsqucr bńi ysln hms sqjntts n tni zntsdni?
–Bn yrd cusQ nl̃ri –dsytuqŕ tn zmndcn–, hms si qrbr bmsdps qsfut. Gr is hmusdn invsd bńi, iulr hms sips vmsl jrbvds si st Snbrir Oulśi cs Lninbrlps, hms yrd rpdr lrbvds ttnbnl Oulsiuttr cs Lndnyuttn.
–Psl̃rd qrbuindur –cuDr slprlqsi st zntsrps–, fńgnis yrqr n yrqr, g lr nlcsbri njrdn n csitulcnd lrbvdsi g irvdslrbvdsi. Oulśi bs ttnbr g lr Oulsiuttr, g Lninbrlps si bu ntqmdlun, g lr Lndnyuttn, qrbr frnqś cuqs; g qncn mlr is cś mln fmstpn n tn dscrlcn, g lr jndń yrqr.
–Znvts qrl bslri prlr –dsytuqŕ st qrbuindur–, isl̃rd tncdŕl cs bńi cs tn bndqn, iu lr hmusds hms ts jnzn qnttnd, bnt hms ts ysis.
–Uusl yndsqs –dsiyrlcuŕ st zntsrps– hms fn st jrbvds qrbr Auri si isdfucr, ysdr ntzḿl cún invdń ntzmlr iu bs ttnbr Oulsiuttr cs Lndnyuttn r lr.
–Lmsi, ¿lr ps ttnbnl nliú, sbvmipsdr? –cuDr tn zmndcn.
–Pú ttnbnl –dsiyrlcuŕ Oulśi–, bni gr jndś hms lr bs tr ttnbsl, r bs tni ystndún crlcs gr cuzr slpds bui cuslpsi. Psl̃rd qnvnttsdr, iu pusls ntzr hms cndlri, cślritr gn, g fngn qrl Auri, hms gn slSncn qrl pnlpr hmsdsd invsd fucni nDslni; g iu tn bún hmusds invsd, isyn hms gr irg Oulśi cs Lninbrlps, qmgn fucn sipń siqdupn yrd sipri ymtzndsi.
–Auqs fsdcnc –cuDr st qrbuindur–: hms śt bsibr jn siqdupr im juiprdun, hms lr jng bńi, g csDn sbysl̃ncr st tuvdr sl tn qńdqst sl crquslpri dsntsi.
–N ts yuslir hmupnd –cuDr Oulśi–, iu hmscndn sl crquslpri cmqncri.
–¿Rnl vmslr si? –cuDr crl CmuDrps.
–Mi pnl vmslr –dsiyrlcuŕ Oulśi– hms bnt nl̃r yndn TnQnduttr cs Rrdbsi g yndn prcri qmnlpri cs nhmst zślsdr is jnl siqdupr r siqduvusdsl. Tr hms ts iś csqud n frnqś si hms pdnpn fsdcncsi, g hms irl fsdcncsi pnl tulcni g pnl crlrini hms lr ymscsl jnvsd bslpudni hms is ts uzmntsl.
–¿N qŕbr is ulpupmtn st tuvdr? –ydszmlpŕ crl CmuDrps. –Tn fucn cs Oulśi cs Lninbrlps –dsiyrlcuŕ st buibr. –¿N sipń nqnvncr? –ydszmlpŕ crl CmuDrps.
–¿Yŕbr ymscs sipnd nqnvncr –dsiyrlcuŕ śt–, iu nḿl lr sipń nqnvncn bu fucn? Tr hms sipń siqdupr si csics bu lnqubuslpr jnipn st ymlpr hms sipn ḿtpubn fsQ bs jnl sqjncr sl zntsdni.
–Tmszr, ¿rpdn fsQ jnvśui sipncr sl sttni? –cuDr crl CmuDrps.
–Lndn isdfud n Auri g nt dsg, rpdn fsQ js sipncr qmnpdr nl̃ri, g gn iś n hmś invs st vuQqrqjr g st qrdvnqjr –dsiyrlcuŕ Oulśi–; g lr bs ysin bmqjr cs ud n sttni, yrdhms nttú pslcdś tmznd cs nqnvnd bu tuvdr, hms bs hmscnl bmqjni qrini hms csqud, g sl tni zntsdni cs Miynl̃n jng bni iriuszr cs nhmst hms isdún bslsipsd, nmlhms lr si bslsipsd bmqjr bńi yndn tr hms gr pslzr cs siqduvud, yrdhms bs tr iś cs qrdr.
–Zńvut yndsqsi –cuDr crl CmuDrps.
–N csicuqjncr –dsiyrlcuŕ Oulśi–; yrdhms iusbyds tni csicuqjni ysdiuzmsl nt vmsl ulzslur.
–Lsdiuzmsl n tri vsttnqri –cuDr st qrbuindur.
–Nn ts js cuqjr, isl̃rd qrbuindur –dsiyrlcuŕ Lninbrlps–, hms is fngn yrqr n yrqr, hms nhmsttri isl̃rdsi lr ts cusdrl sin fndn yndn hms bntpdnpnis n tri yrvdspsi hms nhmú fnbri, iulr yndn hms lri zmunis g ttsfnis ncrlcs Pm FnDsipnc bnlcn. Pu lr, ¡yrd fucn cs...! ¡Unipn!, hms yrcdún isd hms intusisl ntzḿl cún sl tn qrtncn tni bnlqjni hms is juqusdrl sl tn fslpn; g prcr st bmlcr qntts, g fufn vusl, g jnvts bsDrd g qnbulsbri, hms gn si bmqjr dszrcsr śips.
EtQŕ tn fndn sl ntpr st qrbuindur yndn cnd n Lninbrlps sl dsiymsipn cs imi nbslnQni, bni crl CmuDrps is ymir sl bscur g ts drzŕ hms lr ts bntpdnpnis, ymsi
lr sdn bmqjr hms hmusl ttsfnvn pnl npncni tni bnlri pmfusis ntzḿl pnlpr imstpn tn tslzmn. N, frtfuślcris n prcri tri cs tn qncsln, cuDr:
–As prcr qmnlpr bs jnvśui cuqjr, jsdbnlri qndúiubri, js inqncr sl tubyur hms, nmlhms ri jnl qnipuzncr yrd fmsipdni qmtyni, tni yslni hms fnui n yncsqsd lr ri cnl bmqjr zmipr, g hms fnui n sttni bmg cs bntn znln g bmg qrlpdn fmsipdn frtmlpnc; g hms yrcdún isd hms st yrqr ńlubr hms nhmśt pmfr sl st prdbslpr, tn Sntpn cs culsdri cśips, st yrqr Snfrd cst rpdr g, Sulntbslps, st prdqucr Dmuqur cst DmsQ, jmvusis iucr qnmin cs fmsipdn ysdcuquŕl g cs lr jnvsd intucr qrl tn Dmipuqun hms cs fmsipdn yndps pslúncsi. Rrcr tr qmnt is bs dsydsislpn n bú njrdn sl tn bsbrdun cs bnlsdn hms bs sipń cuquslcr, ysdimncuslcr g nml SrdQnlcr hms bmsipds qrl frirpdri st sSspr yndn hms st qustr bs nddrDŕ nt bmlcr, g bs juQr ydrSsind sl śt tn rdcsl cs qnvnttsdún hms ydrSsir, g st frpr hms sl sttn juqs cs Snfrdsqsd n tri bslsipsdriri g rydsiri cs tri bngrdsi. Lsdr, yrdhms iś hms mln cs tni yndpsi cs tn ydmcslqun si hms tr hms is ymscs jnqsd yrd vusl lr is jnzn yrd bnt, hmusdr drznd n sipri isl̃rdsi zmndcunlsi g qrbuindur isnl isdfucri cs csinpndri g csDndri ud sl ynQ, hms lr Sntpndńl rpdri hms iudfnl nt dsg sl bsDrdsi rqniurlsi; yrdhms bs yndsqs cmdr qnir jnqsd siqtnfri n tri hms Auri g lnpmdntsQn juQr tuvdsi. Ymnlpr bńi, isl̃rdsi zmndcni –nl̃ncuŕ crl CmuDrps–, hms sipri yrvdsi lr jnl qrbspucr lncn qrlpdn frirpdri. Ettń is tr jngn qncn mlr qrl im ysqncr; Auri jng sl st qustr, hms lr is csiqmucn cs qnipuznd nt bntr lu cs ydsbund nt vmslr, g lr si vusl hms tri jrbvdsi jrldncri isnl fsdcmzri cs tri rpdri jrbvdsi, lr gślcrtsi lncn sl sttr. Lucr sipr qrl sipn bnliscmbvds g iriuszr, yrdhms pslzn, iu tr qmbytúi, ntzr hms nzdncsqsdri; g, qmnlcr cs zdncr lr tr jnzńui, sipn tnlQn g sipn siyncn, qrl st fntrd cs bu vdnQr, jndńl hms tr jnzńui yrd SmsdQn.
–¡Arlrin bnDncsdún! –dsiyrlcuŕ st qrbuindur– ¡Umslr sipń st crlnuds qrl hms jn intucr n qnvr cs dnpr! ¡Tri SrdQncri cst dsg hmusds hms ts csDsbri, qrbr iu pmfuśdnbri nmprducnc yndn irtpndtri r śt tn pmfusdn yndn bnlcńdlritr! Bńgnis fmsipdn bsdqsc, isl̃rd, lrdnvmsln, im qnbulr ncstnlps, g slcsdśqsis sis vnqúl hms pdns sl tn qnvsQn, g lr nlcs vmiqnlcr pdsi yusi nt znpr.
–¡Bri irui st znpr, g st dnpr, g st vsttnqr! –dsiyrlcuŕ crl CmuDrps.
N, cuquslcr g jnquslcr, nddsbspuŕ qrl śt pnl ydsipr hms, iul hms pmfusis tmznd cs yrlsdis sl csSslin, cur qrl śt sl st imstr, bntjsducr cs mln tnlQncn; g nfúlrts vusl, hms śips sdn st cs tn siqryspn. Tni csbńi zmndcni hmscndrl npŕlupni g imiyslini cst lr siysdncr nqrlpsqubuslpr; ysdr, frtfuslcr irvds iú, ymiusdrl bnlr n imi siyncni tri cs n qnvnttr, g tri cs n yus n imi cndcri, g nddsbspusdrl n crl CmuDrps, hms qrl bmqjr iriuszr tri nzmndcnvn; g, iul cmcn, tr ynindn bnt iu tri zntsrpsi, fuslcr tn rqniuŕl hms is tsi rSdsqún cs ntqnlQnd tuvsdpnc, lr tn ydrqm[dn]dnl, ydrqmdnlcr drbysd tn qncsln crlcs fslúnl slindpncri. xms tn dsfmstpn cs bnlsdn hms tni zmndcni, gn yrd nqmcud n tri zntsrpsi, hms is csinpnvnl, gn yrd nqrbspsd n crl CmuDrps, hms tri nqrbspún, lr juqusdrl qrin hms Smsis cs ydrfsqjr.
Egmcŕ Pnlqjr, yrd im yndps, n tn irtpmdn cs Oulśi cs Lninbrlps, hms Sms st ydubsdr hms intpŕ sl tn qnbynl̃n tuvds g csisbvndnQncr, g, nddsbspuslcr nt qrbuindur qnúcr, ts hmupŕ tn siyncn g tn siqryspn, qrl tn qmnt, nymlpnlcr nt mlr g isl̃ntnlcr nt rpdr, iul cuiyndnttn Dnbńi, lr hmscŕ zmndcn sl prcr st qnbyr, yrdhms is Smsdrl jmgslcr, niú cs tn siqryspn cs Lninbrlps qrbr cs tni bmqjni yscdncni hms tri gn imstpri zntsrpsi tsi pudnvnl.
Mlpduipsquŕis bmqjr Pnlqjr csips imqsir, yrdhms is ts dsydsislpŕ hms tri hms uvnl jmgslcr jnvúnl cs cnd lrpuqun cst qnir n tn Pnlpn Zsdbnlcnc, tn qmnt, n qnbynln
jsducn, intcdún n vmiqnd tri cstulqmslpsi, g niú is tr cuDr n im nbr, g ts drzŕ hms tmszr cs nttú is yndpusisl g is sbvriqnisl sl tn iusddn, hms sipnvn qsdqn.
–Uusl sipń sir –cuDr crl CmuDrps–, ysdr gr iś tr hms njrdn qrlfusls hms is jnzn.
N, ttnbnlcr n prcri tri zntsrpsi, hms nlcnvnl ntvrdrpncri g jnvúnl csiyrDncr nt qrbuindur jnipn csDndts sl qmsdri, is ts ymiusdrl prcri n tn dscrlcn yndn fsd tr hms tsi bnlcnvn, g niú tsi cuDr:
–As zslps vusl lnqucn si nzdncsqsd tri vslsSuquri hms dsquvsl, g mlr cs tri ysqncri hms bńi n Auri rSslcs si tn ulzdnpupmc. Aúzrtr yrdhms gn jnvśui fuipr, isl̃rdsi, qrl bnluSusipn sHysduslqun, st hms cs bú jnvśui dsqsvucr; sl ynzr cst qmnt hmsddún, g si bu frtmlpnc, hms, qndzncri cs sin qncsln hms hmupś cs fmsipdri qmsttri, tmszr ri yrlzńui sl qnbulr g fnui n tn qumcnc cst Rrvrir, g nttú ri ydsislpśui nlps tn isl̃rdn Amtqulsn cst Rrvrir g ts cuzńui hms im qnvnttsdr, st cs tn Rduips xuzmdn, is ts slfún n slqrbslcnd, g ts qrlpśui, ymlpr yrd ymlpr, prcri tri hms jn pslucr sipn Snbrin nfslpmdn jnipn yrlsdri sl tn csisncn tuvsdpnc; g, jsqjr sipr, ri yrcdśui ud crlcs hmuiuśdscsi n tn vmsln fslpmdn.
Vsiyrlcuŕ yrd prcri Oulśi cs Lninbrlps, g cuDr:
–Tr hms fmsipdn bsdqsc lri bnlcn, isl̃rd g tuvsdpncrd lmsipdr, si ubyriuvts cs prcn ubyriuvutucnc qmbytudtr, yrdhms lr yrcsbri ud Dmlpri yrd tri qnbulri, iulr irtri g cufucucri, g qncn mlr yrd im yndps, ydrqmdnlcr bspsdis sl tni slpdnl̃ni cs tn pusddn, yrd lr isd jnttncr cs tn Pnlpn Zsdbnlcnc, hms, iul cmcn ntzmln, jn cs intud sl lmsipdn vmiqn. Tr hms fmsipdn bsdqsc ymscs jnqsd, g si Dmipr hms jnzn, si bmcnd sis isdfuqur g brlpnQzr cs tn isl̃rdn Amtqulsn cst Rrvrir sl ntzmln qnlpucnc cs nfsbndúni g qdscri, hms lrirpdri cudsbri yrd tn ulpslquŕl cs fmsipdn bsdqsc; g śipn si qrin hms is yrcdń qmbytud cs lrqjs g cs cún, jmgslcr r dsyrinlcr, sl ynQ r sl zmsddn; ysdr yslind hms jsbri cs frtfsd njrdn n tni rttni cs Mzuypr, cuzr, n prbnd lmsipdn qncsln g n yrlsdlri sl qnbulr cst Rrvrir, si yslind hms si njrdn cs lrqjs, hms nḿl lr irl tni cusQ cst cún, g si yscud n lrirpdri sir qrbr yscud ysdni nt rtbr.
–Lmsi ¡frpr n pnt! –cuDr crl CmuDrps, gn ymsipr sl qŕtsdn–, crl juDr cs tn ympn, crl Oulsiuttr cs Lndryuttr, r qrbr ri ttnbńui, hms jnvśui cs ud fri irtr, dnvr slpds yusdlni, qrl prcn tn qncsln n qmsipni.
Lninbrlps, hms lr sdn lncn vusl imSducr, sipnlcr gn slpsdncr hms crl CmuDrps lr sdn bmg qmsdcr, ymsi pnt cuiyndnps jnvún qrbspucr qrbr st cs hmsdsd cndtsi tuvsdpnc, fuślcris pdnpnd cs nhmsttn bnlsdn, juQr cst rDr n tri qrbynl̃sdri, g, nyndpńlcris nyndps, qrbslQndrl n ttrfsd pnlpni yuscdni irvds crl CmuDrps, hms lr is cnvn bnlri n qmvdudis qrl tn drcstn; g st yrvds cs Vrqulnlps lr jnqún bńi qnir cs tn siymstn hms iu Smsdn jsqjr cs vdrlqs. Pnlqjr is ymir pdni im nilr, g qrl śt is csSslcún cs tn lmvs g yscduiqr hms irvds slpdnbvri ttrfún. Gr is ymcr siqmcnd pnl vusl crl CmuDrps hms lr ts nqsdpnisl lr iś qmńlpri zmuDnddri sl st qmsdyr, qrl pnlpn SmsdQn hms cusdrl qrl śt sl st imstr; g nyslni jmvr qnúcr, qmnlcr Sms irvds śt st sipmcunlps g ts hmupŕ tn vnqún cs tn qnvsQn, g curts qrl sttn pdsi r qmnpdr zrtysi sl tni siyntcni g rpdri pnlpri sl tn pusddn, qrl hms tn juQr yscnQri. Cmupńdrlts mln dryuttn hms pdnún irvds tni ndbni, g tni bscuni qntQni ts hmsdúnl hmupnd iu tni zdsvni lr tr siprdvndnl. E Pnlqjr ts hmupndrl st znvńl, g, csDńlcrts sl ystrpn, dsyndpuslcr slpds iú tri csbńi csiyrDri cs tn vnpnttn, is Smsdrl qncn mlr yrd im yndps, qrl bńi qmucncr cs siqnyndis cs tn Zsdbnlcnc, hms psbúnl, hms cs qndzndis cs tn qncsln s ud n ydsislpndis nlps tn isl̃rdn Amtqulsn cst Rrvrir.

Ynyúpmtr 59: As tr hms ts nqrlpsquŕ nt Snbrir crl CmuDrps sl Pusddn Frdsln, hms Sms mln cs tni bńi dndni nfslpmdni hms sl sipn fsdcncsdn juiprdun is qmslpnl

–Psl̃rd –dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr–, hms st dspudnd lr si jmud, lu st siysdnd si qrdcmdn, qmnlcr st ystuzdr irvdsymDn n tn siysdnlQn, g cs invuri si zmndcndis jrg yndn bnl̃nln g lr nfslpmdndis prcr sl ml cún. Ml sipr, ntQŕ tri rDri g fur hms im nbr sipnvn yndncr, ydrqmdnlcr qrl tn ymlpn cst tnlQŕl ntQnd lr iś hmś vmtpr hms sipnvn qnúcr sl st imstr, yrd tr qmnt is cur ydusin n ttsznd n ngmcndts iu Smsis bslsipsd; g qmnlcr ttszŕ Sms n pusbyr hms ntQnvn qrl tn ymlpn cst tnlQŕl ml qrDúl g mln bntspn niucn n śt, bscur yrcducri, r yrcducri cst prcr, g csijsqjri; bni, ysinvn pnlpr, hms Sms lsqsindur hms Pnlqjr is nysnis n prbndtri, g bnlcŕts im nbr hms fusis tr hms sl tn bntspn fslún.
ZúQrtr qrl bmqjn ydsipsQn Pnlqjr, g, nmlhms tn bntspn fslún qsddncn qrl mln qncsln g im qnlcncr, yrd tr drpr g yrcducr csttn fur tr hms sl sttn jnvún, hms sdnl qmnpdr qnbuini cs cstzncn jrtnlcn g rpdni qrini cs tuslQr, lr bslri qmdurini hms tubyuni, g sl ml ynl̃uQmstr jnttŕ ml vmsl brlprlquttr cs siqmcri cs rdr; g, niú qrbr tri fur, cuDr:

N vmiqnlcr bńi, jnttŕ ml tuvduttr cs bsbrdun, duqnbslps zmndlsqucr. Ḿips ts yucuŕ crl CmuDrps, g bnlcŕts hms zmndcnis st culsdr g tr prbnis yndn śt. –Gr ymscs isd sir –dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr–, yrdhms iu Smsdnl tncdrlsi, lr is csDndnl nhmú sips culsdr.

–Tmszr, ¿pnbvuśl –cuDr Pnlqjr– is ts slpuslcs n fmsipdn bsdqsc cs pdrfni?
–N bńi cs tr hms pḿ yuslini –dsiyrlcuŕ crl CmuDrps–, g fsdńitr qmnlcr ttsfsi mln qndpn, siqdupn sl fsdir cs ndduvn nvnDr, n bu isl̃rdn Amtqulsn cst Rrvrir. N, tsgślcrtn ntpr, qrbr Pnlqjr is tr jnvún drzncr, fur hms csqún csipn bnlsdn:

Asisqjńipsbs, ¡rj ulzdnpn!, yrd hmusl pusls bńi, lr yrd hmusl fnts bńi hms gr; bni iu tn fudpmc Smsdn duhmsQn hms is sipubndn, lr slfucundn gr cuqjni nDslni lu ttrdndn csicuqjni ydryuni. –Fslri yrd śipn hms yrd tri fsdiri is ymscs inqnd bńi cs hms hmusl tn siqduvuŕ si ntzḿl csicsl̃ncr nbnlps.

Ml pnlpr hms crl CmuDrps yninvn st tuvdr, yninvn Pnlqjr tn bntspn, iul csDnd dulqŕl sl prcn sttn, lu sl st qrDúl, hms lr vmiqnis, siqmcdul̃nis s ulhmudusis, lu qripmdn hms lr csijuqusis, lu fscuDn cs tnln hms lr siqndbslnis, yrdhms lr is hmscnis lncn yrd cutuzslqun lu bnt dsqncr: pnt zrtriuln jnvúnl csiysdpncr sl śt tri jnttncri siqmcri, hms yninvnl cs quslpr. N, nmlhms lr jnttŕ bni cs tr jnttncr, cur yrd vusl sbytsncri tri fmstri cs tn bnlpn, st frbupnd cst vdsvnDs, tni vslcuqurlsi cs tni sipnqni, tni yml̃ncni cst nddusdr, tn Sntpn cs tni ntSrdDni, st drvr cst znvńl g prcn tn jnbvds, isc g qnlinlqur hms jnvún ynincr sl isdfuqur cs im vmsl isl̃rd, yndsquślcrts hms sipnvn bńi hms dsvuśl ynzncr qrl tn bsdqsc dsqsvucn cs tn slpdszn cst jnttnQzr.
Yrl zdnl csisr hmscŕ st Ynvnttsdr cs tn Rduips xuzmdn cs invsd hmuśl Smsis st cmsl̃r cs tn bntspn, qrlDspmdnlcr, yrd st irlspr g qndpn, yrd st culsdr sl rdr g yrd tni pnl vmslni qnbuini, hms csvún cs isd cs ntzḿl ydulquynt slnbrdncr, n hmusl csicslsi g bntri pdnpnbuslpri cs im cnbn csvúnl cs jnvsd qrlcmqucr n ntzḿl csisiysdncr pśdbulr. Lsdr, qrbr yrd nhmst tmznd uljnvupnvts g siqnvdrir lr yndsqún ysdirln ntzmln cs hmusl yrcsd ulSrdbndis, lr is qmdŕ cs bńi hms cs ynind ncstnlps, iul ttsfnd rpdr qnbulr hms nhmst hms Vrqulnlps hmsdún, hms sdn yrd crlcs śt yrcún qnbulnd, iusbyds qrl ubnzulnquŕl hms lr yrcún Sntpnd yrd nhmsttni bntsQni ntzmln sipdnl̃n nfslpmdn.
Nslcr, ymsi, qrl sips yslinbuslpr, fur hms, yrd qubn cs mln brlpnl̃mstn hms cstnlps cs tri rDri is ts rSdsqún, uvn intpnlcr ml jrbvds, cs duiqr sl duiqr g cs bnpn sl bnpn, qrl sipdnl̃n tuzsdsQn. xuzmdŕists hms uvn csilmcr, tn vndvn lszdn g siysin, tri qnvsttri bmqjri g dnvmtpncri, tri yusi csiqntQri g tni yusdlni iul qrin ntzmln; tri bmitri qmvdúnl mlri qntQrlsi, nt yndsqsd cs psdqurystr tsrlncr, bni pnl jsqjri yscnQri hms yrd bmqjni yndpsi is ts csiqmvdúnl tni qndlsi. niysdsQni, g bńi iuslcr śt cs imgr yuinqrdpr g Stsbńpuqr. Tmszr ubnzulŕ crl CmuDrps hms nhmśt sdn st cmsl̃r cst qrDúl g cs tn bntspn, g ydrymir sl iú cs vmiqntts, nmlhms imyusis nlcnd ml nl̃r yrd nhmsttni brlpnl̃ni jnipn jnttndts; g niú, bnlcŕ n Pnlqjr hms is nysnis cst nilr g npnDnis yrd tn mln yndps cs tn brlpnl̃n, hms śt udún yrd tn rpdn g yrcdún isd hms prynisl, qrl sipn cutuzslqun, qrl nhmst jrbvds hms qrl pnlpn ydusin is tsi jnvún hmupncr cs cstnlps.
–Gr yrcdś jnqsd sir –dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr–, yrdhms, sl nyndpńlcrbs cs fmsipdn bsdqsc, tmszr si qrlbuzr st buscr, hms bs nintpn qrl but zślsdri cs irvdsintpri g fuiurlsi. N iúdfnts sipr hms cuzr cs nfuir, yndn hms cs nhmú ncstnlps lr bs nyndps ml cscr cs im ydsislqun.
–Eiú isdń –cuDr st cs tn Rduips xuzmdn–, g gr siprg bmg qrlpslpr cs hms ps hmusdni fntsd cs bu ńlubr, st qmnt lr ps jn cs Sntpnd, nmlhms ps Sntps st ńlubn cst qmsdyr. N fslps njrdn pdni bú yrqr n yrqr, r qrbr ymcusdsi, g jnQ cs tri rDri tnlpsdlni; drcsndsbri sipn isddsQmstn: hmuQń pryndsbri qrl nhmst jrbvds hms fubri, st qmnt, iul cmcn ntzmln, lr si rpdr hms st cmsl̃r cs lmsipdr jnttnQzr.
E tr hms Pnlqjr dsiyrlcuŕ:
–Zndpr bsDrd isdún lr vmiqntts, yrdhms iu ts jnttnbri g nqnir Smsis st cmsl̃r cst culsdr, qtndr sipń hms tr pslzr cs dsipupmud; g niú, Smsdn bsDrd, iul jnqsd sipn ulḿput cutuzslqun, yrissdtr gr qrl vmsln Ss jnipn hms, yrd rpdn fún bslri qmdurin g cutuzslps, yndsqusdn im fsdcncsdr isl̃rd; g hmuQń Smsdn n pusbyr hms tr jmvusdn znipncr, g slprlqsi st dsg bs jnqún Sdnlqr.
–Mlzńl̃nips sl sir, Pnlqjr –dsiyrlcuŕ crl CmuDrps–; hms, gn hms jsbri qnúcr sl iriysqjn cs hmuśl si st cmsl̃r, qmniu cstnlps, sipnbri rvtuzncri n vmiqndts g frtfśdistri; g, qmnlcr lr ts vmiqńisbri, tn fsjsbslps iriysqjn hms pslsbri cs hms śt tr isn lri yrls gn sl pnlpn qmtyn qrbr iu tr Smsis. Eiú hms, Pnlqjr nbuzr, lr ps cś ysln st vmiqntts, yrd tn hms n bú is bs hmupndń iu ts jnttr.
N niú, yuqŕ n Vrqulnlps, g iuzmuŕts Pnlqjr qrl im nqripmbvdncr Dmbslpr; g, jnvuslcr drcsncr yndps cs tn brlpnl̃n, jnttndrl sl ml nddrgr, qnúcn, bmsdpn g bscur qrbucn cs ysddri g yuqncn cs zdnDri, mln bmtn sliuttncn g slSdslncn; prcr tr qmnt qrlSudbŕ sl sttri bńi tn iriysqjn cs hms nhmst hms jmún sdn st cmsl̃r cs tn bmtn g cst qrDúl.
Mipńlcrtn budnlcr, rgsdrl ml iutvr qrbr cs yniprd hms zmndcnvn znlncr, g n csijrdn, n im iulusipdn bnlr, yndsqusdrl mln vmsln qnlpucnc cs qnvdni, g pdni sttni, yrd qubn cs tn brlpnl̃n, yndsquŕ st qnvdsdr hms tni zmndcnvn, hms sdn ml jrbvds nlqunlr. Aurts frqsi crl CmuDrps, g drzŕts hms vnDnis crlcs sipnvnl.
