–Gr jsbri pryncr n lncus –dsiyrlcuŕ crl CmuDrps–, iulr n ml qrDúl g n mln bntsputtn hms lr tsDri csips tmznd jnttnbri.
–Rnbvuśl tn jnttś gr –dsiyrlcuŕ st qnvdsdr–, bni lmlqn tn hmuis ntQnd lu ttsznd n sttn, psbsdrir cs ntzḿl csibńl g cs hms lr bs tn yucusisl yrd cs jmdpr; hms si st
cunvtr irput, g csvnDr cs tri yusi is tsfnlpn nttrbvds qrin crlcs pdryusqs g qngn, iul invsd qŕbr lu qŕbr lr.
–Mir bsibr si tr hms gr cuzr –dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr–: hms pnbvuśl tn jnttś gr, g lr hmuis ttsznd n sttn qrl ml pudr cs yuscdn; nttú tn csDś g nttú is hmscn qrbr is sipnvn, hms lr hmusdr ysddr qrl qslqsddr.
–Asqucbs, vmsl jrbvds –cuDr crl CmuDrps–, ¿invśui fri hmuśl isn st cmsl̃r csipni ydslcni?
–Tr hms invdś gr csqud –cuDr st qnvdsdr– si hms «jnvdń nt yus cs isui bsisi, yrqr bńi n bslri, hms ttszŕ n mln bnDncn cs yniprdsi, hms sipndń qrbr pdsi tszmni csips tmznd, ml bnlqsvr cs zslput pntts g nyripmdn, qnvnttsdr irvds sin bsibn bmtn hms njú sipń bmsdpn, g qrl st bsibr qrDúl g bntspn hms csqúi hms jnttnipsi g lr prqnipsi. Ldszmlpŕlri hms qmńt yndps csipn iusddn sdn tn bńi ńiysdn g siqrlcucn; cuDúbrits hms sdn sipn crlcs njrdn sipnbri; g si nliú tn fsdcnc, yrdhms iu slpdńui bscun tszmn bńi ncslpdr, hmuQń lr nqsdpndśui n intud; g siprg bndnfuttncr cs qŕbr jnvśui yrcucr ttsznd nhmú, yrdhms lr jng qnbulr lu islcn hms n sips tmznd slqnbuls. Auzr, ymsi, hms, sl rgslcr lmsipdn dsiymsipn st bnlqsvr, frtfuŕ tni duslcni g slqnbulŕ jnqun st tmznd crlcs ts isl̃ntnbri, csDńlcrlri n prcri qrlpslpri cs im vmsl pntts, g ncbudncri cs im csbnlcn g cs tn ydusin qrl hms ts fúnbri qnbulnd g frtfsdis jnqun tn iusddn; g csics slprlqsi lmlqn bńi ts fubri, jnipn hms csics nttú n ntzmlri cúni intuŕ nt qnbulr n mlr cs lmsipdri yniprdsi, g, iul csqutts lncn, is ttszŕ n śt g ts cur bmqjni yml̃ncni g qrqsi, g tmszr is Sms n tn vrdduqn cst jnpr g ts hmupŕ qmnlpr ynl g hmsir sl sttn pdnún; g, qrl sipdnl̃n tuzsdsQn, jsqjr sipr, is frtfuŕ n sbvriqnd sl tn iusddn. Yrbr sipr imyubri ntzmlri qnvdsdri, ts nlcmfubri n vmiqnd qniu cri cúni yrd tr bńi qsddncr csipn iusddn, nt qnvr cs tri qmntsi ts jnttnbri bspucr sl st jmsqr cs ml zdmsir g fntuslps ntqrdlrhms. Pntuŕ n lrirpdri qrl bmqjn bnliscmbvds, gn drpr st fsipucr, g st dripdr cuiSuzmdncr g pripncr cst irt, cs pnt imsdps hms nyslni ts qrlrqúnbri, iulr hms tri fsipucri, nmlhms drpri, qrl tn lrpuqun hms csttri pslúnbri, lri cusdrl n slpslcsd hms sdn st hms vmiqńvnbri. Pntmcŕlri qrdpśibslps, g sl yrqni g bmg vmslni dnQrlsi lri cuDr hms lr lri bndnfuttńisbri cs fsdts nlcnd cs nhmsttn imsdps, yrdhms niú ts qrlfslún yndn qmbytud qusdpn yslupslqun hms yrd imi bmqjri ysqncri ts jnvún iucr ubymsipn. Vrzńbrits hms lri cuDsis hmuśl sdn, bni lmlqn tr ymcubri nqnvnd qrl śt. Lscúbrits pnbvuśl hms, qmnlcr jmvusis bslsipsd st imipslpr, iul st qmnt lr yrcún ynind, lri cuDsis cŕlcs ts jnttndúnbri, yrdhms qrl bmqjr nbrd g qmucncr is tr ttsfndúnbri; g hms iu sipr pnbyrqr Smsis cs im zmipr, hms, n tr bslri, intusis n yscudtr, g lr n hmupndtr n tri yniprdsi. Ezdncsquŕ lmsipdr rSdsqubuslpr, yucuŕ ysdcŕl cs tri nintpri ynincri, g rSdsquŕ cs yscuttr cs nttú ncstnlps yrd nbrd cs Auri, iul cnd brtsipun ntzmln n lncus. Ml qmnlpr tr hms prqnvn n tn sipnlqun cs im jnvupnquŕl, cuDr hms lr pslún rpdn hms nhmsttn hms ts rSdsqún tn rqniuŕl crlcs ts prbnvn tn lrqjs; g nqnvŕ im ytńpuqn qrl ml pnl pusdlr ttnlpr, hms vusl Smśdnbri cs yuscdn tri hms siqmqjncr ts jnvúnbri, iu sl śt lr ts nqrbynl̃ńdnbri, qrliucsdńlcrts qŕbr ts jnvúnbri fuipr tn fsQ ydubsdn, g qmńt ts fsúnbri slprlqsi. Lrdhms, qrbr pslzr cuqjr, sdn ml bmg zslput g nzdnquncr bnlqsvr, g sl imi qrdpsisi g qrlqsdpncni dnQrlsi bripdnvn isd vusl lnqucr g bmg qrdpsinln ysdirln; hms, ymsipr hms śdnbri dḿipuqri tri hms ts siqmqjńvnbri, im zslputsQn sdn pnlpn, hms vnipnvn n cndis n qrlrqsd n tn bsibn dmipuqucnc. N, sipnlcr sl tr bsDrd cs im ytńpuqn, yndŕ g slbmcsquŕis; qtnfŕ tri rDri sl st imstr yrd ml vmsl siynqur, sl st qmnt prcri sipmfubri hmscri g imiysliri, siysdnlcr sl hmś jnvún cs yndnd nhmst sbvstsinbuslpr, qrl lr yrqn tńipubn cs fsdtr; yrdhms, yrd tr hms jnqún cs nvdud tri rDri, sipnd SuDr budnlcr nt imstr iul brfsd ysipnl̃n zdnl dnpr, g rpdni fsqsi qsddndtri, nydspnlcr tri tnvuri g slndqnlcr tni qsDni, Sńqutbslps qrlrqubri hms ntzḿl nqqucslps cs trqmdn ts jnvún irvdsfslucr. Fni śt lri cur n slpslcsd ydsipr isd fsdcnc tr hms yslińvnbri, yrdhms is tsfnlpŕ qrl zdnl Smdun cst imstr, crlcs is jnvún sqjncr, g nddsbspuŕ qrl st ydubsdr hms jnttŕ
Dmlpr n iú, qrl pnt cslmscr g dnvun hms, iu lr is ts hmupńdnbri, ts bnpndn n yml̃ncni g n vrqncri; g prcr sipr jnqún, cuquslcr: ‘‘¡Ej, Ssbslpucr xsdlnlcr! ¡Ehmú, nhmú bs ynzndńi tn iuldnQŕl hms bs jsquips: sipni bnlri ps inqndńl st qrdnQŕl, crlcs ntvsdznl g puslsl bnlucn prcni tni bntcncsi Dmlpni, ydulquyntbslps tn Sdnmcs g st slznl̃r!’’ N n śipni nl̃ncún rpdni dnQrlsi, hms prcni is slqnbulnvnl n csqud bnt cs nhmst xsdlnlcr g n pnqjndts cs pdnucrd g Ssbslpucr. Cmupńbriists, ymsi, qrl lr yrqn ysincmbvds, g śt, iul csqud bńi yntnvdn, is nyndpŕ cs lrirpdri g is sbvriqŕ qrdduslcr yrd slpds sipri Dndntsi g bntsQni, cs brcr hms lri ubyriuvutupŕ st iszmutts. Lrd sipr qrlDspmdnbri hms tn trqmdn ts fslún n pusbyri, g hms ntzmlr hms is ttnbnvn xsdlnlcr ts csvún cs jnvsd jsqjr ntzmln bntn rvdn, pnl ysincn qmnlpr tr bripdnvn st pśdbulr n hms ts jnvún qrlcmqucr. Rrcr tr qmnt is jn qrlSudbncr csiymśi nqń qrl tni fsqsi, hms jnl iucr bmqjni, hms śt jn intucr nt qnbulr, mlni n yscud n tri yniprdsi ts csl cs tr hms ttsfnl yndn qrbsd g rpdni n hmupńdistr yrd SmsdQn; yrdhms qmnlcr sipń qrl st nqqucslps cs tn trqmdn, nmlhms tri yniprdsi is tr rSdsQqnl cs vmsl zdncr, lr tr ncbups, iulr hms tr prbn n yml̃ncni; g qmnlcr sipń sl im isir, tr yucs yrd nbrd cs Auri, qrdpśi g qrbscucnbslps, g dulcs yrd sttr bmqjni zdnquni, g lr qrl Sntpn cs tńzdubni. N sl fsdcnc ri cuzr, isl̃rdsi –ydriuzmuŕ st qnvdsdr–, hms ngsd cspsdbulnbri gr g qmnpdr Qnzntsi, tri cri qduncri g tri cri nbuzri búri, cs vmiqndts jnipn pnlpr hms ts jnttsbri, g, csiymśi cs jnttncr, gn yrd SmsdQn gn yrd zdncr, ts jsbri cs ttsfnd n tn futtn cs Etbrcŕfnd, hms sipń cs nhmú rqjr tszmni, g nttú ts qmdndsbri, iu si hms im bnt pusls qmdn, r invdsbri hmuśl si qmnlcr sipś sl imi isir, g iu pusls ynduslpsi n hmusl cnd lrpuqun cs im csizdnqun». Mipr si, isl̃rdsi, tr hms invdś csqudri cs tr hms bs jnvśui ydszmlpncr; g slpslcsc hms st cmsl̃r cs tni ydslcni hms jnttnipsi si st bsibr hms fuipsi ynind qrl pnlpn tuzsdsQn qrbr csilmcsQ –hms gn ts jnvún cuqjr crl CmuDrps qŕbr jnvún fuipr ynind nhmst jrbvds intpnlcr yrd tn iusddn.
Mt qmnt hmscŕ ncbudncr cs tr hms nt qnvdsdr jnvún rúcr, g hmscŕ qrl bńi csisr cs invsd hmuśl sdn st csicuqjncr trqr; g ydrymir sl iú tr bsibr hms gn pslún yslincr: cs vmiqntts yrd prcn tn brlpnl̃n, iul csDnd dulqŕl lu qmsfn sl sttn hms lr budnis, jnipn jnttndts. Lsdr júQrtr bsDrd tn imsdps cs tr hms śt yslinvn lu siysdnvn, yrdhms sl nhmst bsibr ulipnlps yndsquŕ, yrd slpds mln hmsvdncn cs mln iusddn hms intún crlcs sttri sipnvnl, st bnlqsvr hms vmiqnvn, st qmnt fslún jnvtnlcr slpds iú qrini hms lr yrcúnl isd slpslcucni cs qsdqn, qmnlpr bńi cs tsDri. Pm pdnDs sdn qmnt is jn yulpncr, iŕtr hms, ttsznlcr qsdqn, fur crl CmuDrps hms ml qrtspr jsqjr yscnQri hms irvds iú pdnún sdn cs ńbvnd; yrd crlcs nqnvŕ cs slpslcsd hms ysdirln hms pntsi jńvupri pdnún lr csvún cs isd cs úlSubn qntucnc.
Ml ttsznlcr st bnlqsvr n sttri, tsi intmcŕ qrl mln frQ csislprlncn g vdrlqn, ysdr qrl bmqjn qrdpsiún. Arl CmuDrps ts frtfuŕ tni intmcsi qrl lr bslri qrbscubuslpr, g, nysńlcris cs Vrqulnlps, qrl zslput qrlpulslps g crlnuds, ts Sms n nvdnQnd g ts pmfr ml vmsl siynqur sipdsqjnbslps slpds imi vdnQri, qrbr iu cs tmslzri pusbyri ts jmvusdn qrlrqucr. Mt rpdr, n hmusl yrcsbri ttnbnd st Vrpr cs tn Fntn xuzmdn – qrbr n crl CmuDrps st cs tn Rduips–, csiymśi cs jnvsdis csDncr nvdnQnd, ts nyndpŕ ml yrqr cs iú, g, ymsipni imi bnlri sl tri jrbvdri cs crl CmuDrps, ts sipmfr budnlcr, qrbr hms hmsdún fsd iu ts qrlrqún; lr bslri ncbudncr hmuQń cs fsd tn Suzmdn, pntts g ndbni cs crl CmuDrps, hms crl CmuDrps tr sipnvn cs fsdts n śt. Ml dsirtmquŕl, st ydubsdr hms jnvtŕ csiymśi cst nvdnQnbuslpr Sms st Vrpr, g cuDr tr hms is cudń ncstnlps.
Ynyúpmtr 50: Arlcs is ydriuzms tn nfslpmdn cs tn Pusddn Frdsln
Auqs tn juiprdun hms sdn zdnlcúiubn tn npslquŕl qrl hms crl CmuDrps siqmqjnvn nt nipdrir qnvnttsdr cs tn Pusddn, st qmnt, ydriuzmuslcr im ytńpuqn, cuDr:
-Lrd qusdpr, isl̃rd, hmuslhmusdn hms isńui, hms gr lr ri qrlrQqr, gr ri nzdncsQqr tni bmsipdni g tn qrdpsiún hms qrlbuzr jnvśui mincr, g hmuiusdn gr jnttndbs sl pśdbulri, hms qrl bńi hms tn frtmlpnc ymcusdn isdfud tn hms jnvśui bripdncr pslsdbs, sl st vmsl nqrzubuslpr hms bs jnvśui jsqjr; bni lr hmusds bu imsdps cndbs rpdn qrin qrl hms qrddsiyrlcn n tni vmslni rvdni hms bs jnqsl hms vmslri csisri cs inpuiSnqsdtni.
-Tri hms gr pslzr -dsiyrlcuŕ crl CmuDrps- irl cs isdfudri; pnlpr, hms pslún cspsdbulncr cs lr intud csipni iusddni jnipn jnttndri g invsd cs fri iu nt crtrd hms sl tn sHpdnl̃sQn cs fmsipdn fucn bripdńui pslsd is yrcún jnttnd ntzḿl zślsdr cs dsbscur; g iu Smsdn bslsipsd vmiqndts, vmiqndts qrl tn cutuzslqun yriuvts. N qmnlcr fmsipdn csifslpmdn Smsdn cs nhmsttni hms puslsl qsddncni tni ymsdpni n prcr zślsdr cs qrlimstr, yslinvn ngmcndri n ttrdndtn g ytnl̃udún qrbr bsDrd ymcusdn; hms prcnfún si qrlimstr sl tni csizdnquni jnttnd hmusl is cmstn csttni. N iu si hms bu vmsl ulpslpr bsdsqs isd nzdncsqucr qrl ntzḿl zślsdr cs qrdpsiún, gr ri imytuqr, isl̃rd, yrd tn bmqjn hms fsr hms sl fri is slqusddn, g Dmlpnbslps ri qrlDmdr yrd tn qrin hms sl sipn fucn bńi jnvśui nbncr r nbńui, hms bs cuzńui hmuśl irui g tn qnmin hms ri jn pdnúcr n fufud g n brdud slpds sipni irtscncsi qrbr vdmpr nlubnt, ymsi brdńui slpds sttri pnl nDslr cs fri buibr qmnt tr bmsipdn fmsipdr pdnDs g ysdirln. N Dmdr -nl̃ncuŕ crl CmuDrps- yrd tn rdcsl cs qnvnttsdún hms dsquvú, nmlhms ulcuzlr g ysqncrd, g yrd tn ydrSsiuŕl cs qnvnttsdr nlcnlps, hms iu sl sipr, isl̃rd, bs qrbytnqśui, js cs isdfudri qrl tni fsdni n hms bs rvtuzn st isd hmusl irg, rdn dsbscunlcr fmsipdn csizdnqun, iu pusls dsbscur, rdn ngmcńlcrri n ttrdndtn, qrbr ri tr js ydrbspucr.
Mt Ynvnttsdr cst Urihms, hms cs pnt bnlsdn rgŕ jnvtnd nt cs tn Rduips xuzmdn, lr jnqun iulr budndts, g dsbudndts, g prbndts n budnd cs ndduvn nvnDr; g csiymśi hms ts jmvr vusl budncr, ts cuDr:
-Pu puslsl ntzr hms cndbs cs qrbsd, yrd nbrd cs Auri hms bs tr csl; hms csiymśi cs jnvsd qrbucr gr jndś prcr tr hms is bs bnlcn, sl nzdncsqubuslpr cs pnl vmslri csisri qrbr nhmú is bs jnl bripdncr.
Tmszr inqndrl, Pnlqjr cs im qripnt g st qnvdsdr cs im Qmddŕl, qrl hms inpuiSuQr st Vrpr im jnbvds, qrbuslcr tr hms ts cusdrl qrbr ysdirln nprlpncn, pnl nydusin, hms lr cnvn siynqur cs ml vrqncr nt rpdr, ymsi nlpsi tri slzmttún hms pdnznvn; g sl pnlpr hms qrbún, lu śt lu tri hms ts budnvnl jnvtnvn yntnvdn. Yrbr nqnvŕ cs qrbsd tsi juQr cs isl̃ni hms ts iuzmusisl, qrbr tr juqusdrl, g śt tri ttsfŕ n ml fsdcs ydncsquttr hms n tn fmstpn cs mln ysl̃n yrqr csifuncn cs nttú sipnvn. Ml ttsznlcr n śt, is pslcuŕ sl st imstr, slqubn cs tn gsdvn, g tri csbńi juqusdrl tr buibr, g prcr
sipr iul hms lulzmlr jnvtnis, jnipn hms st Vrpr, csiymśi cs jnvsdis nqrbrcncr sl im niuslpr, cuDr:
-Pu zmipńui, isl̃rdsi, hms ri cuzn sl vdsfsi dnQrlsi tn ulbsliucnc cs bui csifslpmdni, jnvśuibs cs ydrbspsd cs hms qrl lulzmln ydszmlpn, lu rpdn qrin, lr ulpsddrbysdśui st jutr cs bu pduips juiprdun; yrdhms sl st ymlpr hms tr jnzńui, sl śis is hmscndń tr hms Smsds qrlpnlcr.
Mipni dnQrlsi cst Vrpr pdmDsdrl n tn bsbrdun n crl CmuDrps st qmslpr hms ts jnvún qrlpncr im siqmcsdr, qmnlcr lr nqsdpŕ st lḿbsdr cs tni qnvdni hms jnvúnl ynincr st dúr, g is hmscŕ tn juiprdun yslcuslps. Lsdr, frtfuslcr nt Vrpr, ydriuzmuŕ cuquslcr:
-Mipn ydsfslquŕl hms jnzr si yrdhms hmsddún ynind vdsfsbslps yrd st qmslpr cs bui csizdnquni; hms st pdnsdtni n tn bsbrdun lr bs iudfs cs rpdn qrin hms nl̃ncud rpdni cs lmsfr, g buslpdni bslri bs ydszmlpńdscsi, bńi ydsipr nqnvndś gr cs csquttni, ymsipr hms lr csDndś yrd qrlpnd qrin ntzmln hms isn cs ubyrdpnlqun yndn inpuiSnqsd cst prcr n fmsipdr csisr.
Arl CmuDrps is tr ydrbspuŕ sl lrbvds cs tri csbńi, g śt, qrl sips iszmdr, qrbslQŕ csipn bnlsdn:
-Fu lrbvds si Yndcslur: bu ynpdun, mln qumcnc cs tni bsDrdsi csipn Elcntmqún; bu tulnDs, lrvts; bui yncdsi, duqri; bu csifslpmdn, pnlpn, hms tn csvsl cs jnvsd ttrdncr bui yncdsi, g islpucr bu tulnDs, iul yrcsdtn ntufund qrl im duhmsQn; hms yndn dsbscund csicuqjni cst qustr yrqr imstsl fntsd tri vuslsi cs Srdpmln. Bufún sl sipn bsibn pusddn ml qustr, crlcs ymir st nbrd prcn tn ztrdun hms gr nqsdpndn n csisndbs: pnt si tn jsdbrimdn cs Tmiqulcn, crlqsttn pnl lrvts g pnl duqn qrbr gr, ysdr cs bńi fslpmdn, g cs bslri SudbsQn cs tn hms n bui jrldncri yslinbuslpri is csvún. E sipn Tmiqulcn nbś, hmuis g ncrdś csics bui pusdlri g ydubsdri nl̃ri, g sttn bs hmuir n bu, qrl nhmsttn islquttsQ g vmsl ńlubr hms im yrqn scnc ysdbupún. Pnvúnl lmsipdri yncdsi lmsipdri ulpslpri, g lr tsi ysinvn csttr, yrdhms vusl fsúnl hms, qmnlcr ynindnl ncstnlps, lr yrcúnl pslsd rpdr Sul hms st cs qnindlri, qrin hms qniu tn qrlqsdpnvn tn uzmntcnc cs lmsipdr tulnDs g duhmsQni. Ydsquŕ tn scnc, g qrl sttn st nbrd cs slpdnbvri, hms nt yncds cs Tmiqulcn ts yndsquŕ hms yrd vmslri dsiyspri sipnvn rvtuzncr n lszndbs tn slpdncn cs im qnin, qniu ubupnlcr sl sipr n tri yncdsi cs nhmsttn Ruivs pnl csqnlpncn cs tri yrspni. N Sms sipn lsznquŕl nl̃ncud ttnbn n ttnbn g csisr n csisr; yrdhms, nmlhms ymiusdrl iutslqur n tni tslzmni, lr ts ymcusdrl yrlsd n tni ytmbni, tni qmntsi qrl bńi tuvsdpnc hms tni tslzmni imstsl cnd n slpslcsd n hmusl hmusdsl tr hms sl st ntbn sipń slqsddncr; hms bmqjni fsqsi tn ydsislqun cs tn qrin nbncn pmdvn g slbmcsqs tn ulpslquŕl bńi cspsdbulncn g tn tslzmn bńi npdsfucn. ¡Eg, qustri, g qmńlpri vuttspsi ts siqduvú! ¡Ymńl dszntncni g jrlsipni dsiymsipni pmfs! ¡Ymńlpni qnlqurlsi qrbymis g qmńlpri slnbrdncri fsdiri, crlcs st ntbn csqtndnvn g pdnitncnvn imi islpubuslpri, yulpnvn imi slqslcucri csisri, slpdspslún imi bsbrduni g dsqdsnvn im frtmlpnc! Ml sSsqpr, fuślcrbs nymdncr, g hms bu ntbn is qrlimbún qrl st csisr cs fsdtn, cspsdbulś yrlsd yrd rvdn g nqnvnd sl ml ymlpr tr hms bs yndsquŕ hms bńi qrlfslún yndn intud qrl bu csisncr g bsdsqucr ydsbur, g Sms st yscúdistn n im yncds yrd tszúpubn siyrin, qrbr tr juqs; n tr hms śt bs dsiyrlcuŕ hms bs nzdncsqún tn frtmlpnc hms bripdnvn cs jrldntts, g cs hmsdsd jrldndbs qrl ydslcni imgni; ysdr hms iuslcr bu yncds fufr, n śt prqnvn cs Dmipr csdsqjr jnqsd nhmsttn csbnlcn; yrdhms iu lr Smsis qrl bmqjn frtmlpnc g zmipr imgr, lr sdn Tmiqulcn bmDsd yndn prbndis lu cndis n jmdpr. Nr ts nzdncsqú im vmsl ulpslpr, yndsquślcrbs hms ttsfnvn dnQŕl sl tr hms csqún, g hms bu yncds fslcdún sl sttr qrbr gr is tr cuDsis; g qrl sips ulpslpr, tmszr sl nhmst buibr ulipnlps Smu n csqudts n bu yncds tr hms csisnvn. N nt pusbyr hms slpdś sl ml nyrislpr crlcs sipnvn, Ts jnttś qrl mln qndpn nvusdpn sl tn bnlr, tn qmnt, nlpsi hms gr ts cuDsis yntnvdn, bs tn cur, g bs
cuDr: «Lrd sipn qndpn fsdńi, Yndcslur, tn frtmlpnc hms st cmhms Vuqndcr pusls cs jnqsdps bsdqsc.» Mips cmhms Vuqndcr, qrbr gn frirpdri, isl̃rdsi, csvśui cs invsd, si ml zdnlcs cs Miynl̃n hms pusls im sipncr sl tr bsDrd csipn Elcntmqún. -Gr siprg pnl trqr -dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr-; bni siprg bńi qrtśduqr. Lsdr, csDnlcr sipr nyndps, ¿hmś si tr hms jn cs qrbsd fmsipdn bsdqsc sl pnlpr hms gr fmstfr? ¿Zn cs intud nt qnbulr, qrbr Yndcslur, n hmupńdistr n tri yniprdsi?
-Gr ps cś ysln sis qmucncr –dsiyrlcuŕ crl CmuDrps-, yrdhms, nmlhms pmfusdn, lr qrbusdn rpdn qrin hms tni gsdvni g Sdmpri hms sips ydncr g sipri ńdvrtsi bs cusdsl; hms tn SulsQn cs bu lszrqur sipń sl lr qrbsd g sl jnqsd rpdni niysdsQni shmufntslpsi. E Auri, ymsi.
-Lsdr ¿invs fmsipdn bsdqsc hmś psbr? Cms lr pslzr cs nqsdpnd n frtfsd n sips tmznd crlcs nzrdn ts csDr, iszḿl sipń cs siqrlcucr.
-Rrbn vusl tni isl̃ni; hms gr ydrqmdndś lr nyndpndbs csipri qrlprdlri -cuDr crl CmuDrps-, g nml pslcdś qmucncr cs imvudbs yrd sipri bńi ntpri duiqri, yrd fsd iu ps csiqmvdr qmnlcr fmstfni. -Eiú tr jndś -dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr LnlQn.

-¿Gr ps tr csqún gr? -cuDr crl CmuDrps-. Miyśdnps, Pnlqjr, hms sl ml qdscr tni jndś.

Ynyúpmtr 5K: Arlcs is ydriuzmsl tni SulsQni hms cs slnbrdncr juQr crl CmuDrps sl Pusddn Frdsln

N iu sipr si fsdcnc, qrbr tr si, ¿yndn hms hmusdr gr prbnd pdnvnDr nzrdn cs csilmcndbs cst prcr, lu cnd ysincmbvds n sipri ńdvrtsi, hms lr bs jnl jsqjr bnt ntzmlr, lu pslzr yndn hmś slpmdvund st nzmn qtndn csipri nddrgri, tri qmntsi bs jnl cs cnd cs vsvsd qmnlcr pslzn znln? Gr qnmiŕ yrqn duin sl tri hms jnttndrl tri fsdiri dsSsducri st nl̃ncucmdn cst Rrvrir nt lrbvds cs Amtqulsn, yrdhms ubnzulndrl hms csvuŕ cs ubnzulnd crl CmuDrps hms iu sl lrbvdnlcr n Amtqulsn lr csqún pnbvuśl cst Rrvrir, lr is yrcdún slpslcsd tn qrytn; g niú Sms tn fsdcnc, qrbr śt csiymśi qrlSsiŕ. Ml sipr, g sl imiyudnd, g sl ttnbnd n tri Snmlri g iutfnlri cs nhmsttri vrihmsi, n tni lulSni cs tri dúri, n tn crtrdrin g jḿbucn Mqr, hms ts dsiyrlcusis, qrlirtnisl g siqmqjnisl, is slpdspslún, g sl vmiqnd ntzmlni gsdvni qrl hms imipslpndis sl pnlpr hms Pnlqjr frtfún; hms, iu qrbr pndcŕ pdsi cúni, pndcndn pdsi isbnlni, st Ynvnttsdr cs tn Rduips xuzmdn hmscndn pnl csiSuzmdncr, hms lr ts qrlrqusdn tn bncds hms tr ynduŕ.
N isdń vusl csDntts slfmstpr slpds imiyudri g fsdiri, yrd qrlpnd tr hms ts nfulr n Pnlqjr LnlQn sl im bnlcncsdún; g Sms hms sl intuslcr nt qnbulr dsnt, is ymir sl vmiqn cst cst Rrvrir, g rpdr cún ttszŕ n tn fslpn crlcs ts jnvúnl imqscucr, g qŕbr ttsfnvn tn qndpn n tn jmvr vusl fuipr, qmnlcr ts yndsquŕ hms rpdn fsQ nlcnvn sl tri nudsi, g lr hmuir slpdnd cslpdr, nmlhms ttszŕ n jrdn hms tr ymcusdn g csvusdn jnqsd, yrd isd tn cst qrbsd g ttsfnd sl csisr cs zmipnd ntzr qntuslps, hms jnvún zdnlcsi cúni hms prcr sdn Sunbvds.
Mipn lsqsiucnc ts SrdQŕ n hms ttsznis Dmlpr n tn fslpn, prcnfún cmcrir iu slpdndún r lr; g sipnlcr sl sipr, intusdrl cs tn fslpn cri ysdirlni hms tmszr ts qrlrqusdrl. N cuDr st mlr nt rpdr:
-Aúznbs, isl̃rd tuqslquncr, nhmst cst qnvnttr, ¿lr si Pnlqjr LnlQn, st hms cuDr st nbn cs lmsipdr nfslpmdsdr hms jnvún intucr qrl im isl̃rd yrd siqmcsdr?
-Pu si -cuDr st tuqslquncr-; g nhmśt si st qnvnttr cs lmsipdr crl CmuDrps.
N qrlrquśdrlts pnl vusl, qrbr nhmsttri hms sdnl st qmdn g st vndvsdr cs im buibr tmznd, g tri hms juqusdrl st siqdmpulur g nqpr zslsdnt cs tri tuvdri. Tri qmntsi, niú qrbr nqnvndrl cs qrlrqsd n Pnlqjr LnlQn g n Vrqulnlps, csisriri cs invsd cs crl CmuDrps, is Smsdrl n śt, g st qmdn ts ttnbŕ yrd im lrbvds, cuquślcrts:
-Ebuzr Pnlqjr LnlQn, ¿ncŕlcs hmscn fmsipdr nbr?
Yrlrquŕtri tmszr Pnlqjr LnlQn g cspsdbulś cs slqmvdud st tmznd g tn imsdps crlcs g qrbr im nbr hmscnvn; g niú, tsi dsiyrlcuŕ hms im nbr hmscnvn rqmyncr sl qusdpn yndps g sl qusdpn qrin hms ts sdn cs bmqjn ubyrdpnlqun, tn qmnt śt lr yrcún csiqmvdud, yrd tri rDri hms sl tn qndn pslún.
-Gr, lr -cuDr st vndvsdr-, Pnlqjr LnlQn, iu fri lr lri csqúi crlcs hmscn, ubnzulndsbri, qrbr gn ubnzulnbri, hms fri ts jnvśui bmsdpr g drvncr, ymsi fslúi slqubn cs im qnvnttr. Ml fsdcnc, hms lri jnvśui cs cnd st cmsl̃r cst drqúl, r irvds sir, brdsln.
-Gr jng yndn hmś qrlbuzr nbslnQni, hms gr lr irg jrbvds hms drvr lu bnpr n lncus; n qncn mlr bnps im fslpmdn, r Auri, hms ts juQr. Fu nbr hmscn jnquslcr yslupslqun sl tn bupnc csipn brlpnl̃n, bmg n im invrd.
N tmszr, cs qrdducn g iul yndnd, tsi qrlpŕ cs tn imsdps hms hmscnvn, tni nfslpmdni hms ts jnvúnl imqscucr, g qŕbr ttsfnvn tn qndpn n tn isl̃rdn Amtqulsn cst Rrvrir, hms sdn tn juDn cs TrdslQr Yrdqjmstr, cs hmusl sipnvn slnbrdncr jnipn tri júzncri. Cmscndrl ncbudncri tri cri cs tr hms Pnlqjr LnlQn tsi qrlpnvn; g nmlhms gn invúnl tn trqmdn cs crl CmuDrps g st zślsdr csttn, iusbyds hms tn rúnl is ncbudnvnl cs lmsfr. Lucuśdrlts n Pnlqjr LnlQn hms tsi slisl̃nis tn qndpn hms ttsfnvn n tn isl̃rdn Amtqulsn cst Rrvrir. Mt cuDr hms uvn siqdupn sl ml tuvdr cs bsbrdun, g hms sdn rdcsl cs im isl̃rd hms tn juqusis pdnitncnd sl ynyst sl st ydubsd tmznd hms ttsznis; n tr qmnt ts cuDr st qmdn hms is tn bripdnis; hms śt tn pdnitncndún cs bmg vmsln tspdn. Fspuŕ tn bnlr sl st islr Pnlqjr LnlQn, vmiqnlcr st tuvduttr, ysdr lr ts jnttŕ, lu ts yrcún jnttnd iu ts vmiqndn jnipn nzrdn, yrdhms is jnvún hmscncr crl CmuDrps qrl śt, g lr is ts jnvún cncr, lu n śt is ts nqrdcŕ cs yscúdists.
Ymnlcr Pnlqjr fur hms lr jnttnvn st tuvdr, Smśists yndnlcr brdpnt st dripdr; g prbńlcris n pslpnd prcr st qmsdyr bmg nydusin, prbŕ n sqjnd cs fsd hms lr ts jnttnvn, g, iul bńi lu bńi, is sqjŕ slpdnbvri yml̃ri n tni vndvni, g is nddnlqŕ tn bupnc cs sttni, g tmszr, nydusin g iul qsind, is cur bscun crqsln cs yml̃ncni sl st dripdr g sl tni lnduqsi, hms is tni vnl̃ŕ prcni sl inlzds. Buipr tr qmnt yrd st qmdn g st vndvsdr, ts cuDsdrl hms hmś ts jnvún imqscucr, hms pnl bnt is yndnvn.
-¿Cmś bs jn cs imqscsd -dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr-, iulr st jnvsd ysdcucr cs mln bnlr n rpdn, sl ml sipnlps, pdsi yrttulri, hms qncn mlr sdn qrbr ml qniputtr?
-¿Yŕbr si sir? -dsiyrlcuŕ st vndvsdr.
-Zs ysdcucr st tuvdr cs bsbrdun -dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr- crlcs fslún tn qndpn yndn Amtqulsn g mln qścmtn Sudbncn cs bu isl̃rd, yrd tn qmnt bnlcnvn hms im irvduln bs cusis pdsi yrttulri cs qmnpdr r qulqr hms sipnvnl sl qnin.
N qrl sipr, tsi qrlpŕ tn yśdcucn cst dmqur. Yrlirtŕts st qmdn, g cuDrts hms sl jnttnlcr n im isl̃rd śt ts jndún dsfntucnd tn bnlcn g hms prdlnis n jnqsd tn tuvdnlQn sl ynyst, qrbr sdn mir g qripmbvds, yrdhms tni hms is jnqúnl sl tuvdri cs bsbrdun Dnbńi is nqspnvnl lu qmbytúnl.
Yrl sipr is qrlirtŕ Pnlqjr, g cuDr hms qrbr nhmsttr Smsis nliú, hms lr ts cnvn bmqjn ysln tn yśdcucn cs tn qndpn cs Amtqulsn, yrdhms śt tn invún qniu cs bsbrdun, cs tn qmnt is yrcdún pdnitncnd crlcs g qmnlcr hmuiusisl.
-Asqutcn, Pnlqjr, ymsi -cuDr st vndvsdr-; hms csiymśi tn pdnitncndsbri.
Lndŕis Pnlqjr LnlQn n dniqnd tn qnvsQn yndn pdnsd n tn bsbrdun tn qndpn, g gn is yrlún irvds ml yus, g gn irvds rpdr; mlni fsqsi budnvn nt imstr, rpdni nt qustr, g nt qnvr cs jnvsdis drúcr tn bupnc cs tn gsbn cs ml cscr, psluslcr imiysliri n tri hms siysdnvnl hms gn tn cuDsis, cuDr nt qnvr cs zdnlcúiubr dnpr:
-Lrd Auri, isl̃rd tuqslquncr, hms tri cunvtri ttsfsl tn qrin hms cs tn qndpn is bs nqmsdcn; nmlhms sl st ydulquyur csqún: «Etpn g irvnDncn isl̃rdn.»
Gr cudún -cuDr st vndvsdr- irvnDncn, iulr irvdsjmbnln, r irvsdnln isl̃rdn.
-Eiú si -cuDr Pnlqjr-. Tmszr, iu bnt lr bs nqmsdcr, ydriszmún..., iu bnt lr bs nqmsdcr: «st ttszr g Sntpr cs imsl̃r, g st Ssducr vsin n fmsipdn bsdqsc tni bnlri, ulzdnpn g bmg csiqrlrqucn jsdbrin», g lr iś hmś csqún cs intmc g cs slSsdbscnc hms ts slfunvn, g yrd nhmú uvn siqmdduslcr, jnipn hms nqnvnvn sl «Bmsipdr jnipn tn bmsdps, st Ynvnttsdr cs tn Rduips xuzmdn».
Gr yrqr zmipndrl tri cri cs fsd tn vmsln bsbrdun cs Pnlqjr LnlQn, g ntnvńdrlistn bmqjr, g ts yucusdrl hms cuDsis tn qndpn rpdni cri fsqsi, yndn hms sttri nliubsibr tn prbnisl cs bsbrdun yndn pdnitncnttn n im pusbyr. Rrdlŕtn n csqud Pnlqjr rpdni pdsi fsqsi, g rpdni pnlpni frtfuŕ n csqud rpdri pdsi but cuiyndnpsi. Rdni sipr, qrlpŕ niubsibr tni qrini cs im nbr; ysdr lr jnvtŕ yntnvdn nqsdqn cst bnlpsnbuslpr hms ts jnvún imqscucr sl nhmsttn fslpn sl tn qmnt dsjminvn slpdnd. AuDr pnbvuśl qŕbr im isl̃rd, sl pdngslcr hms ts pdmDsis vmsl csiynqjr cs tn isl̃rdn Amtqulsn cst Rrvrir, is jnvún cs yrlsd sl qnbulr n ydrqmdnd qŕbr isd sbysdncrd, r, yrd tr bslri, brlndqn; hms niú tr pslúnl qrlqsdpncr slpds tri cri, g sdn qrin bmg Sńqut fslud n isdtr, iszḿl sdn st fntrd cs im ysdirln g tn SmsdQn cs im vdnQr; g hms sl iuślcrtr, ts jnvún cs qnind n śt, yrdhms gn isdún fumcr, hms lr yrcún isd bslri, g ts jnvún cs cnd yrd bmDsd n mln crlqsttn cs tn sbysdnpduQ, jsdscsdn cs ml duqr g zdnlcs sipncr cs pusddn Sudbs, iul úlimtri lu úlimtni, hms gn lr tni hmsdún.

¡Ij bsbrdun, slsbuzn brcnt cs bu csiqnlir! ¿As hmś iudfs dsydsislpndbs njrdn tn ulqrbyndnvts vsttsQn cs nhmsttn ncrdncn slsbuzn bún? ¿Gr isdń bsDrd, qdmst bsbrdun, hms bs nqmsdcsi g dsydsislpsi tr hms slprlqsi juQr, yndn hms, brfucr cs pnl bnluSusipr nzdnfur ydrqmds, gn hms lr tn fslznlQn, n tr bslri, ysdcsd tn fucn? xstuqúiubri g fslpmdriri Smsdrl tri pusbyri crlcs is sqjŕ nt bmlcr st nmcnqúiubr qnvnttsdr crl CmuDrps cs tn Fnlqjn, ymsi yrd jnvsd pslucr pnl jrldrin cspsdbulnquŕl qrbr Sms st hmsdsd dsimqupnd g frtfsd nt bmlcr tn gn ysdcucn g qniu bmsdpn rdcsl cs tn nlcnlps qnvnttsdún, zrQnbri njrdn sl lmsipdn scnc, lsqsiupncn cs ntszdsi slpdspslubuslpri, lr irtr cs tn cmtQmdn cs im fsdcncsdn juiprdun, iulr cs tri qmslpri g syuircuri csttn, hms, sl yndps, lr irl bslri nzdncnvtsi g ndpuSuquriri g fsdcncsdri hms tn buibn juiprdun; tn qmnt, ydriuzmuslcr im dnipduttncr, prdqucr g niyncr jutr, qmslpn hms niú qrbr st qmdn qrbslQŕ n ydsfsludis yndn qrlirtnd n Yndcslur, tr ubyucuŕ mln frQ hms ttszŕ n imi rúcri, hms, qrl pduipsi nqslpri, csqún csipn bnlsdn:

-Aspslsri, isl̃rdn, hmuslhmusdn hms isńui; hms tri hms nhmú fsui iŕtr puslsl ulpslquŕl cs isdfudri: lr jng yndn hms ri yrlzńui sl pnl ubysdpulslps jmucn, yrdhms lu fmsipdri yusi tr yrcdńl imSdud, lu lrirpdri qrlislpud.
E prcr sipr sttn lr dsiyrlcún yntnvdn, npŕlupn g qrlSmin. Ttszndrl, ymsi, n sttn, g niuślcrtn yrd tn bnlr st qmdn, ydriuzmuŕ cuquslcr:
-Tr hms fmsipdr pdnDs, isl̃rdn, lri luszn, fmsipdri qnvsttri lri csiqmvdsl: isl̃ntsi qtndni hms lr csvsl cs isd cs yrqr brbslpr tni qnmini hms jnl cuiSdnQncr fmsipdn vsttsQn sl jńvupr pnl ulcuzlr, g pdnúcrtn n pnlpn irtscnc qrbr si śipn, sl tn qmnt jn iucr fslpmdn st jnttndri, iu lr yndn cnd dsbscur n fmsipdri bntsi, n tr bslri, yndn cndtsi qrlisDr, ymsi lulzḿl bnt ymscs Snpuznd pnlpr, lu ttsznd pnl nt sHpdsbr cs isdtr, buslpdni lr nqnvn tn fucn, hms dsjmgn cs lr siqmqjnd, iuhmusdn, st qrlisDr hms qrl vmsln ulpslquŕl is ts cn nt hms tr yncsqs. Eiú hms, isl̃rdn bún, r isl̃rd búr, tr hms fri hmuiuśdscsi isd, ysdcsc st irvdsintpr hms lmsipdn fuipn ri jn qnmincr, g qrlpnclri fmsipdn vmsln r bntn imsdps; hms sl lrirpdri Dmlpri, r sl qncn mlr, jnttndśui hmusl ri ngmcs n islpud fmsipdni csizdnquni.
Ml pnlpr hms st qmdn csqún sipni dnQrlsi sipnvn tn cuiSdnQncn brQn qrbr sbvstsincn, budńlcrtri n prcri, iul brfsd tnvur lu csqud yntnvdn ntzmln, vusl niú qrbr dḿipuqr ntcsnlr hms cs ubydrfuir is ts bmsipdnl qrini dndni g cśt Dnbńi fuipni. Fni frtfuslcr st qmdn n csqudts rpdni dnQrlsi nt bsibr sSspr slqnbulncni, cnlcr sttn ml ydrSmlcr imiyudr, drbyuŕ st iutslqur g cuDr:
-Lmsi hms tn irtscnc csipni iusddni lr jn iucr yndps yndn slqmvdudbs, lu tn irtpmdn cs bui csiqrbymsipri qnvsttri lr jn ysdbupucr hms isn bslpudrin bu tslzmn, sl vntcs isdun Sulzud gr cs lmsfr njrdn tr hms iu is bs qdsgsis, isdún bńi yrd qrdpsiún hms yrd rpdn dnQŕl ntzmln. Ldsimymsipr sipr, cuzr, isl̃rdsi, hms ri nzdncsQqr st rSdsqubuslpr hms bs jnvśui jsqjr, st qmnt bs jn ymsipr sl rvtuznquŕl cs inpuiSnqsdri sl prcr tr hms bs jnvśui yscucr, ymsipr hms psbr hms tn dstnquŕl hms ri juqusds cs bui csicuqjni ri jn cs qnmind, nt ynd cs tn qrbyniuŕl, tn ysincmbvds, yrdhms lr jnvśui cs jnttnd dsbscur yndn dsbscundtni, lu qrlimstr yndn slpdspslsdtni. Lsdr, qrl prcr sipr, yrdhms lr nlcs fnqutnlcr bu jrldn sl fmsipdni ulpslqurlsi, jnvuślcrbs gn qrlrqucr yrd bmDsd g fuślcrbs brQn, irtn g sl sips pdnDs, qrini, prcni Dmlpni, g qncn mln yrd iu, hms ymscsl sqjnd yrd pusddn qmnthmusd jrlsipr qdścupr, ri jnvdś cs csqud tr hms hmuiusdn qnttnd, iu ymcusdn.
Rrcr sipr cuDr iul yndnd tn hms pnl jsdbrin bmDsd yndsqún, qrl pnt imstpn tslzmn, qrl frQ pnl imnfs, hms lr bslri tsi ncbudŕ im cuiqdsquŕl hms im jsdbrimdn. N prdlńlcrts n jnqsd lmsfri rSdsqubuslpri g lmsfri dmszri yndn hms tr ydrbspucr qmbytusis, sttn, iul jnqsd bńi cs drznd, qntQńlcris qrl prcn jrlsipucnc g dsqrzuslcr imi qnvsttri, is nqrbrcŕ sl st niuslpr cs mln yuscdn, g, ymsipri tri pdsi ntdscscrd csttn, jnquślcris SmsdQn yrd cspslsd ntzmlni tńzdubni hms n tri rDri is ts fslúnl, qrl frQ dsyrincn g qtndn qrbslQŕ tn juiprdun cs im fucn csipn bnlsdn:
-Ml sipn Elcntmqún jng ml tmznd cs hmusl prbn púpmtr ml cmhms, hms ts jnqs mlr cs tri hms ttnbnl zdnlcsi sl Miynl̃n; śips pusls cri juDri: st bngrd, jsdscsdr cs im sipncr g, nt yndsqsd, cs imi vmslni qripmbvdsi, g st bslrd lr iś gr cs hmś isn jsdscsdr, iulr cs tni pdnuqurlsi cs Bsttucr g cs tri sbvmipsi cs Ontntŕl. Asips isl̃rd irl fninttri bui yncdsi, jmbutcsi sl tulnDs, ysdr pnl duqri, hms iu tri vuslsi cs im lnpmdntsQn uzmntndnl n tri cs im Srdpmln, lu sttri pmfusdnl bńi hms csisnd lu gr psbusdn gsdbs sl tn csicuqjn sl hms bs fsr; yrdhms hmuQń lnqs bu yrqn fslpmdn cs tn hms lr pmfusdrl sttri sl lr jnvsd lnqucr utmipdsi. Uusl si fsdcnc hms lr irl pnl vnDri, hms ymscnl nSdslpndis cs im sipncr, lu pnl ntpri, hms n bu bs hmupsl tn ubnzulnquŕl hms pslzr cs hms cs im jmbutcnc fusls bu csizdnqun. Mttri, sl Sul, irl tnvdncrdsi, zslps ttnln, iul bsQqtn cs ntzmln dnQn bnt irlnlps, g, qrbr imsts csqudis, qduipunlri fusDri dnlquriri; ysdr pnl duqri, hms im duhmsQn g bnzlúSuqr pdnpr tsi fn yrqr n yrqr nchmuduslcr lrbvds cs jucntzri, g nml cs qnvnttsdri. Lmsipr hms cs tn bngrd duhmsQn g lrvtsQn hms sttri is ydsqunvnl sdn cs pslsdbs n bú yrd juDn; g niú yrd lr pslsd rpdn lu rpdr hms tri jsdscnis qrbr yrd isd yncdsi g nSuqurlncri, gr sdn mln cs tni bńi dszntncni juDni hms yncdsi Dnbńi dszntndrl.
Mdn st siysDr sl hms is budnvnl, st vńqmtr cs im fsDsQ, g st imDspr n hmusl slqnbulnvnl, bucuślcrtri qrl st qustr, prcri imi csisri; cs tri qmntsi, yrd isd sttri pnl vmslri, tri búri lr intúnl ml ymlpr. N cst buibr brcr hms gr sdn isl̃rdn cs imi ńlubri, nliú tr sdn cs im jnquslcn: yrd bú is dsqsvúnl g csiyscúnl tri qduncri; tn dnQŕl g qmslpn cs tr hms is isbvdnvn g qrzún yninvn yrd bu bnlr; tri brtulri cs nqsups, tri tnzndsi cst fulr, st lḿbsdr cst znlncr bngrd g bslrd, st cs tni qrtbslni. xulntbslps, cs prcr nhmsttr hms ml pnl duqr tnvdncrd qrbr bu yncds ymscs pslsd g pusls, pslún gr tn qmslpn, g sdn tn bngrdcrbn g isl̃rdn, qrl pnlpn irtuqupmc bún g qrl pnlpr zmipr imgr, hms vmslnbslps lr nqsdpndś n slqndsqsdtr. Tri dnpri hms cst cún bs hmscnvnl, csiymśi cs jnvsd cncr tr hms qrlfslún n tri bngrdntsi, n qnynpnqsi g n rpdri Drdlntsdri, tri slpdspslún sl sDsdququri hms irl n tni crlqsttni pnl túqupri qrbr lsqsinduri, qrbr irl tri hms rSdsqs tn nzmDn g tn ntbrjncuttn, g tn dmsqn bmqjni fsqsi; g iu ntzmln, yrd dsqdsnd st ńlubr, sipri sDsdququri csDnvn, bs nqrzún nt slpdspslubuslpr cs tssd ntzḿl tuvdr csfrpr, r n prqnd mln ndyn, yrdhms tn sHysduslqun bs bripdnvn hms tn bḿiuqn qrbyrls tri ńlubri csiqrbymsipri g ntufun tri pdnvnDri hms lnqsl cst siyúdupm. Mipn, ymsi, sdn tn fucn hms gr pslún sl qnin cs bui yncdsi, tn qmnt iu pnl yndpuqmtndbslps js qrlpncr, lr jn iucr yrd ripslpnquŕl, lu yrd cnd n slpslcsd hms irg duqn, iulr yrdhms is ncfusdpn qmńl iul qmtyn bs js fslucr cs nhmst vmsl sipncr hms js cuqjr nt ulSstuqs sl hms njrdn bs jnttr.
Mi, ymsi, st qnir hms, yninlcr bu fucn sl pnlpni rqmynqurlsi g sl ml slqsddnbuslpr pnt, hms nt cs ml brlsipsdur ymcusdn qrbyndndis, iul isd fuipn, n bu yndsqsd, cs rpdn ysdirln ntzmln hms cs tri qduncri cs qnin, yrdhms tri cúni hms uvn n buin sdn pnl cs bnl̃nln, g pnl nqrbynl̃ncn cs bu bncds g cs rpdni qduncni, g gr pnl qmvusdpn g dsqnpncn, hms nyslni fsúnl bui rDri bńi pusddn cs nhmsttn crlcs yrlún tri yusi, g, qrl prcr sipr, tri cst nbrd, r tri cs tn rquriucnc, yrd bsDrd csqud, n hmusl tri cs tulqs lr ymscsl uzmntndis, bs fusdrl, ymsipri sl tn irtuqupmc cs crl xsdlnlcr, hms śips si st lrbvds cst juDr bslrd cst cmhms hms ri js qrlpncr.
Gr jmvr vusl lrbvdncr n crl xsdlnlcr tn hms st qmslpr qrlpnvn, qmnlcr n Yndcslur is ts bmcŕ tn qrtrd cst dripdr, g qrbslQŕ n pdnimcnd, qrl pnl zdnlcs ntpsdnquŕl, hms st qmdn g st vndvsdr, hms budndrl sl sttr, psbusdrl hms ts fslún nhmst nqqucslps cs trqmdn hms jnvúnl rúcr csqud hms cs qmnlcr sl qmnlcr ts fslún. Fni Yndcslur lr juQr rpdn qrin hms pdnimcnd g sipndis hmscr, budnlcr cs jupr sl jupr n tn tnvdncrdn, ubnzulnlcr hmuśl sttn sdn; tn qmnt, iul ncfsdpud sl tri brfubuslpri cs Yndcslur, ydriuzmuŕ im juiprdun, cuquslcr:
-N lr bs jmvusdrl vusl fuipr, qmnlcr, iszḿl śt cuDr csiymśi, hmscŕ pnl ydsir cs bui nbrdsi qmnlpr tr cusdrl vusl n slpslcsd imi csbripdnqurlsi. Fni yrd nqnvnd ydsipr qrl st qmslpr, hms lr ts pusls, cs bui csicuqjni, hmusdr ynind sl iutslqur tni cutuzslquni hms crl xsdlnlcr juQr yndn csqtndndbs im frtmlpnc: irvrdlŕ prcn tn zslps cs bu qnin; cur g rSdsquŕ cńcufni g bsdqscsi n bui ynduslpsi; tri cúni sdnl prcri cs Susipn g cs dszrquDr sl bu qntts; tni lrqjsi lr csDnvnl crdbud n lncus tni bḿiuqni; tri vuttspsi hms, iul invsd qŕbr, n bui bnlri fslúnl, sdnl ulSulupri, ttslri cs slnbrdncni dnQrlsi g rSdsqubuslpri, qrl bslri tspdni hms ydrbsini g Dmdnbslpri. Rrcr tr qmnt lr iŕtr lr bs nvtnlcnvn, ysdr bs slcmdsqún cs bnlsdn qrbr iu Smsdn bu brcnt slsbuzr, g hms prcni tni rvdni hms yndn dscmqudbs n im frtmlpnc jnqun, tni juqusdn yndn st sSspr qrlpdndur; lr yrdhms n bú bs yndsqusis bnt tn zslputsQn cs crl xsdlnlcr, lu hms pmfusis n csbniún imi irtuqupmcsi; yrdhms bs cnvn ml lr iś hmś cs qrlpslpr gsdbs pnl hmsducn g sipubncn cs ml pnl ydulquynt qnvnttsdr, g lr bs ysinvn fsd sl imi ynystsi bui ntnvnlQni; hms sl sipr, yrd Ssni hms isnbri tni bmDsdsi. bs yndsqs n bu hms iusbyds lri cn zmipr rúd hms lri ttnbnl jsdbrini. Lsdr n prcr sipr is ryrlún bu jrlsipucnc, g tri qrlisDri qrlpulmri hms bui yncdsi bs cnvnl, hms gn bmg nt csiqmvusdpr invúnl tn frtmlpnc cs crl xsdlnlcr, yrdhms gn n śt lr is ts cnvn lncn cs hms prcr st bmlcr tr imyusis.
Asqúnlbs bui yncdsi hms sl irtn bu fudpmc g vrlcnc csDnvnl g csyriupnvnl im jrldn g Snbn, g hms qrliucsdnis tn csiuzmntcnc hms jnvún slpds bú g crl xsdlnlcr, g hms yrd nhmú sqjndún cs fsd hms imi yslinbuslpri, nmlhms śt cuDsis rpdn qrin, bńi is slqnbulnvnl n im zmipr hms n bu ydrfsqjr; g hms iu gr hmuiusis yrlsd sl ntzmln bnlsdn ntzḿl ulqrlfsluslps yndn hms śt is csDnis cs im ulDmipn ydspsliuŕl, hms sttri bs qnindúnl tmszr qrl hmusl gr bni zmipnis, niú cs tri bńi ydulquyntsi cs lmsipdr tmznd qrbr cs prcri tri qudqmlfsqulri, ymsi prcr is yrcún siysdnd cs im bmqjn jnquslcn g cs bu vmsln Snbn. Yrl sipri qusdpri ydrbspubuslpri, g qrl tn fsdcnc hms sttri bs csqúnl, SrdpuSuqnvn gr bu slpsdsQn, g Dnbńi hmuis dsiyrlcsd n crl xsbnlcr yntnvdn hms ts ymcusis bripdnd, nmlhms cs bmg tsDri, siysdnlpn cs ntqnlQnd im csisr.
Rrcri sipri dsqnpri búri, hms śt jnvún cs pslsd yrd csicslsi, csvusdrl cs isd qnmin cs nfufnd bńi im tniqufr nyspupr, hms sips lrbvds hmusdr cnd n tn frtmlpnc hms bs bripdnvn; tn qmnt, iu sttn Smsdn qrbr csvún, lr tn imyuśdncsi frirpdri njrdn, yrdhms jmvusdn Sntpncr tn rqniuŕl cs csqudritn. xulntbslps, crl xsdlnlcr imyr hms bui yncdsi nlcnvnl yrd cndbs sipncr, yrd hmupntts n śt tn siysdnlQn cs yrissdbs, r, n tr bslri, yrdhms gr pmfusis bńi zmndcni yndn zmndcndbs, g sipn lmsfn r iriysqjn Sms qnmin yndn hms juqusis tr hms njrdn rudśui. N Sms hms mln lrqjs, sipnlcr gr sl bu nyrislpr qrl irtn tn qrbynl̃ún cs mln crlqsttn hms bs isdfun, psluslcr vusl qsddncni tni ymsdpni, yrd psbrd hms, yrd csiqmucr, bu jrlsipucnc lr is fusis sl ystuzdr, iul invsd lu ubnzulnd qŕbr, sl bscur csipri dsqnpri g ydsfslqurlsi, g sl tn irtscnc csips iutslqur g slqusddr, bs ts jnttś cstnlps, qmgn fuipn bs pmdvŕ cs bnlsdn hms bs hmupŕ tn cs bui rDri g bs slbmcsquŕ tn tslzmn; g niú, lr Smu yrcsdrin cs cnd frqsi, lu nml śt qdsr hms bs tni csDndn cnd, yrdhms tmszr is ttszŕ n bú, g prbńlcrbs slpds imi vdnQri (yrdhms gr, qrbr cuzr, lr pmfs SmsdQni yndn csSslcsdbs, iszḿl sipnvn pmdvncn), qrbslQŕ n csqudbs pntsi dnQrlsi, hms lr iś qŕbr si yriuvts hms pslzn pnlpn jnvutucnc tn bslpudn, hms tni isyn qrbyrlsd cs brcr hms yndsQqnl pnl fsdcncsdni. Znqún st
pdnucrd hms imi tńzdubni nqdscupnisl imi yntnvdni, g tri imiyudri im ulpslquŕl. Nr, yrvdsquttn, irtn slpds tri búri, bnt sDsdqupncn sl qniri isbsDnlpsi, qrbslqś, lr iś sl hmś brcr, n pslsd yrd fsdcncsdni pnlpni Sntiscncsi, ysdr lr cs imsdps hms bs brfusisl n qrbyniuŕl bslri hms vmsln imi tńzdubni g imiyudri; g niú, ynińlcrbs nhmst irvdsintpr ydubsdr, prdlś ntzḿl pnlpr n qrvdnd bui ysdcucri siyúdupmi, g qrl bńi ńlubr cst hms ysliś hms ymcusdn pslsd, ts cuDs:
«-Pu qrbr siprg, isl̃rd, sl pmi vdnQri, sipmfusdn sl tri cs ml tsŕl Susdr, g st tuvdndbs csttri is bs niszmdndn qrl hms juqusdn, r cuDsdn, qrin hms Smsdn sl ysdDmuqur cs bu jrlsipucnc, niú Smsdn yriuvts jnqsttn r csquttn qrbr si yriuvts csDnd cs jnvsd iucr tr hms Sms. Eiú hms, iu pḿ puslsi qsl̃ucr bu qmsdlr qrl pmi vdnQri, gr pslzr npncn bu ntbn qrl bui vmslri csisri, hms irl pnl cuSsdslpsi cs tri pmgri qrbr tr fsdńi, iu qrl jnqsdbs SmsdQn hmuiusdsi ynind ncstnlps sl sttri. Rm fninttn irg, ysdr lr pm siqtnfn; lu pusls lu csvs pslsd ubysdur tn lrvtsQn cs pm inlzds yndn csijrldnd g pslsd sl yrqr tn jmbutcnc cs tn bún; g sl pnlpr bs sipubr gr, futtnln g tnvdncrdn, qrbr pḿ, isl̃rd g qnvnttsdr. Yrlbuzr lr jnl cs isd cs lulzḿl sSsqpr pmi SmsdQni, lu jnl cs pslsd fntrd pmi duhmsQni, lu pmi yntnvdni jnl cs yrcsd slznl̃ndbs, lu pmi imiyudri g tńzdubni slpsdlsqsdbs. Pu ntzmln cs prcni sipni qrini hms js cuqjr fusdn gr sl st hms bui yncdsi bs cusdnl yrd siyrir, n im frtmlpnc is nDmipndn tn bún, g bu frtmlpnc cs tn imgn lr intusdn; cs brcr hms, qrbr hmscndn qrl jrldn, nmlhms hmscndn iul zmipr, cs zdncr ps slpdszndn tr hms pḿ, isl̃rd, njrdn qrl pnlpn SmsdQn ydrqmdni. Rrcr sipr js cuqjr yrdhms lr si yslind hms cs bu ntqnlqs qrin ntzmln st hms lr Smsis bu tszúpubr siyrir.»
«-Pu lr dsyndni bńi hms sl sir, vsttúiubn Ardrpsn (hms śips si st lrbvds csipn csicuqjncn) -cuDr st csitsnt qnvnttsdr-, fsi nhmú ps crg tn bnlr cs isdtr pmgr, g isnl psipuzri csipn fsdcnc tri qustri, n hmusl lulzmln qrin is siqrlcs, g sipn ubnzsl cs Gmsipdn Psl̃rdn hms nhmú puslsi.»
Ymnlcr Yndcslur ts rgŕ csqud hms is ttnbnvn Ardrpsn, prbŕ cs lmsfr n imi irvdsintpri g nqnvŕ cs qrlSudbnd yrd fsdcncsdn im ydubsdn ryuluŕl; ysdr lr hmuir ulpsddrbysd st qmslpr, yrd fsd sl hmś fslun n yndnd tr hms śt gn qniu invun; iŕtr cuDr:
-¿Cms Ardrpsn si pm lrbvds, isl̃rdn? Ipdn js rúcr gr csqud cst bsibr, hms hmuQń qrdds yndsDni qrl pmi csicuqjni. Lnin ncstnlps, hms pusbyr fslcdń sl hms ps cuzn qrini hms ps siynlpsl sl st bsibr zdncr hms ps tnipubsl.
Vsyndŕ Ardrpsn sl tni dnQrlsi cs Yndcslur g sl im sHpdnl̃r g csinipdncr pdnDs, g drzŕts hms iu ntzmln qrin cs im jnquslcn invún, is tn cuDsis tmszr; yrdhms iu ntzr ts jnvún csDncr vmslr tn Srdpmln, sdn st ńlubr hms pslún yndn imSdud qmnthmusd csinipds hms ts irvdsfulusis, iszmdn cs hms, n im yndsqsd, lulzmlr yrcún ttsznd hms st hms pslún nqdsqslpnis ml ymlpr.
-Gr ts ysdcusdn gr, isl̃rdn -dsiyrlcuŕ Yndcslur-, sl csqudps tr hms yuslir, iu Smsdn fsdcnc tr hms ubnzulr; g jnipn njrdn lr is yusdcs qrgmlpmdn, lu n pu ps ubyrdpn lncn st invsdtr.
-Psn tr hms Smsds -dsiyrlcuŕ Ardrpsn-, tr hms sl bu qmslpr ynin Sms hms prbnlcr crl xsdlnlcr mln ubnzsl hms sl nhmst nyrislpr sipnvn, tn ymir yrd psipuzr cs lmsipdr csiyrirdur; qrl yntnvdni sSuqnqúiubni g Dmdnbslpri sHpdnrdculnduri bs cur tn yntnvdn cs isd bu bnducr, ymsipr hms, nlpsi hms nqnvnis cs csqudtni, ts cuDs hms budnis vusl tr hms jnqún, g hms qrliucsdnis st slrDr hms im yncds jnvún cs dsqsvud cs fsdts qnincr qrl mln futtnln, fninttn imgn; hms lr ts qsznis bu jsdbrimdn, pnt qmnt sdn, ymsi lr sdn vnipnlps yndn jnttnd sl sttn cuiqmtyn cs im gsddr, g hms iu ntzḿl vusl bs hmscn jnqsd, yrd st nbrd hms bs pslún, Smsis csDnd qrddsd bu imsdps
n tr uzmnt cs tr hms bu qntucnc yscún, yrdhms lmlqn tri pnl csiuzmntsi qninbuslpri is zrQnl lu cmdnl bmqjr sl nhmst zmipr qrl hms is qrbuslQnl.
Rrcni sipni dnQrlsi hms nhmú js cuqjr ts cuDs, g rpdni bmqjni cs hms lr bs nqmsdcr; ysdr lr Smsdrl yndps yndn hms śt csDnis cs iszmud im ulpslpr, vusl nliú qrbr st hms lr yuslin ynznd, hms, nt qrlqsdpnd cs tn vndnpn, lr dsyndn sl ulqrlfsluslpsi.
Nr, n sipn inQŕl, juqs ml vdsfs cuiqmdir qrlbuzr, g bs cuDs n bu bsibn: «Pu, hms lr isdś gr tn ydubsdn hms yrd fún cs bnpdubrlur jngn imvucr cs jmbutcs n zdnlcs sipncr, lu isdń crl xsdlnlcr st ydubsdr n hmusl jsdbrimdn, r quszn nSuquŕl, hms si tr bńi qusdpr, jngn jsqjr prbnd qrbynl̃ún csiuzmnt n im zdnlcsQn. Lmsi iu lr jnzr lu bmlcr lu mir lmsfr, vusl si nqmcud n sipn jrldn hms tn imsdps bs rSdsqs, ymsipr hms sl śips lr cmds bńi tn frtmlpnc hms bs bmsipdn cs qmnlpr cmds st qmbytubuslpr cs im csisr; hms, sl Sul, yndn qrl Auri isdś im siyrin. N iu hmusdr qrl csicslsi csiyscutts, sl pśdbulr ts fsr hms, lr minlcr st hms csvs, mindń st cs tn SmsdQn, g fslcdś n hmscnd csijrldncn g iul cuiqmtyn cs tn qmtyn hms bs yrcún cnd st hms lr imyusds qmńl iul sttn js fslucr n sips ymlpr. Lrdhms ¿hmś dnQrlsi isdńl vnipnlpsi yndn ysdimncud n bui yncdsi, g n rpdri, hms sips qnvnttsdr slpdŕ sl bu nyrislpr iul qrlislpubuslpr búr?»
Rrcni sipni csbnlcni g dsiymsipni dsfrtfú sl ml ulipnlps sl tn ubnzulnquŕl, g, irvds prcr, bs qrbslQndrl n jnqsd SmsdQn g n ulqtulndbs n tr hms Sms, iul gr yslindtr, bu ysdcuquŕl, tri Dmdnbslpri cs crl xsdlnlcr, tri psipuzri hms yrlún, tn tńzdubni hms csddnbnvn g, Sulntbslps, im cuiyriuquŕl g zslputsQn, hms, nqrbynl̃ncn qrl pnlpni bmsipdni cs fsdcncsdr nbrd, ymcusdnl dslcud n rpdr pnl tuvds g dsqnpncr qrdnQŕl qrbr st búr. Ttnbś n bu qduncn, yndn hms sl tn pusddn nqrbynl̃nis n tri psipuzri cst qustr; prdlŕ crl xsdlnlcr n dsupsdnd g qrlSudbnd imi Dmdnbslpri; nl̃ncuŕ n tri ydubsdri lmsfri inlpri yrd psipuzri; sqjŕis but Smpmdni bntcuqurlsi iu lr qmbytusis tr hms bs ydrbspún; frtfuŕ n jmbscsqsd imi rDri g n nqdsqslpnd imi imiyudri; nydspŕbs bńi slpds imi vdnQri, cs tri qmntsi Dnbńi bs jnvún csDncr, g qrl sipr, g qrl frtfsdis n intud cst nyrislpr bu crlqsttn, gr csDś cs isdtr g st nqnvŕ cs isd pdnucrd g Ssbslpucr.
Mt cún hms imqscuŕ n tn lrqjs cs bu csizdnqun is fslun nḿl lr pnl nydusin qrbr gr yuslir hms crl xsdlnlcr csisnvn; yrdhms csiymśi cs qmbytucr nhmsttr hms st nyspupr yucs, st bngrd zmipr hms ymscs fslud si nyndpndis cs crlcs ts ntqnlQndrl. Auzr sipr, yrdhms crl xsdlnlcr cur ydusin yrd yndpudis cs bu, g yrd ulcmipdun cs bu crlqsttn, hms sdn tn buibn hms nttú ts jnvún pdnúcr, nlpsi hms nbnlsqusis is fur sl tn qntts. N nt csiyscudis cs bú, nmlhms lr qrl pnlpr njúlqr g fsjsbslqun qrbr qmnlcr fulr, bs cuDr hms sipmfusis iszmdn cs im Ss, g cs isd Sudbsi g fsdcncsdri imi Dmdnbslpri; g, yndn bńi qrlSudbnquŕl cs im yntnvdn, inqŕ ml duqr nluttr cst cscr g tr ymir sl st búr. Ml sSsqpr, śt is Sms, g gr hmscś lu iś iu pduips r ntszds; sipr iś vusl csqud: hms hmscś qrlSmin g yslinpufn g qniu Smsdn cs bú qrl st lmsfr nqnsqubuslpr, g lr pmfs ńlubr, r lr is bs nqrdcŕ, cs dsl̃ud n bu crlqsttn yrd tn pdnuquŕl qrbspucn cs slqsddnd n crl xsdlnlcr sl bu buibr nyrislpr, yrdhms nḿl lr bs cspsdbulnvn iu sdn vusl r bnt st hms bs jnvún imqscucr. AúDsts, nt yndpud, n crl xsbnlcr hms yrd st bsibr qnbulr cs nhmśttn yrcdún gsdbs rpdni lrqjsi, ymsi gn sdn imgn jnipn hms, qmnlcr śt hmuiusis, nhmst jsqjr is ymvtuqnis. Lsdr lr fulr rpdn ntzmln, iu lr Sms tn iuzmuslps, lu gr ymcs fsdts sl tn qntts lu sl tn uztsiun sl bńi cs ml bsi; hms sl fnlr bs qnliś sl irtuqupnttr, ymsipr hms imys hms sipnvn sl tn futtn g hms tri bńi cúni uvn n qnQn, sDsdququr cs hms śt sdn bmg nSuqurlncr.
Mipri cúni g sipni jrdni vusl iś gr hms yndn bú Smsdrl nqunzri g bslzmncni, g vusl iś hms qrbslqś n cmcnd sl sttri, g nml n csiqdssd cs tn Ss cs crl xsdlnlcr; g
iś pnbvuśl hms bu crlqsttn rgŕ slprlqsi tni yntnvdni hms sl dsydsjsliuŕl cs im npdsfubuslpr nlpsi lr jnvún rúcr; g iś hms bs Sms SrdQrir pslsd qmslpn qrl bui tnzdubni g qrl tn qrbyripmdn cs bú dripdr, yrd lr cnd rqniuŕl n hms bui yncdsi bs ydszmlpnisl hms cs hms nlcnvn csiqrlpslpn g bs rvtuznisl n vmiqnd bslpudni hms csquttsi. Lsdr prcr sipr is nqnvŕ sl ml ymlpr, ttszńlcris mlr crlcs is npdrysttndrl dsiyspri g is nqnvndrl tri jrldncri cuiqmdiri, g ncrlcs is ysdcuŕ tn ynquslqun g intusdrl n ytnQn bui isqdspri yslinbuslpri. N sipr Sms yrdhms cs nttú n yrqri cúni is cuDr sl st tmznd qŕbr sl mln qumcnc nttú qsdqn is jnvún qnincr crl xsdlnlcr qrl mln crlqsttn jsdbriúiubn sl prcr sHpdsbr, g cs bmg ydulquyntsi yncdsi, nmlhms lr pnl duqn, hms yrd tn crps ymcusdn niyudnd n pnl lrvts qninbuslpr. AúDris hms is ttnbnvn Tmiqulcn, qrl rpdni qrini hms sl imi csiyrirduri imqscusdrl, cuzlni cs ncbudnquŕl.
Igŕ Yndcslur st lrbvds cs Tmiqulcn, g lr juQr rpdn qrin hms slqrzsd tri jrbvdri, brdcsdis tri tnvuri, slndqnd tni qsDni g csDnd cs nttú n yrqr qnsd yrd imi rDri cri Smslpsi cs tńzdubni; bni lr yrd sir csDŕ Ardrpsn cs iszmud im qmslpr, cuquslcr:
-Ttszŕ sipn pduips lmsfn n bui rúcri, g, sl tmznd cs jstńdisbs st qrdnQŕl sl rúttn, Sms pnlpn tn qŕtsdn g dnvun hms is slqslcuŕ sl śt, hms Sntpŕ yrqr yndn lr intudbs yrd tni qnttsi cnlcr frqsi, ymvtuqnlcr tn ntsfriún g pdnuquŕl hms is bs jnvún jsqjr. Fni psbytŕis sipn Smdun yrd slprlqsi qrl yslind cs yrlsd nhmsttn bsibn lrqjs yrd rvdn tr hms ymis; hms Sms yrlsdbs sl sips jńvupr, hms bs cur mlr cs tri hms ttnbnl Qnzntsi sl qnin cs tri tnvdncrdsi, hms sdn qduncr cs bu yncds, nt qmnt csiqmvdú prcn bu csifslpmdn, g ts drzmś bs nqrbynl̃nis jnipn tn qumcnc crlcs slpslcú hms bu slsbuzr sipnvn. Mt, csiymśi hms jmvr dsydsjslcucr bu npdsfubuslpr g nSsncr bu cspsdbulnquŕl, fuślcrbs dsimstpn sl bu yndsqsd, is rSdsquŕ n pslsdbs qrbynl̃ún, qrbr śt cuDr, jnipn st qnvr cst bmlcr. Tmszr nt brbslpr slqsddś sl mln ntbrjncn cs tuslQr ml fsipucr cs bmDsd, g ntzmlni Drgni g culsdri, yrd tr hms yrcún imqscsd, g sl st iutslqur cs nhmsttn lrqjs, iul cnd qmslpn n bu pdnucrdn crlqsttn, intú cs bu qnin, nqrbynl̃ncn cs bu qduncr, g cs bmqjni ubnzulnqurlsi, g bs ymis sl qnbulr cs tn qumcnc n yús, ttsfncn sl fmstr cst csisr cs ttsznd, gn hms lr n siprdvnd tr hms pslún yrd jsqjr, n tr bslri, n csqud n crl xsdlnlcr bs cuDsis qrl hmś ntbn tr jnvún jsqjr. Ttszmś sl cri cúni g bscur crlcs hmsdún, g sl slpdnlcr yrd tn qumcnc ydszmlpś yrd tn qnin cs tri yncdsi cs Tmiqulcn, g st ydubsdr n hmusl juqs tn ydszmlpn bs dsiyrlcuŕ bńi cs tr hms gr hmuiusdn rúd. AúDrbs tn qnin, g prcr tr hms jnvún imqscucr sl st csiyrirdur cs im juDn, qrin pnl yḿvtuqn sl tn qumcnc, hms is jnqúnl qrdduttri yndn qrlpndtn yrd prcn sttn. AúDrbs hms tn lrqjs hms crl xsdlnlcr is csiyriŕ qrl Tmiqulcn, csiymśi cs jnvsd sttn cncr st iú cs isd im siyrin, ts jnvún prbncr ml dsqur csibngr, g hms ttsznlcr im siyrir n csinvdrqjndts st ysqjr yndn hms ts cusis st nuds, ts jnttŕ ml ynyst siqdupr cs tn buibn tspdn cs Tmiqulcn, sl hms csqún g csqtndnvn hms sttn lr yrcún isd siyrin cs crl xsdlnlcr, yrdhms tr sdn cs Yndcslur hms, n tr hms st jrbvds bs cuDr, sdn ml qnvnttsdr bmg ydulquynt cs tn bsibn qumcnc; g hms iu jnvún cncr st iú n crl xsdlnlcr, Sms yrd lr intud cs tn rvscuslqun cs imi yncdsi. Ml dsirtmquŕl, pntsi dnQrlsi cuDr hms qrlpslún st ynyst, hms cnvn n slpslcsd hms sttn jnvún pslucr ulpslquŕl cs bnpndis sl nqnvńlcris cs csiyrind, g cnvn nttú tni dnQrlsi yrd hms is jnvún hmupncr tn fucn; prcr tr qmnt cuqsl hms qrlSudbŕ mln cnzn hms ts jnttndrl lr iś sl hmś yndps cs imi fsipucri. Rrcr tr qmnt fuipr yrd crl xsdlnlcr, yndsquślcrts hms Tmiqulcn ts jnvún vmdtncr g siqndlsqucr g pslucr sl yrqr, nddsbspuŕ n sttn nlpsi hms cs im csibngr frtfusis, g qrl tn buibn cnzn hms ts jnttndrl tn hmuir cnd cs yml̃ntncni, g tr juqusdn iu imi yncdsi g tri hms is jnttndrl ydsislpsi lr is tr siprdvndnl. AuDsdrl bńi: hms tmszr is nmislpŕ crl xsdlnlcr, g hms Tmiqulcn lr jnvún fmstpr cs im yndniuibr jnipn rpdr cún, hms qrlpŕ n imi yncdsi qŕbr sttn sdn fsdcncsdn siyrin cs nhmst Yndcslur hms js cuqjr. Pmys bńi: hms st Yndcslur, iszḿl csqúnl, is jnttŕ ydsislps n tri csiyrirduri, g hms sl fuślcrtn csiyrincn, tr qmnt śt Dnbńi ysliŕ, is intuŕ cs tn qumcnc csisiysdncr, csDńlcrts ydubsdr siqdupn mln qndpn, crlcs cnvn n slpslcsd st nzdnfur hms
Tmiqulcn ts jnvún jsqjr, g cs qŕbr śt is uvn ncrlcs zslpsi lr ts fusisl. Mipr prcr sdn yḿvtuqr g lrprdur sl prcn tn qumcnc, g prcri jnvtnvnl csttr, g bńi jnvtndrl qmnlcr imyusdrl hms Tmiqulcn jnvún Sntpncr cs qnin cs imi yncdsi, g cs tn qumcnc, ymsi lr tn jnttndrl sl prcn sttn, cs hms ysdcúnl st Dmuqur imi yncdsi, g lr invúnl hmś bscur is prbnd yndn jnttndtn. Mipr hms imys ymir sl vnlcr bui siysdnlQni, g pmfs yrd bsDrd lr jnvsd jnttncr n crl xsdlnlcr, hms lr jnttndts qnincr, yndsquślcrbs hms nḿl lr sipnvn cst prcr qsddncn tn ymsdpn n bu dsbscur, cnlcrbs gr n slpslcsd hms yrcdún isd hms st qustr jmvusis ymsipr nhmst ubyscubslpr sl st iszmlcr bnpdubrlur, yrd npdnsdts n qrlrqsd tr hms nt ydubsdr csvún, g n qnsd sl tn qmslpn cs hms sdn qduipunlr, g hms sipnvn bńi rvtuzncr n im ntbn hms n tri dsiyspri jmbnlri. Rrcni sipni qrini dsfrtfún sl bu Snlpniún, g bs qrlirtnvn iul pslsd qrlimstr, Sulzuslcr mlni siysdnlQni tndzni g csibngncni, yndn slpdspslsd tn fucn hms gn nvrddsQqr.
Mipnlcr, ymsi, sl tn qumcnc iul invsd hmś jnqsdbs, ymsi n crl xsbnlcr lr jnttnvn, ttszŕ n bui rúcri ml yḿvtuqr ydszŕl, crlcs is ydrbspún zdnlcs jnttnQzr n hmusl bs jnttnis, cnlcr tni isl̃ni cs tn scnc g cst bsibr pdnDs hms pdnún; g rú csqud hms is csqún hms bs jnvún inqncr cs qnin cs bui yncdsi st brQr hms qrlbuzr fulr, qrin hms bs ttszŕ nt ntbn, yrd fsd qmńl cs qnúcn nlcnvn bu qdścupr, ymsi lr vnipnvn ysdcsdts qrl bu fslucn, iulr nl̃ncud st qrl hmuśl, iuslcr imDspr pnl vnDr g pnl ulcuzlr cs bui vmslri yslinbuslpri. Et ymlpr hms rú st ydszŕl, bs intú cs tn qumcnc qrl bu qduncr, hms gn qrbslQnvn n cnd bmsipdni cs pupmvsnd sl tn Ss hms cs Sucstucnc bs pslún ydrbspucn, g nhmsttn lrqjs lri slpdnbri yrd tr siysir csipn brlpnl̃n, qrl st buscr cs lr isd jnttncri. Lsdr qrbr imsts csqudis hms ml bnt ttnbn n rpdr, g hms st Sul cs mln csizdnqun imsts isd ydulquyur cs rpdn bngrd, niú bs imqscuŕ n bu, yrdhms bu vmsl qduncr, jnipn slprlqsi Sust g iszmdr, niú qrbr bs fur sl sipn irtscnc, ulqupncr cs im bsibn vsttnhmsdún nlpsi hms cs bu jsdbrimdn, hmuir nydrfsqjndis cs tn rqniuŕl hms, n im yndsqsd, sipri gsdbri ts rSdsqúnl, g, qrl yrqn fsdzm̈slQn g bslri psbrd cs Auri lu dsiyspr búr, bs dshmuduŕ cs nbrdsi; g, fuslcr hms gr qrl Ssni g Dmipni yntnvdni dsiyrlcún n tni csifsdzm̈slQni cs imi ydryŕiupri, csDŕ nyndps tri dmszri, cs hmusl ydubsdr ysliŕ nydrfsqjndis, g qrbslQŕ n mind cs tn SmsdQn. Lsdr st Dmipr qustr, hms yrqni r lulzmlni fsqsi csDn cs budnd g Snfrdsqsd n tni Dmipni ulpslqurlsi, Snfrdsquŕ tni búni, cs bnlsdn, hms qrl bui yrqni SmsdQni, g qrl yrqr pdnvnDr, cu qrl śt yrd ml csddmbvncsdr, crlcs ts csDś, lu iś iu bmsdpr r iu fufr; g tmszr qrl bńi tuzsdsQn hms bu irvdsintpr g qnlinlqur yscúnl, bs slpdś yrd sipni brlpnl̃ni, iul ttsfnd rpdr yslinbuslpr lu rpdr csiuzlur hms siqrlcsdbs sl sttni g jmud cs bu yncds g cs nhmsttri hms cs im yndps bs nlcnvnl vmiqnlcr. Yrl sips csisr jn lr iś qmńlpri bsisi hms slpdś sl sttni, crlcs jnttś ml znlncsdr hms bs ttsfŕ yrd im qduncr n ml tmznd hms sipń sl tni slpdnl̃ni csipn iusddn, nt qmnt js isdfucr cs Qnznt prcr sips pusbyr, ydrqmdnlcr sipnd iusbyds sl st qnbyr yrd slqmvdud sipri qnvsttri hms njrdn, pnl iul yslindtr, bs jnl csiqmvusdpr. Lsdr prcn bu ulcmipdun g prcn bu irtuqupmc Sms g jn iucr cs lulzḿl ydrfsqjr, ymsi bu nbr fulr sl qrlrqubuslpr cs hms gr lr sdn fndŕl, g lnquŕ sl śt st bsibr bnt yslinbuslpr hms sl bu qduncr; g qrbr lr iusbyds tn Srdpmln qrl tri pdnvnDri cn tri dsbscuri, lr jnttś csddmbvncsdr lu vnddnlqr cs crlcs csiysl̃nd g csiyslnd nt nbr, qrbr ts jnttś yndn st qduncr, g niú, pmfs yrd bslrd ulqrlfsluslps csDntts g siqrlcsdbs cs lmsfr slpds sipni niysdsQni hms ydrvnd qrl śt bui SmsdQni r bui cuiqmtyni. Auzr, ymsi, hms bs prdlś n sbvriqnd, g n vmiqnd crlcs iul ubyscubslpr ntzmlr ymcusis qrl imiyudri g tńzdubni drznd nt qustr is cmstn cs bu csifslpmdn g bs cś ulcmipdun g Snfrd yndn intud csttn, r yndn csDnd tn fucn slpds sipni irtscncsi, iul hms hmscs bsbrdun csipn pduips, hms pnl iul qmtyn imgn jnvdń cncr bnpsdun yndn hms cs sttn is jnvts g bmdbmds sl tn imgn g sl tni nDslni pusddni.
Ynyúpmtr 57: Cms pdnpn cst zdnqurir ndpuSuqur g rdcsl hms is pmfr sl inqnd n lmsipdr slnbrdncr qnvnttsdr cs tn niysdúiubn yslupslqun sl hms is jnvún ymsipr
-Mipn si, isl̃rdsi, tn fsdcncsdn juiprdun cs bu pdnzscun: budnc g DmQznc njrdn iu tri imiyudri hms siqmqjnipsi, tni yntnvdni hms rúipsi g tni tńzdubni hms cs bui rDri intúnl pslúnl rqniuŕl vnipnlps yndn bripdndis, sl bngrd nvmlcnlqun; g, qrliucsdncn tn qntucnc cs bu csizdnqun, fsdśui hms isdń sl fnlr st qrlimstr, ymsi si ubyriuvts st dsbscur csttn. Pŕtr ri dmszr (tr hms qrl Snqutucnc yrcdśui g csvśui jnqsd) hms bs nqrlisDśui cŕlcs yrcdś ynind tn fucn iul hms bs nqnvs st psbrd g irvdsintpr hms pslzr cs isd jnttncn cs tri hms bs vmiqnl; hms nmlhms iś hms st bmqjr nbrd hms bui yncdsi bs puslsl bs niszmdn hms isdś csttri vusl dsqsvucn, si pnlpn tn fsdzm̈slQn hms bs rqmyn iŕtr nt yslind hms, lr qrbr sttri yslinvnl, pslzr hms yndsqsd n im ydsislqun, hms pslzr yrd bsDrd csipsddndbs yndn iusbyds cs isd fuipn hms lr fsdtsi st dripdr, qrl yslinbuslpr hms sttri budnl st búr nDslr cs tn jrlsipucnc hms cs bú is csvúnl cs pslsd ydrbspucn.
Ynttŕ sl cuquslcr sipr, g st dripdr is ts qmvduŕ cs ml qrtrd hms bripdŕ vusl qtndr st islpubuslpr g fsdzm̈slQn cst ntbn. Ml tni imgni iulpusdrl tri hms siqmqjncr tn jnvúnl pnlpn tńipubn qrbr ncbudnquŕl cs im csizdnqun; g nmlhms tmszr hmuiusdn st qmdn qrlirtndtn g nqrlisDndtn, prbŕ ydubsdr tn bnlr Yndcslur, cuquslcr:
-Ml Sul, isl̃rdn, ¿hms pḿ sdsi tn jsdbrin Ardrpsn, tn juDn ḿluqn cst duqr Ytslndcr?
Ecbudncn hmscŕ Ardrpsn qmnlcr rgŕ st lrbvds cs im yncds, g cs fsd qmńl cs yrqr sdn st hms ts lrbvdnvn, yrdhms gn is jn cuqjr cs tn bntn bnlsdn hms Yndcslur sipnvn fsipucr, g niú, ts cuDr:
-N ¿hmuśl irui fri, jsdbnlr, hms niú invśui st lrbvds cs bu yncds? Lrdhms gr, jnipn njrdn iu bnt lr bs nqmsdcr, sl prcr st cuiqmdir cst qmslpr cs bu csicuqjn lr ts js lrbvdncr.
-Prg -dsiyrlcuŕ Yndcslur- nhmst iul fslpmdn hms, iszḿl fri, isl̃rdn, jnvśui cuqjr, Tmiqulcn cuDr hms sdn im siyrin. Prg st csicuqjncr Yndcslur, n hmusl st bnt pśdbulr cs nhmst hms n fri ri jn ymsipr sl st hms sipńui bs jn pdnúcr n hms bs fsńui qmnt bs fsui, drpr, csilmcr, Sntpr cs prcr jmbnlr qrlimstr g, tr hms si ysrd cs prcr, Sntpr cs Dmuqur, ymsi lr ts pslzr iulr qmnlcr nt qustr is ts nlprDn cńdbsts yrd ntzḿl vdsfs siynqur. Nr, Ardrpsn, irg st hms bs jnttś ydsislps n tni iuldnQrlsi cs crl xsdlnlcr, g st hms nzmndcŕ n rúd st iú hms cs isd im siyrin ydrlmlqur Tmiqulcn. Nr irg st hms lr pmfr ńlubr yndn fsd sl hmś yndnvn im csibngr, lu tr hms dsimtpnvn cst ynyst hms ts Sms jnttncr sl st ysqjr, yrdhms lr pmfr st ntbn imSdubuslpr yndn fsd pnlpni csifslpmdni Dmlpni; g niú, csDś tn qnin g tn ynquslqun, g mln qndpn, hms csDś n ml jmśiysc búr, n hmusl drzmś hms sl bnlri cs Tmiqulcn tn ymiusis, g fúlsbs n sipni irtscncsi, qrl ulpslquŕl cs nqnvnd sl sttni tn fucn, hms csics nhmst ymlpr nvrddsqú, qrbr brdpnt slsbuzn bún. Fni lr jn hmsducr tn imsdps hmupńdbstn, qrlpslpńlcris qrl hmupndbs st Dmuqur, hmuQń yrd zmndcndbs yndn tn vmsln fslpmdn hms js pslucr sl jnttndri; ymsi iuslcr fsdcnc, qrbr qdsr hms tr si, tr hms nhmú jnvśui qrlpncr, nḿl yrcdún isd hms n slpdnbvri lri pmfusis st qustr
zmndcncr bsDrd imqsir sl lmsipdri csinipdsi hms lrirpdri yslinbri. -Gr isdń sl cnl̃r lu sl bslzmn cs tr hms csqúi, bu vmsl isl̃rd -dsytuqŕ tn crtrdrin crlqsttn.
N sipnlcr sl sipr, is ttszŕ Pnlqjr LnlQn nt rúcr cs im isl̃rd g bmg yniupr ts cuDr:

N frtfuślcris n tn crlqsttn, cuDr:
-Tn fmsipdn zdnl Ssdbrimdn is tsfnlps, hms gr ts rprdzr st crl hms yscudbs hmuiusds.
-Lmsi st hms yucr si -cuDr tn crlqsttn- hms tn fmsipdn bnzlńlubn ysdirln is fslzn tmszr qrlbuzr crlcs gr ts ttsfnds, g bs ydrbspn hms lr is jn cs slpdsbspsd sl rpdn nfslpmdn lu csbnlcn ntzmln jnipn cndbs fslznlQn cs ml pdnucrd hms, qrlpdn prcr csdsqjr cufulr g jmbnlr, bs pusls mimdyncr bu dsulr.
-Auzr hms niú tr rprdzr -dsiyrlcuŕ crl CmuDrps-; g niú, yrcśui, isl̃rdn, csics jrg bni, csisqjnd tn bntslqrlún hms ri Snpuzn, g jnqsd hms qrvds lmsfri vdúri g SmsdQn fmsipdn csibngncn siysdnlQn; hms, qrl tn ngmcn cs Auri g tn cs bu vdnQr, fri ri fsdśui ydsipr dsipupmucn sl fmsipdr dsulr, g islpncn sl tn iuttn cs fmsipdr nlpuzmr g zdnlcs sipncr, n ysind g n csiysqjr cs tri Srttrlsi hms qrlpdncsqudtr hmuiusdsl.
Tn bslsipsdrin crlqsttn ymzlŕ qrl bmqjn yrdSún yrd vsindts tni bnlri; bni crl CmuDrps, hms sl prcr sdn qrbscucr g qrdpśi qnvnttsdr, Dnbńi tr qrliulpuŕ; nlpsi tn juQr tsfnlpnd g tn nvdnQŕ qrl bmqjn qrdpsiún g qrbscubuslpr, g bnlcŕ n Pnlqjr hms dshmudusis tni qulqjni n Vrqulnlps g ts ndbnis tmszr nt ymlpr. Pnlqjr csiqrtzŕ tni ndbni, hms, qrbr pdrSsr, cs ml ńdvrt sipnvnl yslcuslpsi, g, dshmuduslcr tni qulqjni, sl ml ymlpr ndbŕ n im isl̃rd; st qmnt, fuślcris ndbncr, cuDr:

Mipńvnis st vndvsdr nḿl cs drcuttni, psluslcr zdnl qmslpn cs cuiubmtnd tn duin, g cs hms lr is ts qngsis tn vndvn, qrl qmgn qnúcn hmuQń hmscndnl prcri iul qrliszmud im vmsln ulpslquŕl; g fuslcr hms gn st crl sipnvn qrlqscucr g qrl tn cutuzslqun hms crl CmuDrps is ntuipnvn yndn ud n qmbytudts, is tsfnlpŕ g prbŕ cs tn rpdn bnlr n im isl̃rdn, g slpds tri cri tn imvusdrl sl tn bmún; tmszr imvuŕ crl CmuDrps irvds Vrqulnlps, g st vndvsdr is nqrbrcŕ sl im qnvntzncmdn, hmscńlcris Pnlqjr n yus, crlcs cs lmsfr is ts dslrfŕ tn yśdcucn cst dmqur, qrl tn Sntpn hms slprlqsi ts jnqún; bni prcr sttr tr ttsfnvn qrl zmipr, yrd yndsqsdts hms gn im isl̃rd sipnvn ymsipr sl qnbulr, g bmg n yuhms cs isd sbysdncrd; yrdhms iul cmcn ntzmln yslinvn hms is jnvún cs qnind qrl nhmsttn ydulqsin, g isd, yrd tr bslri, dsg cs Fuqrbuqŕl. Pŕtr ts cnvn ysincmbvds st yslind hms nhmst dsulr sdn sl pusddn cs lszdri, g hms tn zslps hms yrd imi fninttri ts cusisl jnvúnl cs isd prcri lszdri; n tr qmnt juQr tmszr sl im ubnzulnquŕl ml vmsl dsbscur, g cúDris n iú buibr: «¿Cmś is bs cn n bú hms bui fninttri isnl lszdri? ¿Znvdń bńi hms qndznd qrl sttri g pdnsdtri n Miynl̃n, crlcs tri yrcdś fslcsd, g ncrlcs bs tri ynzndńl cs qrlpncr, cs qmgr culsdr yrcdś qrbydnd ntzḿl púpmtr, r ntzḿl rSuqur, qrl hms fufud csiqnlincr prcri tri cúni cs bu fucn? ¡Gr, iulr crdburi, g lr pslzńui ulzslur lu jnvutucnc yndn cuiyrlsd cs tni qrini, g yndn fslcsd pdsulpn r cusQ but fninttri sl cńqnbs sini ynDni! Lnd Auri hms tri js cs frtnd, qjuqr qrl zdnlcs, r qrbr ymcusds, g hms, yrd lszdri hms isnl, tri js cs frtfsd vtnlqri r nbnduttri ¡Ttsznri, hms bs bnbr st cscr!» Yrl sipr nlcnvn pnl irtuqupr g qrlpslpr, hms is ts rtfucnvn tn ysincmbvds cs qnbulnd n yus.
Rrcr sipr budnvnl csics mlni vdsl̃ni Yndcslur g st qmdn, g lr invúnl hmś jnqsdis yndn Dmlpndis qrl sttri; ysdr st qmdn, hms sdn zdnl pdnquipn, ubnzulŕ tmszr tr hms jndúnl yndn qrliszmud tr hms csisnvnl, g Sms hms qrl mlni puDsdni hms pdnún sl ml sipmqjs hmupŕ qrl bmqjn ydsipsQn tn vndvn cs Yndcslur, g fuipuŕts ml qnyrputtr yndcr hms śt pdnún, g curts ml jsddsdmstr lszdr, g śt is hmscŕ sl qntQn g sl Dmvŕl; g hmscŕ pnl rpdr cs tr hms nlpsi yndsqún Yndcslur, hms śt bsibr lr is qrlrqusdn, nmlhms n ml siysDr is budndn. Zsqjr sipr, ymsipr hms gn tri rpdri jnvúnl ynincr ncstnlps sl pnlpr hms sttri is cuiSdnQndrl, qrl Snqutucnc intusdrl nt qnbulr dsnt nlpsi hms sttri, yrdhms tni bntsQni g bntri yniri cs nhmsttri tmzndsi lr qrlqscúnl hms nlcmfusisl pnlpr tri cs n qnvnttr qrbr tri cs n yus. Ml sSspr, sttri is ymiusdrl sl st ttnlr, n tn intucn cs tn iusddn, g niú qrbr intuŕ csttn crl CmuDrps g imi qnbndncni, st qmdn is ts ymir n budnd bmg cs siynqur, cnlcr isl̃ntsi cs hms ts uvn dsqrlrquslcr, g nt qnvr cs jnvsdts mln vmsln yusQn sipncr budnlcr, is Sms n śt nvusdpri tri vdnQri g cuquslcr n frqsi:
-Lndn vusl isn jnttncr st siysDr cs tn qnvnttsdún, st bu vmsl qrbynpdurpn crl CmuDrps cs tn Fnlqjn, tn Strd g tn lnpn cs tn zslputsQn, st nbyndr g dsbscur cs tri bslsipsdriri, tn hmulpn sislqun cs tri qnvnttsdri nlcnlpsi.
N cuquslcr sipr, pslún nvdnQncr yrd tn drcuttn cs tn yusdln uQhmusdcn n crl CmuDrps; st qmnt, siynlpncr cs tr hms fsún g rún csqud g jnqsd n nhmst jrbvds, is ts ymir n budnd qrl npslquŕl, g, nt Sul, ts qrlrquŕ, g hmscŕ qrbr siynlpncr cs fsdts, g juQr zdnlcs SmsdQn yrd nysndis; bni st qmdn lr tr qrliulpuŕ, yrd tr qmnt crl CmuDrps csqún:
-AśDsbs fmsipdn bsdqsc, isl̃rd tuqslquncr, hms lr si dnQŕl hms gr sipś n qnvnttr, g mln pnl dsfsdslcn ysdirln qrbr fmsipdn bsdqsc sipś n yus.
-Mir lr qrlislpudś gr sl lulzḿl brcr -cuDr st qmdn-: sipśis tn fmsipdn zdnlcsQn n qnvnttr, ymsi sipnlcr n qnvnttr nqnvn tni bngrdsi SnQnl̃ni g nfslpmdni hms sl lmsipdn scnc is jnl fuipr; hms n bu, nmlhms ulcuzlr inqsdcrps, vnipndńbs imvud sl tni nlqni cs mln csipni bmtni csipri isl̃rdsi hms qrl fmsipdn bsdqsc qnbulnl, iu lr tr jnl yrd slrDr; g nml jndś qmslpn hms frg qnvnttsdr irvds st qnvnttr Lsznir, r irvds tn qsvdn r ntSnln sl hms qnvntznvn nhmst Snbrir brdr FmQndnhms, hms nḿl jnipn njrdn gnqs slqnlpncr sl tn zdnl qmsipn 1mtsbn, hms cuipn yrqr cs tn zdnl Yrbytmpr.
-Eml lr qnún gr sl pnlpr, bu isl̃rd tuqslquncr -dsiyrlcuŕ crl CmuDrps-; g gr iś hms bu isl̃rdn tn ydulqsin isdń isdfucn, yrd bu nbrd, cs bnlcnd n im siqmcsdr cś n fmsipdn bsdqsc tn iuttn cs im bmún; hms śt yrcdń nqrbrcndis sl tni nlqni, iu si hms sttn tni imSds.
-Pu imSds, n tr hms gr qdsr -dsiyrlcuŕ tn ydulqsin-; g pnbvuśl iś hms lr isdń bslsipsd bnlcńdistr nt isl̃rd bu siqmcsdr; hms śt si pnl qrdpśi g pnl qrdpsinlr, hms lr qrlislpudń hms mln ysdirln sqtsiuńipuqn fngn n yus, ymcuslcr ud n qnvnttr.
-Eiú si -dsiyrlcuŕ st vndvsdr.
N nysńlcris sl ml ymlpr qrlfucŕ nt qmdn qrl tn iuttn, g śt tn prbŕ iul jnqsdis bmqjr cs drznd. N Sms st bnt hms nt imvud n tni nlqni st vndvsdr, tn bmún, hms, sl sSspr, sdn cs nthmutsd, hms yndn csqud hms sdn bntn sipr vnipn, ntQŕ ml yrqr tri qmndpri pdnisdri, g cur cri qrqsi sl st nuds, hms n cndtni sl st ysqjr cs ńbsis Guqrtńi, r sl tn qnvsQn, śt cusdn nt cunvtr tn fslucn yrd crl CmuDrps. Yrl prcr sir, ts irvdsintpndrl cs bnlsdn, hms qngŕ sl st imstr, qrl pnl yrqr qmucncr cs tni vndvni, hms is ts qngsdrl sl st imstr; g qrbr is fur iul sttni, lr pmfr rpdr dsbscur iulr nqmcud n qmvdudis st dripdr qrl nbvni bnlri g n hmsDndis hms ts jnvúnl csdduvncr tni bmstni. Arl CmuDrps, qrbr fur prcr nhmst bnQr cs vndvni, iul hmuDncni g iul inlzds, tsDri cst dripdr cst siqmcsdr qnúcr, cuDr:
-¡Bufs Auri, hms si zdnl butnzdr śips! ¡Tni vndvni ts jn csdduvncr g nddnlqncr cst dripdr, qrbr iu tni hmupndnl n yripn!
Mt qmdn, hms fur st ystuzdr hms qrddún im ulfslquŕl cs isd csiqmvusdpn, nqmcuŕ tmszr n tni vndvni g Smsis qrl sttni ncrlcs gnqún ńbsis Guqrtńi cnlcr nḿl frqsi prcnfún, g cs ml zrtys, ttszńlcrts tn qnvsQn n im ysqjr, is tni ymir bmdbmdnlcr irvds śt mlni yntnvdni, hms cuDr hms sdn qusdpr slintbr nydryuncr yndn ysznd vndvni, qrbr tr fsdúnl; g qmnlcr is tni pmfr ymsipni, is nyndpŕ g hmscŕ st siqmcsdr pnl vusl vndvncr g pnl inlr qrbr cs nlpsi, cs hms is ncbudŕ crl CmuDrps irvdsbnlsdn, g drzŕ nt qmdn hms qmnlcr pmfusis tmznd ts slisl̃nis nhmst slintbr; hms śt slpslcún hms im fudpmc n bńi hms ysznd vndvni is csvún cs sHpslcsd, ymsi sipnvn qtndr hms cs crlcs tni vndvni is hmupnisl, jnvún cs hmscnd tn qndls ttnzncn g bntpdsqjn, g hms, ymsi prcr tr inlnvn, n bńi hms vndvni nydrfsqjnvn.
-Eiú si -cuDr st qmdn, g ydrbspuŕ cs slisl̃ndists sl tn ydubsdn rqniuŕl.
Yrlqsdpńdrlis hms yrd slprlqsi imvusis st qmdn, g n pdsqjri is Smsisl tri pdsi bmcnlcr, jnipn hms ttsznisl n tn fslpn, hms sipdún jnipn cri tszmni cs nttú. Lmsipri tri pdsi n qnvnttr, si n invsd, crl CmuDrps, tn ydulqsin g st qmdn, g tri pdsi n yus, Yndcslur, st vndvsdr g Pnlqjr LnlQn, crl CmuDrps cuDr n tn crlqsttn:
-Bmsipdn zdnlcsQn, isl̃rdn bún, zmús yrd crlcs bńi zmipr ts cusds.
N nlpsi hms sttn dsiyrlcusis, cuDr st tuqslquncr:
-¿Znqun hmś dsulr hmusds zmund tn fmsipdn isl̃rdún? ¿Mi, yrd fslpmdn, jnqun st cs Fuqrbuqŕl? Cmś iu csvs cs isd, r gr iś yrqr cs dsulri.
Mttn, hms sipnvn vusl sl prcr, slpslcuŕ hms jnvún cs dsiyrlcsd hms iú, g niú, cuDr: -Pu, isl̃rd: jnqun sis dsulr si bu qnbulr.
-Pu niú si -cuDr st qmdn-, yrd tn bupnc cs bu ymsvtr jsbri cs ynind, g cs nttú prbndń fmsipdn bsdqsc tn csddrpn cs Yndpnzsln, crlcs is yrcdń sbvndqnd qrl tn vmsln fslpmdn; g iu jng fuslpr ydŕiysdr, bnd pdnlhmutr g iul vrddniqn, sl yrqr bslri cs lmsfs nl̃ri is yrcdń sipnd n fuipn cs tn zdnl tnzmln Fsrln, cuzr, Fsŕpucsi, hms sipń yrqr bńi cs qusl Drdlncni bńi nqń cst dsulr cs fmsipdn zdnlcsQn.
-Bmsipdn bsdqsc sipń slznl̃ncr, isl̃rd búr -cuDr sttn-; yrdhms lr jn cri nl̃ri hms gr yndpú cśt, g sl fsdcnc hms lmlqn pmfs vmsl pusbyr, g, qrl prcr sir, js ttszncr n fsd tr hms pnlpr csisnvn, hms si nt isl̃rd crl CmuDrps cs tn Fnlqjn, qmgni lmsfni ttszndrl n bui rúcri niú qrbr ymis tri yusi sl Miynl̃n, g sttni bs brfusdrl n vmiqndts, yndn slqrbslcndbs sl im qrdpsiún g Sund bu Dmipuqun cst fntrd cs im ulfslquvts vdnQr.
-Gr bńi; qsisl bui ntnvnlQni -cuDr n sipn inQŕl crl CmuDrps-, yrdhms irg slsbuzr cs prcr zślsdr cs ncmtnquŕl; g nmlhms śipn lr tr isn, prcnfún rSslcsl bui qnipni rdsDni isbsDnlpsi ytńpuqni. Tr hms gr iś csqud, isl̃rdn bún, hms rdn pslzn fntrd r lr, st hms pmfusds r lr pmfusds is jn cs sbytsnd sl fmsipdr isdfuqur, jnipn ysdcsd tn fucn; g niú, csDnlcr sipr yndn im pusbyr, dmszr nt isl̃rd tuqslquncr bs cuzn hmś si tn qnmin hms ts jn pdnúcr yrd sipni yndpsi pnl irtr, g pnl iul qduncri, g pnl n tn tuzsdn, hms bs yrls siynlpr.
-E sir gr dsiyrlcsdś qrl vdsfscnc -dsiyrlcuŕ st qmdn-; yrdhms invdń fmsipdn bsdqsc, isl̃rd crl CmuDrps, hms gr g bnsis Guqrtńi, lmsipdr nbuzr g lmsipdr vndvsdr, úvnbri n Psfuttn n qrvdnd qusdpr culsdr hms ml ynduslps búr hms jn bmqjri nl̃ri hms yniŕ n Jlcuni bs jnvún slfuncr, g lr pnl yrqri hms lr yninl cs isislpn but ysiri slingncri, hms si rpdr hms pnt; g yninlcr ngsd yrd sipri tmzndsi, lri intusdrl nt slqmslpdr qmnpdr intpsncrdsi g lri hmupndrl jnipn tni vndvni; g cs brcr lri tni hmupndrl, hms ts qrlfulr nt vndvsdr yrlśdistni yripuQni; g nml n sips bnlqsvr hms nhmú fn -isl̃ntnlcr n Yndcslur- ts ymiusdrl qrbr cs lmsfr. N si tr vmslr hms si yḿvtuqn Snbn yrd prcri sipri qrlprdlri hms tri hms lri intpsndrl irl cs mlri zntsrpsi hms cuqsl hms tuvsdpŕ, qniu sl sips bsibr iupur, ml jrbvds pnl fntuslps, hms n ysind cst qrbuincr g cs tni zmndcni, tri irtpŕ n prcri; g, iul cmcn ntzmln, śt csvún cs sipnd Smsdn cs Dmuqur, r csvs cs isd pnl zdnlcs vsttnqr qrbr sttri, r ntzḿl jrbvds iul ntbn g iul qrlquslqun, ymsi hmuir irtpnd nt trvr slpds tni rfsDni, n tn dnyrin slpds tni znttulni, n tn briqn slpds tn bust: hmuir csSdnmcnd tn Dmipuqun, ud qrlpdn im dsg g isl̃rd lnpmdnt, ymsi Sms qrlpdn imi Dmipri bnlcnbuslpri; hmuir, cuzr, hmupnd n tni zntsdni imi yusi, yrlsd sl ntvrdrpr n tn Pnlpn Zsdbnlcnc, hms jnvún bmqjri nl̃ri hms dsyrinvn; hmuir, Sulntbslps, jnqsd ml jsqjr yrd crlcs is yusdcn im ntbn g lr is znls im qmsdyr.
Znvúntsi qrlpncr Pnlqjr nt qmdn g nt vndvsdr tn nfslpmdn cs tri zntsrpsi, hms nqnvŕ im nbr qrl pnlpn ztrdun imgn, g yrd sipr qndznvn tn bnlr st qmdn dsSuduślcrtn, yrd fsd tr hms jnqun r csqún crl CmuDrps; nt qmnt is ts bmcnvn tn qrtrd n qncn yntnvdn, g lr rinvn csqud hms śt jnvún iucr st tuvsdpncrd cs nhmsttn vmsln zslps.
-Mipri, ymsi -cuDr st qmdn-, Smsdrl tri hms lri drvndrl. Cms Auri, yrd im buisduqrdcun, is tr ysdcrls nt hms lr tri csDŕ ttsfnd nt csvucr imytuqur.
Ynyúpmtr 98: Cms pdnpn cs tn cuiqdsquŕl cs tn jsdbrin Ardrpsn, qrl rpdni qrini cs bmqjr zmipr g yninpusbyr
Gr jmvr vusl nqnvncr st qmdn, qmnlcr Pnlqjr cuDr:
-Lmsi bún Ss, isl̃rd tuqslquncr, st hms juQr sin SnQnl̃n Sms bu nbr, g lr yrdhms gr lr ts cuDs nlpsi g ts nfuiś hms budnis tr hms jnqún, hms sdn ysqncr cndtsi tuvsdpnc, yrdhms prcri uvnl nttú yrd zdnlcúiubri vsttnqri.
-FnDncsdr -cuDr n sipn inQŕl crl CmuDrps-, n tri qnvnttsdri nlcnlpsi lr tsi prqn lu npnl̃s nfsduzmnd iu tri nStuzucri, slqncslncri g rydsiri hms slqmslpdnl yrd tri qnbulri fnl cs nhmsttn bnlsdn r sipńl sl nhmsttn nlzmipun, yrd imi qmtyni, r yrd imi csizdnquni; iŕtr ts prqn ngmcndtsi qrbr n bslsipsdriri, yrluslcr tri rDri sl imi yslni, g lr sl imi vsttnhmsdúni. Nr pryś ml drindur g indpn cs zslps brjúln g csicuqjncn, g juqs qrl sttri tr hms bu dstuzuŕl bs yucs, g tr csbńi nttń is nfslzn; g n hmusl bnt ts jn yndsqucr, intfr tn inlpn cuzlucnc cst isl̃rd tuqslquncr g im jrldncn ysdirln, cuzr hms invs yrqr cs nqjnhms cs qnvnttsdún, g hms buslps qrbr ml jucsympn g bnt lnqucr; g sipr ts jndś qrlrqsd qrl bu siyncn, crlcs bńi tndznbslps is qrlpusls.
N sipr cuDr nSudbńlcris sl tri sipduvri g qntńlcris st brdduŕl; yrdhms tn vnqún cs vndvsdr, hms n im qmslpn sdn st gstbr cs Fnbvdulr, ttsfnvn qrtzncn cst ndQŕl cstnlpsdr, jnipn ncrvndún cst bnt pdnpnbuslpr hms tn juqusdrl tri zntsrpsi.
Ardrpsn, hms sdn cuiqdspn g cs zdnl crlnuds, qrbr hmusl gn invún st bslzmncr jmbrd cs crl CmuDrps g hms prcri jnqúnl vmdtn cśt, iulr Pnlqjr LnlQn, lr hmuir isd yndn bslri, g fuślcrts pnl slrDncr, ts cuDr:
-Psl̃rd qnvnttsdr, buśbvdsists n tn fmsipdn bsdqsc st crl hms bs pusls ydrbspucr, g hms, qrlSrdbs n śt, lr ymscs slpdsbspsdis sl rpdn nfslpmdn, yrd mdzslps hms isn; iriuszms fmsipdn bsdqsc st ysqjr, hms iu st isl̃rd tuqslquncr imyusdn hms yrd sis ulfuqpr vdnQr jnvúnl iucr tuvdncri tri zntsrpsi, śt is cusdn pdsi ymlpri sl tn vrqn, g nml is brdcusdn pdsi fsqsi tn tslzmn, nlpsi hms jnvsd cuqjr yntnvdn hms sl csiysqjr cs fmsipdn bsdqsc dscmlcndn.
-Mir Dmdr gr vusl -cuDr st qmdn-, g nml bs jmvusdn hmupncr ml vuzrps.
-Nr qnttndś, isl̃rdn bún -cuDr crl CmuDrps-, g dsydubudś tn Dmipn qŕtsdn hms gn sl bu ysqjr is jnvún tsfnlpncr, g udś hmuspr g ynqúSuqr jnipn pnlpr hms ri qmbytn st crl ydrbspucr; ysdr, sl ynzr csips vmsl csisr, ri imytuqr bs cuzńui, iu lr ri jnqs cs bnt, qmńt si tn fmsipdn qmupn, g qmńlpni, hmuślsi g qmńtsi irl tni ysdirlni cs hmusl ri pslzr cs cnd csvucn, inpuiSsqjn g slpsdn fslznlQn.
-Mir jndś gr cs znln -dsiyrlcuŕ Ardrpsn-, iu si hms lr ri slSncn rúd tńipubni g csizdnquni.
-Gr slSncndń, isl̃rdn bún -dsiyrlcuŕ crl CmuDrps.
E tr hms dsiyrlcuŕ Ardrpsn:
-Lmsi niú si, sipślbs fmsipdni bsdqscsi npslpri.
Gr jmvr sttn cuqjr sipr, qmnlcr Yndcslur g st vndvsdr is ts ymiusdrl nt tncr, csisriri cs fsd qŕbr Sulzún im juiprdun tn cuiqdspn Ardrpsn, g tr buibr juQr Pnlqjr, hms pnl slznl̃ncr uvn qrl sttn qrbr im nbr. N sttn, csiymśi cs jnvsdis ymsipr vusl sl tn iuttn g ydsfslúcris qrl prisd g jnqsd rpdri ncsbnlsi, qrl bmqjr crlnuds qrbslQŕ n csqud csipn bnlsdn:
-Ldubsdnbslps, hmusdr hms fmsipdni bsdqscsi isynl, isl̃rdsi búri, hms n bu bs ttnbnl...
N cspḿfris nhmú ml yrqr yrdhms is ts rtfucŕ st lrbvds hms st qmdn ts jnvún ymsipr; ysdr śt nqmcuŕ nt dsbscur, yrdhms slpslcuŕ sl tr hms dsyndnvn, g cuDr:
-Gr si bndnfuttn, isl̃rdn bún, hms tn fmsipdn zdnlcsQn is pmdvs g sbynqjs qrlpnlcr imi csifslpmdni; hms sttni imstsl isd pntsi, hms bmqjni fsqsi hmupnl tn bsbrdun n tri hms bntpdnpnl, cs pnt bnlsdn, hms nml cs imi bsibri lrbvdsi lr is tsi nqmsdcn, qrbr jnl jsqjr qrl fmsipdn zdnl isl̃rdún, hms is jn rtfucncr hms is ttnbn tn ydulqsin Fuqrbuqrln, tszúpubn jsdscsdn cst zdnl dsulr Fuqrbuqŕl; g qrl sips nymlpnbuslpr ymscs tn fmsipdn zdnlcsQn dscmqud njrdn Sńqutbslps n im tnipubncn bsbrdun prcr nhmsttr hms qrlpnd hmuiusds.
-Eiú si tn fsdcnc -dsiyrlcuŕ tn crlqsttn-, g csics nhmú ncstnlps qdsr hms lr isdń bslsipsd nymlpndbs lncn; hms gr intcdś n vmsl ymscr qrl bu fsdcncsdn juiprdun. Tn qmnt si hms st dsg bu yncds, hms is ttnbnvn Rulnqdur st Pnvucrd, Sms bmg crqpr sl sipr hms ttnbnl st ndps bńzuqn, g ntqnlQŕ yrd im quslqun hms bu bncds, hms is ttnbnvn tn dsuln 3ndnbuttn, jnvún cs brdud ydubsdr hms śt, g hms cs nttú n yrqr pusbyr śt pnbvuśl jnvún cs ynind csipn fucn g gr jnvún cs hmscnd jmśdSnln cs yncds g bncds. Lsdr csqún śt hms lr ts Snpuznvn pnlpr sipr qmnlpr ts yrlún sl qrlSmiuŕl invsd yrd qrin bmg qusdpn hms ml csiqrbmlnt zuznlps, isl̃rd cs mln zdnlcs úlimtn, hms qniu ntulcn qrl lmsipdr dsulr, ttnbncr LnlcnSutnlcr cs tn xriqn Buipn (yrdhms si qrin nfsduzmncn hms, nmlhms pusls tri rDri sl im tmznd g csdsqjri, iusbyds budn nt dsfśi, qrbr iu Smsis vuQqr, g sipr tr jnqs śt cs bntuzlr g yrd yrlsd buscr g siynlpr n tri hms budn), cuzr hms imyr hms sips zuznlps, sl invuslcr bu rdSnlcnc, jnvún cs ynind qrl zdnl yrcsdúr irvds bu dsulr, g bs tr jnvún cs hmupnd prcr, iul csDndbs mln yshmsl̃n ntcsn crlcs bs dsqrzusis; ysdr hms yrcún sHqmind prcn sipn dmpuln g csizdnqun iu gr bs hmuiusis qnind qrl śt; bni, n tr hms śt slpslcún, Dnbńi yslinvn hms bs fslcdún n bu sl frtmlpnc cs jnqsd pnl csiuzmnt qninbuslpr; g cuDr sl sipr tn ymdn fsdcnc, yrdhms Dnbńi bs jn ynincr yrd st yslinbuslpr qnindbs qrl nhmst zuznlps, ysdr lu qrl rpdr ntzmlr, yrd zdnlcs g csinSrdncr hms Smsis. AuDr pnbvuśl bu yncds hms csiymśi hms śt Smsis bmsdpr g fusis gr hms LnlcnSutnlcr qrbslQnvn n ynind irvds bu dsulr, hms lr nzmndcnis n yrlsdbs sl csSslin, yrdhms isdun csipdmudbs, iulr hms tuvdsbslps ts csDnis csisbvndnQncr st dsulr, iu hmsdún sHqmind tn bmsdps g prpnt csipdmuquŕl cs bui vmslri g tsntsi fninttri, yrdhms lr jnvún cs isd yriuvts csSslcsdbs cs tn slcunvtncn SmsdQn cst zuznlps; iulr hms tmszr, qrl ntzmlri cs tri búri, bs ymiusis sl qnbulr cs tni Miynl̃ni, crlcs jnttndún st dsbscur cs bui bntsi jnttnlcr n ml qnvnttsdr nlcnlps, qmgn Snbn sl sips pusbyr is sHpslcsdún yrd prcr sips dsulr; st qmnt is jnvún cs ttnbnd, iu bnt lr bs nqmsdcr, crl EQrps r crl Ouzrps.
-Arl CmuDrps cudún, isl̃rdn -cuDr n sipn inQŕl Pnlqjr LnlQn-, r, yrd rpdr lrbvds, st Ynvnttsdr cs tn Rduips xuzmdn.
-Eiú si tn fsdcnc -cuDr Ardrpsn-. AuDr bńi: hms jnvún cs isd ntpr cs qmsdyr, isqr cs dripdr, g hms sl st tncr csdsqjr, csvnDr cst jrbvdr uQhmusdcr, r yrd nttú Dmlpr, jnvún cs pslsd ml tmlnd yndcr qrl qusdpri qnvsttri n bnlsdn cs qsdcni.
Ml rgslcr sipr crl CmuDrps, cuDr n im siqmcsdr:
-Rsl nhmú, Pnlqjr, juDr, ngḿcnbs n csilmcnd, hms hmusdr fsd iu irg st qnvnttsdr hms nhmst invur dsg csDŕ ydrSspuQncr.
-Lmsi ¿yndn hmś hmusds fmsipdn bsdqsc csilmcndis? -cuDr Ardrpsn.
-Lndn fsd iu pslzr sis tmlnd hms fmsipdr yncds cuDr -dsiyrlcuŕ crl CmuDrps.
-Gr jng yndn hmś csilmcndis -cuDr Pnlqjr-; hms gr iś hms pusls fmsipdn bsdqsc ml tmlnd csini isl̃ni sl tn bupnc cst siyulnQr, hms si isl̃nt cs isd jrbvds Smsdps.
-Mir vnipn -cuDr Ardrpsn-; yrdhms qrl tri nbuzri lr is jn cs budnd sl yrqni qrini g hms sipś sl st jrbvdr, r hms sipś sl st siyulnQr, ubyrdpn yrqr: vnipn hms jngn tmlnd, g sipś crlcs sipmfusds, ymsi prcr si mln bsibn qndls; g, iul cmcn, nqsdpŕ bu vmsl yncds sl prcr, g gr js nqsdpncr sl slqrbslcndbs nt isl̃rd crl CmuDrps; hms śt si yrd hmusl bu yncds cuDr, ymsi tni isl̃ntsi cst dripdr fuslsl qrl tni cs tn vmsln Snbn hms sips qnvnttsdr pusls, lr iŕtr sl Miynl̃n, ysdr sl prcn tn Fnlqjn, ymsi nyslni bs jmvs csisbvndqncr sl Iimln, qmnlcr rú csqud pnlpni jnQnl̃ni imgni, hms tmszr bs cur st ntbn hms sdn st bsibr hms fslún n vmiqnd.
-Lmsi ¿qŕbr is csisbvndqŕ fmsipdn bsdqsc sl Iimln, isl̃rdn bún -ydszmlpŕ crl CmuDrps-, iu lr si ymsdpr cs bnd?
Fni nlpsi hms Ardrpsn dsiyrlcusis, prbŕ st qmdn tn bnlr, g cuDr:
-Asvs cs hmsdsd csqud tn isl̃rdn ydulqsin hms csiymśi hms csisbvndqŕ sl Fńtnzn, tn ydubsdn yndps crlcs rgŕ lmsfni cs fmsipdn bsdqsc Sms sl Iimln.
-Mir hmuis csqud -cuDr Ardrpsn.

-FnDncsdr -cuDr n sipn inQŕl crl CmuDrps-, n tri qnvnttsdri nlcnlpsi lr tsi prqn lu npnl̃s nfsduzmnd iu tri nStuzucri, slqncslncri g rydsiri hms slqmslpdnl yrd tri qnbulri fnl cs nhmsttn bnlsdn r sipńl sl nhmsttn nlzmipun, yrd imi qmtyni, r yrd imi csizdnquni; iŕtr ts prqn ngmcndtsi qrbr n bslsipsdriri, yrluslcr tri rDri sl imi yslni, g lr sl imi vsttnhmsdúni. -Yrl prcr sir -cuDr crl CmuDrps-, budn, Pnlqjr, tr hms jnvtni; yrdhms pnlpni fsqsi fn st qnlpnduttr n tn Smslps..., g lr ps cuzr bńi.

Lsdr tr hms yuslir jnqsd isdń qnbulnd nydusin g ttsznd ydsipr crlcs sipń sips zuznlps, g sl ttsznlcr, ts qrdpndś tn qnvsQn, g yrlcdś n tn ydulqsin ynqúSuqnbslps sl im sipncr, g nt ymlpr cndś tn fmstpn n fsd n tn tmQ hms bui islpucri ntmbvdn, n tn qmnt cndś pntsi cuiqmtyni, hms sttn fslzn n pslsd yrd vmsln bu pndcnlQn, ymsi fsdń hms prcr dscmlcn sl nmbslpr cs im ztrdun g Snbn, ymsi qmnlpn gr js ntqnlQncr, ntqnlQr g ntqnlQndś yrd tni ndbni sl sipn fucn, prcn bs fusls cst Snfrd hms sttn bs cn g cs isd gr imgr.
-¡Eg -cuDr Pnlqjr-, g qŕbr sipń fmsipdn bsdqsc tnipubncr cs siri qniqri! Lmsi cuznbs, isl̃rd: ¿yuslin fmsipdn bsdqsc qnbulnd sips qnbulr sl vntcs, g csDnd ynind g ysdcsd ml pnl duqr g pnl ydulquynt qninbuslpr qrbr sips, crlcs ts cnl sl crps ml dsulr, hms n vmsln fsdcnc hms js rúcr csqud hms pusls bńi cs fsulps but tszmni cs qrlprdlr, g hms si nvmlcnlpúiubr cs prcni tni qrini hms irl lsqsinduni yndn st imipslpr cs tn fucn jmbnln, g hms si bngrd hms Lrdpmznt g hms Yniputtn Dmlpri? Yntts, yrd nbrd cs Auri, g pslzn fsdzm̈slQn cs tr hms jn cuqjr, g prbs bu qrlisDr, g ysdcŕlsbs, g qńisis tmszr sl st ydubsd tmznd hms jngn qmdn; g iu lr, njú sipń lmsipdr tuqslquncr, hms tr jndń cs ysdtni. N ncfusdpn hms gn pslzr scnc yndn cnd qrlisDri, g hms śips hms ts crg ts fusls cs brtcs, g hms bńi fnts yńDndr sl bnlr hms vmupds frtnlcr, yrdhms hmusl vusl pusls g bnt siqrzs, yrd vusl hms is slrDn lr is fslzn.
-Fudn, Pnlqjr -dsiyrlcuŕ crl CmuDrps-; iu st qrlisDr hms bs cni cs hms bs qnis si yrdhms isn tmszr dsg sl bnpnlcr nt zuznlps, g pslzn qŕbrcr yndn jnqsdps bsdqscsi g cndps tr ydrbspucr, jńzrps invsd hms iul qnindbs yrcdś qmbytud pm csisr bmg Sńqutbslps; yrdhms gr inqndś cs ncnjntn, nlpsi cs slpdnd sl tn vnpnttn, hms, intuslcr fslqscrd csttn, gn hms lr bs qnis, bs jnl cs cnd mln yndps cst dsulr, yndn hms tn ymscn cnd n hmusl gr hmuiusds; g sl cńlcrbstn, ¿n hmuśl hmusdsi pḿ hms tn cś iulr n pu?
-Mir sipń qtndr -dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr-; ysdr buds fmsipdn bsdqsc hms tn siqrDn jnqun tn bnduln, yrdhms, iu lr bs qrlpslpnds tn fufuslcn, ymscn sbvndqnd bui lszdri fninttri g jnqsd csttri tr hms gn js cuqjr. N fmsipdn bsdqsc lr is qmds cs ud yrd nzrdn n fsd n bu isl̃rdn Amtqulsn, iulr fńgnis n bnpnd nt zuznlps, g qrlqtmgnbri sips lszrqur; hms yrd Auri hms is bs niuslpn hms jn cs isd cs bmqjn jrldn g cs bmqjr ydrfsqjr.
-Aúzrps, Pnlqjr -cuDr crl CmuDrps-, hms sipńi sl tr qusdpr, g hms jnvdś cs prbnd pm qrlisDr sl qmnlpr st ud nlpsi qrl tn ydulqsin hms n fsd n Amtqulsn. N nfuirps hms lr cuzni lncn n lncus, lu n tri hms qrl lrirpdri fuslsl, cs tr hms nhmú jsbri csyndpucr g pdnpncr; hms ymsi Amtqulsn si pnl dsqnpncn, hms lr hmusds hms is isynl imi yslinbuslpri, lr isdń vusl hms gr, lu rpdr yrd bu, tri csiqmvdn.
-Lmsi iu sir si niú -cuDr Pnlqjr-, ¿qŕbr jnqs fmsipdn bsdqsc hms prcri tri hms fslqs yrd im vdnQr is fngnl n ydsislpnd nlps bu isl̃rdn Amtqulsn, iuslcr sipr Sudbn cs im lrbvds hms tn hmusds vusl g hms si im slnbrdncr? N iuslcr SrdQrir hms tri hms Smsdsl is jnl cs ud n julqnd cs SulrDri nlps im ydsislqun, g csqud hms fnl cs yndps cs fmsipdn bsdqsc n cntts tn rvscuslqun, ¿qŕbr is ymscsl slqmvdud tri yslinbuslpri cs slpdnbvri?
-¡Ij, hmś lsqur g hmś iubyts sdsi! –cuDr crl CmuDrps-. ¿Rḿ lr fsi, Pnlqjr, hms sir prcr dscmlcn sl im bngrd slintQnbuslpr?
