-Yrl sin bnlsdn cs nbrd -cuDr Pnlqjr- js rúcr gr ydscuqnd hms is jn cs nbnd n Gmsipdr Psl̃rd, yrd iu iŕtr, iul hms lri bmsfn siysdnlQn cs ztrdun r psbrd cs ysln. Emlhms gr ts hmsddún nbnd g isdfud yrd tr hms ymcusis.
-¡Bńtnps st cunvtr yrd futtnlr -cuDr crl CmuDrps-, g hmś cs cuiqdsqurlsi cuqsi n tni fsqsi! Gr yndsqs iulr hms jni sipmcuncr.
-Lmsi n Ss bún hms lr iś tssd –dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr.
Ml sipr tsi cur frqsi bnsis Guqrtńi hms siysdnisl ml yrqr; hms hmsdúnl cspslsdis n vsvsd sl mln Srlpsquttn hms nttú sipnvn. Aspḿfris crl CmuDrps, qrl lr yrqr zmipr cs Pnlqjr, hms gn sipnvn qnlincr cs bslpud pnlpr g psbún lr ts qrzusis im nbr n yntnvdni; yrdhms, ymsipr hms śt invun hms Amtqulsn sdn mln tnvdncrdn cst Rrvrir, lr tn jnvún fuipr sl prcn im fucn.
Znvúnis sl sips pusbyr fsipucr Yndcslur tri fsipucri hms Ardrpsn pdnún qmnlcr tn jnttndrl, hms nmlhms lr sdnl bmg vmslri, jnqúnl bmqjn fslpnDn n tri hms csDnvn. Mipnlcr sl sipr, nqsdpŕ n ynind yrd nttú ml bmqjnqjr hms uvn cs qnbulr, st qmnt, yrluślcris n budnd qrl bmqjn npslquŕl n tri hms sl tn Smslps sipnvnl, cs nttú n yrqr nddsbspuŕ n crl CmuDrps g, nvdnQńlcrts yrd tni yusdlni, qrbslQŕ n ttrdnd bmg cs ydryŕiupr, cuquslcr:
-¡Eg, isl̃rd búr! ¿Gr bs qrlrqs fmsipdn bsdqsc? Lmsi búdsbs vusl; hms gr irg nhmst brQr Elcdśi hms hmupŕ fmsipdn bsdqsc cs tn slquln crlcs sipnvn npncr.
Vsqrlrquŕts crl CmuDrps, g niuślcrts yrd tn bnlr, is frtfuŕ n tri hms nttú sipnvnl, g cuDr:
-Lrdhms fsnl fmsipdni bsdqscsi qmńl cs ubyrdpnlqun si jnvsd qnvnttsdri nlcnlpsi sl st bmlcr, hms csiSnznl tri pmsdpri g nzdnfuri hms sl śt is jnqsl yrd tri ulirtslpsi g bntri jrbvdsi hms sl śt fufsl, isynl fmsipdni bsdqscsi hms tri cúni ynincri, yninlcr gr yrd ml vrihms, rú mlri zdupri g mlni frqsi bmg tnipubrini, qrbr cs ysdirln nStuzucn g bslsipsdrin; nqmcú tmszr, ttsfncr cs bu rvtuznquŕl, jnqun tn yndps crlcs bs yndsquŕ hms tni tnbslpnvtsi frqsi irlnvnl, g jnttś npncr n mln slquln n sips bmqjnqjr hms njrdn sipń cstnlps, cs tr hms bs jmstzr sl st ntbn, yrdhms isdń psipuzr hms lr bs csDndń bslpud sl lncn. Auzr hms sipnvn npncr n tn slquln, csilmcr cst bscur qmsdlr ndduvn, g sipńvnts nvduslcr n nQrpsi qrl tni duslcni cs mln gszmn ml futtnlr, hms csiymśi imys hms sdn nbr imgr; g niú qrbr gr ts fu ts ydszmlpś tn qnmin cs pnl npdrQ fnymtnbuslpr; dsiyrlcuŕ st QnSur hms ts nQrpnvn yrdhms sdn im qduncr, g hms qusdpri csiqmucri hms pslún lnqúnl bńi cs tncdŕl hms cs iubyts; n tr qmnt sips lul̃r cuDr: «Psl̃rd, lr bs nQrpn iulr yrdhms ts yucr bu intndur.» Mt nbr dsytuqŕ lr iś hmś ndslzni g cuiqmtyni, tni qmntsi, nmlhms cs bú Smsdrl rúcni, lr Smsdrl ncbupucni. Ml dsirtmquŕl, gr ts juqs csinpnd, g prbś Dmdnbslpr nt futtnlr cs hms ts ttsfndún qrliuzr g ts ynzndún ml dsnt irvds rpdr, g nml injmbncri. ¿Gr si fsdcnc prcr sipr, juDr Elcdśi? ¿Gr lrpnips qrl qmńlpr ubysdur is tr bnlcś, g qrl qmńlpn jmbutcnc ydrbspuŕ cs jnqsd prcr qmnlpr gr ts ubymis g lrpuSuhmś g hmuis? Vsiyrlcs; lr ps pmdvsi lu cmcsi sl lncn; cu tr hms yniŕ n sipri isl̃rdsi, yrdhms is fsn g qrliucsds isd cst ydrfsqjr hms cuzr jnvsd qnvnttsdri nlcnlpsi yrd tri qnbulri.
-Rrcr tr hms fmsipdn bsdqsc jn cuqjr si bmqjn fsdcnc -dsiyrlcuŕ st bmqjnqjr-; ysdr st Sul cst lszrqur imqscuŕ bmg nt dsfśi cs tr hms fmsipdn bsdqsc is ubnzuln.
-¿Yŕbr nt dsfśi? -dsytuqŕ crl CmuDrps-.Tmszr ¿lr ps ynzŕ st futtnlr?
-Gr iŕtr lr bs ynzŕ -dsiyrlcuŕ st bmqjnqjr-, ysdr niú qrbr fmsipdn bsdqsc pdniymir cst vrihms g hmscnbri irtri, bs frtfuŕ n npnd n tn bsibn slquln g bs cur cs lmsfr pnlpri nQrpsi, hms hmscś jsqjr ml Pnl Undprtrbś csirttncr; g n qncn nQrps hms bs cnvn, bs csqún ml crlnuds g qjmSspn nqsdqn cs jnqsd vmdtn cs fmsipdn bsdqsc, hms, n lr islpud gr pnlpr crtrd, bs dusdn cs tr hms csqún. Ml sSsqpr, śt bs yndŕ pnt, hms jnipn njrdn js sipncr qmdńlcrbs sl ml jriyupnt cst bnt hms st bnt futtnlr slprlqsi bs juQr. As prcr tr qmnt pusls fmsipdn bsdqsc tn qmtyn; yrdhms iu is Smsdn im qnbulr ncstnlps g lr fulusdn crlcs lr ts ttnbnvnl, lu is slpdsbspusdn sl lszrquri nDslri, bu nbr is qrlpslpndn qrl cndbs mln r cri crqslni cs nQrpsi, g tmszr bs irtpndn g ynzndn qmnlpr bs csvún. Fni qrbr fmsipdn bsdqsc ts csijrldŕ pnl iul ydryŕiupr, g ts cuDr pnlpni futtnlúni, slqslcuŕists tn qŕtsdn, g qrbr lr tr ymcr fslznd sl fmsipdn bsdqsc, qmnlcr is fur irtr csiqndzŕ irvds bú st lmvtncr, cs brcr, hms bs yndsqs hms lr isdś bńi jrbvds sl prcn bu fucn.
-Mt cnl̃r sipmfr -cuDr crl CmuDrps- sl udbs gr cs nttú, hms lr bs jnvún cs ud jnipn csDndps ynzncr; yrdhms vusl csvún gr cs invsd, yrd tmslzni sHysduslquni, hms lr jng futtnlr hms zmndcs yntnvdn hms cusds, iu śt fss hms lr ts sipń vusl zmndcnttn. Lsdr gn ps nqmsdcni, Elcdśi, hms gr Dmdś hms iu lr ps ynznvn, hms jnvún cs ud n vmiqndts, g hms ts jnvún cs jnttnd, nmlhms is siqrlcusis sl st fuslpds cs tn vnttsln.
-Eiú si tn fsdcnc -cuDr Elcdśi-; ysdr lr nydrfsqjŕ lncn. -Ejrdn fsdńi iu nydrfsqjn -cuDr crl CmuDrps.
N cuquslcr sipr, is tsfnlpŕ bmg nydusin g bnlcŕ n Pnlqjr hms slSdslnis n Vrqulnlps, hms sipnvn ynquslcr sl pnlpr hms sttri qrbúnl.
Ldszmlpŕts Ardrpsn hmś sdn tr hms jnqsd hmsdún. Mt ts dsiyrlcuŕ hms hmsdún ud n vmiqnd nt futtnlr g qnipuzntts cs pnl bnt pśdbulr, g jnqsd ynzncr n Elcdśi jnipn st ḿtpubr bndnfscú, n csiysqjr g ysind cs qmnlpri futtnlri jmvusis sl st bmlcr; n tr hms sttn dsiyrlcuŕ hms ncfudpusis hms lr yrcún, qrlSrdbs nt crl ydrbspucr, slpdsbspsdis sl lulzmln sbydsin jnipn nqnvnd tn imgn; g hms ymsi sipr invún śt bsDrd hms rpdr ntzmlr, hms irisznis st ysqjr jnipn tn fmstpn cs im dsulr.
-Eiú si fsdcnc -dsiyrlcuŕ crl CmuDrps-,g si SrdQrir hms Elcdśi pslzn ynquslqun jnipn tn fmstpn, qrbr fri, isl̃rdn, csqúi; hms gr ts prdlr n Dmdnd g n ydrbspsd cs lmsfr cs lr yndnd jnipn jnqsdts fslzncr g ynzncr.
-Gr bs qdsr csiri Dmdnbslpri -cuDr Elcdśi-; bńi hmuiusdn pslsd nzrdn qrl hms ttsznd n Psfuttn hms prcni tni fslznlQni cst bmlcr: cśbs, iu pusls njú, ntzr hms qrbn g ttsfs, g hmścsis qrl Auri im bsdqsc g prcri tri qnvnttsdri nlcnlpsi, hms pnl vusl nlcnlpsi isnl sttri yndn qrliuzr qrbr tr jnl iucr yndn qrlbuzr.
Pnqŕ cs im dsymsipr Pnlqjr ml yscnQr cs ynl g rpdr cs hmsir, g cńlcristr nt brQr, ts cuDr:
-Rrbn, jsdbnlr Elcdśi, hms n prcri lri ntqnlQn yndps cs fmsipdn csizdnqun. -Lmsi ¿hmś yndps ri ntqnlQn n fri? -ydszmlpŕ Elcdśi.
-Mipn yndps cs hmsir g ynl hms ri crg -dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr-, hms Auri invs iu bs jn cs jnqsd Sntpn r lr; yrdhms ri jnzr invsd, nbuzr, hms tri siqmcsdri cs tri qnvnttsdri nlcnlpsi sipnbri imDspri n bmqjn jnbvds g n bntn fslpmdn, g nml n rpdni qrini hms is iuslpsl bsDrd hms is cuqsl.
Elcdśi niuŕ cs im ynl g hmsir g, fuslcr hms lncus ts cnvn rpdn qrin, nvnDŕ im qnvsQn g prbŕ st qnbulr sl tni bnlri, qrbr imsts csqudis. Uusl si fsdcnc hms, nt yndpudis, cuDr n crl CmuDrps:
-Lrd nbrd cs Auri, isl̃rd qnvnttsdr nlcnlps, hms iu rpdn fsQ bs slqrlpdnds, nmlhms fsn hms bs jnqsl yscnQri, lr bs irqrddn lu ngmcs, iulr cśDsbs qrl bu csizdnqun; hms lr isdń pnlpn, hms lr isn bngrd tn hms bs fslcdń cs im ngmcn cs fmsipdn bsdqsc, n hmusl Auri bntcuzn, g n prcri qmnlpri qnvnttsdri nlcnlpsi jnl lnqucr sl st bmlcr.
Jvnis n tsfnlpnd crl CmuDrps yndn qnipuzntts; bni śt is ymir n qrddsd cs brcr hms lulzmlr is npdsfuŕ n iszmutts. Cmscŕ qrdducúiubr crl CmuDrps cst qmslpr cs Elcdśi, g Sms bslsipsd hms tri csbńi pmfusisl bmqjn qmslpn qrl lr dsúdis, yrd lr nqnvntts cs qrddsd cst prcr.
Ynyúpmtr 95: Cms pdnpn cs tr hms imqscuŕ sl tn fslpn n prcn tn qmncduttn cs crl CmuDrps
Eqnvŕis tn vmsln qrbucn, sliuttndrl tmszr g, iul hms tsi imqscusis qrin cuzln cs qrlpnd, ttszndrl rpdr cún n tn fslpn, siynlpr g nirbvdr cs Pnlqjr LnlQn; g nmlhms śt hmuiusdn lr slpdnd sl sttn, lr tr ymcr jmud. Tn fslpsdn, fslpsdr, im juDn g Fnduprdlsi, hms fusdrl fslud n crl CmuDrps g n Pnlqjr, tsi intusdrl n dsqsvud qrl bmsipdni cs bmqjn ntszdún, g śt tni dsquvuŕ qrl zdnfs qrlpulslps g nytnmir; g cuDrtsi hms ts ncsdsQnisl rpdr bsDrd tsqjr hms tn fsQ ynincn; n tr qmnt ts dsiyrlcuŕ tn jmśiyscn hms qrbr tn ynznis bsDrd hms tn rpdn fsQ, hms sttn is tn cndún cs ydúlquysi. Arl CmuDrps cuDr hms iú jndún, g niú, ts ncsdsQndrl mlr dnQrlnvts sl st buibr qndnbnlqjŕl cs bnddni, g śt is nqripŕ tmszr, yrdhms fslún bmg hmsvdnlpncr g Sntpr cs Dmuqur.
Gr is jmvr vusl slqsddncr qmnlcr tn jmśiyscn nddsbspuŕ nt vndvsdr, g niuślcrts cs tn vndvn, cuDr:
-Lndn bu inlpuzmncn hms lr is jn nḿl cs nydrfsqjnd bńi cs bu dnvr yndn im vndvn, g hms bs jn cs frtfsd bu qrtn; hms nlcn tr cs bu bnducr yrd siri imstri, hms si fsdzm̈slQn; cuzr, st ysuls, hms irtún gr qrtznd cs bu vmsln qrtn.
Gr is tn hmsdún cnd st vndvsdr, nmlhms sttn bńi pudnvn, jnipn hms st tuqslquncr ts cuDr hms is tn cusis; hms gn lr sdn bslsipsd bńi mind cs nhmsttn ulcmipdun, iulr hms is csiqmvdusis g bripdnis sl im buibn Srdbn, g cuDsis n crl CmuDrps hms qmnlcr ts csiyrDndrl tri tncdrlsi zntsrpsi is jnvún fslucr n nhmsttn fslpn jmgslcr; g hms iu ydszmlpnis yrd st siqmcsdr cs tn ydulqsin, ts cudúnl hms sttn ts jnvún slfuncr ncstnlps n cnd nfuir n tri cs im dsulr qŕbr sttn uvn g ttsfnvn qrliuzr st tuvsdpncrd cs prcri. Yrl sipr cur cs vmsln znln tn qrtn n tn fslpsdn st vndvsdr, g niubuibr ts frtfusdrl prcri tri ncjsdslpsi hms jnvún ydsipncr yndn tn tuvsdpnc cs crl CmuDrps. Miynlpńdrlis prcri tri cs tn fslpn cs tn jsdbrimdn cs Ardrpsn, g nml cst vmsl pntts cst Qnznt Yndcslur. ZuQr st qmdn hms tsi ncsdsQnisl cs qrbsd cs tr hms sl tn fslpn jmvusis, g st jmśiysc, qrl siysdnlQn cs bsDrd ynzn, qrl cutuzslqun tsi ncsdsQŕ mln dnQrlnvts qrbucn; g n prcr sipr crdbún crl CmuDrps, g Smsdrl cs yndsqsd cs lr csiysdpntts, yrdhms bńi ydrfsqjr ts jndún yrd slprlqsi st crdbud hms st qrbsd. Rdnpndrl irvds qrbucn, sipnlcr cstnlps st fslpsdr, im bmDsd, im juDn, Fnduprdlsi g prcri tri yninDsdri, cs tn sHpdnl̃n trqmdn cs crl CmuDrps g cst brcr hms ts jnvúnl jnttncr. Tn jmśiyscn tsi qrlpŕ tr hms qrl śt g qrl st jnddusdr tsi jnvún nqrlpsqucr, g budnlcr iu nqnir sipnvn nttú Pnlqjr, qrbr lr ts fusis, qrlpŕ prcr tr cs im bnlpsnbuslpr, cs hms lr yrqr zmipr dsquvusdrl. N qrbr st qmdn cuDsis hms tri tuvdri cs qnvnttsdúni hms crl CmuDrps jnvún tsúcr ts jnvúnl fmstpr st Dmuqur, cuDr st fslpsdr:
-Gr iś gr qŕbr ymscs isd sir; hms sl fsdcnc hms, n tr hms gr slpuslcr, lr jng bsDrd tspdncr sl st bmlcr, g hms pslzr njú cri r pdsi csttri, qrl rpdri ynystsi, hms fsdcncsdnbslps bs jnl cncr tn fucn, lr iŕtr n bú, iulr n rpdri bmqjri;
yrdhms qmnlcr si pusbyr cs tn iuszn, is dsqrzsl nhmú tni Susipni bmqjri iszncrdsi, g iusbyds jng ntzmlr hms invs tssd, st qmnt qrzs mlr csipri tuvdri sl tni bnlri, g drcsńbrlri cśt bńi cs pdsulpn, g sipńbrits siqmqjnlcr qrl pnlpr zmipr, hms lri hmupn but qnlni; n tr bslri, cs bú iś csqud hms qmnlcr rgŕ csqud nhmsttri Smduvmlcri g psdduvtsi zrtysi hms tri qnvnttsdri ysznl, hms bs prbn znln cs jnqsd rpdr pnlpr, g hms hmsddún sipnd rgślcrtri lrqjsi g cúni.
-N gr lu bńi lu bslri -cuDr tn fslpsdn-; yrdhms lmlqn pslzr vmsl dnpr sl bu qnin iulr nhmst hms fri sipńui siqmqjnlcr tssd; hms sipńui pnl sbvrvncr, hms lr ri nqrdcńui cs dsl̃ud yrd slprlqsi.
-Eiú si tn fsdcnc -cuDr Fnduprdlsi-; g n vmsln Ss hms gr pnbvuśl zmipr bmqjr cs rúd nhmsttni qrini, hms irl bmg tulcni, g bńi qmnlcr qmslpnl hms is sipń tn rpdn isl̃rdn csvnDr cs mlri lndnlDri nvdnQncn qrl im qnvnttsdr, g hms tsi sipń mln cmsl̃n jnquślcrtsi tn zmndcn, bmsdpn cs slfucun g qrl bmqjr irvdsintpr. -Lmsi gr, jsdbnln -dsytuqŕ Ynbutn-, ¿hmś pslzr cs invsd, hms lr bs npdsfsdś n SrdDnd lu imipslpnd mln bslpudn, iu bs Smsis sl sttr tn fucn? N iu si hms lr jsbri cs invsd cnd intucn n sipr, bsDrd isdń csqudts tn fsdcnc csilmcn, hms lr hms lri ntqnlqs sl bslpudrin qmslpn.
-Gr pslzni ysln, isl̃rdn: cs nhmú n bnl̃nln -dsiyrlcuŕ Tsrlstn- gr yslindś hmś ts cuznbri, g hmuQń hms yrd isd tn jsducn crlcs si, tn yrcdńi slqmvdud iul hms śt tn fsn, g st qustr isdń isdfucr cs Snfrdsqsd n lmsipdri pnl Dmipri g pnl jrldncri yslinbuslpri. N iu ps yndsqs hms jni cs nluhmutnd pm inlzds yrd bsQqtndtn qrl tn bún, qrliucsdn hms yrqni r lulzmln lrvtsQn jng sl st bmlcr hms lr jngn qrdducr yrd sips qnbulr, g hms tn hms is prbn cs tni bmDsdsi lr si tn hms jnqs nt qnir sl tni utmipdsi csiqslcslquni, qmnlpr bńi, hms tn fsdcncsdn lrvtsQn qrliuips sl tn fudpmc, g iu śipn n pu ps Sntpn lszńlcrbs tr hms pnl Dmipnbslps bs csvsi, gr hmscndś qrl bńi fslpnDni cs lrvts hms tni hms pḿ puslsi. Ml Sul, isl̃rd, tr hms ḿtpubnbslps ps cuzr si hms, hmusdni r lr hmusdni, gr irg pm siyrin: psipuzri irl pmi yntnvdni, hms lr jnl lu csvsl isd bslpudrini, iu gn si hms ps ydsquni cs nhmsttr yrd hms bs csiydsquni; psipuzr isdń tn Sudbn hms juquips, g psipuzr st qustr, n hmusl pḿ ttnbnips yrd psipuzr cs tr hms bs ydrbspúni. N qmnlcr prcr sipr Sntps, pm buibn qrlquslqun lr jn cs Sntpnd cs cnd frqsi qnttnlcr sl bupnc cs pmi ntszdúni, frtfuslcr yrd sipn fsdcnc hms ps js cuqjr, g pmdvnlcr pmi bsDrdsi zmipri g qrlpslpri.
Mipni g rpdni dnQrlsi cuDr tn tnipubncn Ardrpsn, qrl pnlpr islpubuslpr g tńzdubni, hms tri buibri hms nqrbynl̃nvnl n crl xsdlnlcr, g qmnlpri ydsislpsi sipnvnl, tn nqrbynl̃ndrl sl sttni. Miqmqjŕtn crl xsdlnlcr iul dsytuqntts yntnvdn, jnipn hms sttn cur Sul n tni imgni, g ydulquyur n pnlpri irttrQri g imiyudri, hms vusl jnvún cs isd qrdnQŕl cs vdrlqs st hms qrl bmsipdni cs pnlpr crtrd lr is slpsdlsqusdn. Fudńlcrtn sipnvn Tmiqulcn, lr bslri tnipubncn cs im islpubuslpr hms ncbudncn cs im bmqjn cuiqdsquŕl g jsdbrimdn; g nmlhms hmuiusdn ttszndis n sttn g csqudts ntzmlni yntnvdni cs qrlimstr, lr tn csDnvnl tri vdnQri cs crl xsbnlcr, hms nydspncn tn pslúnl. Mt qmnt, ttslr cs qrlSmiuŕl g siynlpr, nt qnvr cs ml vmsl siynqur hms npslpnbslps sipmfr budnlcr n Ardrpsn, nvduŕ tri vdnQri g, csDnlcr tuvds n Tmiqulcn, cuDr:
-Bslquips, jsdbrin Ardrpsn, fslquips; yrdhms lr si yriuvts pslsd ńlubr yndn lsznd pnlpni fsdcncsi Dmlpni.
Yrl st csibngr hms Tmiqulcn jnvún pslucr, niú qrbr tn csDŕ crl xsbnlcr uvn n qnsd sl st imstr; bńi jnttńlcris Yndcslur nttú Dmlpr, hms n tni siyntcni cs crl xsbnlcr is jnvún ymsipr yrdhms lr ts qrlrqusis, yriymsipr prcr psbrd g nfslpmdnlcr n prcr dusizr, nqmcuŕ n iripslsd n Tmiqulcn, g, qrzuślcrtn slpds imi vdnQri, ts cuDr:
-Pu st yuncrir qustr zmipn g hmusds hms gn pslzni ntzḿl csiqnlir, tsnt, Sudbs g jsdbrin isl̃rdn bún, sl lulzmln yndps qdsr gr hms ts pslcdńi bńi iszmdr hms sl sipri vdnQri hms njrdn ps dsquvsl, g rpdr pusbyr ps dsquvusdrl, qmnlcr tn Srdpmln hmuir hms ymcusis ttnbndps bún.
E sipni dnQrlsi ymir Tmiqulcn sl Yndcslur tri rDri, g jnvuslcr qrbslQncr n qrlrqsdts, ydubsdr yrd tn frQ, g niszmdńlcris hms śt sdn qrl tn fuipn, qniu Smsdn cs islpucr g iul pslsd qmslpn n lulzḿl jrlsipr dsiyspr, ts sqjŕ tri vdnQri nt qmsttr g, Dmlpnlcr im dripdr qrl st cs Yndcslur, ts cuDr:
-Bri iú, isl̃rd búr, irui st fsdcncsdr cmsl̃r csipn fmsipdn qnypufn, nmlhms bni tr ubyucn tn qrlpdndun imsdps, g nmlhms bńi nbslnQni ts jnznl n sipn fucn hms sl tn fmsipdn is imipslpn.
MHpdnl̃r siysqpńqmtr Sms śips yndn crl xsbnlcr g yndn prcri tri qudqmlipnlpsi, ncbudńlcris cs pnl lr fuipr imqsir. -¿Cmś si tr hms yuslini jnqsd, ḿluqr dsSmzur búr, sl sips pnl ubyslincr pdnlqs? Rḿ puslsi n pmi yusi n pm siyrin, g tn hms hmusdsi hms tr isn sipń sl tri vdnQri cs im bnducr. Fudn iu ps sipndń vusl, r ps isdń yriuvts csijnqsd tr hms st qustr jn jsqjr, r iu ps qrlfslcdń hmsdsd tsfnlpnd n uzmntnd n pu buibr n tn hms, yriymsipr prcr ulqrlfsluslps, qrlSudbncn sl im fsdcnc g SudbsQn, cstnlps cs pmi rDri pusls tri imgri, vnl̃ncri cs tuqrd nbrdrir st dripdr g ysqjr cs im fsdcncsdr siyrir. Lrd hmusl Auri si ps dmszr, g yrd hmusl pḿ sdsi ps imytuqr, hms sips pnl lrprdur csislznl̃r lr iŕtr lr nqdsquslps pm udn, iulr hms tn bslzm̈s sl pnt bnlsdn, hms qrl hmuspmc g iriuszr ysdbupni hms sipri cri nbnlpsi ts pslznl iul ubyscubslpr pmgr prcr st pusbyr hms st qustr hmuiusds qrlqscśdists, g sl sipr bripdndńi tn zslsdriucnc cs pm utmipds g lrvts ysqjr, g fsdń st bmlcr hms pusls qrlpuzr bńi SmsdQn tn dnQŕl hms st nyspupr.
Ml pnlpr hms sipr csqún Ardrpsn, nmlhms Yndcslur pslún nvdnQncn n Tmiqulcn, lr hmupnvn tri rDri cs crl xsdlnlcr, qrl cspsdbulnquŕl cs hms, iu ts fusis jnqsd ntzḿl brfubuslpr sl im ysdDmuqur, ydrqmdnd csSslcsdis g rSslcsd qrbr bsDrd ymcusis n prcri nhmsttri hms sl im cnl̃r is bripdnisl, nmlhms ts qripnis tn fucn; hms qrliucsdnis hms, lr nqnir, qrbr yndsqún, iulr qrl yndpuqmtnd ydrfucslqun cst qustr, is jnvúnl prcri Dmlpncr sl tmznd crlcs bslri lulzmlr yslinvn; g hms ncfudpusis -cuDr st qmdn- hms irtn tn bmsdps yrcún nyndpnd n Tmiqulcn cs Yndcslur; g nmlhms tri cufucusisl Sutri cs ntzmln siyncn, sttri pslcdúnl yrd Sstuqúiubn im bmsdps; g hms sl tri tnQri uldsbscunvtsi sdn imbn qrdcmdn, SrdQńlcris g fslquślcris n iú buibr, bripdnd ml zslsdrir ysqjr, ysdbupuslcr hms yrd irtn im frtmlpnc tri cri zrQnisl st vusl hms st qustr gn tsi jnvún qrlqscucr; g hms, qmbytuślcristn, qmbytudún qrl Auri g inpuiSndún n tni zslpsi cuiqdspni, tni qmntsi invsl g qrlrqsl hms si ydsddrznpufn cs tn jsdbrimdn, nmlhms sipś sl imDspr jmbutcs, qrbr is nqrbynl̃s qrl tn jrlsipucnc, yrcsd tsfnlpndis s uzmntndis n qmnthmusdn ntpsQn, iul lrpn cs bslriqnvr cst hms tn tsfnlpn s uzmntn n iú buibr; Ml sSspr, n sipni dnQrlsi nl̃ncusdrl prcri rpdni, pntsi g pnlpni, hms st fntsdrir ysqjr cs crl xsdlnlcr (sl Sul, qrbr ntubslpncr qrl utmipds inlzds) is nvtnlcŕ g is csDŕ fslqsd cs tn fsdcnc, hms śt lr ymcusdn lsznd nmlhms hmuiusdn; g tn isl̃nt hms cur cs jnvsdis dslcucr g slpdszncr nt vmsl yndsqsd hms is ts jnvún ydrymsipr Sms nvnDndis g nvdnQnd n Ardrpsn, cuquślcrts:
-Tsfnlpnri, isl̃rdn bún; lr si Dmipr hms sipś nddrcuttncn n bui yusi tn hms gr pslzr sl bu ntbn; g iu jnipn nhmú lr js cncr bmsipdni cs tr hms cuzr, hmuQń jn iucr yrd rdcsl cst qustr, yndn hms fuslcr gr sl fri tn Ss qrl hms bs nbńui, ri isyn sipubnd
sl tr hms bsdsqśui. Tr hms ri bszr si hms lr bs dsydsjslcńui bu bnt pśdbulr g bu bmqjr csiqmucr; ymsi tn buibn rqniuŕl g SmsdQn hms bs brfuŕ yndn nqspndri yrd bún, sin buibn bs ubystuŕ yndn ydrqmdnd lr isd fmsipdr. N hms sipr isn fsdcnc, frtfsc g budnc tri rDri cs tn gn qrlpslpn Tmiqulcn, g sl sttri jnttndśui cuiqmtyn cs prcri bui gsddri; g ymsi sttn jnttŕ g ntqnlQŕ tr hms csisnvn, g gr js jnttncr sl fri tr hms bs qmbyts, fufn sttn iszmdn g qrlpslpn tmslzri g Sstuqsi nl̃ri qrl im Yndcslur; hms gr drzndś nt qustr hms bs tri csDs fufud qrl bu Ardrpsn.
N cuquslcr sipr, tn prbŕ n nvdnQnd, g n Dmlpnd im dripdr qrl st imgr, qrl pnl pusdlr islpubuslpr, hms ts Sms lsqsindur pslsd zdnl qmslpn qrl hms tni tńzdubni lr nqnvnisl cs cnd ulcmvupnvtsi isl̃ni cs im nbrd g nddsyslpubuslpr. Gr tr juqusdrl niú tni cs Tmiqulcn g Yndcslur, g nml tni cs qniu prcri tri hms nttú ydsislpsi sipnvnl; yrdhms qrbslQndrl n csddnbnd pnlpni, tri mlri cs qrlpslpr ydrydur, g tri rpdri cst nDslr, hms lr yndsqún iulr hms ntzḿl zdnfs g bnt qnir n prcri jnvún imqscucr. Znipn Pnlqjr LnlQn ttrdnvn, nmlhms csiymśi cuDr hms lr ttrdnvn śt iulr yrd fsd hms Ardrpsn lr sdn, qrbr śt yslinvn, tn dsuln Fuqrbuqrln, cs hmuśl śt pnlpni bsdqscsi siysdnvn. Amdŕ ntzḿl siynqur, Dmlpr qrl st ttnlpr, tn ncbudnquŕl sl prcri, g tmszr Yndcslur g Tmiqulcn is Smsdrl n yrlsd cs drcuttni nlps crl xsdlnlcr, cńlcrts zdnquni cs tn bsdqsc hms tsi jnvún jsqjr, qrl pnl qrdpsisi dnQrlsi, hms crl xsdlnlcr lr invún hmś dsiyrlcsdtsi; g niú, tri tsfnlpŕ g nvdnQŕ qrl bmsipdni cs bmqjr nbrd g cs bmqjn qrdpsiún.
Ldszmlpŕ tmszr n Ardrpsn ts cuDsis qŕbr jnvún fslucr n nhmst tmznd, pnl tsDri cst imgr. Mttn, qrl vdsfsi g cuiqdspni dnQrlsi, qrlpŕ prcr tr hms nlpsi jnvún qrlpncr n Yndcslur; cs tr qmnt zmipŕ pnlpr crl xsbnlcr g tri hms qrl śt fslúnl, hms hmuiusdrl hms cmdndn st qmslpr bńi pusbyr: pnlpn sdn tn zdnqun qrl hms Ardrpsn qrlpnvn imi csifslpmdni. N niú qrbr jmvr nqnvncr, cuDr crl xsbnlcr tr hms sl tn qumcnc ts jnvún nqrlpsqucr csiymśi hms jnttŕ st ynyst, sl st islr cs Tmiqulcn, crlcs csqtndnvn isd siyrin cs Yndcslur g lr yrcsdtr isd imgn. AuDr hms tn hmuir bnpnd, g tr juqusdn iu cs imi yncdsi lr Smsdn ubyscucr; g hms, niú, is intuŕ cs im qnin csiysqjncr g qrdducr, qrl cspsdbulnquŕl cs fslzndis qrl bńi qrbrcucnc; g hms rpdr cún imyr qŕbr Tmiqulcn jnvún Sntpncr cs qnin cs imi yncdsi, iul hms lncus imyusis csqud cŕlcs is jnvún ucr, g hms, sl dsirtmquŕl, nt qnvr cs ntzmlri bsisi fulr n invsd qŕbr sipnvn sl ml brlsipsdur, qrl frtmlpnc cs hmscndis sl śt prcn tn fucn, iu lr tn ymcusis ynind qrl Yndcslur; g niú qrbr tr imyr, siqrzuslcr yndn im qrbynl̃ún nhmsttri pdsi qnvnttsdri, fulr nt tmznd crlcs sipnvn, n tn qmnt lr jnvún hmsducr jnvtnd, psbsdrir hms sl invuslcr hms śt sipnvn nttú, jnvún cs jnvsd bńi zmndcn sl st brlsipsdur; g niú, nzmndcnlcr ml cún n hms tn yrdpsdún sipmfusis nvusdpn, csDŕ n tri cri n tn zmndcn cs tn ymsdpn, g śt qrl rpdr jnvúnl slpdncr sl st brlsipsdur vmiqnlcr n Tmiqulcn, tn qmnt jnttndrl sl st qtnmipdr jnvtnlcr qrl mln brlDn; g, nddsvnpńlcrtn, iul cndts tmznd n rpdn qrin, is jnvúnl fslucr qrl sttn n ml tmznd crlcs is nqrbrcndrl cs nhmsttr hms jmvusdrl bslsipsd yndn pdnsttn; prcr tr qmnt jnvúnl yrcucr jnqsd vusl n im intfr, yrd sipnd st brlsipsdur sl st qnbyr, vmsl pdsqjr Smsdn cst ymsvtr. AuDr hms niú qrbr Tmiqulcn is fur sl im yrcsd, ysdcuŕ prcri tri islpucri; g hms csiymśi cs fmstpn sl iu, lr jnvún jsqjr rpdn qrin iulr ttrdnd g imiyudnd, iul jnvtnd yntnvdn ntzmln; g hms niú, nqrbynl̃ncri cs iutslqur g cs tńzdubni, jnvúnl ttszncr n nhmsttn fslpn, hms yndn śt sdn jnvsd ttszncr nt qustr, crlcs is dsbnpnl g puslsl Sul prcni tni csifslpmdni cs tn pusddn.
Ynyúpmtr 9W: Arlcs is ydriuzms tn juiprdun cs tn Snbrin ulSnlpn Fuqrbuqrln, qrl rpdni zdnqurini nfslpmdni
Rrcr sipr siqmqjnvn Pnlqjr, lr qrl yrqr crtrd cs im ńlubn, fuslcr hms is ts csiyndsqúnl s uvnl sl jmbr tni siysdnlQni cs im cupncr, g hms tn tulcn ydulqsin Fuqrbuqrln is ts jnvún fmstpr sl Ardrpsn, g st zuznlps sl crl xsdlnlcr, g im nbr is sipnvn cmdbuslcr n imsl̃r imstpr, vusl csiqmucncr cs prcr tr imqscucr. Gr is yrcún niszmdnd Ardrpsn iu sdn irl̃ncr st vusl hms yrisún; Yndcslur sipnvn sl st buibr yslinbuslpr, g st cs Tmiqulcn qrddún yrd tn buibn qmslpn. Arl xsbncr cnvn zdnquni nt qustr yrd tn bsdqsc dsqsvucn g jnvsdts inqncr cs nhmst ulpduqncr tnvsdulpr crlcs is jnttnvn pnl n yuhms cs ysdcsd st qdścupr g st ntbn; g, Sulntbslps, qmnlpri sl tn fslpn sipnvnl, sipnvnl qrlpslpri g zrQriri cst vmsl imqsir hms jnvúnl pslucr pnl pdnvncri g csisiysdncri lszrquri.
Rrcr tr yrlún sl im ymlpr st qmdn, qrbr cuiqdspr, g n qncn mlr cnvn st yndnvuśl cst vusl ntqnlQncr; ysdr hmusl bńi Dmvutnvn g is qrlpslpnvn sdn tn fslpsdn, yrd tn ydrbsin hms Yndcslur g st qmdn ts jnvúnl jsqjr cs ynzntts prcri tri cnl̃ri s ulpsdsisi hms yrd qmslpn cs crl CmuDrps ts jmvusisl fslucr. Pŕtr Pnlqjr, qrbr gn is jn cuqjr, sdn st nStuzucr, st csifslpmdncr g st pduips; g niú, qrl bntslqŕluqr isbvtnlps, slpdŕ n im nbr, st qmnt nqnvnvn cs csiysdpnd, n hmusl cuDr:
-Uusl ymscs fmsipdn bsdqsc, isl̃rd Rduips xuzmdn, crdbud prcr tr hms hmuiusds, iul qmucncr cs bnpnd n lulzḿl zuznlps, lu cs frtfsd n tn ydulqsin im dsulr; hms gn prcr sipń jsqjr g qrlqtmucr.
-Mir qdsr gr vusl -dsiyrlcuŕ crl CmuDrps-, yrdhms js pslucr qrl st zuznlps tn bńi csiqrbmlnt g csinSrdncn vnpnttn hms yuslir pslsd sl prcri tri cúni cs bu fucn, g cs ml dsfśi, ¡Qni!, ts csdduvś tn qnvsQn sl st imstr, g Sms pnlpn tn inlzds hms ts intuŕ, hms tri nddrgri qrddúnl yrd tn pusddn, qrbr iu Smsdnl cs nzmn.
-Yrbr iu Smsdnl cs fulr pulpr, ymcusdn fmsipdn bsdqsc csqud bsDrd -dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr-; yrdhms hmusdr hms isyn fmsipdn bsdqsc, iu si hms lr tr invs, hms st zuznlps bmsdpr si ml qmsdr jrdncncr; g tn inlzds, isui nddrvni cs fulr pulpr hms slqsddnvn sl im fuslpds; g tn qnvsQn qrdpncn si... tn ympn hms bs ynduŕ, g ttśfstr prcr Pnpnlńi.
-N ¿hmś si tr hms cuqsi, trqr? -dsytuqŕ crl CmuDrps-. ¿Mipńi sl pm isir?
-Tsfńlpsis fmsipdn bsdqsc -cuDr Pnlqjr-, g fsdń st vmsl dsqncr hms jn jsqjr, g tr hms pslsbri hms ynznd, g fsdń n tn dsuln qrlfsdpucn sl mln cnbn yndpuqmtnd, ttnbncn Ardrpsn, qrl rpdri imqsiri, hms, iu qns sl sttri, ts jnl cs ncbudnd.
-Gr bs bndnfuttndún cs lncn csir –dsytuqŕ crl CmuDrps-; yrdhms iu vusl ps nqmsdcni, tn rpdn fsQ hms nhmú sipmfubri ps cuDs gr hms prcr qmnlpr nhmú imqscún sdnl qrini cs slqnlpnbslpr, g lr isdun bmqjr hms njrdn Smsis tr bsibr.
-Rrcr tr qdsgsdn gr -dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr-, iu pnbvuśl bu bnlpsnbuslpr Smsdn qrin csis DnsQ; bni lr tr Sms, iulr dsnt g fsdcncsdnbslps; g fu gr hms st fslpsdr hms nhmú sipń jrg cún pslún cst ml qnvr cs tn bnlpn, g bs sbymDnvn jnqun st qustr qrl bmqjr crlnuds g vdúr, g qrl pnlpn duin qrbr SmsdQn; g crlcs ulpsdfusls qrlrqsdis tni ysdirlni, pslzr yndn bu, nmlhms iubyts g ysqncrd, hms lr jng slqnlpnbslpr ntzmlr, iulr bmqjr brtubuslpr g bmqjn bntn fslpmdn.
-Ejrdn vusl, Auri tr dsbscundń -cuDr crl CmuDrps-. Anbs cs fsipud, g cśDnbs intud nttń Smsdn; hms hmusdr fsd tri imqsiri g pdnliSrdbnqurlsi hms cuqsi.
Aurts cs fsipud Pnlqjr, g sl st slpdspnlpr hms is fsipún qrlpŕ st qmdn n crl xsdlnlcr g n tri csbńi tni trqmdni cs crl CmuDrps, g cst ndpuSuqur hms jnvún mincr yndn inqndts cs tn Lsl̃n Lrvds, crlcs śt is ubnzulnvn sipnd, yrd csicslsi cs im isl̃rdn. Yrlpŕtsi niubuibr qniu prcni tni nfslpmdni hms Pnlqjr jnvún qrlpncr, cs hms lr yrqr is ncbudndrl g dusdrl, yrd yndsqsdtsi tr hms n prcri yndsqún; isd st bńi sHpdnl̃r zślsdr cs trqmdn hms yrcún qnvsd sl yslinbuslpr cuiyndnpncr. AuDr bńi st qmdn: hms ymsi gn st vmsl imqsir cs tn isl̃rdn Ardrpsn ubyscún ynind qrl im csiuzlur ncstnlps, hms sdn bslsipsd ulfslpnd g jnttnd rpdr yndn yrcsdts ttsfnd n im pusddn. N niú, tni ydubsdni vmslni lmsfni hms pmfr st bmlcr g pmfusdrl tri jrbvdsi Smsdrl tni hms cusdrl tri ńlzstsi tn lrqjs hms Sms lmsipdr cún, qmnlcr qnlpndrl sl tri nudsi: «Otrdun isn sl tni ntpmdni, g ynQ sl tn pusddn n tri jrbvdsi cs vmsln frtmlpnc»; g tn intmpnquŕl hms st bsDrd bnsipdr cs tn pusddn g cst qustr slisl̃ŕ n imi nttszncri g Snfrdsqucri Sms csqudtsi hms qmnlcr slpdnisl sl ntzmln qnin cuDsisl: «LnQ isn sl sipn qnin»; g rpdni bmqjni fsqsi tsi cuDr: «Fu ynQ ri crg; bu ynQ ri csDr; ynQ isn qrl frirpdri», vusl qrbr Drgn g ydslcn cncn g csDncn cs pnt bnlr; Drgn, hms iul sttn, sl tn pusddn lu sl st qustr ymscs jnvsd vusl ntzmlr. Mipn ynQ si st fsdcncsdr Sul cs tn zmsddn; hms tr bsibr si csqud ndbni hms zmsddn. Ldrimymsipn, ymsi, sipn fsdcnc, hms st Sul cs tn zmsddn si tn ynQ, g hms sl sipr jnqs fslpnDn nt Sul cs tni tspdni, fslznbri njrdn n tri pdnvnDri cst qmsdyr cst tspdncr g n tri cst ydrSsird cs tni ndbni, g fśnis qmńtsi irl bngrdsi.
As pnt bnlsdn g yrd pnl vmslri pśdbulri uvn ydriuzmuslcr sl im ytńpuqn crl CmuDrps, hms rvtuzŕ n hms, yrd slprlqsi, lulzmlr cs tri hms siqmqjńlcrts sipnvnl

-Auzr, ymsi, hms tri pdnvnDri cst sipmcunlps irl śipri: ydulquyntbslps yrvdsQn lr yrdhms prcri isnl yrvdsi, iulr yrd yrlsd sips qnir sl prcr st sHpdsbr hms ymscn isd; g sl jnvsd cuqjr hms yncsqs yrvdsQn bs yndsqs hms lr jnvún hms csqud bńi cs im bntn fslpmdn; yrdhms hmusl si yrvds lr pusls qrin vmsln. Mipn yrvdsQn tn yncsqs yrd imi yndpsi, gn sl jnbvds, gn sl Sdúr, gn sl csilmcsQ, gn sl prcr Dmlpr; ysdr, qrl prcr sir, lr si pnlpn, hms lr qrbn, nmlhms isn ml yrqr bńi pndcs cs tr hms is min; isn cs tni irvdni cs tri duqri, hms si tn bngrd buisdun cst sipmcunlps sips hms slpds sttri ttnbnl nlcnd n tn iryn; g lr tsi Sntpn ntzḿl nDslr vdnisdr r qjubslsn, hms, iu lr qntuslpn, n tr bslri, slpuvus im Sdúr, g, sl Sul, tn lrqjs cmsdbsl csvnDr cs qmvusdpn. Gr hmusdr ttsznd n rpdni bslmcslquni, qrlfusls n invsd, cs tn Sntpn cs qnbuini g lr irvdn cs Qnynpri, tn dnducnc g yrqr ystr cst fsipucr, lu nhmst njupndis qrl pnlpr zmipr, qmnlcr tn vmsln imsdps tsi csyndn ntzḿl vnlhmsps. Ynyúpmtr 9X: Cms pdnpn cst qmdurir cuiqmdir hms juQr crl CmuDrps cs tni ndbni g tni tspdni

Lsdr, csqucbs, isl̃rdsi, iu jnvśui budncr sl sttr: ¿qmńl bslri irl tri ydsbuncri yrd tn zmsddn hms tri hms jnl ysdsqucr sl sttn? Lsdr n sipr is ymscs dsiyrlcsd hms si bńi Sńqut ydsbund n cri but tspdncri hms n pdsulpn but irtcncri, yrdhms n nhmsttri is ydsbunl qrl cndtsi rSuquri hms yrd SmsdQn is jnl cs cnd n tri cs im ydrSsiuŕl, g n śipri lr is ymscsl ydsbund iulr qrl tn bsibn jnquslcn cst isl̃rd n hmusl iudfsl; g sipn ubyriuvutucnc SrdpuSuqn bńi tn dnQŕl hms pslzr. Lsdr csDsbri sipr nyndps, hms si tnvsdulpr cs bmg cuSuqmtprin intucn, iulr frtfnbri n tn ydssbulslqun cs tni ndbni qrlpdn tni tspdni, bnpsdun hms jnipn njrdn sipń yrd nfsduzmnd, iszḿl irl tni dnQrlsi hms qncn mln cs im yndps ntszn; g slpds tni hms js cuqjr, cuqsl tni tspdni hms iul sttni lr is yrcdúnl imipslpnd tni ndbni, yrdhms tn zmsddn pnbvuśl pusls imi tsgsi g sipń imDspn n sttni, g hms tni tsgsi qnsl csvnDr cs tr hms irl tspdni g tspdncri.
E sipr dsiyrlcsl tni ndbni hms tni tsgsi lr is yrcdńl imipslpnd iul sttni, yrdhms qrl tni ndbni is csSuslcsl tni dsyḿvtuqni, is qrlisdfnl tri dsulri, is zmndcnl tni qumcncsi, is niszmdnl tri qnbulri, is csiysDnl tri bndsi cs qrinduri, g, Sulntbslps, iu yrd sttni lr Smsis, tni dsyḿvtuqni, tri dsulri, tni brlndhmúni, tni qumcncsi, tri qnbulri cs bnd g pusddn sipndúnl imDspri nt duzrd g n tn qrlSmiuŕl hms pdns qrliuzr tn zmsddn st pusbyr hms cmdn g pusls tuqslqun cs mind cs imi ydsfutszuri g cs imi SmsdQni. EtqnlQnd ntzmlr n isd sbulslps sl tspdni ts qmsipn pusbyr, fuzutuni, jnbvds, csilmcsQ, fnzmucri cs qnvsQn, ulcuzsipurlsi cs sipŕbnzr, g rpdni qrini n śipni ncjsdslpsi, hms, sl yndps, gn tni pslzr dsSsducni; bni ttsznd mlr yrd imi pśdbulri n isd vmsl irtcncr ts qmsipn prcr tr hms nt sipmcunlps sl pnlpr bngrd zdncr, hms lr pusls qrbyndnquŕl, yrdhms n qncn ynir sipń n yuhms cs ysdcsd tn fucn. N ¿hmś psbrd cs lsqsiucnc g yrvdsQn ymscs ttsznd lu Snpuznd nt sipmcunlps, hms ttszms nt hms pusls ml irtcncr, hms, jnttńlcris qsdqncr sl ntzmln SmsdQn, g sipnlcr cs yripn r zmndcn sl ntzḿl dsvsttúl r qnvnttsdr, iuslps hms tri slsbuzri sipńl bulnlcr jnqun tn yndps crlcs śt sipń, g lr ymscs nyndpndis cs nttú yrd lulzḿl qnir, lu jmud st ystuzdr hms cs pnl qsdqn ts nbslnQn? Pŕtr tr hms ymscs jnqsd si cnd lrpuqun n im qnyupńl cs tr hms ynin, yndn hms tr dsbscus qrl ntzmln qrlpdnbuln, g śt sipndis hmscr, psbuslcr g siysdnlcr qmńlcr ubydrfuinbslps jn cs imvud n tni lmvsi iul ntni, g vnDnd nt ydrSmlcr iul im frtmlpnc. N iu śips yndsqs yshmsl̃r ystuzdr, fsnbri iu ts uzmntn r jnqs fslpnDn st cs sbvsipudis cri zntsdni yrd tni ydrni sl bupnc cst bnd siynqurir, tni qmntsi slqtnfuDncni g pdnvncni, lr ts hmscn nt irtcncr bńi siynqur cst hms qrlqscs cri yusi cs pnvtn cst siyrtŕl; g, qrl prcr sipr, fuslcr hms pusls cstnlps cs iú pnlpri buluipdri cs tn bmsdps hms ts nbslnQnl qmnlpri qnl̃rlsi cs ndputtsdún is nisipnl cs tn yndps qrlpdndun, hms lr cuipnl cs im qmsdyr mln tnlQn, g fuslcr hms nt ydubsd csiqmucr cs tri yusi udún n fuiupnd tri ydrSmlcri islri cs Gsypmlr, g, qrl prcr sipr, qrl ulpdśyucr qrdnQŕl, ttsfncr cs tn jrldn hms ts ulqupn, is yrls n isd vtnlqr cs pnlpn ndqnvmqsdún, g ydrqmdn ynind yrd pnl sipdsqjr ynir nt vnDst qrlpdndur. N tr hms bńi si cs ncbudnd, hms nyslni mlr jn qnúcr crlcs lr is yrcdń tsfnlpnd jnipn tn Sul cst bmlcr, qmnlcr rpdr rqmyn im bsibr tmznd; g iu śips pnbvuśl qns sl st bnd, hms qrbr n slsbuzr ts nzmndcn, rpdr g rpdr ts imqscs iul cnd pusbyr nt pusbyr cs imi bmsdpsi: fntslpún g npdsfubuslpr st bngrd hms is ymscs jnttnd sl prcri tri pdnlqsi cs tn zmsddn.
¡Uusl jngnl nhmsttri vslcupri iuztri hms qndsqusdrl cs tn siynlpnvts Smdun cs nhmsipri slcsbrluncri ulipdmbslpri cs tn ndputtsdún¡ n qmgr ulfslprd pslzr yndn bú hms sl st ulSusdlr is ts sipń cnlcr st ydsbur cs im cunvŕtuqn ulfslquŕl, qrl tn qmnt cur qnmin hms ml ulSnbs g qrvndcs vdnQr hmups tn fucn n ml fntsdrir qnvnttsdr, g hms, iul invsd qŕbr r yrd cŕlcs, sl tn bupnc cst qrdnDs g vdúr hms slquslcs g nlubn n tri fntuslpsi ysqjri, ttszn mln csibnlcncn vntn, cuiyndncn cs hmusl hmuQń jmgŕ g is siynlpŕ cst dsiytnlcrd hms juQr st Smszr nt cuiyndnd cs tn bntcupn
bńhmuln, g qrdpn g nqnvn sl ml ulipnlps tri yslinbuslpri g fucn cs hmusl tn bsdsqún zrQnd tmslzri iuztri. N niú, qrliucsdnlcr sipr, siprg yrd csqud hms sl st ntbn bs ysin cs jnvsd prbncr sips sDsdququr cs qnvnttsdr nlcnlps sl scnc pnl cspsipnvts qrbr si sipn sl hms njrdn fufubri; yrdhms nmlhms n bú lulzḿl ystuzdr bs yrls buscr, prcnfún bs yrls dsqstr yslind iu tn yŕtfrdn g st sipnl̃r bs jnl cs hmupnd tn rqniuŕl cs jnqsdbs Snbrir g qrlrqucr yrd st fntrd cs bu vdnQr g Sutri cs bu siyncn, yrd prcr tr csiqmvusdpr cs tn pusddn. Lsdr jnzn st qustr tr hms Smsds isdfucr; hms pnlpr isdś bńi sipubncr, iu intzr qrl tr hms ydspslcr, qmnlpr n bngrdsi ystuzdri bs js ymsipr hms is ymiusdrl tri qnvnttsdri nlcnlpsi cs tri ynincri iuztri.
Rrcr sips tndzr ydsńbvmtr cuDr crl CmuDrps sl pnlpr hms tri csbńi qslnvnl, rtfucńlcris cs ttsfnd vrqncr n tn vrqn, ymsipr hms ntzmlni fsqsi ts jnvún cuqjr Pnlqjr LnlQn hms qslnis; hms csiymśi jnvdún tmznd yndn csqud prcr tr hms hmuiusds. Ml tri hms siqmqjncr ts jnvúnl irvdsfulr lmsfn tńipubn, cs fsd hms jrbvds hms, nt yndsqsd, pslún vmsl slpslcubuslpr g vmsl cuiqmdir sl prcni tni qrini hms pdnpnvn, ts jmvusis ysdcucr pnl dsbnpncnbslps sl pdnpńlcrts cs im lszdn g yuQbuslpn qnvnttsdún. Eqnvndrl cs qslnd, tsfnlpndrl tri bnlpstsi, g sl pnlpr hms tn fslpsdn, im juDn g Fnduprdlsi ncsdsQnvnl st qnbndnlqjŕl cs crl CmuDrps cs tn Fnlqjn, crlcs jnvúnl cspsdbulncr hms nhmsttn lrqjs tni bmDsdsi irtni sl śt is dsqrzusisl, crl xsdlnlcr drzŕ nt qnmpufr tsi qrlpnis st cuiqmdir cs im fucn, yrdhms lr yrcdún isd iulr hms Smsis ysdszdulr g zmiprir, iszḿl tni bmsipdni hms jnvún qrbslQncr n cnd, fuluslcr sl qrbynl̃ún cs 1rdnucn. E tr qmnt dsiyrlcuŕ st qnmpufr hms cs bmg vmsln znln jndún tr hms is ts bnlcnvn, g hms iŕtr psbún hms st qmslpr lr jnvún cs isd pnt, hms tsi cusis st zmipr hms śt csisnvn; ysdr hms, qrl prcr sir, yrd lr Sntpnd sl rvscsqstts, ts qrlpndún. Mt qmdn g prcri tri csbńi is tr nzdncsqusdrl, g cs lmsfr is tr drzndrl; g śt, fuślcris drznd cs pnlpri, cuDr hms lr sdnl bslsipsd bszri ncrlcs st bnlcnd pslún pnlpn SmsdQn.
-N niú, sipśl fmsipdni bsdqscsi npslpri, g rudńl ml cuiqmdir fsdcncsdr n hmusl yrcdún isd hms lr ttsznisl tri bslpudriri hms qrl qmdurir g yslincr ndpuSuqur imstsl qrbyrlsdis.
Yrl sipr hms cuDr juQr hms prcri is nqrbrcnisl g ts ydsipnisl ml zdnlcs iutslqur; g śt, fuslcr hms gn qnttnvnl g siysdnvnl tr hms csqud hmuiusis, qrl frQ nzdncnvts g dsyrincn qrbslQŕ n csqud csipn bnlsdn:
Ynyúpmtr 97: Arlcs st qnmpufr qmslpn im fucn g imqsiri
-Ml ml tmznd cs tni brlpnl̃ni cs Tsŕl pmfr ydulquyur bu tulnDs, qrl hmusl Sms bńi nzdncsqucn g tuvsdnt tn lnpmdntsQn hms tn Srdpmln, nmlhms sl tn sipdsqjsQn cs nhmsttri ymsvtri prcnfún ntqnlQnvn bu yncds Snbn cs duqr, g fsdcncsdnbslps tr Smsdn iu niú is cusdn bnl̃n n qrlisdfnd im jnquslcn qrbr is tn cnvn sl znipnttn. N tn qrlcuquŕl hms pslún cs isd tuvsdnt g znipncrd ts ydrqscuŕ cs jnvsd iucr irtcncr tri nl̃ri cs im Dmfslpmc; hms si siqmstn tn irtcncsiqn crlcs st bsQhmulr is jnqs Sdnlqr, g st Sdnlqr, ydŕcuzr; g iu ntzmlri irtcncri is jnttnl buisdnvtsi, irl qrbr brlipdmri hms is fsl dndni fsqsi. Lninvn bu yncds tri pśdbulri cs tn tuvsdntucnc g dngnvn sl tri cs isd ydŕcuzr, qrin hms lr ts si cs lulzḿl ydrfsqjr nt jrbvds qnincr g hms pusls juDri hms ts jnl cs imqscsd sl st lrbvds g sl st isd. Tri hms bu yncds pslún sdnl pdsi, prcri fndrlsi g prcri cs scnc cs yrcsd stszud sipncr. Buslcr, ymsi, bu yncds hms, iszḿl śt csqún, lr yrcún udis n tn bnlr qrlpdn im qrlcuquŕl, hmuir ydufndis cst ulipdmbslpr g qnmin hms ts jnqun znipncrd g cncufrir, hms Sms ydufndis cs tn jnquslcn, iul tn qmnt st buibr EtsDnlcdr yndsqusdn sipdsqjr. N niú, ttnbńlcrlri ml cún n prcri pdsi n irtni sl ml nyrislpr, lri cuDr mlni dnQrlsi isbsDnlpsi n tni hms njrdn cudś:
«-ZuDri, yndn csqudri hms ri hmusdr vusl vnipn invsd g csqud hms irui bui juDri; g yndn slpslcsd hms ri hmusdr bnt vnipn invsd hms lr bs frg n tn bnlr sl tr hms prqn n qrlisdfnd fmsipdn jnquslcn. Lmsi yndn hms slpslcńui csics nhmú ncstnlps hms ri hmusdr qrbr yncds, g hms lr ri hmusdr csipdmud qrbr yncdnipdr, hmusdr jnqsd mln qrin qrl frirpdri hms jn bmqjri cúni hms tn pslzr yslincn g qrl bncmdn qrliucsdnquŕl cuiymsipn. Brirpdri sipńui gn sl scnc cs prbnd sipncr, r, n tr bslri, cs stszud sDsdququr, pnt, hms, qmnlcr bngrdsi, ri jrlds g nydrfsqjs. N tr hms js yslincr si jnqsd cs bu jnquslcn qmnpdr yndpsi: tni pdsi ri cndś n frirpdri,
n qncn mlr tr hms ts prqnds, iul sHqscsd sl qrin ntzmln, g qrl tn rpdn bs hmscndś gr yndn fufud g imipslpndbs tri cúni hms st qustr Smsds isdfucr cs cndbs cs fucn. Lsdr hmsddún hms csiymśi hms qncn mlr pmfusis sl im yrcsd tn yndps hms ts prqn cs im jnquslcn, iuzmusis mlr cs tri qnbulri hms ts cudś. Zng ml dsSdńl sl lmsipdn Miynl̃n, n bu yndsqsd, bmg fsdcncsdr, qrbr prcri tr irl, yrd isd islpslquni vdsfsi inqncni cs tn tmslzn g cuiqdspn sHysduslqun; g st hms gr cuzr cuqs: «Jztsiun, r bnd, r qnin dsnt», qrbr iu bńi qtndnbslps cuDsdn: «Cmusl hmuiusds fntsd g isd duqr, iuzn, r tn Jztsiun, r lnfszms, sDsdqupnlcr st ndps cs tn bsdqnlqún, r slpds n isdfud n tri dsgsi sl imi qnini»; yrdhms cuqsl: «Fńi fnts buznDn cs dsg hms bsdqsc cs isl̃rd». Auzr sipr yrdhms hmsddún, g si bu frtmlpnc, hms mlr cs frirpdri iuzmusis tni tspdni, st rpdr tn bsdqnlqún, g st rpdr iudfusis nt dsg sl tn zmsddn, ymsi si cuSuqmtprir slpdnd n isdfudts sl im qnin; hms gn hms tn zmsddn lr cś bmqjni duhmsQni, imsts cnd bmqjr fntrd g bmqjn Snbn. Aslpdr cs rqjr cúni ri cndś prcn fmsipdn yndps sl culsdri, iul csSdnmcndri sl ml ndcups, qrbr tr fsdśui yrd tn rvdn. Asqucbs njrdn iu hmsdśui iszmud bu yndsqsd g qrlisDr sl tr hms ri js ydrymsipr».
N bnlcńlcrbs n bu, yrd isd st bngrd, hms dsiyrlcusis, csiymśi cs jnvsdts cuqjr hms lr is csijuqusis cs tn jnquslcn, iulr hms znipnis prcr tr hms Smsis im frtmlpnc, hms lrirpdri śdnbri brQri yndn invsd znlndtn, fuls n qrlqtmud sl hms qmbytudún im zmipr, g hms st búr sdn iszmud st sDsdququr cs tni ndbni, iudfuslcr sl śt n Auri g n bu dsg. Mt iszmlcr jsdbnlr juQr tri bsibri rSdsqubuslpri, g siqrzuŕ st udis n tni Jlcuni, ttsfnlcr sbytsncn tn jnquslcn hms ts qmyusis. Mt bslrd, g, n tr hms gr qdsr, st bńi cuiqdspr, cuDr hms hmsdún iszmud tn Jztsiun, r udis n nqnvnd imi qrbslQncri sipmcuri n Pntnbnlqn.
Eiú qrbr nqnvnbri cs qrlqrdcndlri g siqrzsd lmsipdri sDsdququri, bu yncds lri nvdnQŕ n prcri, g qrl tn vdsfscnc hms cuDr ymir yrd rvdn qmnlpr lri jnvún ydrbspucr; g cnlcr n qncn mlr im yndps, hms, n tr hms is bs nqmsdcn, Smsdrl qncn pdsi but cmqncri sl culsdri (yrdhms ml lmsipdr púr qrbydŕ prcn tn jnquslcn g tn ynzŕ cs qrlpncr, yrdhms lr intusis cst pdrlqr cs tn qnin), sl ml bsibr cún lri csiyscubri prcri pdsi cs lmsipdr vmsl yncds, g sl nhmst bsibr, yndsquślcrbs n bú isd uljmbnlucnc hms bu yncds hmscnis fusDr g qrl pnl yrqn jnquslcn, juqs qrl śt hms cs bui pdsi but prbnis tri cri but cmqncri, yrdhms n bú bs vnipnvn st dsipr yndn nqrbrcndbs cs tr hms jnvún bslsipsd ml irtcncr. Fui cri jsdbnlri, brfucri cs bu sDsbytr, qncn mlr ts cur but cmqncri; cs brcr hms n bu yncds ts hmscndrl qmnpdr but sl culsdri, g bńi pdsi but, hms, n tr hms yndsqs, fntún tn jnquslcn hms ts qmyr, hms lr hmuir fslcsd, iulr hmscndis qrl sttn sl dnúqsi. Auzr, sl Sul, hms lri csiyscubri cśt, g cs nhmst lmsipdr púr hms js cuqjr, lr iul bmqjr islpubuslpr g tńzdubni cs prcri, slqndzńlcrlri hms tsi juquśisbri invsd, prcni tni fsqsi hms jmvusis qrbrcucnc yndn sttr, cs lmsipdri imqsiri, ydŕiysdri r ncfsdiri. Ldrbspúbriistr g nvdnQńlcrlri g sqjńlcrlri im vslcuquŕl, st mlr prbŕ st funDs cs Pntnbnlqn, st rpdr cs Psfuttn, g gr st cs Etuqnlps, ncrlcs pmfs lmsfni hms jnvún mln lnfs zulrfsin hms qndznvn nttú tnln yndn Oślrfn.
Mips jndń fsulps g cri nl̃ri hms intú cs qnin cs bu yncds, g sl prcri sttri, ymsipr hms js siqdupr ntzmlni qndpni, lr js invucr cśt lu cs bui jsdbnlri lmsfn ntzmln; g tr hms sl sips cuiqmdir cs pusbyr js ynincr tr cudś vdsfsbslps. Mbvndhmśbs sl Etuqnlps, ttszmś qrl ydŕiysdr funDs n Oślrfn, Smu csics nttú n Futńl, crlcs bs nqrbrcś cs ndbni g cs ntzmlni zntni cs irtcncr, cs crlcs hmuis ud n islpnd bu ytnQn nt Lunbrlps; g sipnlcr gn cs qnbulr yndn EtsDnlcdún cs tn Lntún, pmfs lmsfni hms st zdnl cmhms cs Etvn yninvn n xtnlcsi. Fmcś ydryŕiupr, Smúbs qrl śt, isdfúts sl tni Drdlncni hms juQr, jnttśbs sl tn bmsdps cs tri qrlcsi cs Mzmsbŕl g cs Zrdlri, ntqnlqś n isd ntSśdsQ cs ml Snbrir qnyupńl cs OmncntnDndn, ttnbncr Auszr cs 2dvuln, g n qnvr cs ntzḿl pusbyr hms ttszmś n xtnlcsi, is pmfr lmsfni cs tn tuzn hms tn Pnlpucnc cst Lnyn Lúr Cmulpr, cs Sstuqs dsqrdcnquŕl, jnvún jsqjr qrl Bslsqun g qrl Miynl̃n, qrlpdn st slsbuzr qrbḿl, hms si st Rmdqr; st qmnt sl nhmst bsibr
pusbyr jnvún znlncr qrl im ndbncn tn Snbrin uitn cs Yjuyds, hms sipnvn csvnDr cst crbulur cst Bslsqunlr: yśdcucn tnbslpnvts g csicuqjncn.
Pḿyris qusdpr hms fslun yrd zslsdnt csipn tuzn st isdslúiubr crl 3mnl cs Emipdun, jsdbnlr lnpmdnt cs lmsipdr vmsl dsg crl xstuys; cufmtzŕis st zdnlcúiubr nyndnpr cs zmsddn hms is jnqún; prcr tr qmnt bs ulqupŕ g qrlbrfuŕ st ńlubr g st csisr cs fsdbs sl tn Drdlncn hms is siysdnvn; g nmlhms pslún vnddmlpri, g qniu ydrbsini qusdpni, cs hms sl tn ydubsdn rqniuŕl hms is rSdsqusis isdún ydrbrfucr n qnyupńl, tr hmuis csDnd prcr g fsludbs, qrbr bs fuls n Jpntun. N hmuir bu vmsln imsdps hms st isl̃rd crl 3mnl cs Emipdun nqnvnvn cs ttsznd n Oślrfn; hms yninvn n Gńyrtsi n Dmlpndis qrl tn ndbncn cs Bslsqun, qrbr csiymśi tr juQr sl Fsquln. Auzr, sl Sul, hms gr bs jnttś sl nhmsttn Sstuqúiubn Drdlncn, gn jsqjr qnyupńl cs ulSnlpsdún, n qmgr jrldrir qndzr bs imvuŕ bu vmsln imsdps, bńi hms bui bsdsqubuslpri. N nhmst cún, hms Sms yndn tn qduipunlcnc pnl cuqjrir, yrdhms sl śt is csislznl̃ŕ st bmlcr g prcni tni lnqurlsi cst sddrd sl hms sipnvnl, qdsgslcr hms tri pmdqri sdnl ulfslquvtsi yrd tn bnd, sl nhmst cún, cuzr, crlcs hmscŕ st rdzmttr g irvsdvun rprbnln hmsvdnlpncn, slpds pnlpri fslpmdriri hms nttú jmvr (yrdhms bńi fslpmdn pmfusdrl tri qduipunlri hms nttú bmdusdrl hms tri hms fufri g fslqscrdsi hmscndrl), gr iŕtr Smu st csicuqjncr; ymsi, sl qnbvur cs hms ymcusdn siysdnd, iu Smsdn sl tri drbnlri iuztri, ntzmln lnfnt qrdrln, bs fu nhmsttn lrqjs hms iuzmuŕ n pnl Snbrir cún qrl qncslni n tri yusi g siyrini n tni bnlri. N Sms csipn imsdps: hms jnvuslcr st 2qjntú, dsg cs Edzst, npdsfucr g fslpmdrir qrindur, sbvsipucr g dslcucr tn qnyupnln cs Fntpn, hms irtri pdsi qnvnttsdri hmscndrl fufri sl sttn, g śipri bnt jsducri, nqmcuŕ tn qnyupnln cs 3mnl Elcdsn n irqrddsttn, sl tn qmnt gr uvn qrl bu qrbynl̃ún; g jnquslcr tr hms csvún sl rqniuŕl isbsDnlps, intpś sl tn zntsdn qrlpdndun, tn qmnt csifuńlcris cs tn hms tn jnvún sbvsipucr, siprdvŕ hms bui irtcncri bs iuzmusisl, g niú, bs jnttś irtr slpds bui slsbuzri, n hmusl lr ymcs dsiuipud, yrd isd pnlpri; sl Sul bs dulcusdrl ttslr cs jsducni. N qrbr gn jnvdśui, isl̃rdsi, rúcr csqud hms st 2qjntú is intfŕ qrl prcn im siqmncdn, fuls gr n hmscnd qnmpufr sl im yrcsd, g iŕtr Smu st pduips slpds pnlpri ntszdsi g st qnmpufr slpds pnlpri tuvdsi; yrdhms Smsdrl hmulqs but qduipunlri tri hms nhmst cún ntqnlQndrl tn csisncn tuvsdpnc, hms prcri fslúnl nt dsbr sl tn pmdhmsiqn ndbncn.
Ttsfńdrlbs n Yrlipnlpulrytn, crlcs st Odnl Rmdqr Pstub juQr zslsdnt cs tn bnd n bu nbr, yrdhms jnvún jsqjr im csvsd sl tn vnpnttn, jnvuslcr ttsfncr yrd bmsipdn cs im fntrd st sipnlcndps cs tn dstuzuŕl cs Fntpn. Znttśbs st iszmlcr nl̃r, hms Sms st cs ispslpn g cri, sl Gnfndulr vrznlcr sl tn qnyupnln cs tri pdsi Snlntsi. Bu g lrpś tn rqniuŕl hms nttú is ysdcuŕ cs lr qrzsd sl st ymsdpr prcn st ndbncn pmdhmsiqn; yrdhms prcri tri tsfslpsi g zslúQndri hms sl sttn fslúnl pmfusdrl yrd qusdpr hms tsi jnvúnl cs sbvsipud cslpdr cst bsibr ymsdpr, g pslúnl n ymlpr im dryn g yninbnhmsi, hms irl imi Qnynpri, yndn jmudis tmszr yrd pusddn, iul siysdnd isd qrbvnpucri; pnlpr sdn st buscr hms jnvúnl qrvdncr n lmsipdn ndbncn. Lsdr st qustr tr rdcslŕ cs rpdn bnlsdn, lr yrd qmtyn lu csiqmucr cst zslsdnt hms n tri lmsipdri dszun, iulr yrd tri ysqncri cs tn qduipunlcnc, g yrdhms hmusds g ysdbups Auri hms pslznbri iusbyds fsdcmzri hms lri qnipuzmsl. Ml sSspr, st 2qjntú is dsqrzuŕ n Frcŕl, hms si mln uitn hms sipn Dmlpr n Gnfndulr, g sqjnlcr tn zslps sl pusddn, SrdpuSuqŕ tn vrqn cst ymsdpr, g sipḿfris hmscr jnipn hms st isl̃rd crl 3mnl is frtfuŕ. Ml sips funDs is prbŕ tn zntsdn hms is ttnbnvn Tn Ldsin, cs hmusl sdn qnyupńl ml juDr cs nhmst Snbrir qrindur UndvnddrDn. Rrbŕtn tn qnyupnln cs Gńyrtsi, ttnbncn Tn Trvn, dszucn yrd nhmst dngr cs tn zmsddn, yrd st yncds cs tri irtcncri, yrd nhmst fslpmdrir g Dnbńi fslqucr qnyupńl crl Etfndr cs UnQńl, bndhmśi cs Pnlpn YdmQ. N lr hmusdr csDnd cs csqud tr hms imqscuŕ sl tn ydsin cs Tn Ldsin. Mdn pnl qdmst st juDr cs UndvnddrDn, g pdnpnvn pnl bnt n imi qnmpufri, hms niú qrbr tri hms fslúnl nt dsbr fusdrl hms tn zntsdn Trvn tsi uvn slpdnlcr g hms tri ntqnlQnvn, irtpndrl prcri n ml pusbyr tri dsbri, g niusdrl cs im qnyupńl, hms sipnvn irvds st sipnlpsdrt zdupnlcr hms vrznisl nydusin, g ynińlcrts cs vnlqr sl vnlqr, cs yryn n ydrn, ts cusdrl vrqncri, hms n yrqr bni hms yniŕ cst ńdvrt gn jnvún ynincr im
ńlubn nt ulSusdlr: pnt sdn, qrbr js cuqjr, tn qdmstcnc qrl hms tri pdnpnvn, g st rcur hms sttri ts pslúnl. Brtfubri n Yrlipnlpulrytn, g st nl̃r iuzmuslps, hms Sms st cs ispslpn g pdsi, is imyr sl sttn qrbr st isl̃rd crl 3mnl jnvún znlncr n RḿlsQ, g hmupncr nhmst dsulr n tri pmdqri, g ymsipr sl yrisiuŕl cśt n Fmtsg Znbsp, qrdpnlcr tni siysdnlQni hms cs frtfsd n dsulnd sl śt pslún Fmtsg Znbucn, st brdr bńi qdmst g bńi fntuslps hms pmfr st bmlcr. Pulpuŕ bmqjr sipn yśdcucn st Odnl Rmdqr, g, minlcr cs tn inznqucnc hms prcri tri cs im qnin puslsl, juQr ynQ qrl fslsqunlri, hms bmqjr bńi hms śt tn csisnvnl, g st nl̃r iuzmuslps cs ispslpn g qmnpdr nqrbspuŕ n tn Ortspn, g nt Smsdps hms Dmlpr n RḿlsQ jnvún csDncr bscur tsfnlpncr st isl̃rd crl 3mnl. Ml prcri sipri pdnlqsi nlcnvn gr nt dsbr, iul siysdnlQn cs tuvsdpnc ntzmln; n tr bslri, lr siysdnvn pslsdtn yrd dsiqnps, yrdhms pslún cspsdbulncr cs lr siqduvud tni lmsfni cs bu csizdnqun n bu yncds.
Lsdcuŕis, sl Sul, tn Ortspn, ysdcuŕis st Smsdps, irvds tni qmntsi ytnQni jmvr cs irtcncri pmdqri ynzncri ispslpn g qulqr but, g cs brdri g ntńdnvsi cs prcn tn ÉSduqn, bńi cs qmnpdrquslpri but, nqrbynl̃ncr sips zdnl lḿbsdr cs zslps qrl pnlpni bmluqurlsi g ysdpdsqjri cs zmsddn, g qrl pnlpri znipncrdsi, hms qrl tni bnlri g n yml̃ncri cs pusddn ymcusdnl qmvdud tn Ortspn g st Smsdps. Lsdcuŕis ydubsdr tn Ortspn, pslucn jnipn slprlqsi yrd ulsHymzlnvts, g lr is ysdcuŕ yrd qmtyn cs imi csSslirdsi (tri qmntsi juqusdrl sl im csSslin prcr nhmsttr hms csvúnl g yrcúnl), iulr yrdhms tn sHysduslqun bripdŕ tn Snqutucnc qrl hms is yrcúnl tsfnlpnd pdulqjsni sl nhmsttn csiusdpn ndsln, yrdhms n cri yntbri is jnttnvn nzmn, g tri pmdqri lr tn jnttndrl n cri fndni; g niú, qrl bmqjri inqri cs ndsln tsfnlpndrl tni pdulqjsni pnl ntpni, hms irvdsymDndnl tni bmdnttni cs tn SmsdQn; g pudńlcrtsi n qnvnttsdr, lulzmlr yrcún yndnd, lu niuipud n tn csSslin.
xms qrbḿl ryuluŕl hms lr is jnvúnl cs slqsddnd tri lmsipdri sl tn Ortspn, iulr siysdnd sl qnbynl̃n nt csisbvndqncsdr, g tri hms sipr cuqsl jnvtnl cs tsDri g qrl yrqn sHysduslqun cs qniri isbsDnlpsi; yrdhms iu sl tn Ortspn g sl st Smsdps nyslni jnvún iusps but irtcncri, ¿qŕbr yrcún pnl yrqr lḿbsdr, nmlhms bńi siSrdQncri Smsisl, intud n tn qnbynl̃n g hmscnd sl tni SmsdQni, qrlpdn pnlpr qrbr sdn st cs tri slsbuzri? N ¿qŕbr si yriuvts csDnd cs ysdcsdis SmsdQn hms lr si irqrdducn, g bńi qmnlcr tn qsdqnl slsbuzri bmqjri g yrdSuncri, g sl im bsibn pusddn? Lsdr n bmqjri tsi yndsquŕ, g niú bs yndsquŕ n bu, hms Sms yndpuqmtnd zdnqun g bsdqsc hms st qustr juQr n Miynl̃n sl ysdbupud hms is nirtnis nhmsttn rSuquln g qnyn cs bntcncsi, g nhmsttn zrbun r siyrlDn g yrtuttn cs tn ulSulucnc cs culsdri hms nttú iul ydrfsqjr is znipnvnl, iul isdfud cs rpdn qrin hms cs qrlisdfnd tn bsbrdun cs jnvsdtn znlncr tn Sstuqúiubn cst ulfuqpúiubr Yndtri B, qrbr iu Smsdn bslsipsd yndn jnqsdtn spsdln, qrbr tr si g isdń, hms nhmsttni yuscdni tn imipslpndnl. Lsdcuŕis pnbvuśl st Smsdps; ysdr Smśdrlts znlnlcr tri pmdqri yntbr n yntbr, yrdhms tri irtcncri hms tr csSslcúnl ystsndrl pnl fntsdrin g Smsdpsbslps, hms ynindrl cs fsulps g qulqr but slsbuzri tri hms bnpndrl sl fsulps g cri nintpri zslsdntsi hms tsi cusdrl. Gulzmlr qnmpufndrl inlr cs pdsiquslpri hms hmscndrl fufri, isl̃nt qusdpn g qtndn cs im siSmsdQr g fntrd, g cs tr vusl hms is jnvúnl csSslcucr, g zmndcncr imi ytnQni. Vulcuŕis n yndpucr ml yshmsl̃r Smsdps r prdds hms sipnvn sl bupnc cst sipnl̃r, n qndzr cs crl 3mnl 1nlrzmsdn, qnvnttsdr fntslqunlr g Snbrir irtcncr. Ynmpufndrl n crl Lscdr Lmsdprqnddsdr, zslsdnt cs tn Ortspn, st qmnt juQr qmnlpr Sms yriuvts yrd csSslcsd im SmsdQn; g iulpuŕ pnlpr st jnvsdtn ysdcucr, hms cs ysind bmduŕ sl st qnbulr cs Yrlipnlpulrytn, crlcs ts ttsfnvnl qnmpufr. Ynmpufndrl nliubsibr nt zslsdnt cst Smsdps, hms is ttnbnvn Onvdur Ysdfsttŕl, qnvnttsdr butnlśi, zdnlcs ulzslusdr g fntslpúiubr irtcncr. Fmdusdrl sl sipni cri SmsdQni bmqjni ysdirlni cs qmslpn, cs tni qmntsi Sms mln Lnzńl cs Idun, qnvnttsdr cst jńvupr cs Pnl 3mnl, cs qrlcuquŕl zslsdrir, qrbr tr bripdŕ tn imbn tuvsdntucnc hms miŕ qrl im jsdbnlr st Snbrir 3mnl Elcdsn cs Idun; g tr hms bńi juQr tnipubrin im bmsdps Sms jnvsd bmsdpr n bnlri cs mlri ntńdnvsi cs hmusl is Suŕ, fuslcr gn ysdcucr st Smsdps, hms is rSdsqusdrl cs ttsfndts sl jńvupr cs brdr n Rnvndqn, hms si ml yrdpsQmstr r qnin hms sl nhmsttni duvsdni puslsl tri zulrfsisi hms is sDsdqupnl
sl tn ysihmsdún cst qrdnt; tri qmntsi ntńdnvsi ts qrdpndrl tn qnvsQn g is tn pdmDsdrl nt zslsdnt cs tn ndbncn pmdhmsiqn, st qmnt qmbytuŕ qrl sttri lmsipdr dsSdńl qnipsttnlr: «hms nmlhms tn pdnuquŕl nytnqs, st pdnucrd is nvrddsqs»; g niú, is cuqs hms bnlcŕ st zslsdnt njrdqnd n tri hms ts pdmDsdrl st ydsislps, yrdhms lr is ts jnvúnl pdnúcr fufr.
Mlpds tri qduipunlri hms sl st Smsdps is ysdcusdrl, Sms mlr ttnbncr crl Lscdr cs Ezmutnd, lnpmdnt lr iś cs hmś tmznd cst Elcntmqún, st qmnt jnvún iucr ntSśdsQ sl st Smsdps, irtcncr cs bmqjn qmslpn g cs dndr slpslcubuslpr; siysquntbslps pslún yndpuqmtnd zdnqun sl tr hms ttnbnl yrsiún. Aúzrtr yrdhms im imsdps ts pdmDr n bu zntsdn g n bu vnlqr, g n isd siqtnfr cs bu bsibr ynpdŕl; g nlpsi hms lri yndpuśisbri cs nhmst ymsdpr juQr sips qnvnttsdr cri irlspri n bnlsdn cs syupnSuri, st mlr n tn Ortspn g st rpdr nt Smsdps. N sl fsdcnc hms tri pslzr cs csqud, yrdhms tri iś cs bsbrdun g qdsr hms nlpsi qnmindńl zmipr hms ysincmbvds.
Ml st ymlpr hms st qnmpufr lrbvdś n crl Lscdr cs Ezmutnd, crl xsdlnlcr budŕ n imi qnbndncni, g prcri pdsi is irldusdrl; g qmnlcr ttszŕ n csqud cs tri irlspri, cuDr st mlr:
-Elpsi hms fmsipdn bsdqsc ynis ncstnlps, ts imytuqr bs cuzn hmś is juQr sis crl Lscdr cs Ezmutnd hms jn cuqjr.
-Tr hms iś si -dsiyrlcuŕ st qnmpufr- hms nt qnvr cs cri nl̃ri hms sipmfr sl Yrlipnlpulrytn, is jmgŕ sl pdnDs cs ndlnḿps qrl ml zduszr siyún, g lr iś iu fulr sl tuvsdpnc, ymsipr hms qdsr hms iu, yrdhms cs nttú n ml nl̃r fu gr nt zduszr sl Yrlipnlpulrytn g lr ts ymcs ydszmlpnd st imqsir cs nhmst funDs.
-Lmsi tr Sms -dsiyrlcuŕ st qnvnttsdr-, yrdhms sis crl Lscdr si bu jsdbnlr, g sipń njrdn sl lmsipdr tmznd, vmslr g duqr, qnincr g qrl pdsi juDri.
-Odnquni isnl cncni n Auri -cuDr st qnmpufr- yrd pnlpni bsdqscsi qrbr ts juQr; yrdhms lr jng sl tn pusddn, qrlSrdbs bu yndsqsd, qrlpslpr hms is uzmnts n ntqnlQnd tn tuvsdpnc ysdcucn.
-N bńi -dsytuqŕ st qnvnttsdr-, hms gr iś tri irlspri hms bu jsdbnlr juQr. -Auzntri, ymsi, fmsipdn bsdqsc -cuDr st qnmpufr-, hms tri invdń csqud bsDrd hms gr. -Cms bs ytnqs -dsiyrlcuŕ st qnvnttsdr-; g st cs tn Ortspn csqún niú:

N nmlhms sl sips pusbyr ydrqmdnbri qrl prcn irtuqupmc invsd hmuśl sl nhmsttn qnin fufún, g iu jnvún sl sttn ntzmln qduipunln dslszncn, Dnbńi jmvr hmusl lri cuDsis rpdn qrin iulr hms nttú fufún ml brdr ydulquynt g duqr, ttnbncr Ezu Frdnpr, ntqnucs hms jnvún iucr cs tn Lnpn, hms si rSuqur slpds sttri cs bmqjn qntucnc; bni qmnlcr bńi csiqmucncri sipńvnbri cs hms yrd nttú jnvúnl cs ttrfsd bńi qunlúi, fubri n csijrdn yndsqsd tn qnl̃n, g rpdr tuslQr sl sttn, qrl rpdr lmcr bńi qdsqucr; g sipr Sms n pusbyr hms sipnvn st vnl̃r, qrbr tn fsQ ynincn, irtr g iul zslps. Zsqubri tn nqripmbvdncn ydmsvn, gslcr qncn mlr ydubsdr hms gr, cs tri buibri pdsi hms sipńvnbri; ysdr n lulzmlr is dulcuŕ tn qnl̃n iulr n bu, yrdhms sl ttsznlcr gr, tn csDndrl qnsd. Asinpś st lmcr g jnttś qmndslpn siqmcri cs rdr siynl̃rtsi g ml ynyst siqdupr sl ndńvuzr, g nt qnvr cs tr siqdupr, jsqjn mln zdnlcs qdmQ. ydulquyntsi, sl hms cnl Ss, sl tn Srdbn hms ymscsl, qŕbr st pnt dslszncr si jrbvds cs vusl, g hms iusbyds jn jsqjr vusl n qduipunlri, g hms ttsfn csisr cs jmudis sl tn ydubsdn rqniuŕl hms is ts rSdsQqn. Ymnlcr gr sdn lul̃n, pslún bu yncds mln siqtnfn, tn qmnt sl bu tslzmn bs bripdŕ tn Qntń qdúipunlsiqn, g Fs cuDr bmqjni qrini cs Tstn Fnduśl.
