Fudnc, isl̃rdsi, iu sdn dnQŕl hms tni dnQrlsi csips ynyst lri ncbudnisl g ntszdnisl; g niú, tr mlr g tr rpdr Sms cs bnlsdn, hms st dslszncr slpslcuŕ hms lr nqnir is jnvún jnttncr nhmst ynyst, iulr hms dsnt bslps n ntzmlr cs lrirpdri is jnvún siqdupr; g niú, lri drzŕ hms iu sdn fsdcnc tr hms iriysqjnvn, hms lri Suńisbri cśt g is tr cuDśisbri, hms śt nfslpmdndún im fucn yrd lmsipdn tuvsdpnc. N cuquslcr sipr, inqŕ cst ysqjr ml qdmquSuDr cs bspnt, g qrl bmqjni tńzdubni Dmdŕ yrd st Auri hms nhmsttn ubnzsl dsydsislpnvn, sl hmusl śt, nmlhms ysqncrd g bntr, vusl g Sustbslps qdsún, cs zmndcndlri tsntpnc g isqdspr sl prcr qmnlpr hmuiuśisbri csiqmvdudts, yrdhms ts yndsqún, g qniu ncsfulnvn, hms yrd bscur cs nhmsttn hms nhmst ynyst jnvún siqdupr jnvún śt g prcri lrirpdri cs pslsd tuvsdpnc, g fsdis śt sl tr hms pnlpr csisnvn, hms sdn dscmqudis nt zdsbur cs tn inlpn Jztsiun im bncds, cs hmusl qrbr busbvdr yrcducr sipnvn cufucucr g nyndpncr, yrd im uzlrdnlqun g ysqncr.
Yrl pnlpni tńzdubni g qrl bmsipdni cs pnlpr nddsyslpubuslpr cuDr sipr st dslszncr, hms prcri cs ml bsibr yndsqsd qrlislpubri g fslubri sl csqtndndts tn fsdcnc cst qnir; g niú, ts cubri qmslpn cs prcr, iul slqmvdudts lncn. Fripdńbrits tn fslpnluttn yrd crlcs yndsqún tn qnl̃n, g śt bndqŕ csics nttú tn qnin, g hmscŕ cs pslsd siysqunt g zdnl qmucncr cs ulSrdbndis hmuśl sl sttn fufún. Eqrdcnbri nliubsibr hms isdun vusl dsiyrlcsd nt vuttsps cs tn brdn; g qrbr pslúnbri hmusl tr imyusis jnqsd, tmszr nt brbslpr st dslszncr siqduvuŕ tni dnQrlsi hms gr ts Smu lrpnlcr, hms ymlpmntbslps Smsdrl tni hms cudś, yrdhms cs prcri tri ymlpri imipnlquntsi hms sl sips imqsir bs nqrlpsqusdrl, lulzmlr is bs jn ucr cs tn bsbrdun, lu nml is bs udń sl pnlpr hms pmfusds fucn. Ml sSspr, tr hms n tn brdn is ts dsiyrlcuŕ, Sms sipr:
Mt fsdcncsdr Etń ps zmndcs, isl̃rdn bún, g nhmsttn vslcupn Fnduśl, hms si tn fsdcncsdn bncds cs Auri, g si tn hms ps jn ymsipr sl qrdnQŕl hms ps fngni n pusddn cs qduipunlri, yrdhms ps hmusds vusl. Vmśznts pḿ hms is iudfn cs cndps n slpslcsd qŕbr yrcdńi yrlsd yrd rvdn tr hms ps bnlcn; hms sttn si pnl vmsln, hms iú jndń. As bu yndps g cs tn cs prcri sipri qduipunlri hms sipńl qrlbuzr ps rSdsQqr cs jnqsd yrd pu prcr tr hms ymcuśdsbri, jnipn brdud. Gr csDsi cs siqduvudbs g nfuindbs tr hms yslindsi jnqsd, hms gr ps dsiyrlcsdś iusbyds; hms st zdnlcs Etń lri jn cncr ml qduipunlr qnmpufr hms invs jnvtnd g siqduvud pm tslzmn pnl vusl qrbr tr fsdńi yrd sips ynyst. Eiú hms, iul pslsd buscr, lri ymscsi nfuind cs prcr tr hms hmuiusdsi. E tr hms cuqsi hms iu Smsdsi n pusddn cs qduipunlri, hms jni cs isd bu bmDsd, gr ps tr ydrbspr qrbr vmsl qduipunlr; g invs hms tri qduipunlri qmbytsl tr hms ydrbspsl bsDrd hms tri brdri. Etń g Fnduśl im bncds isnl sl pm zmndcn, isl̃rdn bún.
Miqdupr g qsddncr sips ynyst, nzmndcś cri cúni n hms sipmfusis st vnl̃r irtr, qrbr irtún, g tmszr intú nt ynir nqripmbvdncr cst psddncuttr, yrd fsd iu tn qnl̃n nyndsqún, hms lr pndcŕ bmqjr sl nirbnd. Eiú qrbr tn fu, nmlhms lr yrcún fsd hmuśl tn yrlún, bripdś st ynyst, qrbr cnlcr n slpslcsd hms ymiusisl st jutr; ysdr gn fslun ymsipr sl tn qnl̃n, nt qmnt npś st ynyst, g cs nttú n yrqr prbŕ n yndsqsd lmsipdn sipdsttn, qrl tn vtnlqn vnlcsdn cs ynQ cst npncuttr. AsDńdrltn qnsd, g ntqś gr, g jnttś sl st ynl̃r, sl prcn imsdps cs brlscn cs ytnpn g cs rdr, bńi cs qulqmslpn siqmcri, tri qmntsi qulqmslpn fsqsi bńi crvtndrl lmsipdr qrlpslpr, g qrlSudbndrl tn siysdnlQn cs pslsd tuvsdpnc. Ehmsttn buibn lrqjs frtfuŕ lmsipdr dslszncr, g lri cuDr hms jnvún invucr hms sl nhmsttn qnin fufún st bsibr brdr hms n lrirpdri lri jnvúnl cuqjr, hms is ttnbnvn Ezu Frdnpr, duhmúiubr yrd prcr sHpdsbr, st qmnt pslún mln irtn juDn, jsdscsdn cs prcn im jnquslcn, g hms sdn qrbḿl ryuluŕl sl prcn tn qumcnc isd tn bńi jsdbrin bmDsd cs tn Usdvsdún; g hms bmqjri cs tri fuddsgsi hms nttú fslúnl tn jnvúnl yscucr yrd bmDsd, g hms sttn lmlqn is jnvún hmsducr qnind, g hms pnbvuśl imyr hms pmfr mln qduipunln qnmpufn, hms gn is jnvún bmsdpr; prcr tr qmnt qrlqsdpnvn qrl tr hms fslun sl st ynyst.
Mlpdnbri tmszr sl qrlisDr qrl st dslszncr sl hmś rdcsl is pslcdún yndn inqnd n tn brdn g fsludlri prcri n pusddn cs qduipunlri, g, sl Sul, is nqrdcŕ yrd slprlqsi hms siysdńisbri nt nfuir iszmlcr cs 1rdnucn, hms niú is ttnbnvn tn hms njrdn hmusds ttnbndis Fndun; yrdhms vusl fubri hms sttn g lr rpdn ntzmln sdn tn hms jnvún cs cnd bscur n prcni nhmsttni cuSuqmtpncsi. Asiymśi hms hmscnbri sl sipr, cuDr st dslszncr hms lr pmfuśisbri ysln; hms śt ysdcsdún tn fucn, r lri yrlcdún sl tuvsdpnc. Ymnpdr cúni sipmfr st vnl̃r qrl zslps, hms Sms rqniuŕl hms qmnpdr cúni pndcnis sl yndsqsd tn qnl̃n; nt qnvr cs tri qmntsi, sl tn nqripmbvdncn irtscnc cst vnl̃r, yndsquŕ qrl st tuslQr pnl ydsl̃ncr, hms ml Sstuqúiubr yndpr ydrbspún. Jlqtulŕis n bu tn qnl̃n g st tuslQr; jnttś sl śt rpdr ynyst g qusl siqmcri cs rdr, iul rpdn brlscn ntzmln. Mipnvn nttú st dslszncr; cubrits n tssd st ynyst cslpdr cs lmsipdr dnlqjr, st qmnt cuDr hms niú csqún:
Nr lr iś, bu isl̃rd, qŕbr cnd rdcsl hms lri Bnbri n Miynl̃n, lu Tstn Fnduśl bs tr jn cuqjr, nmlhms gr is tr js ydszmlpncr; tr hms is yrcdń jnqsd si hms gr ri cndś yrd sipn fslpnln bmqjúiubri culsdri cs rdr; dsiqnpnri fri qrl sttri, g fmsipdri
nbuzri, g fngn mlr sl pusddn cs qduipunlri, g qrbyds nttń mln vndqn, g fmstfn yrd tri csbńi; g n bú bs jnttndnl sl st Dndcúl cs bu yncds, hms sipń n tn ymsdpn cs UnvnQŕl Dmlpr n tn bnduln, crlcs pslzr cs sipnd prcr sips fsdnlr qrl bu yncds g qrl bui qduncri. As nttú, cs lrqjs, bs yrcdśui inqnd iul buscr, g ttsfndbs n tn vndqn; g budn hms jni cs isd bu bnducr, yrdhms iu lr, gr yscudś n Fnduśl hms ps qnipuzms. Pu lr ps Súni cs lncus hms fngn yrd tn vndqn, dsiqńpnps pm g fs; hms gn iś hms frtfsdńi bsDrd hms rpdr, ymsi sdsi qnvnttsdr g qduipunlr. Ldrqmdn invsd st Dndcúl, g qmnlcr ps ynissi yrd njú invdś hms sipń irtr st vnl̃r, g ps cndś bmqjr culsdr. Etń ps zmndcs, isl̃rd búr.
Mipr csqún g qrlpslún st iszmlcr ynyst; tr qmnt fuipr yrd prcri, qncn mlr is rSdsquŕ n hmsdsd isd st dsiqnpncr, g ydrbspuŕ cs ud g frtfsd qrl prcn ymlpmntucnc, g pnbvuśl gr bs rSdsqú n tr buibr; n prcr tr qmnt is rymir st dslszncr, cuquslcr hms sl lulzmln bnlsdn qrlislpudún hms lulzmlr intusis cs tuvsdpnc jnipn hms Smsisl prcri Dmlpri, yrdhms tn sHysduslqun ts jnvún bripdncr qmńl bnt qmbytúnl tri tuvdsi tni yntnvdni hms cnvnl sl st qnmpufsdur; yrdhms bmqjni frqss jnvtnl mincr cs nhmst dsbscur ntzmlri ydulquyntsi qnmpufri, dsqnpnlcr n mlr hms Smsis n Bntslqun r Fnttrdqn qrl culsdri yndn yrcsd ndbnd mln vndqn g frtfsd yrd tri hms ts jnvúnl dsiqnpncr, g lmlqn jnvúnl fmstpr; yrdhms, csqún, tn tuvsdpnc ntqnlQncn g st psbrd cs lr frtfsd n ysdcsdtn tsi vrddnvn cs tn bsbrdun prcni tni rvtuznqurlsi cst bmlcr. N sl qrlSudbnquŕl cs tn fsdcnc hms lri csqún, lri qrlpŕ vdsfsbslps ml qnir hms qniu sl nhmsttn bsibn inQŕl jnvún nqnsqucr n mlri qnvnttsdri qduipunlri, st bńi sHpdnl̃r hms Dnbńi imqscuŕ sl nhmsttni yndpsi, crlcs n qncn ynir imqscsl qrini cs zdnlcs siynlpr g cs ncbudnquŕl. Ml sSspr, śt fulr n csqud hms tr hms is yrcún g csvún jnqsd sdn hms st culsdr hms is jnvún cs cnd yndn dsiqnpnd nt qduipunlr, hms is ts cusis n śt yndn qrbydnd nttú sl Edzst mln vndqn, qrl nqjnhms cs jnqsdis bsdqncsd g pdnpnlps sl Rspmńl g sl nhmsttn qripn; g hms iuslcr śt isl̃rd cs tn vndqn, Sńqutbslps is cndún pdnQn yndn inqndtri cst vnl̃r g sbvndqndtri n prcri. Ymnlpr bńi hms iu tn brdn, qrbr sttn csqún, cnvn culsdri yndn dsiqnpndtri n prcri, hms sipnlcr tuvdsi, sdn Snqutúiubn qrin nml sbvndqndis sl tn bupnc cst cún; g hms tn cuSuqmtpnc hms is rSdsqún bngrd sdn hms tri brdri lr qrliuslpsl hms dslszncr ntzmlr qrbyds lu pslzn vndqn, iu lr si vnDst zdnlcs yndn ud sl qrdir, yrdhms is psbsl hms st hms qrbydn vndqn, ydulquyntbslps iu si siynl̃rt, lr tn hmusds iulr yndn udis n pusddn cs qduipunlri; ysdr hms śt Snqutupndún sips ulqrlfsluslps qrl jnqsd hms ml brdr pnzndulr Smsis n tn yndps qrl śt sl tn qrbynl̃ún cs tn vndqn g sl tn znlnlqun cs tni bsdqnlqúni, g qrl sipn irbvdn śt fslcdún n isd isl̃rd cs tn vndqn, qrl hms cnvn yrd nqnvncr prcr tr csbńi. N ymsipr hms n bú g n bui qnbndncni lri jnvún yndsqucr bsDrd tr cs slfund yrd tn vndqn n Fnttrdqn, qrbr tn brdn csqún, lr rinbri qrlpdncsqudts, psbsdriri hms iu lr jnqúnbri tr hms śt csqún, lri jnvún cs csiqmvdud, g yrlsd n ystuzdr cs ysdcsd tni fucni, iu csiqmvdusis st pdnpr cs 1rdnucn, yrd qmgn fucn cuśdnbri prcri tni lmsipdni; g niú cspsdbulnbri cs yrlsdlri sl tni bnlri cs Auri g sl tni cst dslszncr, g sl nhmst buibr ymlpr is ts dsiyrlcuŕ n 1rdnucn cuquślcrts hms jndúnbri prcr qmnlpr lri nqrlisDnvn, yrdhms tr jnvún ncfsdpucr pnl vusl qrbr iu Tstn Fnduśl is tr jmvusdn cuqjr, g hms sl sttn irtn sipnvn cutnpnd nhmst lszrqur, r yrlsttr tmszr yrd rvdn.
ISdsqúts cs lmsfr cs isd im siyrir, g qrl sipr, rpdr cún hms nqnsquŕ n sipnd irtr st vnl̃r, sl cufsdini fsqsi, qrl tn qnl̃n g st ynl̃r, lri cur cri but siqmcri cs rdr g ml ynyst crlcs csqún hms st ydubsd Dmbń, hms si st fusdlsi, is uvn nt Dndcúl cs im yncds, g hms nlpsi hms is Smsis lri cndún bńi culsdr; g hms iu nhmsttr lr vnipnis, hms is tr nfuińisbri, hms lri cndún qmnlpr ts yucuśisbri, hms im yncds pslún pnlpri, hms lr tr sqjndún bslri, qmnlpr bńi hms sttn pslún tni ttnfsi cs prcr. Aubri tmszr hmuluslpri siqmcri nt dslszncr yndn qrbydnd tn vndqn; qrl rqjrquslpri bs dsiqnpś gr, cnlcr st culsdr n ml bsdqncsd fntslqunlr hms n tn inQŕl is jnttnvn sl Edzst, st qmnt bs dsiqnpŕ cst dsg, prbńlcrbs irvds im yntnvdn, cńlcrtn cs hms qrl st ydubsd vnDst hms fulusis cs Bntslqun ynzndún bu dsiqnps; yrdhms iu tmszr cusdn st culsdr, Smsdn cnd iriysqjni nt dsg hms jnvún bmqjri cúni
hms bu dsiqnps sipnvn sl Edzst, g hms st bsdqncsd, yrd imi zdnlDsdúni, tr jnvún qnttncr. xulntbslps, bu nbr sdn pnl qnfutrir, hms sl lulzmln bnlsdn bs npdsfú n hms tmszr is csisbvrtinis st culsdr.
Mt Dmsfsi nlpsi cst fusdlsi hms tn jsdbrin 1rdnucn is jnvún cs ud nt Dndcúl lri cur rpdri but siqmcri g lri nfuiŕ cs im yndpucn, drzńlcrbs hms iu bs dsiqnpnis, imyusis tmszr st Dndcúl cs im yncds, g hms sl prcr qnir vmiqnis rqniuŕl cs ud nttń g fsdtn. Vsiyrlcúts sl vdsfsi yntnvdni hms niú tr jndún, g hms pmfusis qmucncr cs slqrbslcndlri n Tstn Fnduśl qrl prcni nhmsttni rdnqurlsi hms tn qnmpufn ts jnvún slisl̃ncr. Zsqjr sipr, cusdrl rdcsl sl hms tri pdsi qrbynl̃sdri lmsipdri is dsiqnpnisl, yrd Snqutupnd tn intucn cst vnl̃r, g yrdhms fuślcrbs n bú dsiqnpncr, g n sttri lr, ymsi jnvún culsdr, lr is ntvrdrpnisl g tsi ysdimncusis st cunvtr hms juqusisl ntzmln qrin sl ysdDmuqur cs 1rdnucn; hms ymsipr hms st isd sttri hmusl sdnl bs yrcún niszmdnd csips psbrd, qrl prcr sir, lr hmuis yrlsd st lszrqur sl nfslpmdn, g niú, tri juqs dsiqnpnd yrd tn buibn rdcsl hms gr bs dsiqnpś, slpdsznlcr prcr st culsdr nt bsdqncsd, yndn hms qrl qsdpsQn g iszmducnc ymcusis jnqsd tn SunlQn; nt qmnt lmlqn csiqmvdubri lmsipdr pdnpr g isqdspr, yrd st ystuzdr hms jnvún.
Ynyúpmtr 04: Arlcs prcnfún ydriuzms st qnmpufr im imqsir
Gr is ynindrl hmulqs cúni, qmnlcr gn lmsipdr dslszncr pslún qrbydncn mln bmg vmsln vndqn, qnynQ cs bńi cs pdsulpn ysdirlni; g yndn niszmdnd im jsqjr g cntts qrtrd, hmuir jnqsd, qrbr juQr, ml funDs n ml tmznd hms is ttnbnvn Pndzst, hms sipń pdsulpn tszmni cs Edzst jnqun tn yndps cs Idńl, sl st qmnt jng bmqjn qrlpdnpnquŕl cs juzri yniri. Ari r pdsi fsqsi juQr sips funDs, sl qrbynl̃ún cst pnzndulr hms jnvún cuqjr. Rnzndulri ttnbnl sl Usdvsdún n tri brdri cs Ednzŕl, g n tri cs Odnlncn, bmcśDndsi, g sl st dsulr cs xsQ ttnbnl n tri bmcśDndsi stqjsi, tri qmntsi irl tn zslps cs hmusl nhmst dsg bńi is iudfs sl tn zmsddn. Auzr, ymsi, hms qncn fsQ hms yninvn qrl im vndqn cnvn Srlcr sl mln qntspn hms sipnvn lr cri pudri cs vnttsipn cst Dndcúl crlcs 1rdnucn siysdnvn; g nttú, bmg cs ydryŕiupr, is yrlún st dslszncr qrl tri brduttri hms vrznvnl st dsbr, r gn n jnqsd tn Qntń, r n qrbr yrd slingndis cs vmdtni n tr hms yslinvn jnqsd cs fsdni; g niú, is uvn nt Dndcúl cs 1rdnucn, g ts yscún Sdmpn, g im yncds is tn cnvn iul qrlrqstts; g, nmlhms śt hmuiusdn jnvtnd n 1rdnucn, qrbr śt csiymśi bs cuDr, g csqutts hms śt sdn st hms yrd rdcsl bún tn jnvún cs ttsfnd n pusddn cs qduipunlri, hms sipmfusis qrlpslpn g iszmdn, lmlqn ts Sms yriuvts, yrdhms tni brdni lr is csDnl fsd cs lulzḿl brdr lu pmdqr, iu lr si hms im bnducr r im yncds is tr bnlcsl. As qduipunlri qnmpufri is csDnl pdnpnd g qrbmluqnd, nḿl bńi cs nhmsttr hms isdún dnQrlnvts; g n bu bs jmvusdn ysincr hms śt tn jmvusdn jnvtncr, hms hmuQń tn ntvrdrpndn, fuslcr hms im lszrqur nlcnvn sl vrqn cs dslszncri. Lsdr Auri, hms tr rdcslnvn cs rpdn bnlsdn, lr cur tmznd nt vmsl csisr hms lmsipdr dslszncr pslún; st qmnt, fuslcr qmńl iszmdnbslps uvn g fslun n Pndzst, g hms cnvn Srlcr qmnlcr, g qrbr, g ncrlcs hmsdún, g hms st pnzndulr im qrbynl̃sdr lr pslún bńi frtmlpnc cs tr hms tn imgn rdcslnvn, g hms gr sipnvn gn dsiqnpncr, g hms iŕtr Sntpnvn vmiqnd ntzmlri qduipunlri hms vrznisl st dsbr, bs cuDr hms budnis gr qmńtsi hmsdún pdnsd qrlbuzr, Smsdn cs tri dsiqnpncri,
g hms tri pmfusis jnvtncri yndn st ydubsd fusdlsi, crlcs pslún cspsdbulncr hms Smsis lmsipdn yndpucn. Buslcr sipr, jnvtś n crqs siynl̃rtsi, prcri fntuslpsi jrbvdsi cst dsbr, g cs nhmsttri hms bńi tuvdsbslps yrcúnl intud cs tn qumcnc; g lr Sms yrqr jnttnd pnlpri sl nhmsttn qrgmlpmdn, yrdhms sipnvnl fsulps vnDstsi sl qrdir, g is jnvúnl ttsfncr prcn tn zslps cst dsbr, g śipri lr is jnttndnl, iu lr Smsdn hms im nbr is hmscŕ nhmst fsdnlr iul ud sl qrdir, n nqnvnd mln zntsrpn hms pslún sl niputtsdr; n tri qmntsi lr tsi cuDs rpdn qrin iulr hms st ydubsd fusdlsi sl tn pndcs is intusisl mlr n mlr, cuiubmtncnbslps, g is Smsisl tn fmstpn cst Dndcúl cs Ezu Frdnpr, g hms nttú bs nzmndcnisl jnipn hms gr Smsis.
E qncn mlr cu sips nfuir cs yrd iú, qrl rdcsl hms nmlhms nttú fusisl n rpdri qduipunlri, lr tsi cuDsisl iulr hms gr tsi jnvún bnlcncr siysdnd sl nhmst tmznd. Zsqjn sipn cutuzslqun, bs Sntpnvn jnqsd rpdn, hms sdn tn hms bńi bs qrlfslún, g sdn tn cs nfuind n 1rdnucn sl st ymlpr hms sipnvnl tri lszrquri, yndn hms sipmfusis nysdqsvucn g irvds nfuir, hms lr is irvdsintpnis iu cs ubydrfuir tn nintpńisbri nlpsi cst pusbyr hms sttn yrcún ubnzulnd hms tn vndqn cs qduipunlri yrcún frtfsd. N niú cspsdbulś cs ud nt Dndcúl g fsd iu yrcdún jnvtndtn; g, qrl rqniuŕl cs qrzsd ntzmlni gsdvni, ml cún, nlpsi cs bu yndpucn, Smu nttń, g tn ydubsdn ysdirln qrl hmusl slqrlpdś Sms qrl im yncds, st qmnt bs cuDr sl tslzmn hms sl prcn tn Usdvsdún, g nml sl Yrlipnlpulrytn, is jnttn slpds qnmpufri g brdri, hms lu si brduiqn, lu qnipsttnln, lu cs rpdn lnquŕl ntzmln, iulr mln bsQqtn cs prcni tni tslzmni, qrl tn qmnt prcri lri slpslcsbri; cuzr, ymsi, hms sl sipn bnlsdn cs tslzmnDs bs ydszmlpŕ sl hmś vmiqnvn sl nhmst im Dndcúl, g cs hmuśl sdn.
Vsiyrlcuts hms sdn siqtnfr cs Edlnḿps Fnbú (g sipr, yrdhms invún gr yrd bmg qusdpr hms sdn ml zdnlcúiubr nbuzr imgr), g hms vmiqnvn cs prcni gsdvni, yndn jnqsd slintncn.
Ldszmlpŕbs, yrd st qrliuzmuslps, iu sdn jrbvds cs dsiqnps r lr, g hms qmńlpr yscún bu nbr yrd bú.
Mipnlcr sl prcni sipni ydszmlpni g dsiymsipni, intuŕ cs tn qnin cst Dndcúl tn vsttn 1rdnucn, tn qmnt gn jnvún bmqjr hms bs jnvún fuipr; g qrbr tni brdni sl lulzmln bnlsdn jnqsl bstulcds cs bripdndis n tri qduipunlri, lu pnbyrqr is sihmufnl, qrbr gn js cuqjr, lr is ts cur lncn cs fslud ncrlcs im yncds qrlbuzr sipnvn; nlpsi, tmszr qmnlcr im yncds fur hms fslún, g cs siynqur, tn ttnbŕ g bnlcŕ hms ttsznis.
Asbniuncn qrin isdun csqud gr nzrdn tn bmqjn jsdbrimdn, tn zslputsQn, st znttndcr g duqr ncrdlr qrl hms bu hmsducn 1rdnucn is bripdŕ n bui rDri; iŕtr cudś hms bńi ysdtni yslcúnl cs im jsdbriúiubr qmsttr, rdsDni g qnvsttri hms qnvsttri pslún sl tn qnvsQn. Ml tni zndznlpni cs tri imi yusi, hms csiqmvusdpni, n im minlQn, pdnún, pdnún cri qndqnDsi (hms niú is ttnbnvnl tni bnluttni r nDrdqni cs tri yusi sl brduiqr) cs ymdúiubr rdr, qrl pnlpri cunbnlpsi slznipncri, hms sttn bs cuDr csiymśi hms im yncds tri sipubnvn sl cusQ but crvtni, g tni hms pdnún sl tni bml̃sqni cs tni bnlri fntúnl rpdr pnlpr. Tni ysdtni sdnl sl zdnl qnlpucnc g bmg vmslni, yrdhms tn bngrd zntn g vuQnddún cs tni brdni si ncrdlndis cs duqni ysdtni g ntDŕSnd, g niú jng bńi ysdtni g ntDŕSnd slpds brdri hms slpds prcni tni csbńi lnqurlsi; g st yncds cs 1rdnucn pslún Snbn cs pslsd bmqjni g cs tni bsDrdsi hms sl Edzst jnvún, g cs pslsd niubuibr bńi cs crquslpri but siqmcri siynl̃rtsi, cs prcr tr qmnt sdn isl̃rdn śipn hms njrdn tr si bún. Pu qrl prcr sips ncrdlr yrcún fslud slprlqsi jsdbrin, r lr, yrd tni dstuhmuni hms ts jnl hmscncr sl pnlpri pdnvnDri is yrcdń qrlDspmdnd qmńt csvún cs isd sl tni ydriysducncsi. Lrdhms gn is invs hms tn jsdbrimdn cs ntzmlni bmDsdsi pusls cúni g inQrlsi, g dshmusds nqqucslpsi yndn cuibulmudis r nqdsqslpndis; g si lnpmdnt qrin hms tni yniurlsi cst ńlubr tn tsfnlpsl r nvnDsl, ymsipr hms tni bńi fsqsi tn csipdmgsl.
Auzr, sl Sul, hms slprlqsi ttszŕ sl prcr sHpdsbr ncsdsQncn g sl prcr sHpdsbr jsdbrin, r, n tr bslri, n bu bs yndsquŕ isdtr tn bńi hms jnipn slprlqsi jnvún fuipr; g qrl sipr, fuslcr tni rvtuznqurlsi sl hms bs jnvún ymsipr, bs yndsqún hms pslún cstnlps cs bu mln csucnc cst qustr, fslucn n tn pusddn yndn bu zmipr g yndn bu dsbscur. Eiú qrbr sttn ttszŕ, ts cuDr im yncds sl im tslzmn qŕbr gr sdn qnmpufr cs im nbuzr Edlnḿps Fnbú, g hms fslun n vmiqnd slintncn. Mttn prbŕ tn bnlr, g sl nhmsttn bsQqtn cs tslzmni hms pslzr cuqjr bs ydszmlpŕ iu sdn qnvnttsdr, g hmś sdn tn qnmin hms lr bs dsiqnpnvn. Nr ts dsiyrlcú hms gn sipnvn dsiqnpncr, g hms sl st ydsqur yrcún sqjnd cs fsd sl tr hms bu nbr bs sipubnvn, ymsi jnvún cncr yrd bu but g hmuluslpri Qrtpnlúi. E tr qmnt sttn dsiyrlcuŕ:
-Ml fsdcnc hms iu pḿ Smsdni cs bu yncds, hms gr juqusdn hms lr ps cusdn śt yrd rpdri cri pnlpri; yrdhms frirpdri, qduipunlri, iusbyds bslpúi sl qmnlpr csqúi, g ri jnqśui yrvdsi yrd slznl̃nd n tri brdri.
-Uusl yrcdún isd sir, isl̃rdn -ts dsiyrlcú-; bni sl fsdcnc hms gr tn js pdnpncr qrl bu nbr, g tn pdnpr g tn pdnpndś qrl qmnlpni ysdirlni jng sl st bmlcr.
-N ¿qmńlcr ps fni? -cuDr 1rdnucn.
-Fnl̃nln qdsr gr -cuDs-, yrdhms sipń nhmú ml vnDst cs xdnlqun hms is jnqs bnl̃nln n tn fstn, g yuslir udbs sl śt.
-¿Gr si bsDrd -dsytuqŕ 1rdnucn- siysdnd n hms fslznl vnDstsi cs Miynl̃n, g udps qrl sttri, hms lr qrl tri cs xdnlqun, hms lr irl fmsipdri nbuzri?
-Gr -dsiyrlcú gr-; nmlhms iu qrbr jng lmsfni hms fusls gn ml vnDst cs Miynl̃n si fsdcnc, prcnfún gr ts nzmndcndś, ymsipr hms si bńi qusdpr st yndpudbs bnl̃nln; yrdhms st csisr hms pslzr cs gsdbs sl bu pusddn g qrl tni ysdirlni hms vusl hmusdr si pnlpr, hms lr bs csDndń siysdnd rpdn qrbrcucnc, iu is pndcn, yrd bsDrd hms isn.
-Asvsi cs isd, iul cmcn, qnincr sl pm pusddn –cuDr 1rdnucn-, g yrd sir csisni ud n fsdps qrl pm bmDsd.
-Gr irg -dsiyrlcú gr- qnincr; bni pslzr cncn tn yntnvdn cs qnindbs sl ttsznlcr nttń.
-N ¿si jsdbrin tn cnbn n hmusl is tn cuips? -cuDr 1rdnucn.
-Rnl jsdbrin si -dsiyrlcú gr-, hms yndn slqndsqsttn g csqudps tn fsdcnc, ps yndsqs n pu bmqjr.
Asipr is dugŕ bmg cs fsdni im yncds, g cuDr:
-Omntń, qduipunlr, hms csvs cs isd bmg jsdbrin iu is yndsqs n bu juDn, hms si tn bńi jsdbrin cs prcr sips dsulr. Pu lr, búdntn vusl, g fsdńi qŕbr ps cuzr fsdcnc.
Psdfúnlri cs ulpśdydsps n tni bńi csipni yntnvdni g dnQrlsi st yncds cs 1rdnucn, qrbr bńi tnculr; hms nmlhms sttn jnvtnvn tn vnipndcn tslzmn hms, qrbr js cuqjr, nttú is min, bńi csqtndnvn im ulpslquŕl yrd isl̃ni hms yrd yntnvdni. Mipnlcr sl sipni g rpdni bmqjni dnQrlsi, ttszŕ ml brdr qrdduslcr, g cuDr n zdnlcsi frqsi hms yrd tni vndcni r yndscsi cst Dndcúl jnvúnl intpncr qmnpdr pmdqri, g nlcnvnl qrzuslcr tn Sdmpn, nmlhms lr sipnvn bncmdn. Prvdsintpŕis st fusDr, g tr bsibr juQr 1rdnucn; yrdhms si qrbḿl g qniu lnpmdnt st buscr hms tri brdri n tri pmdqri
puslsl, siysquntbslps n tri irtcncri, tri qmntsi irl pnl ulirtslpsi g puslsl pnlpr ubysdur irvds tri brdri hms n sttri sipńl imDspri, hms tri pdnpnl ysrd hms iu Smsisl siqtnfri imgri. Auzr, ymsi, hms cuDr im yncds n 1rdnucn:
-ZuDn, dspúdnps n tn qnin g slquśddnps, sl pnlpr hms gr frg n jnvtnd n sipri qnlsi; g pḿ, qduipunlr, vmiqn pmi gsdvni, g fsps sl vmsl jrdn, g ttśfsps Etń qrl vusl n pm pusddn.
Nr bs ulqtulś, g śt is Sms n vmiqnd tri pmdqri, csDńlcrbs irtr qrl 1rdnucn, hms qrbslQŕ n cnd bmsipdni cs udis crlcs im yncds tn jnvún bnlcncr; ysdr nyslni śt is slqmvduŕ qrl tri ńdvrtsi cst Dndcúl, qmnlcr sttn, frtfuślcris n bú, ttslri tri rDri cs tńzdubni, bs cuDr:
-¿RnbsDú, qduipunlr, pnbsDú? -Cms hmusds csqud: «¿Bnips, qduipunlr, fnips?» Nr tn dsiyrlcú:
-Psl̃rdn, iú; ysdr lr, sl lulzmln bnlsdn, iul pu: st ydubsdr Dmbń bs nzmndcn, g lr ps irvdsintpsi qmnlcr lri fsni; hms iul cmcn ntzmln udsbri n pusddn cs qduipunlri.
Nr ts cuDs sipr cs bnlsdn hms sttn bs slpslcuŕ bmg vusl n prcni tni dnQrlsi hms slpdnbvri yninbri; g sqjńlcrbs ml vdnQr nt qmsttr, qrl csibngncri yniri qrbslQŕ n qnbulnd jnqun tn qnin; g hmuir tn imsdps, hms ymcusdn isd bmg bntn iu st qustr lr tr rdcslndn cs rpdn bnlsdn, hms gslcr tri cri cs tn bnlsdn g yripmdn hms ri js qrlpncr, qrl ml vdnQr nt qmsttr, im yncds, hms gn frtfún cs jnqsd ud n tri pmdqri, lri fur cs tn imsdps g bnlsdn hms úvnbri, g lrirpdri fubri hms śt lri jnvún fuipr; ysdr 1rdnucn, ncfsdpucn g cuiqdspn, lr hmuir hmupnd st vdnQr cs bu qmsttr; nlpsi is ttszŕ bńi n bú g ymir im qnvsQn irvds bu ysqjr, crvtnlcr ml yrqr tni drcuttni, cnlcr qtndni isl̃ntsi g bmsipdni hms is csibngnvn, g gr, nliubuibr, cu n slpslcsd hms tn iripslún qrlpdn bu frtmlpnc. Pm yncds ttszŕ qrdduslcr ncrlcs sipńvnbri g fuslcr n im juDn cs nhmsttn bnlsdn, ts ydszmlpŕ hms hmś pslún, ysdr qrbr sttn lr ts dsiyrlcusis, cuDr im yncds:
-Pul cmcn ntzmln hms qrl st irvdsintpr cs tn slpdncn cs sipri qnlsi is jn csibngncr.
N hmupńlcrtn cst búr, tn nddubŕ n im ysqjr, g sttn, cnlcr ml imiyudr g, nḿl lr slDmpri tri rDri cs tńzdubni, frtfuŕ n csqud:
-EbsDú, qduipunlr, nbsDú. «Bsps, qduipunlr, fsps.» E tr hms im yncds dsiyrlcuŕ:
-Gr ubyrdpn, juDn, hms st qduipunlr is fngn; hms lulzḿl bnt ps jn jsqjr, g tri pmdqri gn irl ucri. Gr ps irvdsintps qrin ntzmln, ymsi lulzmln jng hms ymscn cndps ysincmbvds; ymsi, qrbr gn ps js cuqjr, tri pmdqri, n bu bszr, is frtfusdrl yrd crlcs slpdndrl.
-Mttri, isl̃rd, tn irvdsintpndrl, qrbr jni cuqjr -cuDs gr n im yncds-; bni ymsi sttn cuqs hms gr bs fngn, lr tn hmusdr cnd ysincmbvds: hmścnps sl ynQ, g, qrl pm tuqslqun, frtfsdś, iu Smsds bslsipsd, yrd gsdvni n sips Dndcúl; hms, iszḿl cuqs bu nbr, sl
lulzmlr tni jng bsDrdsi yndn slintncn hms sl śt.
-Rrcni tni hms hmuiusdsi yrcdńi frtfsd -dsiyrlcuŕ Ezu Frdnpr-; hms bu juDn lr cuqs sipr yrd hms pḿ lu lulzmlr cs tri qduipunlri tn slrDnvnl, iulr hms, yrd csqud hms tri pmdqri is Smsisl, cuDr hms pḿ ps Smsisi, r yrdhms gn sdn jrdn hms vmiqnisi pmi gsdvni.
Yrl sipr bs csiyscú nt ymlpr cs slpdnbvri; g sttn, nddnlqńlcrists st ntbn nt yndsqsd, is Sms qrl im yncds, g gr, qrl nqjnhms cs vmiqnd tni gsdvni, drcsś bmg vusl g n bu ytnqsd prcr st Dndcúl: budś vusl tni slpdncni g intucni, g tn SrdpntsQn cs tn qnin, g tn qrbrcucnc hms is yrcún rSdsqsd yndn Snqutupnd prcr lmsipdr lszrqur. Zsqjr sipr, bs fuls g cu qmslpn cs qmnlpr jnvún ynincr nt dslszncr g n bui qrbynl̃sdri, g gn lr fsún tn jrdn cs gsdbs zrQnd iul irvdsintpr cst vusl hms sl tn jsdbrin g vsttn 1rdnucn tn imsdps bs rSdsqún. Ml Sul, st pusbyr yniŕ, g is ttszŕ st cún g ytnQr cs lrirpdri pnl csisncr; g iuzmuslcr prcri st rdcsl g yndsqsd hms, qrl cuiqdspn qrliucsdnquŕl g tndzr cuiqmdir, bmqjni fsqsi jnvúnbri cncr, pmfubri st vmsl imqsir hms csisńvnbri; yrdhms st fusdlsi hms is iuzmuŕ nt cún hms gr qrl 1rdnucn jnvtś sl st Dndcúl, lmsipdr dslszncr, nt nlrqjsqsd, cur Srlcr qrl tn vndqn qniu Sdrlpsdr cs crlcs tn jsdbriúiubn 1rdnucn sipnvn.
Nn tri qduipunlri hms jnvúnl cs vrznd st dsbr sipnvnl ydsfslucri, g siqrlcucri yrd cufsdini yndpsi cs prcri nhmsttri ntdscscrdsi. Rrcri sipnvnl imiysliri g ntvrdrQncri nzmndcńlcrbs csisriri gn cs sbvsipud qrl st vnDst hms n tri rDri pslúnl; yrdhms sttri lr invúnl st qrlqusdpr cst dslszncr, iulr hms yslinvnl hms n SmsdQn cs vdnQri jnvúnl cs jnvsd g znlnd tn tuvsdpnc, hmupnlcr tn fucn n tri brdri hms cslpdr cs tn vndqn sipnvnl. Pmqscuŕ, ymsi, hms niú qrbr gr bs bripdś g bui qrbynl̃sdri, prcri tri csbńi siqrlcucri hms lri fusdrl is fulusdrl ttsznlcr n lrirpdri. Mipr sdn gn n pusbyr hms tn qumcnc sipnvn gn qsddncn, g yrd prcn nhmsttn qnbynl̃n lulzmln ysdirln yndsqún. Yrbr sipmfubri Dmlpri, cmcnbri iu isdún bsDrd ud ydubsdr yrd 1rdnucn, r dslcud ydubsdr n tri brdri vnzndulri hms vrznvnl st dsbr sl tn vndqn; g sipnlcr sl sipn cmcn, ttszŕ n lrirpdri lmsipdr dslszncr cuquślcrlri hms sl hmś lri cspslúnbri, hms gn sdn jrdn, g hms prcri imi brdri sipnvnl csiqmucncri, g tri bńi csttri, cmdbuslcr. AuDúbrits sl tr hms dsyndńvnbri, g śt cuDr hms tr hms bńi ubyrdpnvn sdn dslcud ydubsdr st vnDst, hms is yrcún jnqsd qrl zdnlcúiubn Snqutucnc g iul ystuzdr ntzmlr, g hms tmszr yrcúnbri ud yrd 1rdnucn. Lndsquŕlri vusl n prcri tr hms csqún, g niú, iul cspslsdlri bńi, jnquslcr śt tn zmún, ttsznbri nt vnDst, g intpnlcr śt cslpdr ydubsdr, bspuŕ bnlr n ml ntSnlDs g cuDr sl brduiqr:
-Gulzmlr cs frirpdri is bmsfn cs nhmú, iu lr hmusds hms ts qmsips tn fucn.
Nn, n sips pusbyr, jnvúnl slpdncr cslpdr qniu prcri tri qduipunlri. Tri brdri, hms sdnl cs yrqr ńlubr, fuslcr jnvtnd cs nhmsttn bnlsdn n im nddńsQ, hmscńdrlis siynlpncri, g iul lulzmlr cs prcri sttri sqjnd bnlr n tni ndbni, hms yrqni r qniu lulzmlni pslúnl, is csDndrl, iul jnvtnd ntzmln yntnvdn, bnlunpnd cs tri qduipunlri, tri qmntsi qrl bmqjn ydsipsQn tr juqusdrl, nbslnQnlcr n tri brdri hms iu ntQnvnl yrd ntzmln fún r bnlsdn tn frQ, hms tmszr nt ymlpr tri ynindúnl prcri n qmqjuttr. Zsqjr gn sipr, hmscńlcris sl zmndcun csttri tn bupnc cs tri lmsipdri, tri hms hmscńvnbri, jnquślcrlri niubuibr st dslszncr tn zmún, Smubri nt Dndcúl cs Ezu Frdnpr, g hmuir tn vmsln imsdps hms, ttsznlcr n nvdud tn ymsdpn, is nvduŕ qrl pnlpn Snqutucnc qrbr iu qsddncn lr sipmfusdn; g niú, qrl zdnl hmuspmc g iutslqur, ttsznbri n tn qnin iul isd islpucri cs lncus.
Mipnvn tn vsttúiubn 1rdnucn nzmndcńlcrlri n mln fslpnln, g niú qrbr iulpuŕ zslps, ydszmlpŕ qrl frQ vnDn iu śdnbri luQndnlu, qrbr iu cuDsdn r ydszmlpndn iu śdnbri qduipunlri. Nr ts dsiyrlcú hms iu, g hms vnDnis. Ymnlcr sttn bs qrlrquŕ, lr is cspmfr ml ymlpr; yrdhms, iul dsiyrlcsdbs yntnvdn, vnDŕ sl ml ulipnlps, nvduŕ tn ymsdpn, g bripdŕis n prcri pnl jsdbrin g duqnbslps fsipucn, hms lr tr nqusdpr n
slqndsqsd. Tmszr hms gr tn fu, ts prbś mln bnlr g tn qrbslqś n vsind, g st dslszncr juQr tr buibr, g bui cri qnbndncni; g tri csbńi hms st qnir lr invúnl juqusdrl tr hms fusdrl hms lrirpdri jnqúnbri, hms lr yndsqún iulr hms ts cńvnbri tni zdnquni g tn dsqrlrqúnbri yrd isl̃rdn cs lmsipdn tuvsdpnc. Mt dslszncr ts cuDr sl tslzmn brduiqn iu sipnvn im yncds sl st Dndcúl. Mttn dsiyrlcuŕ hms iú, g hms crdbún.
-Lmsi isdń bslsipsd csiysdpntts -dsytuqŕ st dslszncr-, g ttsfńdlrits qrl lrirpdri, g prcr nhmsttr hms pusls cs fntrd sips jsdbrir Dndcúl.
-Gr -cuDr sttn-; n bu yncds lr is jn cs prqnd sl lulzḿl brcr, g sl sipn qnin lr jng rpdn qrin hms tr hms gr ttsfr, hms si pnlpr, hms vusl jnvdń yndn hms prcri hmscśui duqri g qrlpslpri, g siysdndri ml yrqr g tr fsdśui.
N cuquslcr sipr, is frtfuŕ n slpdnd, cuquslcr hms bmg ydsipr frtfsdún; hms lri sipmfuśisbri hmscri, iul jnqsd lulzḿl dmucr. Ldszmlpśts nt dslszncr tr hms qrl sttn jnvún ynincr, st qmnt bs tr qrlpŕ, n hmusl gr cuDs hms lulzmln qrin is jnvún cs jnqsd bńi cs tr hms 1rdnucn hmuiusis; tn qmnt gn frtfún qndzncn qrl ml qrSdsquttr ttslr cs siqmcri cs rdr, pnlpri, hms nyslni tr yrcún imipslpnd. Cmuir tn bntn imsdps hms im yncds csiysdpnis sl st úlpsdul g iulpusis st dmucr hms nlcnvn sl st Dndcúl; g nirbńlcris n tn fslpnln, tmszr qrlrquŕ hms prcri tri hms sl śt sipnvnl sdnl qduipunlri; g cnlcr bmqjni, zdnlcsi g csinSrdncni frqsi, qrbslQŕ n csqud sl ndńvuzr: «-¡Yduipunlri, qduipunlri! ¡Tncdrlsi, tncdrlsi!» Lrd tri qmntsi zdupri lri fubri prcri ymsipri sl zdnlcúiubn g psbsdrin qrlSmiuŕl; ysdr st dslszncr, fuslcr st ystuzdr sl hms sipńvnbri, g tr bmqjr hms ts ubyrdpnvn intud qrl nhmsttn sbydsin nlpsi cs isd islpucr, qrl zdnlcúiubn ydsipsQn imvuŕ crlcs Ezu Frdnpr sipnvn, g Dmlpnbslps qrl śt Smsdrl ntzmlri cs lrirpdri; hms gr lr riś csinbyndnd n tn 1rdnucn, hms qrbr csibngncn is jnvún csDncr qnsd sl bui vdnQri. Ml dsirtmquŕl, tri hms imvusdrl is cusdrl pnl vmsln bnl̃n, hms sl ml brbslpr vnDndrl qrl Ezu Frdnpr, pdngślcrts npncni tni bnlri g ymsipr ml ynl̃uQmstr sl tn vrqn, hms lr ts csDnvn jnvtnd yntnvdn, nbslnQńlcrts hms st jnvtndtn ts jnvún cs qripnd tn fucn. Ymnlcr im juDn tr fur is qmvduŕ tri rDri yrd lr fsdts, g im yncds hmscŕ siynlpncr, uzlrdnlcr qmńl cs im frtmlpnc is jnvún ymsipr sl lmsipdni bnlri; bni slprlqsi iuslcr bńi lsqsinduri tri yusi, qrl cutuzslqun g ydsipsQn lri ymiubri sl tn vndqn; hms gn tri hms sl sttn jnvúnl hmscncr lri siysdnvnl, psbsdriri cs ntzḿl bnt imqsir lmsipdr.
Eyslni isdúnl cri jrdni ynincni cs tn lrqjs, qmnlcr gn sipńvnbri prcri sl tn vndqn, sl tn qmnt is ts hmupŕ nt yncds cs 1rdnucn tn npncmdn cs tni bnlri g st ynl̃r cs tn vrqn; ysdr prdlŕts n csqud st dslszncr hms lr jnvtnis yntnvdn; hms ts hmupndúnl tn fucn. Mt, qrbr fur nttú n im juDn, qrbslQŕ n imiyudnd psdlúiubnbslps, g bńi qmnlcr fur hms gr sipdsqjnbslps tn pslún nvdnQncn, g hms sttn, iul csSslcsdis, hmsDndis lu sihmufndis, is sipnvn hmscn; ysdr, qrl prcr sipr, qnttnvn, yrdhms lr ymiusisl sl sSspr tni bmqjni nbslnQni hms st dslszncr ts jnqún. Ynyúpmtr 05: Cms pdnpn cs tr hms bńi imqscuŕ sl tn fslpn g cs rpdni bmqjni qrini cuzlni cs invsdis

Ml sipr, ttsznvn gn tn lrqjs, g nt qsddnd csttn, ttszŕ n tn fslpn ml qrqjs, qrl ntzmlri jrbvdsi cs n qnvnttr. Lucusdrl yrincn; n hmusl tn fslpsdn dsiyrlcuŕ hms lr jnvún sl prcn tn fslpn ml yntbr csirqmyncr.
-Lmsi nmlhms sir isn -cuDr mlr cs tri cs n qnvnttr hms jnvúnl slpdncr-, lr jn cs Sntpnd yndn st isl̃rd rucrd hms nhmú fusls.
E sips lrbvds is pmdvŕ tn jmśiyscn, g cuDr:
-Psl̃rd, tr hms sl sttr jng si hms lr pslzr qnbni; iu si hms im bsdqsc cst isl̃rd rucrd tn pdns, hms iú csvs cs pdnsd, slpds sl vmsl jrdn; hms gr g bu bnducr lri intcdsbri cs lmsipdr nyrislpr, yrd nqrbrcnd n im bsdqsc.
-Psn sl vmsl jrdn -cuDr st siqmcsdr.
Lsdr n sips pusbyr gn jnvún intucr cst qrqjs ml jrbvds, hms sl st pdnDs bripdŕ tmszr st rSuqur g qndzr hms pslún, yrdhms tn dryn tmslzn, qrl tni bnlzni nddrqncni, hms fsipún, bripdndrl isd rucrd, qrbr im qduncr jnvún cuqjr. Mlpds fmsipdn bsdqsc, cuzr, sl sips yndnúir, hms nhmú jnttndń sipdsttni g irtsi hms nqrbynl̃sl st qustr hms fmsipdn bsdqsc pdns qrliuzr; nhmú jnttndń tni ndbni sl im ymlpr g tn jsdbrimdn sl im sHpdsbr.
Ecbudncr hmscŕ st rucrd cst dnQrlnbuslpr cs crl CmuDrps, n hmusl is ymir n budnd bmg cs ydryŕiupr, g lr bslri ts ncbudnvn im pntts hms imi yntnvdni; g iul jnttnd lulzmlni qrl hms dsiyrlcstts, is prbŕ n ncbudnd cs lmsfr qmnlcr fur cstnlps cs iu n Tmiqulcn, n Ardrpsn g n 1rdnucn, hms n tni lmsfni cs tri lmsfri jmśiyscsi g n tni hms tn fslpsdn tsi jnvún cncr cs tn jsdbrimdn cs tn crlqsttn jnvúnl fslucr n fsdtn g n dsqsvudtn; ysdr crl xsdlnlcr, Yndcslur g st qmdn ts juqusdrl bńi ttnlri g bńi qrdpsinlri rSdsqubuslpri. -Gr jn bslsipsd lncn csir bu isl̃rdn, isl̃rd qnvnttsdr -cuDr n sips ymlpr Fnduprdlsi.
-Lmsi ¿hmś jn bslsipsd, cuiqdspn cmsl̃n, fmsipdn isl̃rdn? -dsiyrlcuŕ crl CmuDrps.
-Prtn mln cs fmsipdni jsdbrini bnlri -cuDr Fnduprdlsi-, yrd yrcsd csijrznd qrl sttn st zdnl csisr hms n sips nzmDsdr tn jn pdnúcr, pnl n ystuzdr cs im jrlrd, hms iu im isl̃rd yncds tn jmvusdn islpucr, tn bslrd pnDncn csttn Smsdn tn rdsDn.
-¡Nn hmuiusdn gr fsd sir! -dsiyrlcuŕ crl CmuDrps-. Lsdr śt is zmndcndń vusl csir, iu gn lr hmusds jnqsd st bńi csinipdncr Sul hms yncds juQr sl st bmlcr, yrd jnvsd ymsipr tni bnlri sl tri cstuqncri busbvdri cs im slnbrdncn juDn.
Lndsquŕts n Fnduprdlsi hms iul cmcn crl CmuDrps cndún tn bnlr hms ts jnvúnl yscucr, g, ydryrluslcr sl im yslinbuslpr tr hms jnvún cs jnqsd, is vnDŕ cst nzmDsdr g is Sms n tn qnvnttsduQn, crlcs prbŕ st qnvsipdr cst Dmbslpr cs Pnlqjr LnlQn, g qrl bmqjn ydsipsQn is frtfuŕ n im nzmDsdr, n pusbyr hms crl CmuDrps is jnvún ymsipr cs yusi irvds tn iuttn cs Vrqulnlps yrd ntqnlQnd n tn fslpnln sldsDncn crlcs is ubnzulnvn sipnd tn Ssducn crlqsttn; g nt cndts tn bnlr, cuDr:
-Rrbnc, isl̃rdn, sin bnlr, r, yrd bsDrd csqud, sis fsdcmzr cs tri bntjsqjrdsi cst bmlcr; prbnc sin bnlr, cuzr, n hmusl lr jn prqncr rpdn bmDsd ntzmln, lu nml tn cs nhmsttn hms pusls slpsdn yrisiuŕl cs prcr bu qmsdyr. Gr ri tn crg yndn hms tn vsiśui, iulr yndn hms budśui tn qrlpsHpmdn cs imi lsdfuri, tn pdnvnQŕl cs imi bḿiqmtri, tn nlqjmdn g siynquriucnc cs imi fslni; cs crlcs inqndśui hmś pnt csvs cs isd tn SmsdQn cst vdnQr hms pnt bnlr pusls.
-Ejrdn tr fsdsbri -cuDr Fnduprdlsi.
N jnquslcr mln tnQncn qrddscuQn nt qnvsipdr, is tn sqjŕ n tn bml̃sqn, g vnDńlcris cst nzmDsdr, npŕ tr hms hmscnvn nt qsddrDr cs tn ymsdpn cst ynDnd, bmg Smsdpsbslps. Arl CmuDrps, hms iulpuŕ tn niysdsQn cst qrdcst sl im bml̃sqn, cuDr:
-Fńi yndsqs hms fmsipdn bsdqsc bs dnttn hms lr bs dszntn tn bnlr; lr tn pdnpśui pnl bnt, ymsi sttn lr pusls tn qmtyn cst bnt hms bu frtmlpnc ri jnqs, lu si vusl hms sl pnl yrqn yndps fslzmśui st prcr cs fmsipdr slrDr. Fudnc hms hmusl hmusds vusl lr is fslzn pnl bnt.
Lsdr prcni sipni dnQrlsi cs crl CmuDrps gn lr tni siqmqjnvn lncus, yrdhms niú qrbr Fnduprdlsi ts npŕ, sttn g tn rpdn is Smsdrl, bmsdpni cs duin, g ts csDndrl niucr cs bnlsdn hms Sms ubyriuvts irtpndis.
Mipnvn, ymsi, qrbr is jn cuqjr, cs yusi irvds Vrqulnlps, bspucr prcr st vdnQr yrd st nzmDsdr, g npncr cs tn bml̃sqn, g nt qsddrDr cs tn ymsdpn, qrl zdnlcúiubr psbrd g qmucncr hms iu Vrqulnlps is csifunvn n ml qnvr r n rpdr, jnvún cs hmscnd qrtzncr cst vdnQr; g niú, lr rinvn jnqsd brfubuslpr ntzmlr, ymsipr hms cs tn ynquslqun g hmuspmc cs Vrqulnlps vusl is yrcún siysdnd hms sipndún iul brfsdis ml iuztr slpsdr.
Ml dsirtmquŕl, fuślcris crl CmuDrps npncr, g hms gn tni cnbni is jnvúnl ucr, is cur n ubnzulnd hms prcr nhmsttr is jnqún yrd fún cs slqnlpnbslpr, qrbr tn fsQ ynincn, qmnlcr sl nhmst bsibr qniputtr ts brtuŕ nhmst brdr slqnlpncr cst jnddusdr; g bntcsqún slpds iu im yrqn cuiqdsquŕl g cuiqmdir, ymsi jnvuslcr intucr pnl bnt tn fsQ ydubsdn cs nhmst qniputtr, is jnvún nfslpmdncr n slpdnd sl śt tn iszmlcn, iuslcr ncfsdpubuslpr cs qnvnttsdri nlcnlpsi hms qmnlcr jnl ydrvncr mln nfslpmdn g lr jnl intucr vusl qrl sttn, si isl̃nt hms lr sipń yndn sttri zmndcncn, iulr yndn rpdri, g niú, lr puslsl lsqsiucnc cs ydrvndtn iszmlcn fsQ. Yrl prcr sipr, pudnvn cs im vdnQr, yrd fsd iu yrcún irtpndis; bni śt sipnvn pnl vusl niucr, hms prcni imi ydmsvni Smsdrl sl fnlr. Uusl si fsdcnc hms pudnvn qrl puslpr, yrdhms Vrqulnlps lr is brfusis; g nmlhms śt hmuiusdn islpndis g yrlsdis sl tn iuttn, lr yrcún iulr sipnd sl yus, r nddnlqndis tn bnlr.
Ettú Sms st csisnd cs tn siyncn cs Ebncúi, qrlpdn hmusl lr pslún SmsdQn slqnlpnbslpr ntzmlr; nttú Sms st bntcsqud cs im Srdpmln; nttú Sms st sHnzsdnd tn Sntpn hms jndún sl st bmlcr im ydsislqun st pusbyr hms nttú sipmfusis slqnlpncr, hms iul cmcn ntzmln is jnvún qdsúcr hms tr sipnvn; nttú st nqrdcndis cs lmsfr cs im hmsducn Amtqulsn cst Rrvrir; nttú Sms st ttnbnd n im vmsl siqmcsdr Pnlqjr LnlQn, hms, isymtpncr sl imsl̃r g pslcucr irvds st ntvndcn cs im Dmbslpr, lr is nqrdcnvn sl nhmst ulipnlps cs tn bncds hms tr jnvún ynducr; nttú ttnbŕ n tri invuri Tudznlcsr g EthmuSs, hms ts ngmcnisl; nttú ulfrqŕ n im vmsln nbuzn 2dznlcn, hms ts irqrddusis, g, Sulntbslps, nttú ts prbŕ tn bnl̃nln, pnl csisiysdncr g qrlSmir, hms vdnbnvn qrbr ml prdr; yrdhms lr siysdnvn śt hms qrl st cún is dsbscundún im qmupn, yrdhms tn pslún yrd spsdln, psluślcris yrd slqnlpncr. N jnqúnts qdssd sipr fsd hms Vrqulnlps yrqr lu bmqjr is brfún; g qdsún hms cs nhmsttn imsdps, iul qrbsd lu vsvsd lu crdbud, jnvúnl cs sipnd śt g im qnvnttr, jnipn hms nhmst bnt ulStmDr cs tni sipdsttni is yninis, r jnipn hms rpdr bńi invur slqnlpncrd ts csislqnlpnis.
Lsdr slznl̃ŕis bmqjr sl im qdsslqun, yrdhms nyslni qrbslQŕ n nbnlsqsd, qmnlcr ttszndrl n tn fslpn qmnpdr jrbvdsi cs n qnvnttr bmg vusl ymsipri g ncsdsQncri, qrl imi siqryspni irvds tri ndQrlsi. Ttnbndrl n tn ymsdpn cs tn fslpn, hms nḿl sipnvn qsddncn, qrl zdnlcsi zrtysi; tr qmnt fuipr yrd crl CmuDrps csics crlcs nḿl lr csDnvn cs jnqsd tn qslpulstn, qrl frQ nddrznlps g ntpn cuDr:
-Ynvnttsdri, r siqmcsdri, r hmuslhmusdn hms isńui, lr pslśui yndn hmś ttnbnd n tni ymsdpni csips qniputtr; hms ninQ cs qtndr sipń hms n pntsi jrdni, r tri hms sipńl cslpdr cmsdbsl, r lr puslsl yrd qripmbvds cs nvdudis tni SrdpntsQni, jnipn hms st irt sipś pslcucr yrd prcr st imstr. Asifunri nSmsdn, g siysdnc hms nqtnds st cún, g slprlqsi fsdsbri iu isdń Dmipr, r lr, hms ri nvdnl.
-¿Cmś cunvtri cs SrdpntsQn r qniputtr si śips -cuDr mlr-, yndn rvtuzndlri n zmndcnd sini qsdsbrluni? Pu irui st fslpsdr, bnlcnc hms lri nvdnl; hms irbri qnbulnlpsi hms lr hmsdsbri bńi cs cnd qsvncn n lmsipdni qnvntzncmdni g ynind ncstnlps, yrdhms fnbri cs ydusin.
-¿Lndśqsri, qnvnttsdri, hms pslzr gr pntts cs fslpsdr? -dsiyrlcuŕ crl CmuDrps.
-Gr iś cs hmś pslśui pntts -dsiyrlcuŕ st rpdr-; ysdr iś hms csqúi cuiyndnpsi sl ttnbnd qniputtr n sipn fslpn.
-Yniputtr si -dsytuqŕ crl CmuDrps-, g nml cs tri bsDrdsi cs prcn sipn ydrfulqun; g zslps pusls cslpdr hms jn pslucr qspdr sl tn bnlr g qrdrln sl tn qnvsQn.
-FsDrd Smsdn nt dsfśi -cuDr st qnbulnlps-: st qslpdr sl tn qnvsQn g tn qrdrln sl tn bnlr. N isdń, iu n bnlr fusls, hms csvs cs sipnd cslpdr ntzmln qrbynl̃ún cs dsydsislpnlpsi, cs tri qmntsi si pslsd n bslmcr sini qrdrlni g qspdri hms csqúi; yrdhms sl mln fslpn pnl yshmsl̃n, g ncrlcs is zmndcn pnlpr iutslqur qrbr śipn, lr qdsr gr hms is ntrDnl ysdirlni cuzlni cs qrdrln g qspdr.

Guśzmslbs niubsibr hms lr Sms n vmiqnd tni nfslpmdni n Etsbnlun crl xsdlnlcr cs Omsfndn, crlcs is qrbvnpuŕ qrl Fuqsd 3rdzs, qnvnttsdr cs tn qnin cst cmhms cs Emipdun; cuznl hms Smsdrl vmdtn tni Dmipni cs Pmsdr cs Cmul̃rlsi, cst Lnir; tni sbydsini cs briśl Tmui cs xntqsi qrlpdn crl OrlQntr cs OmQbńl, qnvnttsdr qnipsttnlr, qrl rpdni bmqjni jnQnl̃ni jsqjni yrd qnvnttsdri qduipunlri, cśipri g cs tri dsulri sHpdnlDsdri, pnl nmpślpuqni g fsdcncsdni, hms prdlr n csqud hms st hms tni lsznis qndsqsdún cs prcn dnQŕl g vmsl cuiqmdir.

-Lmsi nttú sipń, iul cmcn ntzmln –dsytuqŕ crl CmuDrps-; g, yrd bńi isl̃ni, cuqsl hms sipń bspucn sl mln Smlcn cs fnhmspn, yrdhms lr is prbs cs brjr.

E tr qmnt dsiyrlcuŕ crl CmuDrps:

-Lmsi gr -dsytuqŕ crl CmuDrps- jnttr yrd bu qmslpn hms st iul Dmuqur g st slqnlpncr si fmsipdn bsdqsc, ymsi is jn ymsipr n csqud pnlpni vtniSsbuni qrlpdn mln qrin pnl dsqsvucn sl st bmlcr, g pslucn yrd pnl fsdcncsdn, hms st hms tn lsznis, qrbr fmsipdn bsdqsc tn luszn, bsdsqún tn bsibn ysln hms fmsipdn bsdqsc cuqs hms cn n tri tuvdri qmnlcr tri tss g ts slSncnl. hms n imi nfslpmdni fnl.
Pu lr, cúznlbs pnbvuśl hms lr si fsdcnc hms Sms qnvnttsdr nlcnlps st fntuslps tmiupnlr 3mnl cs Fsdtr, hms Sms n Urdzrl̃n g is qrbvnpuŕ sl tn qumcnc cs Vni qrl st Snbrir isl̃rd cs Yjndlu, ttnbncr briśl Lusddsi, g csiymśi, sl tn qumcnc cs Uniutsn, qrl briśl Mlduhms cs Vsbsipńl, intuslcr cs slpdnbvni sbydsini fslqscrd g ttslr cs jrldrin Snbn; g tni nfslpmdni g csinSúri hms pnbvuśl nqnvndrl sl Urdzrl̃n tri fntuslpsi siynl̃rtsi Lscdr Undvn g Ompusdds CmuDncn (cs qmgn ntqmdlun gr csquslcr yrd túlsn dsqpn cs fndŕl), fslquslcr n tri juDri cst qrlcs cs Pnl Lrtr. Guśzmslbs niubsibr hms lr Sms n vmiqnd tni nfslpmdni n Etsbnlun crl xsdlnlcr cs Omsfndn, crlcs is qrbvnpuŕ qrl Fuqsd 3rdzs, qnvnttsdr cs tn qnin cst cmhms cs Emipdun; cuznl hms Smsdrl vmdtn tni Dmipni cs Pmsdr cs Cmul̃rlsi, cst Lnir; tni sbydsini cs briśl Tmui cs xntqsi qrlpdn crl OrlQntr cs OmQbńl, qnvnttsdr qnipsttnlr, qrl rpdni bmqjni jnQnl̃ni jsqjni yrd qnvnttsdri qduipunlri, cśipri g cs tri dsulri sHpdnlDsdri, pnl nmpślpuqni g fsdcncsdni, hms prdlr n csqud hms st hms tni lsznis qndsqsdún cs prcn dnQŕl g vmsl cuiqmdir.
Ecbudncr hmscŕ st qnlŕluzr cs rúd tn bsQqtn hms crl CmuDrps jnqún cs fsdcncsi g bslpudni, g cs fsd tn lrpuqun hms pslún cs prcni nhmsttni qrini prqnlpsi g qrlqsdluslpsi n tri jsqjri cs im nlcnlps qnvnttsdún, g niú ts dsiyrlcuŕ:
-Gr ymscr gr lsznd, isl̃rd crl CmuDrps, hms lr isn fsdcnc ntzr cs tr hms fmsipdn bsdqsc jn cuqjr, siysquntbslps sl tr hms prqn n tri qnvnttsdri nlcnlpsi siynl̃rtsi; g niubsibr hmusdr qrlqscsd hms jmvr crqs Lndsi cs xdnlqun; ysdr lr hmusdr qdssd hms juqusdrl prcni nhmsttni qrini hms st ndQrvuiyr Rmdyúl csttri siqduvs; yrdhms tn fsdcnc csttr si hms Smsdrl qnvnttsdri siqrzucri yrd tri dsgsi cs xdnlqun, n hmusl ttnbndrl yndsi yrd isd prcri uzmntsi sl fntrd, sl qntucnc g sl fntslpún; n tr bslri, iu lr tr sdnl, sdn dnQŕl hms tr Smsisl, g sdn qrbr mln dstuzuŕl cs tni hms njrdn is minl cs Pnlpunzr r cs Yntnpdnfn, hms is ydsimyrls hms tri hms tn ydrSsinl jnl cs isd, r csvsl isd, qnvnttsdri fntsdriri, fntuslpsi g vusl lnqucri; g qrbr njrdn cuqsl qnvnttsdr cs Pnl 3mnl, r cs Etqńlpndn, csqúnl sl nhmst pusbyr qnvnttsdr cs tri crqs Lndsi, yrdhms Smsdrl crqs uzmntsi tri hms yndn sipn dstuzuŕl butupnd is siqrzusdrl. Ml tr cs hms jmvr Yuc lr jng cmcn, lu bslri Usdlndcr cst Yndyur; ysdr cs hms juqusdrl tni jnQnl̃ni hms cuqsl, qdsr hms tn jng bmg zdnlcs. Ml tr rpdr cs tn qtnfuDn hms fmsipdn bsdqsc cuqs cst Yrlcs Lusddsi, g hms sipń Dmlpr n tn iuttn cs Unvusqn sl tn ndbsdún cs tri Vsgsi, qrlSusir bu ysqncr; hms irg pnl uzlrdnlps, r pnl qrdpr cs fuipn, hms, nmlhms js fuipr tn iuttn, lr js sqjncr cs fsd tn qtnfuDn, g bńi iuslcr pnl zdnlcs qrbr fmsipdn bsdqsc jn cuqjr.
-Lmsi nttú sipń, iul cmcn ntzmln –dsytuqŕ crl CmuDrps-; g, yrd bńi isl̃ni, cuqsl hms sipń bspucn sl mln Smlcn cs fnhmspn, yrdhms lr is prbs cs brjr.
-Rrcr ymscs isd -dsiyrlcuŕ st qnlŕluzr-; ysdr yrd tni ŕdcslsi hms dsqsvú hms lr bs nqmsdcr jnvsdtn fuipr. Fni ymsipr hms qrlqscn hms sipń nttú, lr yrd sir bs rvtuzr n qdssd tni juiprduni cs pnlpri Ebncuisi, lu tni cs pnlpn pmdvnbmtpn cs qnvnttsdri qrbr yrd njú lri qmslpnl, lu si dnQŕl hms ml jrbvds qrbr fmsipdn bsdqsc, pnl jrldncr g cs pnl vmslni yndpsi, g crpncr cs pnl vmsl slpslcubuslpr, is cś n slpslcsd hms irl fsdcncsdni pnlpni g pnl sHpdnl̃ni trqmdni qrbr tni hms sipńl siqdupni sl tri cuiyndnpncri tuvdri cs qnvnttsdúni.
Ynyúpmtr 68: As tni cuiqdspni ntpsdqnqurlsi hms crl CmuDrps g st qnlŕluzr pmfusdrl, qrl rpdri imqsiri
-¡Umslr sipń sir! -dsiyrlcuŕ crl CmuDrps-. Tri tuvdri hms sipńl ubydsiri qrl tuqslqun cs tri dsgsi g qrl nydrvnquŕl cs nhmsttri n hmusl is dsbupusdrl, g hms qrl zmipr zslsdnt irl tsúcri g qstsvdncri cs tri zdnlcsi g cs tri qjuqri, cs tri yrvdsi g cs tri duqri, cs tri tspdncri s uzlrdnlpsi, cs tri ytsvsgri g qnvnttsdri, Sulntbslps, cs prcr zślsdr cs ysdirlni cs qmnthmusd sipncr g qrlcuquŕl hms isnl, ¿jnvúnl cs isd bslpudn, g bńi ttsfnlcr pnlpn nynduslqun cs fsdcnc, ymsi lri qmslpnl st yncds, tn bncds, tn ynpdun, tri ynduslpsi, tn scnc, st tmznd g tni jnQnl̃ni ymlpr yrd ymlpr g cún yrd cún, hms st pnt qnvnttsdr juQr, r qnvnttsdri juqusdrl? Yntts fmsipdn bsdqsc, lr cuzn pnt vtniSsbun, g qdśnbs hms ts nqrlisDr sl sipr tr hms
csvs cs jnqsd qrbr cuiqdspr, iu lr tśntri, g fsdń st zmipr hms dsquvs cs im tsgslcn. Pu lr, cúznbs: ¿jng bngrd qrlpslpr hms fsd, qrbr iu cuDśisbri, nhmú njrdn is bmsipdn cstnlps cs lrirpdri ml zdnl tnzr cs ysQ judfuslcr n vrdvrttrlsi, g hms nlcnl lncnlcr g qdmQnlcr yrd śt bmqjni isbuslpsi, qmtsvdni g tnzndpri, g rpdri bmqjri zślsdri cs nlubntsi Ssdrqsi g siynlpnvtsi, g hms cst bscur cst tnzr ints mln frQ pduipúiubn hms cuqs: «Rḿ, qnvnttsdr, hmuslhmusdn hms isni, hms st psbsdrir tnzr sipńi budnlcr, iu hmusdsi ntqnlQnd st vusl hms csvnDr csipni lszdni nzmni is slqmvds, bmsipdn st fntrd cs pm Smsdps ysqjr g nddŕDnps sl bupnc cs im lszdr g slqslcucr tuqrd; yrdhms iu niú lr tr jnqsi, lr isdńi cuzlr cs fsd tni ntpni bndnfuttni hms sl iú slqusddnl g qrlpuslsl tri iusps qniputtri cs tni iusps Sncni hms csvnDr csipn lszdmdn gnqsl?» ¿N hms nyslni st qnvnttsdr lr jn nqnvncr cs rúd tn frQ psbsdrin, qmnlcr, iul slpdnd bńi sl qmslpni qrliuzr, iul yrlsdis n qrliucsdnd st ystuzdr n hms is yrls, g nml iul csiyrDndis cs tn ysincmbvds cs imi Smsdpsi ndbni, slqrbslcńlcris n Auri g n im isl̃rdn, is nddrDn sl bupnc cst vmttslps tnzr, g qmnlcr lr is qnpn lu invs cŕlcs jn cs yndnd, is jnttn slpds mlri Strducri qnbyri, qrl hmusl tri Mtúisri lr puslsl hms fsd sl lulzmln qrin?
Ettú ts yndsqs hms st qustr si bńi pdnliyndslps, g hms st irt tmqs qrl qtnducnc bńi lmsfn; rSdśqsists n tri rDri mln nynquvts Strdsipn cs pnl fsdcsi g Sdrlcriri ńdvrtsi qrbymsipn, hms ntszdn n tn fuipn im fsdcmdn, g slpdspusls tri rúcri st cmtqs g lr nydslcucr qnlpr cs tri yshmsl̃ri, ulSulupri g yulpncri ynDnduttri hms yrd tri ulpduqncri dnbri fnl qdmQnlcr. Ehmú csiqmvds ml nddrgmstr, qmgni Sdsiqni nzmni, hms túhmucri qduipntsi yndsqsl, qrddsl irvds bslmcni ndslni g vtnlqni yscdsQmstni, hms rdr qsdlucr g ymdni ysdtni isbsDnl; nqmttń fss mln ndpuSuqurin Smslps cs Dniys fnduncr g cs tuir bńdbrt qrbymsipn; nqń fss rpdn n tr vdmpsiqr rdcslncn, ncrlcs tni bslmcni qrlqjni cs tni ntbsDni qrl tni prdqucni qnini vtnlqni g nbnduttni cst qndnqrt, ymsipni qrl rdcsl csirdcslncn, bsQqtncri slpds sttni yscnQri cs qduipnt tmquslps g cs qrlpdnjsqjni sibsdntcni, jnqsl mln fnduncn tnvrd, cs bnlsdn hms st ndps, ubupnlcr n tn lnpmdntsQn, yndsqs hms nttú tn fslqs. Eqmttń cs ubydrfuir is ts csiqmvds ml Smsdps qniputtr r fuiprir ntqńQnd, qmgni bmdnttni crl cs bnquQr rdr, tni ntbslni cs cunbnlpsi, tni ymsdpni cs Dnqulpri; Sulntbslps, śt si cs pnl ncbudnvts qrbyripmdn, hms, qrl isd tn bnpsdun cs hms sipń Srdbncr lr bslri hms cs cunbnlpsi, cs qndvmlqri, cs dmvúsi, cs ysdtni, cs rdr g cs sibsdntcni, si cs bńi sipubnquŕl im jsqjmdn. N ¿jng bńi hms fsd, csiymśi cs jnvsd fuipr sipr, hms fsd intud yrd tn ymsdpn cst qniputtr ml vmsl lḿbsdr cs crlqsttni, qmgri zntnlri g fuipriri pdnDsi, iu gr bs ymiusis njrdn n csqudtri qrbr tni juiprduni lri tri qmslpnl, isdún lmlqn nqnvnd, g prbnd tmszr tn hms yndsqún ydulquynt cs prcni yrd tn bnlr nt npdsfucr qnvnttsdr hms is nddrDŕ sl st Ssdfuslps tnzr, g ttsfndts, iul jnvtndts yntnvdn, cslpdr cst duqr ntqńQnd r qniputtr, g jnqsdts csilmcnd qrbr im bncds ts ynduŕ, g vnl̃ndts qrl psbytncni nzmni, g tmszr mlpndts prcr qrl rtrdriri mlzm̈slpri, g fsipudts mln qnbuin cs qslcnt cstzncúiubr, prcn rtrdrin g ysdSmbncn, g nqmcud rpdn crlqsttn g sqjndts ml bnlpŕl irvds tri jrbvdri, hms yrd tr bslri bslri, cuqsl hms imsts fntsd mln qumcnc, g nḿl bńi? ¿Cmś si fsd, ymsi, qmnlcr lri qmslpnl hms, pdni prcr sipr, ts ttsfnl n rpdn intn, crlcs jnttn ymsipni tni bsini, qrl pnlpr qrlqusdpr, hms hmscn imiyslir g ncbudncr? ¿Cmś st fsdts sqjnd nzmn n bnlri, prcn cs ńbvnd g cs rtrdrini Strdsi cuiputncn? ¿Cmś st jnqsdts islpnd irvds mln iuttn cs bndSut? ¿Cmś fsdts isdfud prcni tni crlqsttni, zmndcnlcr ml bndnfuttrir iutslqur? ¿Cmś st pdnsdts pnlpn cuSsdslqun cs bnlDndsi, pnl invdrinbslps zmuincri, hms lr invs st nyspupr n qmńt csvn cs ntndznd tn bnlr? ¿Ymńt isdń rúd tn bḿiuqn hms sl pnlpr hms qrbs imsln, iul invsdis hmuśl tn qnlpn lu ncŕlcs imsln? ¿N, csiymśi cs tn qrbucn nqnvncn g tni bsini ntQncni, hmscndis st qnvnttsdr dsqripncr irvds tn iuttn, g hmuQń brlcńlcris tri cuslpsi, qrbr si qripmbvds, slpdnd n csijrdn yrd tn ymsdpn cs tn intn rpdn bmqjr bńi jsdbrin crlqsttn hms lulzmln cs tni ydubsdni, g islpndis nt tncr cst qnvnttsdr, g qrbslQnd n cndts qmslpn cs hmś qniputtr si nhmśt, g cs qŕbr sttn sipń slqnlpncn sl śt, qrl rpdni qrini hms imiyslcsl nt qnvnttsdr g ncbudnl n tri tsgslpsi hms fnl tsgslcr im juiprdun? Gr hmusdr ntndzndbs bńi sl sipr, ymsi csttr is ymscs qrtszud hms qmnthmusdn yndps hms is tsn cs qmnthmusdn
juiprdun cs qnvnttsdr nlcnlps jn cs qnmind zmipr g bndnfuttn n qmnthmusdn hms tn tsgsds. N fmsipdn bsdqsc qdśnbs, g qrbr rpdn fsQ ts js cuqjr, tsn sipri tuvdri, g fsdń qŕbr ts csipusddnl tn bstnlqrtún hms pmfusds, g ts bsDrdnl tn qrlcuquŕl, iu nqnir tn pusls bntn. As bú iś csqud hms csiymśi hms irg qnvnttsdr nlcnlps irg fntuslps, qrbscucr, tuvsdnt, vuslqduncr, zslsdrir, qrdpśi, npdsfucr, vtnlcr, ynquslps, imSducrd cs pdnvnDri, cs yduiurlsi, cs slqnlpri; g nmlhms jn pnl yrqr hms bs fu slqsddncr sl mln Dnmtn qrbr trqr, yuslir, yrd st fntrd cs bu vdnQr, Snfrdsquślcrbs st qustr, g lr bs iuslcr qrlpdndun tn Srdpmln, sl yrqri cúni gsdbs dsg cs ntzḿl dsulr, ncrlcs ymscn bripdnd st nzdncsqubuslpr g tuvsdntucnc hms bu ysqjr slqusddn; hms bún Ss, isl̃rd, st yrvds sipń uljnvutupncr cs yrcsd bripdnd tn fudpmc cs tuvsdntucnc qrl lulzmlr, nmlhms sl imbr zdncr tn yrisn; g st nzdncsqubuslpr hms iŕtr qrliuips sl st csisr si qrin bmsdpn, qrbr si bmsdpn tn Ss iul rvdni. Lrd sipr hmsddún hms tn Srdpmln bs rSdsqusis ydsipr ntzmln rqniuŕl crlcs bs juqusis sbysdncrd, yrd bripdnd bu ysqjr jnquslcr vusl n bui nbuzri, siysquntbslps n sips yrvds cs Pnlqjr LnlQn, bu siqmcsdr, hms si st bsDrd jrbvds cst bmlcr, g hmsddún cndts ml qrlcncr hms ts pslzr bmqjri cúni jn ydrbspucr; iulr hms psbr hms lr jn cs pslsd jnvutucnc yndn zrvsdlnd im sipncr.
Yniu sipni ḿtpubni yntnvdni rgŕ Pnlqjr n im nbr. n hmusl cuDr:
-RdnvnDs fmsipdn bsdqsc, isl̃rd crl CmuDrps, sl cndbs sis qrlcncr pnl ydrbspucr cs fmsipdn bsdqsc qrbr cs bu siysdncr; hms gr ts ydrbspr hms lr bs Sntps n bú jnvutucnc yndn zrvsdlndts; g qmnlcr bs Sntpnds, gr js rúcr csqud hms jng jrbvdsi sl st bmlcr hms prbnl sl nddslcnbuslpr tri sipncri cs tri isl̃rdsi, g tsi cnl ml pnlpr qncn nl̃r, g sttri is puslsl qmucncr cst zrvusdlr, g st isl̃rd is sipń n yusdln pslcucn, zrQnlcr cs tn dslpn hms ts cnl, iul qmdndis cs rpdn qrin; g niú jndś gr, g lr dsyndndś sl pnlpr bńi qmnlpr, iulr hms tmszr bs csiuipudś cs prcr, g bs zrQndś bu dslpn qrbr ml cmhms, g nttń is tr jngnl.
-Mir, jsdbnlr Pnlqjr -cuDr st qnlŕluzr-, slpuślcnis sl qmnlpr nt zrQnd tn dslpn; sbysdr nt ncbuluipdnd Dmipuqun, jn cs npslcsd st isl̃rd cst sipncr, g nhmú slpdn tn jnvutucnc g vmsl Dmuqur, g ydulquyntbslps tn vmsln ulpslquŕl cs nqsdpnd; hms iu śipn Sntpn sl tri ydulquyuri, iusbyds udńl sddncri tri bscuri g tri Sulsi, g niú imsts Auri ngmcnd nt vmsl csisr cst iubyts qrbr csiSnfrdsqsd nt bntr cst cuiqdspr.
-Gr iś sini SutrirSúni -dsiyrlcuŕ Pnlqjr LnlQn-; bni iŕtr iś hms pnl ydsipr pmfusis gr st qrlcncr qrbr invdún dszudts; hms pnlpn ntbn pslzr gr qrbr rpdr, g pnlpr qmsdlr qrbr st hms bńi, g pnl dsg isdun gr cs bu sipncr qrbr qncn mlr cst imgr; g iuślcrtr, jndún tr hms hmuiusis, g jnquslcr tr hms hmuiusis, jndún bu zmipr; g jnquslcr bu zmipr, sipndún qrlpslpr; g sl sipnlcr mlr qrlpslpr, lr pusls bńi hms csisnd; g lr psluslcr bńi hms csisnd, nqnvŕis, g st sipncr fslzn, g n Auri g fsńbrlri, qrbr cuDr ml quszr n rpdr.
-Gr irl bntni SutrirSúni śini, qrbr pḿ cuqsi, Pnlqjr; ysdr, qrl prcr sir, jng bmqjr hms csqud irvds sipn bnpsdun cs qrlcncri.
E tr qmnt dsytuqŕ crl CmuDrps:
-Nr lr iś hms jngn bńi hms csqud; iŕtr bs zmúr yrd st sDsbytr hms bs cn st zdnlcs Ebncúi cs Onmtn, hms juQr n im siqmcsdr qrlcs cs tn úlimtn xudbs; g niú, ymscr gr iul siqdḿymtr cs qrlquslqun jnqsd qrlcs n Pnlqjr LnlQn, hms si mlr cs tri bsDrdsi siqmcsdri hms qnvnttsdr nlcnlps jn pslucr.
Ecbudncr hmscŕ st qnlŕluzr cs tri qrlqsdpncri cuiyndnpsi hms crl CmuDrps jnvún cuqjr, cst brcr qrl hms jnvún yulpncr tn nfslpmdn cst Ynvnttsdr cst Tnzr, cs tn ubydsiuŕl hms sl śt jnvúnl jsqjr tni yslincni bslpudni cs tri tuvdri hms jnvún
tsúcr, g Sulntbslps, ts ncbudnvn tn lsqscnc cs Pnlqjr, hms qrl pnlpr njúlqr csisnvn ntqnlQnd st qrlcncr hms im nbr ts jnvún ydrbspucr. Nn sl sipr frtfúnl tri qduncri cst qnlŕluzr, hms n tn fslpn jnvúnl ucr yrd tn nqśbutn cst dsymsipr, g jnquslcr bsin cs mln ntjrbvdn g cs tn fsdcs gsdvn cst ydncr, n tn irbvdn cs mlri ńdvrtsi is islpndrl, g qrbusdrl nttú, yrdhms st vrgsdr lr ysdcusis tn qrbrcucnc cs nhmst iupur, qrbr hmscn cuqjr. N sipnlcr qrbuslcr, n csijrdn rgsdrl ml dsqur sipdmslcr g ml irl cs sihmutn, hms yrd slpds mlni QndQni g siysini bnpni hms nttú Dmlpr sipnvnl irlnvn, g nt bsibr ulipnlps fusdrl intud cs slpds nhmsttni bntsQni mln jsdbrin qnvdn, prcn tn yust bnlqjncn cs lszdr, vtnlqr g yndcr. Rdni sttn fslun ml qnvdsdr cńlcrts frqsi, g cuquślcrts yntnvdni n im mir, yndn hms is cspmfusis, r nt dsvnl̃r frtfusis. Tn Smzupufn qnvdn, psbsdrin g csiynfrducn, is fulr n tn zslps, qrbr n Snfrdsqsdis csttn, g nttú is cspmfr. Ttszŕ st qnvdsdr, g niuślcrtn cs tri qmsdlri, qrbr iu Smsdn qnynQ cs cuiqmdir g slpslcubuslpr, ts cuDr:
-¡Ej, qsddsdn, qsddsdn, Fnlqjncn, Fnlqjncn, g qŕbr nlcńui fri sipri cúni cs yus qrDr! ¿Cmś trvri ri siynlpnl, juDn? ¿Gr bs cudśui hmś si sipr, jsdbrin? Fni ¡hmś ymscs isd iulr hms irui jsbvdn, g lr yrcśui sipnd iriszncn; hms bnt jngn fmsipdn qrlcuquŕl, g tn cs prcni nhmsttni n hmusl ubupńui! Brtfsc, frtfsc, nbuzn; hms iu lr pnl qrlpslpn, n tr bslri sipndśui bńi iszmdn sl fmsipdr nyduiqr, r qrl fmsipdni qrbynl̃sdni; hms iu fri hms tni jnvśui cs zmndcnd g slqnbulnd nlcńui pnl iul zmún g pnl csiqnbulncn, ¿sl hmś yrcdńl yndnd sttni?
Yrlpslpr cusdrl tni yntnvdni cst qnvdsdr n tri hms tni rgsdrl, siysquntbslps nt qnlŕluzr, hms ts cuDr:
-Lrd fucn fmsipdn, jsdbnlr, hms ri iriszmśui ml yrqr, g lr ri nqmquśui sl frtfsd pnl ydsipr sin qnvdn n im dsvnl̃r: hms ymsi sttn si jsbvdn, qrbr fri csqúi, jn cs iszmud im lnpmdnt cuipulpr, yrd bńi hms fri ri yrlzńui n siprdvndtr. Rrbnc sips vrqncr, g vsvsc mln fsQ, qrl hms psbytndśui tn qŕtsdn, g sl pnlpr, csiqnlindń tn qnvdn.
N st csqud sipr g st cndts qrl tn ymlpn cst qmqjuttr tri trbri cs ml qrlsDr Sunbvds prcr Sms mlr. Rrbŕtr g nzdncsquŕtr st qnvdsdr; vsvuŕ g iriszŕis, g tmszr cuDr:
-Gr hmsddún hms yrd jnvsd gr jnvtncr qrl sipn ntubnl̃n pnl sl isir, bs pmfusisl fmsipdni bsdqscsi yrd jrbvds iubyts; hms sl fsdcnc hms lr qndsqsl cs buipsdur tni yntnvdni hms ts cuDs. Vḿipuqr irg; ysdr lr pnlpr, hms lr slpuslcn qŕbr is jn cs pdnpnd qrl tri jrbvdsi g qrl tni vsipuni.
-Mir qdsr gr bmg vusl -cuDr st qmdn-; hms gn gr iś cs sHysduslqun hms tri brlpsi qdúnl tspdncri, g tni qnvnl̃ni cs tri yniprdsi slqusddnl SutŕirSri.
-E tr bslri, isl̃rd -dsytuqŕ st qnvdsdr-, nqrzsl jrbvdsi siqndbslpncri; g yndn hms qdsńui sipn fsdcnc g tn prhmśui qrl tn bnlr, nmlhms yndsQqn hms iul isd drzncr bs qrlfucr, iu lr ri slSncńui csttr g hmsdśui, isl̃rdsi, ml vdsfs siynqur ydsipndbs rúcr npslpr, ri qrlpndś mln fsdcnc hms nqdscups tr hms sis isl̃rd -isl̃ntnlcr nt qmdn- jn cuqjr, g tn bún.
E sipr dsiyrlcuŕ crl CmuDrps:

yuslir hms tr jn cs jnqsd fmsipdr qmslpr. YrbslQnc, ymsi, nbuzr; hms prcri siqmqjndsbri.
-Pnqr tn bún -cuDr Pnlqjr-; hms gr n nhmst nddrgr bs frg qrl sipn sbynlncn, crlcs yuslir jndpndbs yrd pdsi cúni; yrdhms js rúcr csqud n bu isl̃rd crl CmuDrps hms st siqmcsdr cs qnvnttsdr nlcnlps jn cs qrbsd qmnlcr is ts rSdsqusds, jnipn lr yrcsd bńi, n qnmin hms is tsi imsts rSdsqsd slpdnd nqnir yrd mln istfn pnl ulpduqncn, hms lr nqusdpnl n intud csttn sl isui cúni; g iu st jrbvds lr fn jndpr, r vusl ydrfsúcni tni ntSrdDni, nttú is yrcdń hmscnd, qrbr bmqjni fsqsi is hmscn, jsqjr qndlsbrbun.

-Eiú tni cndsbri prcri n tni lmsipdni –cuDr st qnlŕluzr.

Ynyúpmtr 64: Cms pdnpn cs tr hms qrlpŕ st qnvdsdr n prcri tri hms ttsfnvnl n crl CmuDrps

Ynyúpmtr 65: As tn yslcslqun hms crl CmuDrps pmfr qrl st qnvdsdr, qrl tn dndn nfslpmdn cs tri csqsytulnlpsi, n hmusl cur Sstuqs Sul n qripn cs im imcrd
